Text: If anything feels unfamiliar or unaccommodating, you can always ask me for help, Rover. This isn't only because you are our guest. It's just... you have no memory or any friends here in Jinzhou. I think there might be moments when you'd need me.

Since I became an Outrider, I've met people from all walks of life in the wild. Some always seemed in such haste, yet remained unsure where they were heading, and often ended up lost. On the other hand, those who had a clear destination in mind usually did make it, despite arduous roads and occasional stumbles. I aspire to be one of the latter, and leaving home for Jinzhou was the first step I took.

I've been able to hear what the Streams have to tell me for as long as I can remember. They are not sounds produced by the vibrations of air, nor sentences spoken in any known language. They are signals carried by the wind, tangible to me whenever I focus myself to feel those incorporeal, rippling airstreams. The wind that flowed beside my ears just whispered another spellbinding story. Do you wish to hear it?
It sucks that you can't remember your past, there must've been a lot of unforgettable memories. But no worries, we can create new ones. You and I, together!

You should check out Uncle Mahe's for freshest groceries and Auntie Panhua's for the best cuisines. Oh, I'm not saying this because we're related. The food's just that good! Say, I'll bring you over so you can give 'em a try yourself when we have the time.

Auntie Panhua always told me how tastebuds can store memories. Maybe the taste of a familiar dish could jog your memory? Even if that fails, a yummy meal will certainly lift your spirits! I want to make everyone happy, especially you.
Do you know? The little flower next to you really likes you! I heard it talking about it. Plants talk in a silent and sincere language. I can translate their talk for you, if you want.

You saw me in the Dim Forest late at night? My bad, I was probably too caught up waiting for a Noctemint to blossom to notice you. Those plants wait their whole lives for that one bloom. I think they'd be happy to have someone there, witnessing and recording it all.

O-of course we can talk about something other than plants. I do take breaks from the greenhouse, you know. Um... Do you like Morri Pot? The various types of mushrooms in it are so... What? M-mushrooms are not plants. They're fungi!
Stopping to relax once in a while serves for a stronger resonance with the world.
This is a testament to my connection with the world around me, and it's very much my companion now, bearing witness to everything I've experienced on this journey.
It is natural to feel dreadful of the unknown, yet... there are times when the unknown harbors hope, like how I can never know what else this power has to offer.

...Ah, apologies, I got sidetracked. My eyes... They see the original frequencies of all living beings. To me, every life appears blurry and chaotic, in the shape of their souls... I knew you were special the moment I laid eyes on you. Other than my lady Jinhsi, you are the only person who looks so clear and true. I just... I haven't gotten used to the sight of you.

We are all caught in an invisible wheel of karma. We live, we die, and we live again. As time passes, some are bound to leave us behind, having reached their journey's end. All we can do is keep them in our memories and continue forward, until our end comes... What is driving you forward on your journey, Rover?

What will I do if I can no longer stay with my lady? Should the day come, either I will have perished, or she will have accomplished her goals, and my service is no longer required. When the hour truly arrives, perhaps I will choose to live like you—as a roving traveler. It should be nice to join you on your journey.

Take your time and enjoy the journey. Don't hurry too much, or you may miss out on all the beautiful sights along the way. You don't want to reach the end of the road with nothing to show for it. Hehe... Just some tips from someone who's been there before.
I wasn't slacking off, really. I just needed to recharge a little... Aww, you don't believe me? Don't say that. I'll be so hurt.
It does get overwhelming with so many people counting on you. I know that feeling all too well... Worry not. You can relax a little more when you're with me.
Stopping to relax once in a while serves for a stronger resonance with the world.
This is a testament to my connection with the world around me, and it's very much my companion now, bearing witness to everything I've experienced on this journey.
It is natural to feel dreadful of the unknown, yet... there are times when the unknown harbors hope, like how I can never know what else this power has to offer.

You possess special powers related to sound. By observing you... I may be able to find a breakthrough in Ecoacoustics studies. If this ever makes you uncomfortable, please do let me know. Maintaining interpersonal relationships is not my strong suit, but I want to keep a balance between satiating my desire for knowledge and respecting your boundaries.

Some believe Remnant Creatures are embodiments of souls. Indeed, their frequencies are pure and clear—qualities commonly associated with the idea of a soul. That said, I have a question... You'tan stays with me because it embodies my ideals. Then, all those Mutterflies that are attracted to you... What do they represent that is yours? Perhaps... the answer lies within your lost memories.

My doubt of the then universally accepted Ecoacoustic theories provoked me to direct my research accordingly. I questioned the long-held notion that Remnant Creatures are intangible, and I continued to explore the possibilities, chasing every clue I could find. Eventually, I received a response from You'tan in one of the ruins, disproving that theory. Now, I am posed with a variety of other questions that I'm attempting to answer. I believe a claim is always verifiable before it is discredited entirely, and I will keep striving to uncover the truths.

Isn't weird that there's only one right answer to every question? I mean, even the Woolies in my box aren't all the same. They're not all cute and cuddly. Some may even have pointy teeth! Baa! ...You see?
Do you know what's under the Black Shores' base? Aalto and the others won't ever let me go near. Are they keeping cool stuff and scary things down there?

Cosmos said you smell full of stories, and Cloudly told me you've been to many, many places. So, here's Encore's question of the day... What does it feel like to walk at night, when there's no stars in the sky? And... how's it like to be out there in the wild, all by yourself?
Greetings, Rover whom I've come across in my journey. What are you travelling for? You can't quite recall? Hmm, no worries. I'm sure you will rediscover it along the way.

I was scared, too, when I first started travelling alone. Especially at night, I had this constant feeling of being followed. That's when I'd start chanting to myself, 'Keep going, don't look back'. Master always said that if I kept pushing forward, I'd eventually reach the light of dawn.

I've gotten used to walking in the dark, braving the ever-changing weather and rugged roads in the wilderness. That doesn't mean I'm letting my guard down. I'll always keep an eye on the shadows—I won't let them hurt anyone in my reach ever again.

Being a broker such as myself, it is essential to establish good relationships to maintain a stable customer base. You still have some uncertainties about this world, it seems. We should really establish a connection, you know? If there's ever anything you wish to know in the future, I'll make sure you receive the best price for my services.

Since we're buddies now, here's some quick business tips. Like they say in Huanglong, your sweet deal might be someone else's poison. It's all about perspective. You can sell the same intel for different prices depending on who you're selling to. Just a little bit of spin and you've got yourself a high-paying customer. Hmm? Nuh-uh, that's not lying! I'd like to call it reasonable strategy in meeting various demands.

Being popular attracts wealth… and sometimes unwanted attention. You get the occasional oddball who tries to push for a deal. Well, special customers call for special measures. If only all of 'em were as chill to talk to as you.

I have long been stationed in the borderlands, with little knowledge of entertainment or places of leisure. However, if you are looking for tactics against Tacet Discords or beautiful natural vistas, I can provide some suggestions.

While the borderlands cannot rival the city's clamor and glamor, they do possess their unique charm. Should you find time, I suggest you come and witness the full moon and twinkling stars that grace the tranquil night skies. Rest assured, your safety will not be a concern; I will be there with you.
The Midnight Rangers are a source of solace for many, while I see them as a scalpel, with the duty of eradicating maladies. Me? I am the hand that guides this scalpel, I suppose.
The Academy is working as fast as a Hoartoise. So many mysteries about you remain unanswered, yet my research proposals are still pending approval.

As a lone traveler, there must've been times when you were taken advantage of, but couldn't retaliate on the spot. If you ever find yourself in such a situation again... do not hesitate to bring me along.

Many believe having talent is a blessing, but ignore the curse that comes along: someday fate might take it away, quietly. Don't take your talent for granted—make the most of it, before it's too late.

Perhaps you haven't noticed, but you seem to always draw in some... rather interesting people. Not sure if it's a blessing or a curse for you, but it certainly makes my job easier... *chuckle* After all, my targets are usually the more peculiar types.

Contrary to what you may believe, many crimes are motivated by love and responsibility. Ironic, isn't it? The two fundamental values of human society can also lead to its downfall. When love becomes all-consuming and responsibility turns into obsession, crimes find fertile ground to thrive.

I've seen what you're capable of, so I'm not worried about you in a fair fight. That being said, not everyone plays fair. Just watch your back out there... wouldn't want you to get caught off your game.

The Streams make an unusual ripple whenever they flow beside you, as if they are being drawn to you once they come close. I don't know what that implies, but I'm sure I won't settle for standing aside and watching, no matter the implications. If circumstances permit, I want to face everything with you.

Call my name whenever you need me. From desolate lands to vibrant cities, from the beginning prologue to the final epilogue... no matter what awaits us in the end of this journey, no matter what kind of storm you are about to bring, I want to witness everything with you, as long as you'd let me.
Songs are resonating thoughts from the bottom of our hearts. They represent a person's truest feelings.
I want to do as much as I can for everyone in need, but if I take on more than I can handle... I guess it would only trouble those on the receiving end of my help, and burden me further.

Wuthercake is a national dish in Huanglong, though how it is made varies depending on the region. They make delicious Wuthercakes here in Jinzhou, but for me, homemade Wuthercakes are always the best. When we have the chance, would you come home with me, and have a taste of my mother's Wuthercakes?
Shouldn't we cherish all food and not let any go to waste? Oh... Well, if it's truly badly cooked, then.. uhm...

We all have an appreciation for beauty, but life isn't always full of it. I don't want to always rely on the comforts and safety others provide me with. I must be brave to face the ugly truth. I must be one that guards and gives.

Interested in my ribbon? It's a farewell gift from my mother back when I left for Jinzhou. I consider it a sign of a new chapter in my life, one which symbolizes rebirth. I hope it will continue to remind me I should always follow my heart.

My senses are sharper than most, though it used to cause me severe distress. Various stimuli seemed to come at me from all directions, slamming into my mind at once. I felt like a lone feather, tossed around in a wild storm. Don't worry... I am okay now. I have found a way to stabilize myself in the Streams, and it was the Stream's message that led me to you.

Today is very special. It's your big day. So... *clears throat* happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you... Rover, I hope I can sing for you on your birthday this year, then your next birthday, and then the birthday after your next birthday.
Buoyant and languid... where will the wind take you?
With every meeting... comes the inevitable parting. Let's not dwell on it.

I am Yangyang, a temporary Outrider of the Midnight Rangers, responsible for detecting and investigating anomalies. The Streams have guided me to you. I have a feeling we'll be companions for many moons to come.
Let's reach farther destinations together.
The skylark's song is about to sound.
I will do my best to help everyone.
The Streams are getting louder. What do they have to tell me?
I've never felt such strength in me. It's all thanks to you, isn't it? I am forever grateful, Rover, for everything you've done for me.
Streams are converging from all sides, and I stand in their midst, expecting the wind's arrival.
I dedicate my song to brilliance, braving the raging storm. The skylark in me has never soared higher into the heavens.
Precipitance.
Serenade.
Deference.
Storm, hear my command.
Let the winds roar.
Shape the shapeless.
*Effort Sound*
Ugh...I'm okay.
Doesn't... matter.
Don't worry.
I can... take it.
I should... Give it my all...
The wind... has stopped.
Sorry, I didn't...
Is this it... for me...
Please.
Synchronization.
Let me be your blade.
Against the winds.
*Effort Sound*

Overdash racing, hero plays, plus the secret bases out in the suburbs... There are so many more places that I want to take you to. I've never been hyped for days off like this before you came. It's amazing how time flies when we're together!

Even I can tell you're different from us... One day you'll leave for somewhere far away, right? Well, when the day comes, do take this Fiamma sticker, this wristlet I made, plus this jar of homemade Victor Savor... What? That's too much to carry? I-I just want you to think of me when we're not together!
The hero plays at Jinzhou Theater are the bee's knees! Especially during New Years, everyone would gather around to enjoy the plays, havin' a whale of a time.

You see, heroes can defeat bad guys with just a few whams 'n' bams in plays. But that isn't so easy in real life. They're like those pesky Excarats, you whack one here and another pops up somewhere else, like those TDs in the wilds, those no-good bandits, and those weirdos in red... Ahem. Anyway, just keep 'em comin' alright. I'll take 'em all on!
Victor Savor! That sauce is so good, you'll munch an old shoe with it.
What's there to be picky about? I'm good with any food, as long as it fills my tummy.
I've always wanted to become a hero! A hero matching Speedster and Fiamma, bringing hope and courage to all!
I used to fight with nothing more than my flames, but now I have these pistols. I'll hold on tight to whatever weapon I can have, so I can protect everyone!
I was really scared of the dark when I was little, but Fiamma would always arrive in time to drive it away. Now that I'm all grown up, I'm not scared anymore. I can be my own torch!
Happy Birthday! Try this, I made this bow of Maocai all by myself, with extra Victor Savor added just for you. Eat up while it's still steamin'! Don't worry about the spiciness, it's a good omen!
Another day, another heroic me!
Everyone's safe and sound? Looks like I didn't practice for nothing, then!
Ready to roll out anytime!
Jinzhou Patroller, Chixia. You can always call on me if you ever find yourself in a pickle!
You can count on me!
We're in this together!
I'll save the day!
Haha, feelin' generous are ya?
Huggghhh... I can feel the power! And the flames rising!
At this rate, the entire Jinzhou City... No wait. The entirety of Huanglong shall be known to the heroic Chixia's name!
I've become a Human Torch! I am flame! With this power, I can now protect everyone, including someone as strong as you!
Check this one out!
DAKKA DAKKA DAKKA DAKKA!
*Effort Sound*
Watch and learn!
Flame on!
Time for some hot action!
*Effort Sound*
Hmph! Won't happen again.
Play nice, will ya!
Tch... No biggie!
Still fine and dandy!
I can do this all day!
I must... protect...
Ugh...
A hero... will not...
Ally of Justice!
It's morphin' time!
Ooh, bring it on!
Up, up, and away!
Fhwip！
When you have the time, how about we take a walk together? The world is going to look very different when you don't have a particular destination in mind. Want to give it a try?

Sometimes, it feels like the two of us are dandelion seeds, drifting wherever the wind takes us. We have our ups and downs, just like weathering a storm, but one day we may finally land and flourish, after a good rain. Rover, as fellow travelers, let's embrace what lies ahead, wherever and whenever we may be. To me, that's what truly makes life worth living.

During my free time, I enjoy strolling around Jinzhou on my own. Every brick and tile looks slightly different from one another, and I can find resilient little flowers growing in the cracks. The streets are always bustling with people, and the smell of steaming food brings a cozy atmosphere. Whenever I wander around and take in all these sights and sensations, I feel... hmm, is invigorated the right word for it?

I’ve noticed a trend of people sharing Terminal-generated images online, saying those must be new plant species. While I understand their interest and curiosity, I'm worried this could mislead the public. As a botanist myself, I always try to be accurate and honest when I'm sharing information about plants. I've been wanting to find a way to help people tell the difference between fake images and real photos, but it seems there's still a lot of work to do. What should I do...
My mom always said milk would help me grow taller, like how plants need fertilizer. And every time I drink it, I feel warm and cozy. Maybe that's what happiness feels like.
I'm not a big fan of big, greasy dishes—like steaks... It's not that they aren't tasty, I just hate the idea of letting food go to waste if I can't finish it. It doesn't sit right with me...

Maintaining a balanced ecosystem is no easy feat, especially when it involves regulating the population of various species. But what if we could grow flowers that have a calming effect on the Tacet Discords? This could greatly reduce the strain on our frontline soldiers and potentially save lives.

My adventure journal isn't just about plants. Check it out - this story is about an old lady patiently waiting for a flower to bloom, and this one is about an adventurer going all out to snap a photo of a rare type of grass. Each leaf represents a unique story that has bloomed into something beautiful. I wrote them down to remember every one of these stories.

When I was little, I thought showcasing the beauty of flowers would make people appreciate and protect them... Reality hit me hard when I saw people plucking and flaunting expensive flowers instead. It used to upset me, but then I'd remind myself: Verina, remember the value of every plant's life. Remember what mom and dad had wanted you to do.

H-here. This Starflower is for you, and it represents... hope and miracles. Happy birthday! Sorry, I'm not really used to celebrating other people's birthdays yet, erm... Yeah. I just want you to always be happy, Rover.
Wow, such a rare species! It's my lucky day!
I wonder how they're growing...
Can you hear it? Shh... That's the sound of sprouting.

I'm Verina. If you come across any plants that pique your interest, do let me know! Huh? You want me to go on field researches with you? Of-of course! It's my honor. But it can get quite dangerous out in the wild. Please be careful and stay close to me.
Another field trip? I'm ready.
Hopefully we'll make new findings.
Shall we go sightseeing together?
Sprouting marks the inception of a plant's journey, a tiny miracle in motion.
As I grow, even my breaths feel lighter...
Now is the time to bloom... I didn't realize I was holding my breath. Look. It's so beautiful!
Look, it's bearing tiny fruits! Another miracle, but the journey of a plant doesn't end here.
Listen up!
Grow for me.
Photosynthesis.
Life is in everything.
Luminous energy!
Bask in the sunlight!
...Mommy!
Watch out.
*whimpers*
I can use some fertilizer.
I'm just low on fluids.
Now I'm super dehydrated...
Time to hibernate...
Withering... is natural to life...
My dreams... I haven't...
The fruit of evolution.
Imitation!
Bloom!
Hehe, I'm a dandelion!
Whoa!
We still have a long journey ahead of us. Let's press on.
Will there be new discoveries?
I will be there for everyone... As we head toward our shared future, leaving the past behind.
The world around me... I can hear it clearer now.
This power... it's mysterious, yet reassuring nonetheless.
I will need more time to acquaint myself with this unfamiliar world.
A new journey awaits? Brimming with novel sounds, stories, and... fragmented memories.
The place where the land ends is where the ocean begins. Our journey is far from ending.
The show begins.
Begone!
Break!
Disperse.
Sounds, come forth.
I sense your weakness.
No hesitation.
Strike from the shadows.
Shadow follows.
Checkmate.
No hesitation!
Nowhere to hide.
Endure and defy.
Shadow descends.
Moment of resonance.
The hour is upon us.
The end has come.
None shall whisper.
You will obey.
Down with the curtain.
*Effort Sound*
Ugh... Bad timing.
One more time.

Hmm? What am I thinking about, you ask? I'm wondering what is on your mind at the moment, Rover… I cannot tell your thoughts by observing your frequencies, because you look the way you are to me. Surprisingly... it feels good to not know what you're thinking.

There is karma in everything we do. The karma you plant at this moment will surely blossom and bear fruit sometime in the future… And for me? I am of course no exception. I believe it is no coincidence that we find ourselves here, together at this very moment.

Reciting the Heart Sutra brings calmness and enlightenment. Occasionally I would recite it for my lady Jinhsi, but she always started to grow sleepy after a while... You want to hear me recite the Sutra, too? But... you're not going to fall asleep as well, are you?

You're feeling cold? It's not that easy to keep my power in check—especially when I'm unable to suppress my emotions. Though it doesn't bring much harm, the coldness sometimes inevitably causes trouble for others. Do you not mind? Or... would you prefer to have me share the coldness with you?

There is a beverage in Jinzhou, brewed with the petals of a special kind of flower from the Central Plains. I find its mellow sweetness refreshing. People should consume it moderately, though, as dizziness is a common side effect. Me? Oh, I'm immune to that, of course.

If I must say, I'm not used to spicy foods... Hmm? You were planning to invite me to dine at Panhua Restaurant? Then to Panhua Restaurant, it is. I may not be fond of it, but I can still overcome mere spices.
This vision... is both a miracle and a curse. If I could ever get rid of it… No, there is no such possibility. If I must endure it for life, then I will turn it into a weapon for my use.

The delusion one feeds comes back to them in kind... This is what the abbot told me when he gave me these prayer beads. It was a warning for me, but moreso a reminder that everyone has their own demons to fight. Between good and evil lies a thin veil; it takes just one thought to pierce it. I should not be swayed by what others think of me, and instead focus on my spiritual growth to find liberation.

They once called me the Demon of Calamity... Now, I wield this demonic power to protect those dear to me. Rover... do you perceive me as an demon, too? I suppose it doesn't matter either way. No matter what you think of me, I am always ready to cut down any obstacles in your way, as my duty dictates.

Is this your real date of birth? The anniversary of your birth is very much worth celebrating, indeed. From that moment, your life started to unfold; countless karmic events have eventually led you here, standing right before me. This, perhaps, can be called a miracle—Happy Birthday, Rover.
Beautiful beings are beautiful... precisely because of their transiency.
What do I think of you? Your smile... It looks warm.
I should try to smile more, you say? ...Like this? No? ...Maybe like this? Hmm... I may have overdone it. Forget about it.
I am Sanhua, the bodyguard of Magistrate Jinhsi. If you plan to visit dangerous areas, please be sure to bring me along. I will ensure your safety.
Please don't stay too far away from me.
You can trust me to keep you safe.
I will cut down any threat in your way.
The souls... They look clearer to me.
Enlightenment lies in tireless pursuit.
Liberation comes from accepting change and transience.
Now, I am confident to not let you get harmed in the slightest.
Frost Bloom!
Engrave.
Cycle of corruption!
Shackles begone!
Like frigid depths!
Lotus pervade!
*Effort Sound*
You stay back.
My oversight.
Not worth mentioning.
I can keep going.
I won't... back down.
Suffering... transcends.
Karma has caught up to me...
I have failed you...
*Effort Sound*
A change of perception.
Stay behind me.
A good vantage point.
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
A worthwhile expedition.
Oh... I fell asleep? ...Hehe, I guess your presence just made me feel that much more at ease. You should get more rest too, Rover. Staying up late too much could lead to hair loss.

The danger in the air is palpable nowadays. I guess that's why you have come to our aid at a time like this. How unfortunate, I have been hoping to enjoy a peaceful life with you... Anyway. Rover, would you come a little closer? Let's have some leisurely time together, even if only for a little while.
Had a great sleep. Ugh... time for work... Gotta get up... but... still 'eepy... Just one more nap...

I am fully booked for afternoon consultings well into next year, and I heard someone is reselling bookings at high prices... I didn't know it would spiral into this. Honestly, I don't believe my input made much of a difference—in the end, it was up to themselves to solve their own issues.
I'm all about the easy-to-eat stuff. Give me some creamy, savory porridge any day. Can you help me out with this spoonful? It's a little bit too hot for my tongue.
Hmm... food that requires peeling, I guess. Why? It's too much hassle.

I really hate working. That said, I've got to put in some effort now so one day I won't have to work anymore. Haha, sure, I could just retire by myself if I want to... but I'm hoping to ease the load off of everyone else once and for all, so we can all enjoy a peaceful life together.
How do you like it here in Jinzhou? Enjoying your stay? It is my dream to make it a truly safe and cozy place to live, free from all the border city dangers.

In the past, my friends were always there for me, shielding me from harm. Their presence was steadfast like the city walls, providing me a great sense of security and comfort. That is why I am now driven to build stronger walls for all citizens of Jinzhou, so everyone can enjoy the same comfort and reassurance.
It's your birthday today. You should take a well-deserved rest. Let's nap together, shall we? I've got the comfiest sleep gear just for you. Sweet dreams, and happy birthday, dear.
Perfect weather for a walk today... Hmm, maybe not...
More paperwork? Let's see... *satisfied smile* All set. Now, what should I have for dinner?
Sometimes I pretend I was a cloud in the sky... Just drifting by as a soft and fluffy pile, without any worry.
Hi there, I'm Taoqi, in charge of border defense at the Ministry of Development. If you need my help, shoot me a message any time. I'll get back to you during work hours.
No need to rush. Everything will work out in due time.
I'll take good care of you.
Time to work? *chuckle* No more lazing around, then.
I feel so good right now, I'd say even better than when I just took a seven-day leave. Thank you for your help, Rover.
My heart is beating faster, and I can hear my blood rushing... This newfound strength is making me feel a bit restless. Maybe I should go get some sleep.
With more power comes more responsibility... I really don't want more work, but if it's you asking... I can do some overtime. Just a little.

Thank you. You're so reliable, my darling little one. Hmm? You might have actually lived longer than me. Hehe... Now that I'm stronger than ever, I just want to take care of you like a big sister. Can't you just let me?
I will protect.
Everyone, stand down.
Steady there.
Attack is the best defense.
Victory, guide my blade.
This... is my ground!
You got me there.
*pained sound*
Ugh, stay calm.
No biggie, just a scratch.
Time to focus.
It was my misstep...
I couldn't... protect...
I wasn't reliable enough...
Retreat to the bulwark.
Counting on you.
How reliable.
I got your back.
Wind in my aid.
Now I'm moving fast.
Let's take it slow.
*Effort Sound*
Excited for what's inside? Hehe, aren't you adorable.
We still have a long journey ahead of us. Let's press on.
Will there be new discoveries?
I will be there for everyone... As we head toward our shared future, leaving the past behind.
The world around me... I can hear it clearer now.
This power... it's mysterious, yet reassuring nonetheless.
I will need more time to learn about and acquaint myself with this unfamiliar world.
A new journey awaits? Brimming with novel sounds, stories, and... fragmented memories.
The place where the land ends is where the ocean begins. Our journey is far from ending.
The show begins.
Begone!
Break!
Disperse.
Sounds, come forth.
I sense your weakness.
No hesitation.
Strike from the shadows.
Shadow follows.
Checkmate.
No hesitation!
Nowhere to hide.
Endure and defy.
Shadow descends.
Moment of resonance.
The hour is upon us.
The end has come.
None shall whisper.
You will obey.
Down with the curtain.
*Effort Sound*
Ugh... Bad timing.
One more time.

The world is constantly changing, but every action has its consequences. Like a Goldberg machine, it may seem unpredictable, but if you trace the steps carefully, you can find a rational outcome. Therefore, we should exercise caution in our decisions to avoid any unwanted outcomes. Even if it means sacrificing comfort, I'm willing to go through complex procedures for accuracy. Rover, between facts and feelings, which holds more weight for you?

Strange. I was planning to study you as an observer, but now... I am the one opening up to you, telling you things I never thought I would. It feels almost as if... I want you to learn more about me, too. This isn't the plan I had, but somehow, I don't really mind. Perhaps... with more time together, I will deviate further from my usual self, and discover other unexpected feelings.

When I have the time, I travel around Huanglong to explore. I sample local delicacies, talk to people, and observe their daily lives. Theory alone cannot convey the full truth; to reach an accurate conclusion, I must experience it firsthand.

Two words with the same pronunciation do not make people laugh, but when used in certain contexts, people seem to automatically associate them with various meanings and burst into laughter... Puns and memes lack a clear definition. I find them difficult to understand.
Vegetables served cold are less prone to moisture loss, and they have a sweeter taste. I recommend iced Perilla salad if you enjoy vegetables, too.
Though fried foods can be delicious, it's best to enjoy them in moderation, due to their potential health risks.

I wouldn't call the emergence of Waveworn phenomena a 'disaster' that overturned mankind's established knowledge of the world. I believe it has broadened our horizons, prompting us to rethink and reconstruct our system of knowledge. Though we haven't made much progress yet, our continued effort will bring us closer to understanding.

I wear two rings on my hands. One of them is a reminder of what I should never forget, and the other is a symbol of what I should strive to achieve. My life is too short for trivial matters; I must carry on my pursuit in honor of our pioneers.

Withdraw a portion of one's ego, then attach it to the existence of another being in the form of vibrating energy... sounds incredible, doesn't it? It was in this manner that You'tan came into existence. I am yet to uncover all the secrets of the Remnant Creatures, but perhaps that's why You'tan responded to my call—so I may devote my life in search of the answer.

You deserve preferential treatment on the day of your birth... Yes, please lean in closer, just like that... You'tan's embrace soothes the body. It has never embraced anyone other than me before today. Happy birthday, Rover. You'tan and I wanted to do something for you. We hope you like it.
Why hesitate, if you know what you want?
An unwavering faith will resonate with like-minded souls.
I have the key to solving this question.

I am Baizhi, a researcher at the Huaxu Academy. I specialize in Ecoacoustic studies, and I'm always open to answering questions related to my field. Hmm... I don't mind other types of questions, but please note that I may not be able to answer all of them. It would be best to let me know what you are going to ask in advance, so I can prepare accordingly.
Talk is cheap. Show me the action.
May this journey bring us closer to the truth.
You'tan and I will ensure your safety.
My thoughts are clearing up, and my resonance with You'tan is getting stronger… This is all because of your help, isn't it?
In this world, there are only those things which are not yet known, not those which cannot be known. I seem to be one step closer to the truth I seek.
Your help has opened up a world of potential for You'tan and me. It feels a bit foreign to me to be presented with many options, instead of one single truth... but I rather enjoy this feeling.
You have helped me gain a previously unknown level of power; in return, I will use this power to its fullest extent for you.

At the end of a show, everybody yells Encore! really loud, then the curtains open, and they play another song. That's super cool, right? So... If you're friends with Encore, your story will never come to an end!

I've got lots of friends now, but sometimes in my dreams, I'm still all alone. Mommy's not with me anymore, and they say Cosmos and Cloudy are just my imaginary friends… Erm. C-can you hug me a little?
What have you been up to today? Did you have fun? Saw anything cool? C'mon, spill the beans! Encore loves stories! And the feelings people share... they're like one story after another!
Mommy... will you be there in my dreams?

Here! You can have this chocolate, and I'll take your Star Flakes! And presto! Now you have yummy chocolate, and I have chocolate-flavored Star Flakes! How's that for a deal? Psst, It's a little trade secret I got from Aalto!
Ooh… Watch out! The ghosts of food you didn't finish will crawl out of your tummy and give you bad dreams... Boo! Gotcha!
Maybe one day, Encore will go everywhere in the world and be a hero too. Hehe, but first, what's for breakfast tomorrow?
Cosmos and Cloudy are presents from mommy. They’re my best buddies! Don't worry, they're nice Woolies, they tell me lots and lots of stories!

Being happy is the bestest feeling, but it can't just be some pretend thing in a dream! Once upon a time, Encore was living in the happiest dream ever... but it had to stop, like all dreams do. Then when a dream is over, it's another brand new day ahead. Let's do our best!

The path of vengeance that I seek is destined to be filled with darkness and peril, like trudging alone through an endless night. Fortunately, with you around, I won't lose myself so easily.
With you by my side, I can fight without worry... Even if the crimson haze momentarily clouds my sight, you'll be there to help me break free from it, right?

I enjoy releasing lanterns into the sky, watching as the solitary lantern in my hand joins the beautiful sea of many lights, setting them free one by one. That sight always fills me with a nostalgic warmth.
Sometimes I get a little carried away in battles... I didn't startle you, did I?
Will there ever be Loong Whiskers Crisps that are as loooong as a real loong's whiskers? Aww, I really want to give them a try!
Star Flakes are pretty, but they're a pain to keep fresh. I once packed a pouchful of them to enjoy while I was out in the wild, and they quickly turned soggy and lost their crunch.
Wherever I go, I swear to vanquish evil, whether it's out in the daylight or hiding in the dark.
No matter what happens, no matter what I've been through, this jade pendant will forever stay clear and bright.

It's easy to cut down my enemies with a sword swing, but eradicating evil is not as simple. One oversight and it silently regenerates, ready to make a comeback... That's why I must uproot and shatter every trace of evil I see.
Happy Birthday, Rover! I made these Loong Whiskers Crisps to be as long as those of our great Sentinel. They say eating something long on your birthday makes you live long and prosper. Enjoy!

Info brokers love to play games with their words. You can't just believe everything they say, but you can't ignore them either. It's like trying to see through fog, but if you put in the effort, you'll uncover real gems hidden beneath their half-truths. But with me, it's easy. You know me, I've always been honest with you, buddy.

I've been told I'm all about networking, not real friendships. Well, can't say I'd deny that. I don't want anything getting in the way of my judgment, so I tend to keep things strictly business with everyone. But now, I guess you're different. You always are. You have a way of swaying my decisions just by being around, as my friend or not.

In our line of work, being too buddy-buddy with people and exposing weaknesses is a big no-no. Hmm… I can't say 'No' to you, I guess. I don't have anything in particular for hobbies, just some little mist tricks to give everyone a good laugh from time to time.
With everything in this world so unpredictable, why sweat yourself all the time? When you're feeling gloomy, just hit me up. I'll get you straightened out, no strings attached.

Encore's Coral Bowl looks weird, but it sure tastes great. It practically dissolves on your tongue and leaves a nice, mellow flavor. You should give it a try. C'mon, what's up with the side eye? You've got to trust me on this one. The stuff may look like coral, but it's completely harmless, really.

You know how some people make all kinds of excuses for their poor decisions? Take my old man, for example, pointing the finger at booze for his messed up life. Better stay away from things that numb your mind, don't you agree?
To live free as the mist and enjoy life while it lasts. Sounds wonderful, doesn't it?
Hmm, curious about what this is? Nope—not a bone flute, it's a tape recorder. Funny little devices like this always come in handy in a pinch. Why don't we get you some next time?

Believe it or not but when I was young, our house was like a revolving door for debt collectors, thanks to my dad's gambling habit. Boy, did I hate my life having to put up with it all back then. So hey, don't you think your poor buddy deserves a few extra clients, after everything he's been through?

Heya! Happy Birthday, my most special patron! Got you a custom-made mist-maker. It may not look like much, but all you have to do is give it a little twist to have mists of all shapes and sizes... And Voila! Here's a kitten for ya, how'd you like it? Now whenever you're feeling down, just turn your troubles into mist and watch them fade away.
Credibility in the name, and customer satisfaction is the game.
I never miss out on a good deal.
Here's a flower for ya.

Howdy! I'm Aalto, your go-to information broker. I've got all the info you need at fair prices. Knowledge about different places is key to staying ahead while you're out and about. Interested in a quote?
Any detail along the way could become valuable intel.
Nice pick! You won't regret choosing Aalto's service.
It's go time! You'll have my mist for escort.
Whew—I can make more mist now. Thanks, I'll offer you something extra next time.
Hmm? You never fail to impress. My mist can reach even further now. Sweet! And that'll be another intel on the house for ya!
Now I can switch between any kind of mist as I please. Much appreciated, bud! If you need anything, just ask away. I'll do my best to oblige!
Whoa, talk about sincerity. I'll make this worth your while, of course. My mist will be with you at all times, you can trust me to have your back.
Hey, over here!

Soldiers of the Midnight Rangers have entrusted their lives to me. Therefore, every time I wield the scalpel, I must do so with absolute precision so as not to betray their trust. One day, this scalpel will eradicate all Tacet Discords, and when that moment arrives, I hope you can witness it with me.

Flowers in the Knell Square are planted to honor the deceased. These flowers are of a unique variety, and they require significant attention. Here is a cultivation guide. If I fail to keep my promise of witnessing humanity's victory with you, please plant one of these flowers there for me.
Though I no longer practice medicine, I still discuss medical knowledge with my mother in my spare time. This gourd-shaped pill case is a gift from her the year I joined the Midnight Rangers.
In just a few days, a thin layer of dust has collected on my desk. Cleaning is not a challenge, but consistency is.

Jinzhou Stew is renowned for its wide variety of ingredients and easy preparation, making it a beloved homemade dish in Jinzhou. Having been stationed in the borderlands for most of my time, I sometimes miss that taste.

In Jinzhou, there is a vegetable known as Bittberry. It possesses a bitter and slightly astringent flavor, and is renowned for its detoxifying properties. When I was young, my mother was somehow convinced those who can endure bitterness will rise above others. She frequently incorporated this vegetable into our meals. I must confess that its taste was far from pleasant. However, now serving in the army, I have grown accustomed to its flavor. After all, resources are scarce, and it is crucial not to squander them.
If one day, the borderlands no longer need a general, I suppose my wish will have come true.
This spear was modeled after the weapon of Captain Beiwang, bearing the significance of quelling chaos and warding off external threats.

My family has been in the medical profession for generations. I once aspired to follow in their footsteps, saving lives and providing care. However, I soon realized that a doctor could never fully alleviate the pain caused by the Tacet Discords. It was this realization that led me to join the Midnight Rangers. Over the years, I have found my way of bringing solace to the world.

I have worn this vambrace since my first battle. It saved my life countless times. A vambrace like this is believed to bring good luck, ensuring the safe return of soldiers. Though it may show signs of wear, I wish to pass on this luck to you. Additionally, I have prepared a few travel essentials that I hope will prove useful. Happy birthday.
Victory will be ours.

Creating and sustaining connections requires reading between the lines, and speaking words that please... Even the same words can be interpreted differently, depending on the tone and context. It's too complicated for my liking. This is why I prefer straightforward individuals... and I'm glad you are one.

A powerful weapon can bring either justice, or devastation. The character and conviction of its wielder dictate how it's used, and that has a bearing on the judgement of those who crafted it. Now, if I entrust my works to you... to where will this decision lead me?

Music composition follows intricate regulations, much like balancing mathematical equations. This attention to rationalism is profound in classical music. I remember reading a score that sounded beautiful even when played in reverse. The composer was able to create something so mathematically precise, yet still kept all its beauty... I couldn't help wondering how.
Scientific research is but a tool. It's not magic. People tend to have unrealistic expectations about how research works, and you wouldn't want to be one of them.

I need an energy source to keep my brain going while I work, and sugar is the most effective choice. Candies always instantly improve my mood without leaving sticky residues on my fingers. Here, allow me to present you the Lemon Bomb, a proud work of mine. Care to have a taste?
It's important to take time savoring meals prepared with devotion and care, but never those shoddily manufactured instant foods; consuming them is only a disservice to my chewing muscles.

There is an abyssal gap between knowing and understanding. I once assumed I knew the suffering of people stricken by Tacet Discords, trapped in dread and hunger... After my departure from the New Federation, I realized how I wasn't even close to understanding any of them. Maybe there is still a gap between true understanding and what I know now; still, I must do what I can to remedy the situation, now that I am aware of it. I will create Tacetite weapons that are stronger than ever... and with that, grant humans the power to confront Tacet Discords.

Curious about this lighter? I use it to quell my temper when things get annoying. It's not about the flame that goes up in the instant; it's about the click it makes. Sounds nice, doesn't it? Try it yourself.

I knew a couple of researchers from the New Federation. Their worship of technology was fanatical, and it was exactly this fanaticism that clouded their judgment. They believed technological progress was an end in itself, rather than a means for achieving something else. As creators, we must recognize exactly what we are building, and for what purpose.

Happy birthday! I spend most of my time working in the lab, but days like this are not ones I'd easily forget. Here, I have made a multi-purpose tactical belt for you. This is the fifty-plus iteration of it, with an illuminator, a thruster, an air inflation module, and more. This should suffice for most situations you may encounter in the wild. If you want other features, come find me and I'll install them for you.
I still have much experiment data to process...
Precision, elegance, and harmony... These are the beautiful parallels between classical music and science.
With temperance and discipline, my flames will be kept in check.

Mortefi, researcher at Department of Safety, Huaxu Academy. For inquiries about Tacetite weapons, you may visit my lab. Make sure you know what you're talking about, though, before knocking at my door.
As always, I'm the one you need... I really can't win with you, can I? Let's just get this done.
Make this quick. I have experiments underway.

My thoughts feel sharper now... Wait, that could be an interesting concept. I should jot it down.

The Fractsidus... You've dealt with them before, correct? Though we still don't know their origins or motives, I do know one thing from experience—criminals are most dangerous when we don't understand their intentions. You may run into them again anytime, so stay vigilant.

Being a secret agent means constantly adapting to new identities. When the situation calls for it, I'm ready to shed any of my current personas and slip into a new one. But with you, perhaps I can just be myself, Yinlin... and no one else. It doesn't feel awful... to have someone who knows and remembers me for who I truly am.

Speaking of the puppet show... It's an old tradition in Huanglong, though not as popular here as in other places. Dollmaker taught me the tricks to help me manipulate my own puppet better. More importantly, it's a useful way to hide in plain sight while performing. I can teach you a move or two, if you're interested.

Lately, it seems I've been running into you a lot lately... Just a heads up, I like to stay under the radar, and being seen with someone as high profile as you tends to attract unwanted attention... *pause, sigh* Not that I don't want to see you, but you'll need to be more subtle than that.

I've tried many so-called delicacies through my job, but none has left a lasting impression like the plate of Aureate Fried Rice I once had. I believe it's not the fancy ingredients that make a dish truly special, but the skill and care put into its preparation.

Dining with a target requires always catering to their taste. When the food is subpar, I know how to choke it down with a grin. That's why there isn't any dishes I truly dislike... It's not the food that ruins a meal, but the company. With you by my side, I suppose I'd be pleased to eat anything.

A utopia free of all vices and crimes may sound tempting, but once you think about it, it is nothing more than a naïve dream. That's why we exist—to uncover the hidden and unapproachable darkness that the majority refuse to acknowledge, and do the dirty work in their place.
This puppet? I call it Zapstring. It used to be a basic puppet made by some novice, but I've revamped it for battle. It hasn't let me down yet, despite its wear and tear.

Members of the Séance Society were lured in by Dollmaker's false promises, but they too must bear responsibility for what had transpired. I can only hope that upon their release, they will break from the illusions of the past... Despite the loss of loved ones, life must continue.

Happy birthday... What's with that look? Come on, I promise it's really your special day. And no, I'm not playing any games this time. Oh well. I can already tell you have nothing planned, so... Will you let me have you all to myself, for the entire day?
Hehe...
No rush. The impatient ones will fall right into our lap.

Name's Yinlin. As for what I do... Shhh, we don't talk about that in public.
Anything you need me to deal with?
So we're teaming up? Fine, though I'm more used to fighting alone.

For us undercover agents, fighting skills are just the bare minimum. The key to success is having an unbreakable will.

Hello there. What will it be for today? Are you here to put in some extra work, or maybe just to loosen up a bit? Of couse, you're welcome for a chat, too. One moment, I'll go make some tea for you.

Exercising is essential for us martial artists. Other people may not find the same importance in exercise, since everyone has their own unique strengths. After all, we no longer live in a time where brute force is the only solution. Or rather, brute force never really solved anything.

Rumors have been circulating about me, and I don't intend to stop them. My story isn't particularly exciting, but people find amusement in talking about it, that doesn't bother me. And with words about me getting out there, I might end up reeling in a few dunderheads. Whatever impression others may have of me, I trust your judgment will not be swayed. Or, if I may say so, I am happy to accept whatever you think of me.

I did hurt people in the past, sometimes with my hands, and sometimes through other means. Back then, I had to take the initiative... to make sure no more innocent people would fall prey to them. I had experience handling such things, and that was why I felt obligated to help. But I'm not telling you this in response to the rumors. I believe friendship is built on mutual understanding, and now is a good time for you to get to know me better.

When it comes to the business world, one is often told that it’s impossible to find true friendship. I have to concede, nobody I’ve ever known has understood me as well as you do. Though my gym has many customers, you are the only one to have become a true friend of mine. You are, and will always be welcome at my gym, my friend.
A steaming cup of tea makes an excellent remedy for sore muscles after an intense workout. It's quite effective, you should give it a try.

Nestled between the borders, Jinzhou is subject to ever-changing weather. Sustaining the dried fish I've been making for Mimi has been a difficult task... Hmm, I suppose a solution will come to me in due time.

The solid ingredients of Jinzhou Stew blend effortlessly to form a simple dish. Back in the days when I had to live far away from home, it was the only dish that I could recreate to make me feel close to my roots. I can never have enough of it.
I'm not a big fan of foods that are hard to chew… Oh, it's got nothing to do with my teeth. I'm just not fond of the prickling sensation of stickiness in my mouth.
Well... I just want to maintain the stability I currently enjoy, and maybe keep my hometown safe, if I get the luxury to, haha.
Have I been keeping some kind of secret healthy drink in this flask, you ask? *chuckle* It's really just regular hot tea.

The stiffest tree is often broken by the harshest of winds, whereas the bamboo and willow survive by bending along. Finding harmony between strength and adaptability is integral to lasting success, be it in martial arts, commerce, or all aspects of life.

You're always tied up with affairs, how about relaxing a bit for a change on your birthday? Here, I got you an ordermade messager, some Angelica Tea leaves, and a personalized health management planner for the upcoming year. You really should prioritize your health. Self-care comes before anything else, including helping other people, my friend.
Oh? *chuckles*... Did you smell the dried fish I have?
