Now, what do we have here? Ya can't hide from me!
Growing against wind.
Speeding up!
A pleasant discovery.
Woohoo—
Woolies, let's race!
Woolies, keep up!
Ooh, shiny! It's gotta be a dragon's treasure!
*Effort Sound*
Good. There's no time to waste.
*Effort Sound*
Not bad. Found any keepers?
Might come in handy later.

Size isn't everything, you know. I may not look it, but I've got quite a bit of strength that lets me handle any physical work no problem! If you ever need a hand, just let me know! I'm always happy to help out!

Curious about these bandages? They're mostly from my liondance rehearsals, and the rest, well, I got them from my battles in the wild. What about the bandages on your wrist, battle scars too? Wish I could have protected you... I'd rather take the hit myself any day over seeing someone hurt.

On the dangerous frontiers where we suffered immense losses, it was General Jiyan who stepped up to protect everyone, making all the tough decisions to ensure our safety. As the backbone of the Midnight Rangers, he has led us to countless victories as our Qingloong. The weight on his shoulders is beyond our imagination.

When in trouble, ask Chixia, the Ally of Justice! This statement, while playful, rings very true. With her surging passion, seasoned prowess, and abundant vigor, Chixia already meets every quality a hero should have, helping the people in need.

Baizhi has a unique approach to comprehending and accomplishing tasks, but that doesn't make her a difficult person to talk to. When you ask her for help, you may notice a flicker of surprise on her face, but you will never receive a refusal.

I met Danjin a few times on different occasions. I could tell how much she values justice. She is very clear about when to unsheath her blade, and for what she fights, despite being surprisingly young. Her actions reflect her belief in an ideal world—one that she is determined to create.

Ms. Taoqi is always gracefully poised. She is the kind of person to quickly produce multiple solutions with ease in the most urgent situations, with a smile on her face: Don't worry. I've got it sorted. Her seemingly unhurried demeanor must have been earned through hard work that we don't know about.
The Streams have guided me to you. I have a feeling we'll be companions for many moons to come.

This is it... Rover, you have already done so much for me, I shouldn't ask for more. From now on, I want to be the one taking care of you. Please... will you let me? I hope I can be the one to embrace all that you are, and share with you all that you carry.
Tempest.
Shall we take a look?
This is the answer to our endeavor.
This should suffice for a while.
Yangyang's such a darling, even her words sound pretty! Sometimes I can't quite get what she says though. Whatcha call those again? Ah, poems, I think!
Speaking of Baizhi, she's not the talkative type. Don't get me wrong, she's not an Ice Queen! She just has her own ways of expressing emotions. You'll get it once you've spent enough time with her.

She was once the thunder that lit up my path ahead. I've always wanted to be like her, until I realized not everyone had that power. Now, I am happy with being a small flicker of flame, doing what I can to help people around me.

Sometimes they'd perform lion dance between hero plays. That leading dancer, Lingyang, can put on quite a show for a small guy like him! The way he moves and swings around really makes for an awesome lion!
You don't talk much, but you're so strong in battle. There's a good old Huanglong saying, A cat that catches mice doesn't meow. Fits perfectly on you, doesn't it?
Chixia, Ally of Justice, at your service! Are you the one in need of a hero?

Whoa! You've made me so much stronger than I could have ever imagined! Now I'm finally the superhero I've always wanted to be! You've been here for me every step of the way, and you'll forever be the one I want to protect the most!
*Effort Sound*
Makin' 'em count!
Easy peasy. Lemon squeezy!
Heads up!
All fired up!
*Effort Sound*
One shot, one kill!
Boom! Headshot!
*Effort Sound*
PEW PEW PEW!
Sucks to be you!
Comin' in hot!
Close one!
Let's give 'em hell!
Ooh! What's that!
Lucky me, lucky you!
Ohhh... please have something good this time!

Miss Yangyang was curious about my plant growing skills, and she asked me many questions earlier. Then, she patiently listened to me explaining details for a long, long time. Hanging out with her feels like basking in a gentle breeze.
Miss Chixia once fed me a spoonful of her Victor Savor... I-I couldn't believe how spicy it was! What kind of pepper was that? Ow, my mouth still burns just thinking about it.

Did you know? Baizhi is actually an old name for Angelica, a plant that can bloom beautiful flowers in freezing temperatures. It kinda makes me think of Miss Baizhi herself—some might say she seems a bit chilly, but I have a feeling she's got a warm and gentle heart underneath.

Mr. Mortefi's dedication to his work is remarkable, but I do worry about his well-being... I mean, we all know how important the research project is, but a good night's sleep is just as crucial! Whenever I go and check on the nocturnal plants at night, I can see the lights on in his lab from a distance.

Little Encore is full of intriguing ideas, and she always has a lot of curious questions to ask. Hmm... I've got to keep looking for all the answers she wants. Oh, you're wondering why I call her little? Hehe, we're just playing big sister and little baby.

I remember meeting Mr. Calcharo when I was out collecting data in the wild. At first, he didn't seem very approachable... but then he gave me some flower seeds, all super rare species. He's so awesome.
This flower is for you. I hope it makes you happy!

As of late, my thoughts have turned to the wondrous ways in which life flourishes. The fish dance in the sea, the trees root deep in the earth, and the birds take flight in the sky...all thriving and growing in unique ways. You seem to always inspire me to new wonders, too... Would you like to hear about them?
Wow, what is that?
Are those little flowers growing inside?
It's nature's gift! Let's keep it well.
*Exhale*
Keep it together.
Last chance...
I must not... falter.
Is this the end...
Sounds... are fading...
Hopefully this helps.
One with the sounds.
Swift and resolute.
Leave it to me.
Wind guide me.
*Effort Sound*
Seems like a new discovery.
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
An unexpected discovery.
Remnants of the past.
Cherish every gain.
*Exhale*
Last chance.
Last chance...
I must not... falter.
Is this the end...
Sounds... are fading...
Hopefully this helps.
One with the sounds.
Swift and resolute.
Leave it to me.
Wind guide me.
*Effort Sound*
Seems like a new discovery.
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
An unexpected discovery.
Remnants of the past.
Cherish every gain.

Lately, my lady prefers to wake up earlier, so I've been waking her up on time every day… Huh? She sometimes prefer to stay in bed a bit longer?! Is that what she told you? What else did she say? Please, do tell me in detail.
Jianxin... her soul has a beautiful golden hue, and she is a person of respectable character.

That young liondancer? His soul appears in a unique shape, similar to that of an animal... I'm a little ashamed to admit that I once mistook him for a beast from the wild... Ahem. Don't worry, I have since made a formal apology to him, and we've cleared up the misunderstanding.

Baizhi is a brilliant scholar. I once worked with her on a collaborative project, assigned by Madam Magistrate. She will no doubt become a prominent scholar at the Huaxu Academy, and eventually a significant contributor to the study of Remnant Ecoacoustics in Huanglong.
Greetings, Rover. I will escort you for the time being.

Rover. I joined your side because of my lady's orders, and I will continue to stay with you for the days to come... It has nothing to do with my duties now. I make this vow of my own volition, just for you.
Extinguish!
Be alert.
Caution is advised.
Unexpected discovery?
My luck seems better with you around.
Found something you like? Keep them as you will.

People think Lady Jinhsi is too young to lead, but I don't see the problem. Her young age may be seen as a disadvantage, but it's also her greatest strength. As we work on moving Jinzhou forward, she will go further and accomplish more than any of us can imagine.

Oh, I wish I had someone like Sanhua. Imagine how much easier my work would be with her help. Where on earth did Lady Jinhsi find herself such an incredible bodyguard? I'll have to ask her about it next time we meet.

Mr. Xiangli? Yes, he is a great collaborator of ours at the Ministry of Development. Our work partially overlaps with the Academy's research projects, and I consult him daily. Despite his genius intellect and quick thinking, I have no issue keeping up with his ideas.

General Jiyan's schedule is always so impossibly tight... He seems to keep finding more issues to take care of, like a devoted parent who never allows himself any rest. Maybe it's his doctor instincts, always putting others first. I really hope he can take some time off for his own well-being.
Time for another afternoon consultation, I see. What's on your mind today?

You have opened my eyes to things I've never noticed before. Safety isn't found in one person building a wall. It comes from supporting each other, and cherishing shared moments. Thank you for always being here for me. If we could stay like this forever, I... Hmm? You didn't catch that last sentence? Hehe, I'll say it again for you, then...
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
Now... It’s my turn.
Let's watch out.
Hmm... Found something interesting.
My luck seems good like always.
The more the merrier.
Some people are good at listening, while some are good at counseling others. Yangyang is good at both. With her, you can just be yourself.

When I first met Chixia, I was indeed a bit overwhelmed... She was always vibrant and lively, and her way of thinking was very different from mine. As our understanding of each other grew, we created a unique synergy. Our differences complemented each other perfectly.

We didn't converse frequently, but our cooperation was always seamless. He may experience minor inflammation-related health issues because of his Resonance Ability, so I suggest bringing him Bittberry tea next time. A single cup can relieve his symptoms for a whole day.
His good temper is almost as impressive as the exceptional talent he has. I've never seen him raise his voice in anger at anyone. No matter how impossible the task sounds, he always delivers.

The tea Mr. Yuanwu brews always tastes sweeter than those served in teahouses, even if the same recipe and ingredients were used. He told me it was only because he put his sincerity into it. Sincerity... How does it affect the flavor of tea?
I am Baizhi, a researcher at the Huaxu Academy. Let me witness where this encounter will take us.

Once again, you have demonstrated an unimaginable feat. But compared with how it worked, I am now more curious about you as a person. What kind of new possibilities are you going to show me? I have never felt so much anticipation before... Clearly, you are special to me unlike anyone else.
*Effort Sound*
Conception.
Tranquility.
I stand ready.
A new discovery.
A time well spent.
You found it, and it's yours to keep.
Aalto's money this and money that all day, but did you know? Sometimes he helps people for free! He just wouldn't tell me why... Hmph. Then it's up to me to find out!

Verina's flowers are grown with love! Nothing like the ones they sell in the New Federation! But some of them looked a bit wacky, like the one that gobbled down on Aalto's head and gave him a new haircut… Gotta ask her what it's called next time!
Friends in Jinzhou told me Mortefi makes lots of fun gadgets and gizmos! That's so cool! Hmm, should I ask him for a bouncy sheep next time...
Psst. Wanna hear a secret? That strange big guy Aalto's been working with is actually... a doggy person! That's why he's a big doggy in Encore's stories!
Grown-ups like him have to wear a long face all the time, you know. See? Being a grown-up is really tough!
Miss Chixia is another one of Encore's besties! She can get a bit strict sometimes, but in a good way! You can call her when you're lost in town, she doesn't mind the extra work.
Woah! Hey! Woolies, make some room! I wanna look, see? ...Black Shores member, Encore, reporting in!
Your adventure sounds so much fun! Encore really wanna go! Promise you'll take me next time? Pinky swear!
Take this!
Snip-Snap!
Wooly Stampede!
Wooly, thataway!
*Effort Sound*
Baa baa! It’s treasure!
There has to be more. Right?
Finders keepers!

Mortefi may seem a bit intimidating, but he's actually quite nice. Once my blade got really worn out, and Mortefi repaired it for me. To repay his kindness, that week I wiped out several groups of bandits eyeing the Tacetite weapons he developed... He ended up having to repair it for me again.
You can never go wrong by taking lost children to Chixia. While some kids may find me scary, they would never be scared of her.

The familiar sight of Yinlin's thunder always reassures me that the upcoming battle will be a breeze. Though, I must admit, it took me until at least our tenth collaboration to finally learn her name... Embarrassingly so.
When I just met Yangyang, I had been curious how someone could always be such a sweetheart. Later, I finally learned how gentleness with boundary has a powerful strength of its own.
You always act first in the face of injustice, despite having lost all memories... You must always have been a righteous person, right? I'd be very troubled if it turned out otherwise.
Ranger, Danjin. Worry not, my Crimson Blade will not harm you as long as you haven't done anything bad.

My eyes have been opened... I'm starting to realize how there's so much more to the world than just fighting for justice. There are countless amazing things waiting to be discovered, and the best part is having you by my side.
Harmonize!
Vanquish!
Oblivion!
Scarlet... perfuse.
The hunt is on.
Oh?
These'll last a while.
Some Loong Whiskers Crisps would be great...

Sometimes not even I can figure out just where Encore's getting all that energy from. As soon as we arrive somewhere, she's off making friends and sharing stories with the local kids in no time. I even got some of my intel from her buddies, believe it or not.

Being the Jinzhou Garrison's General is no walk in the park. You gotta have that big-picture thinking, be on top of everything, and make decisions like they're nothing. Just take a look at General Jiyan—he's got all those boxes checked off and then some.

Oh, Miss Chixia. Our first convo didn't go quite as planned. I was doing some business in Jinzhou at the time, then she tried to arrest me, probably thought I was some crook. Lucky for me we worked it out later.

Miss Yangyang? We haven't talked much, but the way she can tap into the Streams for intel is definitely something. As someone in the information game, that really sounds handy. I should see if she's interested in being my informant.
Hmm… Seems unlikely she'll ever be my client. She's the type of person to trust the conclusions from her own research over information provided by anyone else.
The Academy's red-haired international research fellow? I heard he's got a way of handling difficult clients. Actually... I was thinking about asking him for some pointers.
I always enjoy doing business with a Ghost Hound. They keep things clean, They're straightforward, and they don't goof around.

That little girl from Rigg's Explorers? Yeah, I bumped into her once, back in the New Federation. Offered me a Starflower for the whereabouts of her mother. But the deal fell through, because she didn't have what I was asking for. And what was that, you ask? Well… I asked for a never-withering flower. In reply, she told me plants have their life cycle, and wilting is just a natural part of it. I remember telling her, The same can be said for humans.

Say, buddy, we should probably take care of those bills you owe me. Let's see here… Hmm, you know what? I actually made a good chunk of change from the intel you asked for, so why don't we just call it even? Swing by anytime and let's do more business!
Seems like a new lead.
Now, that's a total steal.
Aaand… What's inside mystery box No. 01!?

Others often perceive Mortefi as arrogant and unapproachable, but, in fact, he is not that hard to talk to. Remember to be direct with him, as trying to be overly polite and subtle may only lead to misunderstandings.

The battle Magistrate Jinhsi has been taking on may prove more complicated than our situation in the borderlands: stipulating rules, overseeing trade, ensuring the well-being of the people, and managing the city's functioning all demand her coordination and judgement. Every time I return to Jinzhou, I can feel the city's vibrancy and enthusiasm, all thanks to her meticulous governance.

Taoqi... Though our views on loose management don't always align, I am able to focus on the front lines without any worries, thanks to her effective leadership in maintaining Jinzhou's fortifications.

She can perceive minute changes in the surroundings from the Streams, but there is a limit to the amount of information a single person can take in. Excessive use of this ability might add to her burden, and I hope she won't strain herself.
Many stumble through life directionless, without ever finding a purpose. Baizhi is among the rare few who have found their calling, and she is willing to give up anything for the truth she pursues.
That energetic and passionate Patroller? Yes, I have heard of her. She has been devoting her time to protecting the dreams of children in Jinzhou.

Fog can be an enemy to soldiers on the march, as it limits visibility and complicates situational awareness. However, deploying fog strategically can be an effective move on the battlefield. I have had the opportunity to work with Aalto before, and he is an interesting person indeed.
Are you referring to the little girl who is always seen by Aalto's side? I have met her once. She and Aalto complement each other perfectly, personality wise.
I have never regretted braving the long night.
Stay sharp.
Approach with tact.
For emergencies.
Wouldn't hurt to be more prepared.

It was Jiyan who rescued me from the wilderness and referred me to the Academy, and I've been thankful for that... I have solved a lot of problems for him in return, of course. For example, all the Midnight Rangers currently use a one-piece medical kit of my design.
That girl, I think the name is Yangyang. I hear her humming from time to time. Surprisingly, her melodies always bring my mind to peace.

Baizhi and I are almost colleagues, though we don't work in the same department. I've only interacted with her briefly on a few occasions, but I had the chance to read some of her writings. Her paper was well-thought-out and carefully expressed, featuring an intriguing perspective. If I may comment, she is an excellent scholar of Remnant Creatures.

Speaking of Chixia, she's a regular visitor at my lab, often bringing children along. She's a straightforward person, which I like. Besides, those who get along with kids are never bad people. Kids are incredibly perceptive of a person's true character.
That Xiangli Yao... One day I'll outdo him, and create even better inventions!
Quit the chit-chat. Tell me what you need and I'll make it for you, provided your descriptions are reasonable.

Come find me when you need something made. Come find me... when you don't, too. Just idling by together, listening to music and indulging in some sweets... I'll be looking forward to that, if you're here with me.
Inferno!
Burn!
As you wish!
Hmph... Quite good at hiding, aren't you?
Tsk, the quality... Nevermind.
Better than nothing.

Misconceptions about us abound. Violence is just one tool in our arsenal, not our sole means to an end. Cooperation is our usual aim, but in a world of betrayal and deception, we must make sure backstabbing us is never worth the risk. To maintain efficient cooperation, we demand an ironclad contract with consequences... and that's where necessary violence comes in play.

You're quite good with your sword, but in a world like this, fighting alone will not suffice. Picture this: a single hound may not scare you, but what about a pack? Fear creeps in as you're trapped alone, with no one to guard your back, surrounded by enemies on all fronts. They aren't leaving without blood. Strength comes in numbers... Keep that in mind.

As a leader, one must excel in the art of deception, projecting an image of unwavering composure and offering false reassurance... Every decision you make could change lives. If a day comes when you are in charge of other people, or even the entire world, what choices will you make? Will you bear the weight of their fate, or prioritize your own desires above all else?

You've done your homework on us, it seems. As mercenaries, we take on any job and always deliver... The pay is our only concern. Wherever war and chaos go, the Ghost Hounds will follow. We exist, because there is always demand for our service. How do you perceive us? Though I couldn't care less about others' opinions... I'm open to your thoughts.

Someday, I may need your aid. If my actions steer the Ghost Hounds off course, I'll count on you to right my wrongs... or put an end to my existence. For now, I am happy to enjoy our current alliance.
Search, rescue, transportation, recon, group combat... Dogs are loyal and skilled in many ways. Me? I don't keep dogs. It's too dangerous... for the dogs, that is.
Hopefully, my guys aren't stirring up too much trouble back at the base...
Huanglong's emergency rations. They taste slightly better than those made elsewhere.
...Out in the wild, food preferences don't matter. I only care about what's edible.
Humans or Tacet Discords, I'll eradicate any danger to the Ghost Hounds. It is my sole focus to protect my people, and secure any form of momentary respite when I can.

The deaths of our kind are likely to go unnoticed. It's our destiny—fleeting, like dust in the wind. Each of us bears a dog tag with our name and story etched upon it, as a form of legacy... A symbol of our existence, no less than a declaration of it.

In the Underworld, it's all about survival of the fittest. Either you dominate as the apex predator, or you're doomed to be devoured by those above you. It's the brutal law of the land. In a world where might makes right, we must rise to the very top to remain free from others' schemes, and preserve our autonomy.

He's a capable leader. He once recommended me an ancient tome on the art of war from Huanglong, one that I regret not acquiring sooner—it could have saved me some effort. As for the deal between us... *scoff* It was merely an exchange of interests. Nothing more.

Pretentious, arrogant, and self-absorbed... That man epitomizes every trait associated with those snooty New Federation nobles. That said, I cannot deny his talent in crafting Tacetite Weapons. I can arrange a meeting with our trusted arms dealer, if he's interested.
Need to reach Aalto? Here's his contact. Mention my name for a twenty percent discount.
Yinlin? That undercover agent who infiltrated my group? *huff* Easy there. I didn't give her a hard time, provided she always stayed in her lane.
I met her once. A prodigy in the field of botany at such a young age... Impressive.
Happy birthday. Is there anyone or anything bothering you? On this special day, I can offer my services at a discounted price to help rid you of your problems.
Keep your fangs sharp.
*Effort Sound*
...I see my way clear.
Calcharo, leader of the Ghost Hounds Mercenary Group. I suppose you've heard about what we do. Don't worry, your safety as my client will be guaranteed until the job is done.
I'll handle your commission, alone.
You should have the payment ready by now.
Curious you'd want me to join you in person...
Let's see if the gains will be worth the effort.
This power you just gave me... Do you always trust others so easily?
...Your kindness, I have certainly received. Naturally, I'll work for you in return.
Follow our rules and never betray us. As long as I'm alive, the name Ghost Hounds should command enough respect to grant you free reign over the continent.
*amused huff* Impressive, you've got a much bigger ambition than I thought. The offer you made is too enticing to ignore... Very well. I will repay you with my unwavering loyalty.

I owe you a debt that cannot be easily repaid. The Ghost Hounds have their stance to maintain, and I cannot make decisions for my people lightly. However, I am willing to accept this contract... on my own terms. Speak, and your wish will be granted, no questions asked.
Sever!
Strike!
Exterminate!
War spares no one!
Misery follows!
Unleash the fangs!
Let slip the dogs of war!
Saw that coming.
Weaklings.
Do your worst.
Pointless.
Caught you.
Too slow.
Now!
Crush.
Shred.
No escape.
Stay put.
Caution.
*Effort Sound*
Stay calm.
The dice is cast.
Stand down.
Live... no matter what...
My day... has come...
I can hear the... calling...
Fight for me.
All is fair in war.
Target confirmed.
Who's the prey now?
Keep your eyes open.
*Effort Sound*
Nowhere to hide.
It's time.
Follow me.
The loot we find is not part of my pay. It's all yours.
I trust you can use it to the full.
...This should come in handy.
I guess you can say Chixia is a younger colleague of mine. She is a natural fit for the Patroller position. With time and experience, she will surely excel in her role.

Being skilled as a Patroller doesn't necessarily make one suited for undercover work, but curiously enough I see potential in you. Have you considered applying to the Bureau? Just kidding, unless you're interested.
What's that look on your face? Surprised to see me?

This special power you have entrusted me... Should I take it as a sign of trust in my abilities? Or...perhaps a token of affection for me? Either way, I appreciate the gesture. Your straightforwardness is quite endearing.
Cleave it!
Begone!
Back off!
*huff* Think you've got the permission?
You're not getting away.
Hmph... Now you'll behave.
Crush them!
Your time is over!
Don't blink!
Zapstring, our turn.
*huff* Found it.
All yours. You're welcome.
*Effort Sound*

Lingyang often visits my gym to play with Mimi just outside the front doors, always carrying a couple of fresh tetras as treats. I guess it might be his thank-you to Mimi for all the agility training they had done together. He sure is a thoughtful young man.

I am more than happy to get an outstanding training partner like Jianxin by merely offering her a simple meal... Of course, I'm always pleased to spend time with her over a meal, whether she's here to train with me or not.
I can sense a dangerous aura from Danjin's way of fighting... I'm worried that she may have far too much burden on her shoulders at such a young age.
Every morning, when I opened the gym, Chixia was already patrolling the street with exuberant energy. *chuckle*... I must keep up with my exercises too. Can't be outdone by the younger generations.
Your poise and comfidence are impressive. Such remarkable character can't possibly be built overnight. I can tell you've experienced far more than I have.
Whether you need help with working out or maintaining your health, feel free to come by my gym. We welcome all visitors.

Since you've gifted me such a precious treasure, I should give you a matching gift in return. Please, take this Tea Pet—it grants you free access to all the boxing gyms and teahouses in Huanglong. And... if you ever need me, just hand it to any one of the shopkeepers. I will come to your aid as soon as possible, no matter what.
Rumble in all directions.
Maximum voltage.
Careful.
Nice. Let's go check it out.
Found what you're looking for? Good.
Now that's quite the discovery.

Words hold incredible power. In Huanglong, we believe spoken words may manifest into reality. Then if even jokes have a chance to come true, why not good wishes and blessings? That's why we should always express our positive thoughts out loud. Who knows, maybe there is a higher power listening and ready to grant our desires. So, I make sure to say my Lucky Greetings to everyone, as often as possible!

I wish I could show you my hometown, but it's not the same anymore. It's been turned into a Tacet Field, without any life or joy. I prefer living in vibrant places, where there's energy and excitement. But one day, when we overcome the Lament and bring back the beauty of this land, I'll take you there. You'll see the tallest trees, twinkling fireflies, and a river glittering with stars... Yes, we'll see that day...

I'm no longer afraid of letting people see my real appearance, but... I guess I still look rather different, and not everyone is so accepting of that. Sometimes I just want to lend a helping hand, and they'd assume I'm trying to claw at them or something... Erm, what do you think, Rover? Do I look scary to you?

I love people-watching. It's fascinating to see so many different faces and backgrounds come to watch the liondance. Each person brings their own story and personality... I guess they're just, just like... leaves? I've never come across two identical leaves. Every one of them is unique. And you, Rover, I want to know more about you so bad... Tell me more, please?

Feel the drum and dance along, they say. In lion dancing, there isn't really a set melody we dance to. It's all about finding the perfect balance between movement and music. Everyone in our troupe must attend both Mr. Wufang's liondance classes and Mr. Qixing's drumming classes. And let me tell you, I struggle with the drums. Catching the beat is always tricky. I do better in the liondance class, but I often get lost in the dance and forget to keep up with the beat... Luckily, I can still manage to pull off the performance smoothly, thanks to my fellow troupe members. They often tweak the drumbeat tempo to match my rhythm. As my Master likes to point out, I'm a classic case of being good at some things but not so much at others.

Medium-rare is the way to go for grilled meat. That tender texture with a hint of secret spices... mmm, delicious! Trust me, I know all about it. Have you tried those Medium Rare skewers in Jinzhou? I'm the genius behind them, and now they're all the rage!
Hmm... you've got a point there. Would grilled veggies taste any better?

The liondance tradition is all about banishing evil, guarding fortune, and beckoning blessings. I want to be the best dancer out there to keep this tradition thriving. My Master always reminds me not to aim too high and bite off more than I can chew. I know there's still a long road ahead in perfecting my skills, but as long as I keep moving steadily from one pole to another, like we do in the tournaments, I'll surely reach my goal, no matter how high or far away it may seem.

Why do I keep this liondance head with me? Well, when I first got to Jinzhou, I was afraid to take it off. I didn't want people to see that I looked different from everyone else. Wearing the head made me feel safe, like I could hide my appearance and just focus on dancing. Maybe back then, I thought that only by wearing the liondance head could I truly be myself without judgement.

For some reason, people seem obsessed with my tail. Sometimes my seniors like to play their little drums to the beat of my swishing tail. But honestly, I have no idea how to control it. It's more like some kind of... reflex? When I feel happy—like right now, it just starts wagging on its own.

In Jinzhou, the liondance tradition started as a way to celebrate victories in battle. And nowadays, we always perform before our soldiers go into battle—it's like a good luck charm and morale booster. Our Liondance Troupe has been traveling between military camps in various regions to deliver performances. I'll never forget my first time leading a pre-battle show. I was nervous and messed up here and there, but General Jiyan didn't get mad at me. He actually encouraged me a lot. He isn't as strict as he seems in public, is he? No wonder the soldiers admire him so much... He's really a strong and kind person.

Liondance is a fusion of martial arts and dance. It originated from traditional boxing and martial arts in Huanglong, emphasizing swift footwork and powerful postures. Miss Jianxin practices Fengyiquan, a contrasting style to liondance, but just as impressive. I once saw her effortlessly take down seven men with a single punch! The Fengyiquan truly lives up to its reputation: conquering the unyielding with the yielding.

The Qixing Drum's sound echoes far and wide, and people say it scares evil spirits and beasts away. I never thought anyone could sleep through that loud banging, but then I met this pink-haired lady called Taoqi... Turns out she's the Chief Officer of border defense at the Ministry of Development. With all the defenses in Jinzhou, I'd be tired too... Maybe she is just too exhausted from work? I hope she can catch some good rest.

Uncle Yuanwu keeps lots of street cats at his boxing gym. I often bring them fish I've caught as thank-yous for, let's say, helping me practice. I wonder if those cats are picking up on his moves? Maybe I can draw some inspiration from that. By the way, Uncle Yuanwu's dried fish is super delicious!

Don't let Mr. Mortefi's permanent 'Do-Not-Disturb' face fool you, he's actually a big kid at heart. He's the genius behind all those fun toys for Jinzhou's children, and he even created some sick merch for our Liondance Troupe! So when you need his help, don't hesitate to tell him—just do it politely and he'll surely lend you a hand!
Chixia? Aha, you mean my top rival! I won't let her outshine me again... And why is that, you ask? Well, we're battling to see who can help more people!

I love Yangyang's singing! I've been trying to convince her to sing at our theater, but she keeps turning me down.... Says she's embarrassed to sing in front of a crowd. I don't get it! It's just like liondancing—once you take that first step, the rest falls into place!
The Remnant Creature that hangs around Baizhi... It's called You'Tan, right? I once thought it was my kind. Aw. I wish it really was...

Happy birthday! May your life be filled with joy and delight, as you chase your dreams and reach new heights. May happiness follow wherever you go, may your journey be a wonderful show! Hehe, I've come up with a special liondance just for you! Can you spend some more time here with me today? Because, well, this dance might run a little long.
Awoo—Lion up! Victory is mine at this year's Greens-plucking Tournament!
Warm-up's done. Ready for stage!
Hmm? Did I just hear something? It feels off to not hear the drums...
Hiya, I'm Lingyang. You're probably more used to seeing me as that liondancer on the high poles, I guess? Let's hang out more! I want you to remember what I look like, without the liondance head!
Opening greeting—Foul spirits begone, all safe and sound!
Hmm? Where are you going? Count me in!
Shh... I sneaked myself out. Promise you won't tell, okay?
Here's to a safe journey ahead.
Great! That's a new move for me!
No more slacking off now that you're here to help! I should practice harder.
So this is what they mean by Beyond the mountain lies a broader world... Thank you, Rover! I couldn't have made it this far without you. Now I'm ready to challenge higher Plum Blossom Poles.

My Master once told me this: Never lose reverence for the highest pole, no matter how much you've achieved. There's always someone better, and always more to learn, so we should always stay humble. I'll keep cultivating myself with this reverence in mind. Besides, there's someone right in front of me that I want to catch up to.

Legend has it that the liondance was created by ancient sages, inspired by the movement of constellations in the sky. True mastery of it allows one to draw power from the world, to form a miniature cosmos within. ...Now I think I've finally caught a glimpse into that realm. I've still got a long way ahead, but at least I can better protect you now.
This might hurt.
Take this!
Hah!
Time for the high-pole moves!
Celestial blessings!
Beat the drum. Ready to prance!
Watch out!
How's that?
Haa—ah!
Focus!
Evil begone!
Don't blink!
This is... my curtain call!
Drumbeat strong, ill-fortune gone!
Lions rumble, evil crumble!
Oops, that was close.
Not today, friend!
Easy peasy.
Not bad.
Now it's my turn.
C'mon, harder!
...Didn't hurt at all.
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
Oh no!
Oopsies!
*Effort Sound*
*groans* Play time's over.
Are you alright?
I won't... yield...
The drums... still going...
My legs are... heavy...
Is the show... over?
Awoo!
Let's play hide-and-seek!
My time to shine!
Don't worry. I've got this!
*sniff sniff* Smells like danger...
Aha, I like high places.
*Effort Sound*
Found ya!
Stride like the wind.
Move like the rain.
Riches pour, revelries soar!
Our efforts paid off!
There's no stopping good luck once it's on your side!
You're a seasoned fighter, I can tell. Let's have a bout sometime soon, shall we? Sparring is my passion, and I can't pass up an opportunity to fight someone like you!

Erm, actually... I wonder just how you seem to know so much. I've been to the cities a few times, but I know very little compared to you. Can I ask you for help next time I run into things I don't understand? Please bear with me, though, as it may take me some time to catch on...

I grew up in my sect, on a remote, secluded mountain. Most people may find it a bit challenging to make it there, but it should be easy for you. I can take you there if you want. Hehe, honestly, I've always wanted to bring you home as my guest!

I wasn't the brightest kid, but I was lucky to find my talent in martial arts. That's why I really admire people with both brains and courage. Of all the smart people I know, you're the best, being a great martial artist and a true defender of justice. You are the one I look up to the most, beside my masters.

I adore being part of nature's harmony. Every songbird in the sky, every leaf on the ground, and every glimmer of sunlight makes me feel a serene joy, as the sweet breezes surround me, whispering life's many blessings. Your presence brings me the same kind of feeling, Rover. With you, everything feels so right, like I belong where I should.

My life's goal is to one day fully master Fengyiquan. For me, every place—be it in the valley, on a mountain peak, or a bustling market—provides an opportunity to perfect my art. I find joy in connecting with various energies and Chi available across different places; this connection gives me new chances of growth.

Worthy opponents are always hard to find. I always yearn for a good fight from which I can learn and improve myself. That said, I'm not too invested in looking for challenges anymore. One can only find inner peace when they let go of their desires. I can find my growth without engaging in frequent battles.

My favorite food? It's the Guokui Flatbread! We'd always have it at our sect, and when I was little, I got extra servings like other younger disciples. Master Shiling even said that I'd followed his scent of freshly made flatbread all the way up the mountain, and that's how I joined our sect. I'm not sure if it was true or not though, he loves to rib us like that sometimes.

There isn't any particular food that I dislike. I'm not much of a food person, I guess. People mix various ingredients for a variety of purposes—to gain muscle, to treat illnesses, or to stay healthy. The flavors of these food combinations are just natural outcomes. All types of food serve a purpose and can be beneficial.
Unite the strengths that are both seen and unseen, and purge oneself of all that is unclean. Only then may one know the Tao's grandness; it is the final test every true Taoist must take.

I got the Mirrors of Clarity from Master Shiling when I was little. The mirrors represented my masters' good wishes for me: to stay dedicated, disciplined, and become a well-rounded individual. Each day, I carry them with me to honor their teachings, but more importantly, to remind myself of how much they cared for me.

To reach where our sect is, one must take the Ancient Path—it's the only way up the mountain. This is usually difficult for new disciples, but Master Shiling said when he took me in, I almost made it up the mountain as fast as he did. He said I was like a little wild animal: agile, vibrant, and naive. I can't remember any of that, though. The earliest memory I have is practicing martial arts with fellow disciples.

Chixia always invites me to spar. She's really good with her guns, and I've learned so much from those fights. I admire her dedication and genuineness. It's great to have made a friend while honing my fighting skills.

Occasionally I'd leave my sect to go on what we call self-cultivating trips. During one of those trips, I visited Mr. Yuanwu's boxing gym and challenged him to fight, and I won. I told Master Shiling about it when I returned, and it turns out Mr. Yuanwu's ancestors used to practice martial arts at our sect. According to the rules, I guess I should call him my martial senior. I heard that Mr. Yuanwu went through a lot when he was younger, but it seems he doesn't want me to talk too much about it, so let's just drop it there.

I've only celebrated birthdays for my masters and fellow disciples before, and we'd usually make peach buns of longevity for the birthday person. So... here, I've made some peach buns for you! Happy Birthday! I wish you good health and great happiness!
Oh?
Self-awareness leads to wisdom... hmm?
What am I supposed to do with this... Hmm... W-whoah! Phew...
I am Jianxin, the successor of Fengyiquan. Thank you for your hospitality. Would you mind sparring with me?
Release the wants, and the mind quiets. Cleanse the thoughts, and the soul clears.
Enemies ahead? I'm ready.
What will I learn from this fight?
I'll do my best!
This is a different practice, but it feels similar to how I usually do seated cultivation as my master taught. Hmm... how do I put this? I'll tell you once I've come up with a better way to describe.
Finally, I've fully mastered this move. It all went so well today. Thank you for sparring with me!

This is... the feeling of standing on top of a mountain, watching the billowing sea of clouds beneath my feet. The spirit within me resonates with every life in this universe... Yes, that's it! That's how it feels! I've finally figured out how to put this feeling into words!

Now my body and mind have gained a newfound clarity, and even my senses are keener than before. The Chi that surrounds me seems more... Oh no! Sorry! Are you alright? Phew... I should have paid more attention to keep it in check. I'll focus on improving my control of this power from now on. Thank you, Rover! I'm now another step closer to my goal!

Is this real? I can't believe... Thank you, for everything you've done for me. No one, apart from my masters, has shown me more kindness in this life than you have. I can never repay in full what I owe to you, but I want to try anyway. There is something I've wanted to tell you for a while now: beyond seeking martial excellence, I've found another goal in life—to do everything I can for you, until my very last breath.
Come forth.
Serenity.
Clarity.
Chi lasts evermore!
Universe in my psyche!
Embrace the Oneness!
Tranquility!
*Effort Sound*
Caution.
Stay alert.
*Effort Sound*
A decent challenge.
Worthy opponent!
Life renews itself...
Death is not the end...
My time has come...
Hah!
Hmm. Like this?
Evils begone!
Incoming. Beware!
Speedier this way!
*Effort Sound*
Oh, what is that?
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
A contented mind is a perpetual feast.
Hmm. What's it gonna be this time?
A well-deserved reward.
Stopping to relax once in a while serves for a stronger resonance with the world.
This is a testament to my connection with the world around me, and it's very much my companion now, bearing witness to everything I've experienced on this journey.
It is natural to feel dreadful of the unknown, yet... there are times when the unknown harbors hope, like how I can never know what else this power has to offer.
We still have a long journey ahead of us. Let's press on.
Will there be new discoveries?
I will be there for everyone... As we head toward our shared future, leaving the past behind.
The world around me... I can hear it clearer now.
This power... it's mysterious, yet reassuring nonetheless.
I will need more time to acquaint myself with this unfamiliar world.
A new journey awaits? Brimming with novel sounds, stories, and... fragmented memories.
The place where the land ends is where the ocean begins. Our journey is far from ending.
The show begins.
Begone!
Break!
Disperse.
Sounds, come forth.
I sense your weakness.
No hesitation.
Strike from the shadows.
Shadow follows.
Checkmate.
No hesitation!
Nowhere to hide.
Endure and defy.
Shadow descends.
Moment of resonance.
The hour is upon us.
The end has come.
None shall whisper.
You will obey.
Down with the curtain.
*Effort Sound*
Ugh... Bad timing.
One more time.
*Exhale*
Keep it together.
Last chance...
I must not... falter.
Is this the end...
Sounds... are fading...
Hopefully this helps.
One with the sounds.
Swift and resolute.
Leave it to me.
Wind guide me.
*Effort Sound*
Seems like a new discovery.
*Effort Sound*
*Effort Sound*
An unexpected discovery.
Remnants of the past.
Cherish every gain.

An unexpected discovery.
Remnants of the past.
Cherish every gain.
Woolies attack!
G'day. What does our loyal client wish to inquire about today?
You blink, you miss.
Better keep up.
Thanks for watching!
We've got company.
Commanding an army is not a simple task, and sometimes I find myself questioning my own decisions. Going forward, with you staying by my side, I should feel more at ease.
Ready for battle.
What a nuisance.
Hah!
Tear them to pieces.
Leave it to me!

Welcome to Jinzhou, esteemed guest from afar. My apologies for any shortcomings in my hospitality, my schedule is quite full. If there is a matter requiring my attention, please do not hesitate to find me at the City Hall.

The bustling city of Jinzhou is a product of every blooming flower, sturdy brickwork, and occupied home. With every new visitor, the city gains new life. Among them, you are truly one of a kind... No, I am not simply repeating what our Sentinel has said. These words come from my heart as well.

An old proverb states, When a great mind emerges, even the sea will part and the mountains will tremble. It speaks to the transformative power of extraordinary individuals... With your presence in Jinzhou, I believe great changes will come in due time.

I used to be quite curious about your background. However, I've come to realize that one's actions hold more weight than their past. Your past may shape you, but it is your present deeds that truly define you. Having witnessed everything you have done for Jinzhou, I cannot help but notice the mysterious connections between them... Perhaps there is something deeper behind your arrival in Jinzhou.
Walking alone may lead to a faster pace, but a group can cover greater distances. Moving forward, I will stand by my companions… I will stand by you as we face whatever the future holds, together.

Have you been to the Jinzhou Theater? It's a place of endless joy and laughter, especially when a show concludes on a happy note. I've always cherished that sight, which is why I want to ensure everyone finds their own happy ending.
Hmm... When faced with challenges, I am driven by a sense of purpose to find solutions instead of succumbing to worry. The feeling of worry or frustration rarely crosses my mind nowadays.

If you haven't yet, I highly recommend visiting Jinzhou's morning market. The breakfast stall vendor sells the most delicious Loong Buns topped with plump red dates. As they steam, their sweet aroma envelops the air. They are truly a delight.

Jinzhou once suffered from severe food shortages because of the Lament crisis. As someone who lived through that difficult time, I've learned to understand that food is not something to be taken lightly. Every morsel is a gift from Mother Nature as are those who work tirelessly to cultivate it... Personally, I have no dislikes when it comes to food, except for wasteful extravagance or exorbitant prices.
People prayed to the Sentinel not out of weakness, but because they had no other recourse. As leader, I will guide my people towards a future where humanity takes control of our own destiny.

As a child, I had vivid dreams, some of them turning into nightmares. I would find myself lost at sea, fighting against the crashing waves and tangled seaweed. But each time, I managed to hold onto a piece of driftwood and make it back to shore. And when I woke up, I would find something in my hand… Yes, it was this shiny piece of scale.

The snows of Mt. Firmament... I still vaguely remember how the snowflakes there danced in their own whimsical ways. One moment they were hovering in the air, and the next moment they flew upwards into the sky, twirling around the tree branches... Not before long, everything was coated in a shimmering blanket of white. In Jinzhou, the snow brings a sense of peaceful togetherness. Strangers become friends as they brush off each other's shoulders and build snowmen together... Whether the snow is light or heavy, I pray to always protect these precious moments of pure tranquility.
Over the years, my esteemed teacher Changli has taught me much… Yet her smiling eyes still hold mysteries that I cannot yet comprehend.

Amidst my busy days, meals can easily slip my mind. Before I knew it, it would be well past the time for another meal. But like a blessing, Sanhua would always appear with a plate of delicious Loong Buns, filled with exactly what I was craving. I am in awe… How does she know every time?
Taoqi is able to breeze through mountains of workload with ease, despite her frequent yawns. Her efficiency is truly remarkable.
Qingloong rise, monsters gone... Every child in Jinzhou knows this nursery rhyme by heart. My faith rests with Jiyan, for with his protection the Tacet Discords will never breach our borders.
I can feel it in my heart that we both have something we'll fiercely defend, a cause worth fighting for... And we won't back down, no matter what it takes.

After much contemplation, I have decided that a handmade gift will better express my feelings than any expensive store-bought present. Every day since learning of your birthday, I have devoted time to crafting a Loong lantern from materials I've handpicked. Fortunately, I've finished it in time. If you could find time in your busy schedule, please join me at the City Hall to fly this lantern together. It is a beloved tradition in Jinzhou to make a wish upon a soaring lantern on one's birthday, and it is said that the Sentinel will bestow blessings for the year ahead.
May I pray for anything specific for you? It would be my honor… I'm sure your wishes will come true.
I am Jinhsi, the Magistrate of Jinzhou. My role holds great power and duty. I vow to serve my people with diligence and bring prosperity to our land.
As the Sentinel foretold, you and I were meant to cross paths.
Let's go together.
Learning through experience.
I am here to assist.
No one is born good at anything. As the Magistrate of Jinzhou, I must constantly learn and improve.

As the new Magistrate, I initially worried about my lack of ability to protect my people. But soon, I realized that dwelling on self-doubt only hindered my progress, so I trained harder. With each session, my strengths grew. It is an honor to serve and defend my people. I'll always strive to improve as their Magistrate.
Thank you for your guidance. I have seen growth in my strength and leadership abilities, and it seems you have taught me more than just swordsmanship; you've also taught me valuable life lessons.

I am aware that I have rather peculiar frequencies. It is rare for me to encounter someone whose vibrations align with mine so perfectly... Could it be that you also share a mysterious connection with our Sentinel? I do hope so, as that would make me feel… even closer to you.

As I get to know you better, I can't help but notice the similarities between us. Our frequencies, powers, and even purposes seem to align. Defending Jinzhou is my duty, and now I sense a deep connection between you and this land… I once believed that mankind should control our own destiny, but my meeting with you has shown me the power of fate. I am grateful for its hand in bringing you into my life.
The hour of hope.
Shine forevermore.
The time is nigh.
Divine Loong's blessing.
Fallen star.
Beckoning light.
Moment of awakening.
Thawing harmony.
Embrace the change.
Our lights shine through.
Florescent Shadows.
Bask in starlight.
Take flight!
The sky beckons!
Strike fast!
Thus it ends!
Evil be cleansed!
Sacred light!
Thunder guide us!
Heaven ordains. Banish all vice!
O stars... Heed my calling!
Insolence.
Negligence on my part...
So be it.
Worry not.
There is... much to be done...
I must not... falter...
Take form.
Lend me your strength!
Together we fight.
Strike as one!
I shall lead the way.
As far as the eye can see.
Soar against the winds.
Be swift.
A lucky find.
Onwards.
A different approach.
All paths converge.
Forgive me.
Found anything useful?
The lands of Jinzhou are filled with riches.
Would these be enough for your needs? Tell me if there is anything else you want.
Look who we have here. A rare visitor. Luckily, I've finished my work for today. Would you like to join me in a game of Weiqi, if you're not in a rush to leave?

I seem to know a lot about your past, you say? *a small chuckle* Not really. I'd say you may have left those clues for your present self long ago, and I just happened to come across them while going through historical records. I am honored to guide you through the connections between your past and present.

A strategist's mind is a vast and complex entity, much like the ocean. Its placid exterior may mask the turbulent currents of thought swirling within. Master once warned me to be wary of those who stay quiet in times of uncertainty. Yet with you, I find solace in the quiet moments, in our unspoken connection.

Master Xuanmiao taught me the ways of the sword, but he left this world before I could fully absorb his teachings. I have since tried my best to understand his notes and continue my training on my own. When I first saw you wield your sword, it struck a chord with me, and now I understand why. It's not that you resemble my late master in your skills, but rather that he learned from you.

I found you and brought you out of that Sonoro Sphere. This is proof I am qualified to stand by your side and assist in achieving our shared goal. It takes great courage and wisdom to willingly enter into a situation full of unknowns, and I trust that you will achieve your desired outcome. My knowledge and power are at your disposal, always ready to help you in any way needed.
The dynamics of a Weiqi game mirror the complexities of our world, always in a state of constant flux and transformation... Fascinating, isn't it?

My body temperature is higher than usual because of my Flame-controlling Forte. It doesn't hinder daily tasks, but it does have its quirky consequences. Jinhsi's iced pastries and Sanhua's delicate snow birds always melt faster than I'd prefer in my hands... Sigh.

Each delicacy is unique in its own right. It's difficult to choose just one, but if I must, there was a meal I received as a hungry child, a kind gesture that left an indelible memory. That taste remains with me to this day.

What food do I dislike? It's not something that crosses my mind often. Having traveled through barren lands where people suffer from starvation, I have learned to appreciate every bit of nourishment. Plus, there are endless culinary delights beyond the borders of Jinzhou. Even if I spent years exploring, I doubt I could taste them all.

I have always dreamed of a world filled with peace and prosperity. Though I may not live to see it myself, I will do everything in my power to support those who continue to work towards that future. And when that day finally arrives, if you ever find yourself back in Jinzhou, please take a moment to leave a cup of tea for me at my resting place.

The feather I gave you before? Well, it was forged from the fires of my heart. There are only two of them. As long as you hold onto that feather, my fire will never harm you. In fact, I can use it to track your whereabouts if you wish. But if it ever falls into our enemies' hands... hehe.

Why did I quit my job in the capital and request a transfer to Jinzhou? It's quite simple, really. After the Battle Beneath the Crescent, there was no Magistrate in Jinzhou and the central government couldn't just sit by and let chaos reign. Also, my master had a strong connection to Mt. Firmament. He told me it would be the very place where I would find the one I needed to look for. I didn't quite understand his intentions then, but now... well, as they say, fate works in mysterious ways.

Jinhsi is a bright and diligent soul. With time, she will undoubtedly blossom into a capable Magistrate. She has always been dedicated to her work, perhaps too much so. She simply needs some time to find balance and fully embrace who she truly is. I am entrusting her care to you, Rover.

Upon my initial arrival in Jinzhou, I was tasked with handling paperwork at the City Hall for a temporary period. Despite sifting through countless documents and files, never once did I come across any issues regarding our border defenses. During the time when Jinzhou was lacking a Magistrate, General Jiyan's unwavering efforts were essential in protecting the welfare of our people.

Sanhua is always composed and silent. As a bodyguard, she remains vigilant and alert at all times. But both Jinhsi and I have always wished for her to take a well-deserved rest and let others help shoulder the burden.

Although we followed different sects of Taoist teachings, I found commonalities with her. Her pure and open mind is quite rare nowadays. I believe her perception of the world must be as clear as her eyes. I first met her at the tea house; back then, she seemed to have sensed something about my condition, and served me a bowl of Lotus Seed Soup. That was a delightful surprise.

Chixia is a vibrant girl, radiating warmth and enthusiasm like a shining flame. She graciously showed me around Jinzhou, introducing me to all the local gems and delectable delicacies. Ah, yes, now I remember... The Spicy Pulled Chicken may seem intimidating to many, but it's just the right amount of spice for me.

Happy birthday, my dear. When I was younger, I traveled to many places and saw diverse customs for celebrating birthdays, each one unique and fascinating. Here are some gift boxes for you, a small token of my affection. May you find peace and happiness in the years ahead, like the constant moon and rising sun. Oh, these may be too much? Hehe… Consider them extra gifts for your future birthdays. And if I'm still around to see them, I'll find you something different.
Hmm...
Contemplating
The moment at hand... This very moment is the best of our lives.
I am Changli, Counselor to the Jinzhou Magistrate. Pleased to make your acquaintance, Rover. We meet at last. Should you ever need any assistance in Jinzhou, please let me know.
Eons of time on this vast land, all encapsulated in a humble game... I am fortunate to have you as my opponent.
Time to start a new game.
Plan with convention, then conquer by ingenuity.
Who will be sitting on the other side of the board this time?
The sword has no set form, it adapts along with its foes... Likewise, strategies must shift against different opponents.
Oh? This feeling of power coursing through my veins... It feels different from before. Please, do spar with me for another round.

After my master's passing, I spent years studying martial arts and other subjects through… various unconventional methods. This resulted in some rather comical situations, where angry bookshop owners chased me around. But now, I have the luxury of having you teach me everything without any expectations in return. I never thought I could further refine my abilities. Your guidance has been invaluable, and I ought to help you in some way in return. So… Anything I can do for you?

You've taught me more than words can express... I believed I had come to terms with my death; never thought I could one day catch a glimpse into the perspective of an eternal being. For this, I am grateful. As long as my flames still burn, I will stay by your side, dear Rover.

As the sun beats down and the ocean breeze lulls you, your eyes can't help but be drawn to the massive shadow looming over the beach. It beckons to you, calling for your attention and submission—Those man-made, sinister shadows will dance for you. You need only waive the scepter in your hand.
Yes, you remember what those shadows looked like. The memories are crystal clear. They flow in and out of your mind like waves, yet they leave you with nothing to keep.

Yes… like waves. Time and tears swirl together in an eternal dance. I admit, you know everything about the past and future. Yet here you are, shipwrecked in this era, stumbling like a newborn. Welcome to this era, Rover, as you awaken again… that's my warm greeting for you.

All animals want to select high-quality mates, as it serves as a form of survival strategy.
Green Rabbits feed on grass and their tail glands play an important role in metabolizing toxins. When toxins accumulate to a certain extent, it manifests as tail loss.

My name is Yingzhu, I work for the textbook department of the Jinzhou Institute. I’m currently responsible for writing an extracurricular magazine for the students.
It’s called “A Look Inside Jinzhou”, to broaden students’ horizons and satisfy their curiosity.
But my sister thought the draft was too narrow in terms of who would be interested in it. If it doesn’t catch on, it won’t serve its purpose of helping people learn.
漂泊者, do you mind helping us by taking a small test?

I can’t thank you enough!

The test results will be kept confidential, and will only be used as a reference for future writing changes.

The first question is about the Sentinel of Jinzhou, which is super basic!
What is the Sentinel of Jinzhou called?
Correct!

漂泊者, please pay it no mind. Now, let’s look at the other questions!
The next question is about a widely used scientific technology called Tacetite Weapons.
Which department of the Huaxu Academy is responsible for making Tacetite Weapons?

Xingzhu, the Tacetite weapons are what our Resonator uses to fight the Tacet Discords. It’s important we know about them.

Ooh! I remember! That, that red-haired, grumpy researcher, the one with glasses!
I’ll do an impression of him! Ahem… You’re like the blacksmith’s anvil! A spinning top that can’t spin! The chopping board’s... What was it?

Nope, that’s incorrect. It’s the Department of Safety. The Department of “Safety” is really all about making weapons. They are committed to employing every method to combat the Tacet Discords and ensure the safety of Jinzhou.
That question was sure misleading!
I understand how you feel. I’d totally make the wrong guess too.
Well, then don’t make guesses. You should remember the correct answer...
Come on, we should go with my question. I’ve got an interesting one for 漂泊者!
It depends on 漂泊者’s feedback.
...on the ground...the only...light...
...people...gather...

repeated symbol

Haha, it's not just about physical strength.

It's sort of my empathic ability, doesn't that sound a bit common, haha.
The ability can be practical, though. There's been more Tacet Field around lately, and the TD is stupidly awesome.
There's a rockslide caused by TD every couple of days. If it happens to block the road, people get stuck in the mountains.
Luckily, I've saved a lot of trapped people with this empathic ability.
If you run into any difficulties, especially if you need to clear a rocky roadblock or something like that, just call me.
Did you know that water has a sound?
I mean...
It's like the raindrops in the clouds are whispering to me, telling me when they'll arrive and how long they'll stay...
No, I can only hear the sound of ordinary rain. I can't hear the rain if it's trailing.
Well, strictly speaking, the Retroact Rain isn't just ordinary rain. It's actually a form of Remnant Energy.
Remnant Energy can reproduce past events. When the raindrops fall upstream, the mirage of the past appears in the rain.
If one can't distinguish the reality of the mirage, they'll be confused and misled... After all, everyone has someone they hold dear.
So, in case of retrograde rain, you can keep your mind clear and do not get emotionally involved.
I can't hear the Retroact Rain; I can only hear the ordinary rain... Do you think my Resonance Ability is weak?
Doesn't my Resonance Ability seem somewhat useless?
I used to have low self-esteem because of this, but after coming to the Exploration Canal, my abilities have helped everyone a lot.
I realized that there is no such thing as a strong or weak ability, it's how you use it that matters.
Anyway, I need to shake off this passive attitude!
In fact, that's what Pops expects of me, to open up a mountain and cut a river into the sea.
Like him, I am a Ministry of Development employee who works on water construction.
He's been digging canals in the Gorges of Spirits until the Tacet Discord Outbreak.
Nothing. Now I carry on his legacy and try to further his unfinished business.
And that, in turn, is where my personal ambition lies.
Pops will be happy watching from heaven.
No, we can't dig a canal in this area or it would disrupt the community structure.
Me? I study biology.
Tacetite research in the academy is more, after all, TD rampage, Tacetite weapon is the wind mouth. It's good to set up a project, and there are enough funds for research.
Life is tough for us biologists... I'm just trying to minimize the impact of research and development on the ecosystem.
We have a fragile world now.
That being said, from what I've deduced, there should be giant TDs that mimic normal creatures present in the water system of Gorges of Spirits.
I've never seen a report like this before. It's strange…
What do I do now...? The water's too deep...
Hmm. Why is it blue?
I'm screwed... There's no way I'm getting them back...
You really managed to get them back!
It's too late to go back now...
Help! Anyone—
Now you'll think twice before coming back to mess with me again! Bah!
Aww, they're so cute... one... two... three...
Now I can deliver the goods normally, it's great!
I wonder what's up there?
Weird... Am I seeing things...?
Don't make me do this. Spit it out!
Ouch... my leg...
This doesn't make any sense...
I don't have any money on me, really. I don't have any!
Soooo huuunnngryyyy...
Huang! Huang! Where'd you run off to...?
What exactly are these for?
I'm not going down there! There's no way I'm letting you take my packages!
What a heavy stream...
Be careful, I'll go get help!
What's going on... Oh my, get down quickly...
This is too dangerous...
Help, help...
lion dance!
lion dance party yeah!
Gulpuff plushies! First come, first served!
Nanna, I want that small one!
We'll get one for you once the race is over. It's too expensive now.
Nooo, I want it now!
Is that the last box left?
Yep. Let's hurry and go watch the relay once we finish.
My brother's running this year. It's been a while since I last hangout with him. I gotta find a good spot to watch the race.
Come buy some drink to wet your whistle!
Cheap and delicious!
Hey! That's my brother!
My brother won a medal last year!
Hmph! So what! That's not a big deal!
My brother's just busy fighting monsters! That's why he's not with us! Mommy told me so!
You'll know when he's back. He's much cooler!
N-no! You're lying! Waaah!
Hey, did you bully someone again? Come here!
How long are you back for?
I'll need to leave after the Riverside Games is over.
That's so soon. I thought...
Sorry.
It's okay, darling. That's good enough for me to meet you here.
I'll root for you!
Dad, I want to eat them all!
Right, right, right.
Boy, your dad really loves you.
We can't see each other often, so this is my only chance to show my love for him.
My dad is a super hero who fights monsters in the Norfall Barrens!
Do you remember the Riverside Games when we were students?
You mean the Riverside Games from ten years ago?
Yep, the race that year was tremendous. So much time has passed...
Actually... I've always been...
Oops! It just occurred to me that Wenshu was looking for me!
Take it easy.
I'm... I'm not nervous at all.
Do we need to further discuss our relay order?
Actually, I don't want to be the first one...
I'll say it again. Failure's not an option!
Well, well, participation is what truly matters. Don't put so much pressure on us.
Pressure becomes motivation. After all, our goal is to break the record!
Suddenly getting a little nervous...
I wouldn't have warmed up if I'd known.
Sss... Did you get a concussion from that hit?
The research on applying Echoes to people's lives has reached its final stage.
I'm going to write about the possibility of normal people participating in the Echo Riverside Games in my next project.
Can we stop talking about work today?
Typical you. Have a great life with your work! BYE!
Juicy sweet fruit! Come get yourself juicy sweet fruit!
Why is your fruit so much cheaper than his fruit?
Grandpa, is it rotten?
Nonsense! Every fruit here is freshly picked.
That man hikes up the price due to high demand. That's why his fruit is expensive!
Young man, don't get so riled up! I'm just asking.
The pain born from the explosion is the ultimate art.
Hehehehehehehe.......Hahahahahahahaha
I haven't felt this kind of pleasure for a long time!
Are you ready to Overdash?
For the Overdash Challenge!
I'm Shui, an honorary member of the Overdash Club.
Actions speak louder than words. Let's get you Overdashing right away to feel the thrill!
Just to confirm, you're here because of our ad, right?
That's right.
It's no surprise you're drawn to such an exciting event.
Hmm, looks like we need to ramp up our promotions...
But hey, now that you're here, why not give it a shot? It's free, after all!
I wish you'd put it a bit more tactfully...
Alright, let me run you through the event rules!
Overdash is all about racing through the air using Grapples to show off your skills.
Don't worry! It's completely legit!
Hold on. Let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development.
Don't worry! It's completely legit!
Hold on. Let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development.
Fantastic! By the way, let me show you the official documents from the Ministry of Development. We've got the green light!
They're gone...
The documents... are gone!!
A-Anyway, trust me! We've got all the permits!
As long as we stick to the designated area, we are good to go.
This time, we're racing on an Easy track on the outskirts of Jinzhou, perfect for beginners like you!
Normally, I'd guide newbies through their first Overdash, but I need to track down those documents, you know...
So, here's a trick instead. Pay attention, and stay safe, okay?
Step 1: Assess your surroundings. Step 2: Get your hook ready. Step 3: Warm up. Step 4: Let's go! Always keep an eye out for the next Grapple Point.
If you can't spot it, use your Glider for a better view. And remember, don't retract it mid-air or you'll fall straight down!
Even though it's a race, safety is priority number one. Got it?
It's normal to feel dizzy at first. I've got some antiemetics just in case. Hopefully, you won't need them...
Fantastic! Love your enthusiasm!
Alright, get ready for your first Overdash! Meet me outside the city. Don't stand me up!
Bravo! You've conquered all the tracks! That's incredible!
If you haven't been practicing in secret, you must be an Overdash genius!
Haha, it's been ages since I've had a challenger who really gets my adrenaline pumping, ever since Chengchi stopped showing up.
Come on, follow me! Let's have a friendly race on the next track, shall we?
Hey, look! I've even managed to find the permits from the Ministry of Development.
What?!
Oh my...
It really does.
Darn it! I thought it was just a formality. Didn't expect them to throw so many hurdles our way!
Please halt Overdash Club activities until safety concerns are addressed...
Yeah, I know. I admit I did overlook those issues...
But it's still frustrating, you know?
Guess I'll have to rewrite the entire application from scratch. My head throbs just thinking about it.
How about you write it for me?
Oh my!
Oh, how I wish applications could write themselves!
Just kidding!
I appreciate your kind offer, but no worries. I'll handle it myself.
The budget is already tight! I can't afford to pay you!
I'll just do it myself.
It seems I'll have to shut down the Overdash Club for now. I'll get the members to work on track designs and maintenance during this downtime.
And you can use this opportunity to practice even harder!
When I've sorted out all the issues, I'll extend another invitation to you!
By then, you'll see brand-new equipment and track designs!
