Phew, that was close. Thank you so much for saving us! What should we call you?
Nice to meet you, Rover... Oh, I see! You're here to help us, right?
We are members of the Dim Forest exploration team. I'm Qiaomu, and this is Hoohoo.
Hoohoo!
Relax, Rover. He’s not gonna hurt you. Hoohoo's not like those contaminated Hoochief Tacet Discords. He’s a good guide for us.
*An approving hoohoo*!
Our exploration team's responsible for regular surveys of the Dim Forest.
But my teammate Senmin is taking much longer than usual this time... I was really worried about her, so I tried to find her with Hoohoo.
But we ran into the Exiles before we could spot her... We had to request help from the Academy.
Even worse, I still haven't been able to reach her. She's always been in poor health, and with the complicated terrain in there, what if something bad happens...
She has short hair, wears clothes similar to mine, and has a tablet like this.
Haha, you get the point. It's our uniform!
The environment becomes less friendly once you go deeper into the forest. The Dim Forest's filled with poisonous spore dust that can be harmful to our health if we inhale it.
Besides, there's a chance you'll come across contaminated Hoochiefs, and they tend to be pretty aggressive.
Senmin's been there for a long time. I'm really worried about her... I hope everything's okay...
T-Thank you! Let's go! Oh, by the way, please take this.
This is a short-acting antibody that allows you to walk in contaminated areas. I know you have stronger resistance to those toxic spores as a Resonator, but still, it's better safe than sorry.
Her signal vanished here. Let’s check out the area around the central giant tree.
Rest assured. We can protect ourselves. Hoohoo, let's go!
Hoohoo!
Please stay safe... We'll be right there, Senmin!
The first Offshoot Core's... right here. Rover, please lend me your hand to destroy it.
I'll set up the devices and turn them on! These devices will release sound waves that can destroy the Offshoot Cores.
But for us non-Resonators, it's hard to figure out where the sound waves are coming from.
But you should be able to perceive the source of those sound waves. I'll lead the way. Please help me calibrate the devices!
*A cheering hoohoo*!
Take your time, Rover! Just tell me when you're ready!
These animals are glowing red...
These animals are glowing red...
Yeah, they've been affected by spores. You see? There are scratches on them.
Looks like they've been attacked.
Looks like they've been attacked.
*A worried hoohoo*.
Let's hurry up. You two take care.
Let's hurry up. You two take care.
This is it. I never thought I'd come back here after all this time...
Seems like the door's locked.
We might have activated some kind of defense mechanism when we left. Let's look around and see if we can unlock it.
How's it going, Rover? Found anything?
Fantastic! You've got a real talent for finding things. Let's check it out...
Senmin...
I see, so she made use of the spores themselves to produce the antibodies.
I've only viewed these spores as a toxic threat, attempting to find a solution to eliminate them. Regrettably, I still haven't grasped what's hidden beneath the surface.
Interestingly, it was my mentor, who didn't focus her research on the toxic spores, who eventually found a way to improve the antibody.
And Hoohoo... It's truly her last achievement. This...
This must be her final lesson for us!
*An approving hoohoo*!
We've got our hands on some core samples too. Time to head back and dive into our research!
You're surprisingly proactive this time.
After all, you were the one who told me solving this issue's the only way to ensure everyone's real safety, right?
C'mon, let's go. It takes time to enhance the antibody, and we won't see any results until tomorrow afternoon, earliest by 6 o'clock.
*An excited Hoohoo*!
Yeah, you're right. Let's head back. See you tomorrow, Rover.
We're here. Keep going up from here, and we'll reach the top of the tree.
The Main Core is at the top of it. Rover, we're counting on you.
My, these Hoochiefs are so big! Careful! They've been contaminated!
Step down. I'll handle them!
Step down. I'll handle them!
Ever heard of Second Coming of Solaris before, 漂泊者?
So you don't know about it?
Oh, that's not my job. Periodicals and merchandise are only sold at Ganxue's shop.
But how come you don't know about this book?
Second Coming of Solaris... It's the fiction that everyone's talking about across Huanglong. It has been a bestseller for three weeks in a row!
Its author, Karl, is from the New Federation. It's his debut work and he's already been named one of the top-earning writers in recent years with this single book.
It rivets nearly all the attention of our editors from the headquarters.
Of course not... Some swooped in only to try to find the trick to write a top seller.
But I can't deny that it's the best piece of work among all the candidates in recent years.
I was taken on an epic adventure through the protagonist while I was reading Second Coming of Solaris...
Oh, I got carried away. Let's turn back to our topic. 漂泊者, we hope you could lend us some help.
The Pioneer Association has reached an agreement on developing a game franchise based on Second Coming of Solaris and the production of the game is already underway.
The development is still at a very early stage. The basic framework is complete, but we're still working on the production of a huge body of art assets.
The dev team is still struggling to find a creative direction that enables them to recapture the grandeur of the world in the novel.
In our meeting yesterday, a few colleagues mentioned that a well-traveled guest had just arrived in Jinzhou... that is what brought me to you.
Of course, we'll let you know whenever there's progress in the game.
It's okay. I'll describe to you in detail the related scenes in the novel when you need me to.
Simply put, all you need to do is find us some real-world references that fit the descriptions in the novel.
With these references, the developers can have a general picture of what the in-game world should look like.
You don't need to worry about that. We have a deep budget for the game and you'll be well compensated for your efforts.
Of course. If this goes smoothly, the name of 漂泊者 may appear on our Special Thanks list.
Let's begin with today's job if you're ready.
Let me explain our job today.
In the opening chapter, our protagonist paid a visit to a city called Tiancheng.
According to the book, the cries of peddlers fill the market... a bewildering array of goods lines the shelves of every shop...
We had a taste of a local drink served by the hotel. I was caught by total relief though my tongue stung a bit from that bitterness...
Even on such foreign land, we feel safe and sound... We stayed there for three days to restore our strengths before we reluctantly said goodbye to this city.
This Tiancheng here is so much alike to Jinzhou.
Anyway, the dev team wants an item that embodies this prosperity of Tiancheng, which is also a significant town scene in the game.
Well, that local drink will suffice.
If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.
Among all the drinks in Jinzhou, I like tea the most.
...which is also the perfect match for what's in Second Coming of Solaris. Its taste is bitter but persistent on your tongue.
Tea is also the most popular seller here in my shop.
By all means. That's also our greeting to visitors of Jinzhou.
Here. Remember to boil it with spring water. That makes the tea even better!
We look forward to meeting you again. Goodbye.
Drinks that will prevail on foreign taste buds... Maybe I should do a street interview with those visitors?
The Pioneer Merchandises have been Ganxue's staple. Many visitors bring one of those back as a gift.
That would be a good idea that you ask Ganxue about their comments on Jinzhou.
Enjoying a cup of tea over chitchats in an inn... Seeing the steam of hot tea does make it more vivid.
This would be what our dev team needs. I even can picture the lively Tiancheng right now.
Some time passed while Maqi was away to hand over the item...
Thank you. That wraps up today's work!
See you tomorrow, 漂泊者.
I know, you're here for my 42300020 props.
I already know! I'll give it to you now!
Oh my precious Lord Rover! I know you've got 423,00020 right!
Leave it to me quickly!
Thank you sir!
You can go to the quest panel and collect your reward, wait for my quest tomorrow!
Anyone? Help! That guy's about to fall!
Look. Up there! He can't get down!
Help, help!
Yes. That's the one!
Nice. Let me take a look at it.
Let's see here... It's spectacular! You're quite natural for photography, aren't you?
Just look at the transparency of this pond!
I really liked this place when I was a kid. I’d always come here by myself to play.
My parents was worried that I might end up go swimming in it or something on my own, so they gave me a camera.
My dad said if I saw anything I liked, I should take a picture of it.
Well, with something expensive in my hands, I wouldn’t dare jump into the water with it.
But I ended up taking a lot of photos because of it.
There was this one time where I took a picture almost at the same angle as yours and mailed it to a magazine publisher. And whaddaya know! It got selected for one of their knew releases!
That's how I started learning photography, which got better and better by the day. And so did Jinzhou started to thrive.
There were more people on the streets, more shops, and businesses more prosperous. It was a good time.
Okay, I think that’s enough mumbling. Please excuse me, I can't stop thinking about things like this once I start.
We should move on to the next scenery. And the place is...
Oh! I’ve got an idea! Do you like cats?
That's great! Little kitties, fluffy and adorable. Everyone loves them!
Haha, dogs are nice too! But...
You sure know how to be a cat!
Next, I would like you to take a picture of a cat. Sounds good?
I'll mark the location for you. Off we go.
Right there. See those cats, you can go give them a pet if you’d like.
Well? Let see that cute furball.
Beautiful photo. Look how relaxed he is taking its nap. He looks so comfortable.
There used to be some small kittens around here as well. I’d come see them whenever I was back from a business trip.
And there was a calico just like this one. He grew pretty close to me.
I’d often come see him, bring him something to eat, stroke his hair.
It’s a shame that I was busy with work and traveled a lot, so I couldn’t bring him home.
One time, I was away on a long business trip and I couldn’t find him anywhere after I came back.
It made me a bit sad so I stopped visiting for while.
Then one day I happened to pass by and saw these kittens. There were also people coming over to feed and take care of them.
I even asked around, and to my delight the calico ended up being adopted by a lovely family.
*chuckle* That's my story with cats. Now there’s only one more place left to go. And I have a favor to ask.
I’d like to ask you to take a picture of me in the residential area. I wish to make it the the final photo of the collection.
I need to make some preparations. Why don’t we meet there in a bit?
How’s the photo? Let’s give it a look.
Oh, I'm so sorry. I’ve stared at it for too long.
I used to take pictures here with my family, just like that family.
It’s a family thing for us to take a picture here each year. I used to stand in the middle, with my dad having to hold me up just to get in the picture frame when I was younger.
After I grew older, I got big enough to wrap my arms around my parents' shoulders for the pictures.
The amount of family photos grew less after I left home for my job. Now, they're not here anywhere, but...
Taking another photo here at the same spot, can count as telling them I'm doing pretty well, right?
Yeah. I really appreciate your help today. If it wasn't for you, it would’ve been really hard for me to fulfill my wish of capturing the moments of Jinzhou!
I plan to mail these photos back to the publishing, crediting your name on them. Oh, dear. We’ve been so preoccupied with the photos, I haven’t got the chance to get your name yet.
Got it. I am in your debt!
You must accept these as your reward. Keep my camera as well.
It's an old pal of mine. Visited countless places with me over the years. I believe it deserves to continue its journey of capturing the beauties of the world with you.
I trust you and your talent. Also, how about considering becoming a journalist in your free time?
Oh, don't cry, don't cry. Tell me what happened. Did someone pick on you?
Sob...
Been crying for a while now. I can't get an answer out of her.
She just came to buy Spicy Pulled Chicken, but the Fowl is already used up today.
So I said, Come back tomorrow, I'll get the stuff and do prep. And she sat down and bawled.
She’s been like this for nearly 10 minutes now. I haven’t gotten the slightest clue what she’s so sad about.
Sob...
I, I can't do anything right every day. I can't buy what I want to eat, I... *sobbing*
And now your crying even harder. Here, let me help you wipe those tears.
Well, you get the picture! If I could just go buy some fresh ingredients, I can give her the food she’s craving for!
It's just that I have the intention to do it but I can't spare the time, she has to have someone to look after her, and the shop has to have someone to look after it...
I... Wow, thank you so much! I'll treat you to something nice when you're back!
For the ingredients of the Spicy Pulled Chicken, you can directly ask Mahe, we're all familiar.
Tell him I sent you and the bill’s on me.
I hope you won’t mind the hassle. I'll make sure to treat you with our speciality dishes here!
Panhua? So she's finally willing to buy from my place, huh?
I see. One moment please, I'll go get what you need real quick. Freshness guaranteed!
Let’s see here... Cooking oil, chili peppers, chicken. Perfect, we've got everything! Thank you so much! Now it's my turn to shine!
Here you go, sweetie. Dig in.
Let me taste it... Uh...
Why are you crying again, honey? Not to your taste?
No, no, it's really delicious. Just too spicy...
As a child, I was always crying, and my grandpa would make pulled chicken to cheer me up.
He used to say that if I ate something spicy, all the bitterness of life would go away and there's no need to cry.
But now that I'm older, I don't cry as much. When my grandpa passed away, I didn't even shed a tear. I thought I'd lost the ability to cry...
But recently, I was under a lot of pressure and felt wronged, and I suddenly wanted to eat pulled chicken, but I couldn't find it anywhere. That's when I...
I'm really troubling you, but I just, I just miss my grandfather...
Thank you so much, both of you. The chicken was delicious. I'll definitely be back for more.
You can come by anytime, sweetie. Be sure to wear a big smile on your face next time!
I’m glad you stopped by to help. Wouldn’t have made the chicken for her in time without you.
As a restaurant owner, you inevitably come across situations like this. Life can be tough sometimes, and a good meal can make all the difference.
That's why I started this place. When I saw that little girl crying, it broke my heart. Thanks for lending a hand today, it means a lot to me.
Thank you so much for today. From now on, you can use the pots in my shop as you please. If you have any difficulties, don't hesitate to tell me!
Look, the pot is right there. I have copied the recipe for Spicy Pulled Chicken for you. If you follow the recipe to do the cooking, I guarantee it will be delicious!
Would you like to give it a try now? Here, I have some ingredients for you. There is some left, so you can make another dish!
I wanted to get a quick break in, but ended up dropping some of my packages into the lake...
I don't know how to swim... Can you help me fish them out of the water if you got the time?
Oh! Thank you! Thank you so much! I'll know better not to take a breather by a lake next time...
I'm wondering why the ocean is blue.
Then why isn't the water in this pond blue?
Then why isn't the water in this pond blue?
Okay... I have the feeling I've heard of this from somewhere before.
I saw someone staring up at something, so I got curious and looked up...
When I turned around, I realized that all the packages I'm delivering had been snatch away by those damn lizards!
Do you think we can sneak up on them and get my packages back?
Those were some really cool moves! Wow!
Oh right, thank you for helping me get my packages back!
My mother asked me to bring some Wintry Bells home while I'm before I left. I totally forgot about them.
If I make a run for the Gorges of Spirits now, these goods definitely won't be delivered in time.
I might as well go to a shop to get some...
Are these for me? Thank you so much!
Huh? Oh! Yeah, yeah, I'm fine! I appreciate your help, stranger!
I can't figure out the life of me why these fools keep coming after me! I'm never taking this path again!
Good thing you came to help! Much obliged!
Yeah. See how interesting they look? They even got different relationships going on between the three of them.
Wait! Don't leave! Err... Can you help me get rid of them? They're actually blocking my way, so all I could do was stop and look at them.
Ugh... My salary is more important. So, please!
Aww... I really want to keep one... No, wait...
I'm sorry, what am I thinking. Don't take it seriously. Anyway, thank you for helping me deal with this trouble!
I'm just curious about what's on top of these buildings. I kind of want to have a look..
So that's how what's up there. Lame.
Do I look like someone who would fall for that? You may as well tell me it's connected to the other side of the universe.
That sounds so romantic. I must find a way to get up there.
That's enough chit-chat, I'm running late. Bye!
I saw something shining over there. Could it be some kind of hidden treasure?
It's just a shiny spot. There is nothing to be found.
It's just a shiny spot. There is nothing to be found.
Well? Did you find anything?
Ugh, so much for the excitement. I thought I was going to get rich.
This Roseshroom swallowed the package I'm delivering! If I don't get it out in time, it's gonna turn into Roseshroom-goo!
Gotta check on it real quick. Oh... Good, it looks okay. In one piece.
Eww...
That one cloud kinda looks like a bird, and it reminds me of the Tealfrill I once kept.
I did everything I could for my bird. Best cage, bird food, but it still died. Did I neglect it? It seems so unfair, and now I'm feeling guilty.
So it needed more love after all.
All right, All right, I get it. I wasn't doing enough. I will be more responsible next time.
They're asking me to pay the toll before they would let me pass. But I really don't have any money on me.
I even showed them my pockets, and they still won't believe me. Our stations has all the supplies we need, so I don't usually need to carry any money on me.
Um, yeah... Hey! They're trying to take my clothes!
Phew. They almost got away with it!
I'm so glad you helped me out. I need to get going and deliver this package now, or I'll be late for the order.
Oh, don't even get me started. My lunch was stolen! Grrr... Ugh...
Well... Did you pack any extras?
Thank you!
Oh, this is so good!
It's my dog. I took him on a delivery, but he vanished while I wasn't watching.
I just didn't want to shut him inside while I'm out working. I call it long-distance dog walking, by the way.
Found anything?
Okay, thanks!
Oh, nothing. Just my packages getting carried away by the river.
I didn't expect the stream to be this strong. They got washed away just like that. Well, they're gone already, there's nothing left for me to do besides going downstream to pick them up...
Huh? If you want to, sure. Thanks in advance.
Wow. It's amazing how fast you got them back. I'll go ahead with my delivery now. Cheers.
In the land of the Daxia, I am practicing the art of overdashing, hoping to one day become a skilled swordsman.
Indeed, I am a fan of the novel The Seven Swords of Qingren by Kuhai. I aspire to become a new generation of Kung Fu heroes! So I am learning from him, or rather, trying to talk like him.

I learned these words from the novel The Seven Swords of Qingren by Kuhai. This book is very popular in my homeland, and if I want to become a new generation of Kung Fu heroes, I must learn from all aspects!
Qingren heroes are the main characters in the novel The Seven Swords of Qingren and are mysterious swordsmen of unknown identity, known as Chiqiu.

Third, as a hero, you can hide in high places, your presence unknown to others. Swift movements can only be made on the rooftops, challengers must not touch the ground and must not seek other paths.

Alright, there’s no time to waste. I must make my move!
Whoa, 漂泊者, your passion is contagious! You’ve got me all fired up too!

Yes, it's about a kid and their Grandma, traveling to find some moons to brighten up the forest.
Yes, it's about a kid visiting many places, trying to pick up the moons to show their Grandma.

Something seems carved on it... moon… tree... happiness..

General.

We have five hundred remaining soldiers prepared and medically cleared for combat. After receiving the antidote for Retroact Rain, they have reported minimal hallucinations and no adverse effects.

We march on to the Norfall Barrens as soon as the rain stops.

“Phantoms” of Tacet Discords and our fallen soldiers repeated their indiscriminate attacks on everything in their sight.

The Norfall Barrens turned into a living hell, and to this day, we can still hear the desperate cries...
The Battle Beneath the Crescent was humanity’s first recorded encounter with Retroact Rain enhanced by Threnodian power.

Your previous General sent back valuable video recordings of the rain. Those videos provided crucial information, which allowed nations worldwide to speed up their research on defense against the Retroact Rain.
Our people at the Black Shores have theorized that the Threnodian, abnormal moon sightings, and the Retroact Rain may be linked.

Hi, Verina! I'm Chixia, this is Yangyang, and she's Rover! Grandma Lin told us we should come find you!

It's not Viola, either, since Viola has notched petals.
Then there's also the Cliffrecluse, but this flower has a longer stamen and an extra petal.

Uncle Aalto sells stuff without a license, he listens in on people for commercial secrets, and he loves pulling pranks on us kids... But he’s not a bad guy, really!
Ugh, Encore! Remember our little chat?
What did I say about calling me Uncle in public again? I am NOT that old!
Miss Verina, where did you meet this girl?
I ran into her near a cliff on my way home. She was eating a poisonous mushroom...
I managed to make her the antidote in time. Imagine what would have happened if I wasn't there...
Don't worry! Encore's had plenty of that mushroom already!
But why did you go to such a dangerous place alone, little Encore?
We've got your back, little one! No worries! Just tell us what you know!
Because... Because Encore must keep an eye on him!
Because... Because Encore must keep an eye on her!
Ahahaha... Kids can have such wild imaginations sometimes, haha...
Hey, Aalto? Didn't you send Encore there? Wait... Why are they all giving you the side eye?
Encore... Some things are better left unspoken, you know...
Since the situation has come to this, I've got no choice but to tell you...
Indeed! We're here for business. And it's a crucial one! You wanna know what it is?
Let's go, Encore!
Hey, Aalto! Wait for meeee!
See ya! We still have a world to save!
Cough cough... Wait!
Please respect the park and its infrastructure. Keep a safe distance and do not feed the animals.
The area ahead is the Dim Forest. Mutant Organisms frequently appear and are known to organize attacks on humans.
The Midnight Rangers are conducting a recovery operation. Until the area is fully recovered, non-mission personnel are not allowed to enter.
The park is large. To ensure a good experience, we recommend driving or taking the park bus.
Every Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday are performance days. Free parking is available all day.
Thank you for visiting! A new group performance is being planned. Stay tuned!
Hoochiefs often appear in groups in the forest and launch brutal attacks on humans.
Please do not enter the forest unless necessary. If you enter by mistake, please leave as soon as possible.
The exit is ahead. If you are driving, you will need to purchase a new ticket to re-enter.
Who knows what the boss was thinking, choosing such a terrible place to camp...
It looks like we have a lot of supplies, but they all belong to those apes!
They are all so cunning, you can't even take a Coriolus from them!
It looks like we're going to starve again today, sigh...
The area ahead is a conservation area and is only open to staff. Visitors, please do not enter.
Please enter the park in an orderly manner and take your assigned seat. Please respect the performance and do not make loud noises.
The performance is over. Three lucky audience members will be selected to interact with...
The facilities here have mechanisms, suspected to be operated by the Hoochiefs. Please be careful when carrying out your mission.
Please follow the designated route in the ecological tour area. Do not climb over the fence.
The thing you gave me is indeed a bit old. It's a microelectronic device part from before the Lament. It's used for... you wouldn't understand even if I told you.
It's relatively simple to fix... Wait for me here, I'll be back soon.
It cost me several electronic components, the ones that are out of production... Fortunately, the data in them at least made me feel that I didn't lose out.
The Midnight Rangers have always been puzzled by the strange behavior of the Hoochief. After I looked at this hard drive, I think it's actually simple. They are planning to take revenge on humans.
The Dim Forest was a famous zoo before the Lament, known for its animal performances.
Because of their high intelligence, the apes could master many skills. They were the first to be trained for performances, becoming the most popular exhibits.
After the Lament, humans gradually fled the forest. The apes built their nests, becoming the masters, and even started to attack humans.
At first, humans could handle it, until they were infected by the Tacetite, and mutated into the more dangerous creatures they are now.
So... setting traps, locking humans in tree cages, and making humans perform in the theater... is their clumsy revenge, at least that's what I think.
Using the knowledge taught by humans, they are returning what humans have done to them in double.
That's probably it, do you have any other questions?
It's probably a... amusement place? Before the Lament, humans liked to lock animals in cages, rooms, in other words, in fixed areas, for visitors to appreciate.
The largest venue, it is said, can exhibit five to six hundred animals at the same time, and it has also spawned a huge supporting industry.
How much idle time did the people before the Lament have to squander... it's unimaginable now.
Hmm, should it be considered lucky, or unlucky...
It was originally a special albino individual, rescued by humans from the wild and kept in a zoo, and it was deeply loved by visitors because of its eye-catching appearance.
Gradually, it became the star of the zoo, and every time it performed, the venue was packed.
But because of this, the albino orangutan was forced to undergo stricter training, learning to do things that only humans can do...
There were also some people, from the orangutan's perspective, who opposed animal performances.
But their voices were too small, and in the end, they were unable to stop the Feilian Beringal from taking the path of revenge... this is a futile effort, don't you think?
Oh, it's strange, the big leader mobilized a large number of troops in the Dim Forest, but in the end, nothing happened.
It is said that the message conveyed by the Feilian Beringal before its death affected the entire monkey group.
Contrary to expectations, the aggression and combat power of the monkeys have greatly decreased, and it is much easier to deal with.
The Midnight Rangers will also arrange a permanent training ground in the Dim Forest, and you can go and have a look if you have nothing to do.
Although I rarely praise people, I have to say that you did a good job with the Feilian Beringal.
Oh, there's also a video of it when it was a baby.
In fact, albino individuals have a hard time surviving in the wild, so objectively speaking, it was humans who gave it a life.
The people who saved it were probably researchers or something, it's quite romantic, they even held a celebration ceremony when it completed its treatment and left the rescue cabin.
I saw it was quite happy, jumping around on the backs of those people, haha.
I wonder if it started to know about humans from that time on?
Alright, that's enough talking. Take care, I won't see you off.
Rocks! One o'clock!
Watch out! Tacet Discords incoming!
We’ll shake them off. Use your Grapple now!
Yangyang, Rover... Follow me! We're going down from here!
Mind the cliff!
Master Jianxin!
There's too many of them. Someone must stay behind to keep them at bay.
Everyone, let's part our ways here.
Carry on with your mission. You can leave the rest to me.
The Suspended Ruins are ahead of us.
The Resonance Beacon here is still functioning, and the defense feature is intact too. We can catch our breath here.
The Ovathrax assault has been brutal, as expected. We've been cut off from our main forces.
It's the three of us against them all from here.
Master Jianxin... I hope she is okay...
I tried to contact her and our base, but nothing came back. The Threnodian's power is possibly interfering with Terminal signals.
We have no choice but to trust them now. Let's press on.
We're bound to face a vicious fight.
We've reached the Suspended Ruins. We'll get going once you're ready.
It's unusually quiet inside. Tread with caution.
This wall... We should be able to Pull it away with our Grapple.
Every path ahead has been cut off...
We're not seeing anything at the moment... Rover, be careful. Something bigger might be waiting for us ahead.
Creating a Tacet Discord of this level... But it won't stop us!
As expected, the enemies are increasingly strong as we approach the statue.
Have you been injured, Rover, Yangyang?
I'm okay, but Rover, he...
I'm okay, but Rover, she...
...Give me your hand.
Hmm... Knew it. The battle has left you with a few scratches.
I still have some first-aid with me. Please use them.
The upcoming battles will be even more dangerous. Should you get injured, you must let me know in time.
Let's keep moving.
The road ahead is completely blocked off.
You choose where the Disruptor's last blast hits. Make it count, Rover.
May it cleave out a path for us.
This amount of enemies... We cannot fire the Disruptor again...
Yangyang, you...
The Threnodian is only going to summon more of them as we go. We need someone to keep them away and escort the others into the statue.
I understand you're planning to do it yourself, General, but I think I am better suited for this task.
We all want to beat the Threnodian once and for all.
I understand you don't want to leave anyone behind. But we all know you and Rover have the best chance against that monster.
Now that our shared goal is within hand's reach, I... I do not want to let it slip away.
...Indeed, Yangyang. Turns out I was the one being indecisive.
Now, Rover...
I've witnessed the faith and fortitude of so many on our way here. It’s time I fulfill their trust.
Rover, please leave it to me. I'll have your back.
Now, Rover...
Please make the call.
I will stand guard here. The Threnodian will not be able to draw more power from the monsters here.
I'll leave the rest to you.
Watch out! I can feel Tacet Discords ahead.
One moment, Rover.
We can work the terrain to our advantage here. Let's try pull that wall down on them, and they'll be trapped underneath.
Same situation. Let's do it again.

Upgrade the specifications to normal dialogue, showing the situation in the courtyard, and give the camera to the dragon's residence, with the sound effects of fighting, indicating that there are people fighting inside, increasing the sense of urgency. Hint that the water level needs to be lowered to enter.
The control panel requires a special sound storage device to start. I remember it looks a bit like a disc with wings, storing different sound melodies inside.
I know! It's the little UFO, right?
Hehe... It's not that hard! Let's quickly find the other little UFOs.
It seems Jiyan and I were right in our suspicions. It really is that guy causing trouble.
Jiyan, you see, never speaks without solid evidence.
Alright, let's talk about you now.
When I was at home, I felt a special sense of familiarity from you, just like... a Sentinel.
Yeah, that's right. The report mentioned that the pattern on your terminal is very similar to the markings on the Sentinel.
And you, like him, can absorb Threnodian power, so I have some little guesses...
Do you and it come from the same place?
Ever heard of the Court of Savantae Laboratory?
After Sentinel was discovered on Mt. Firmament years ago, it was... processed in the Court of Savantae's laboratory.
The things we've learned from him should be enough to solve quite a few mysteries.
Unfortunately, the original research area of the Court of Savantae has been destroyed, and a lot of the data wasn't saved. That grumpy Sentinel never likes to share anything about himself.
So what I can offer is...
This is all the information we have on the card.
I was planning to meet you and hand it over today, but got a bit delayed.
Everyone hesitates in the face of the unknown, but aren't you curious?
By the look on your face, did you... remember something?
Are you sure you're okay? Do you need a break?
Lab... Court of Savantae?
Long, elongated creature? Could it be the Sentinel? It certainly doesn't look like a naturally hatched creature.
Sorry, I can't agree to this request for now.
But I promise, when the time is right, I'll definitely arrange a meeting between you and him.
So now, on behalf of Huanglong, I formally request your help to combat the rejuvenating storm.

Sentinel always likes to say we're trying to stop a chariot with a mantis' arm, but I think, knowing our insignificance but still facing difficulties, that's what being a Huanglong, a Huanglong person, is all about.
You don't have to answer me right now, you know.
Huanglong's determination won't waver for anything, but with you joining, the chances of victory will definitely increase.
You there, kind sir. Please, I’m in dire need of assistance...
You there, kind miss. Please, I’m in dire need of assistance...
*sigh* The Tacet Discords busted our radars again...
I don’t know what’s got into them lately. It’s like they’re on a rampage. We’ve lost count how many times the radars’ gotten totaled...
Fix, smashed, fix, smashed. Rinse and repeat... With our brothers going out like flies, even the engineers hightailed it. When is this ever going to end...?
My squadmates. Ah... excuse me. Forgot to introduce myself. I’m Hé Chou, Midnight Rangers. I’m from the unit stationed in this area.
With all the mess the TDs have been giving us, everyone’s... ran off left, right, and center.
And now I’m the only one that’s left... plain old useless me... with nothing I can do...
An engineer was supposed to report in for duty today, but he hasn’t even shown up yet...
Ugh. It’s my last assignment, too. I can’t screw this up...
Just my luck. How did I get myself into this mess?
All right, all right... Guess it’s the only thing I can do for now...
Well, it can’t get any worse than this...
But you’re right... There are TDs running wild all over the place as it is... Can’t have my bad luck passing on to others...
All right, all right... Guess it’s the only thing I can do for now...
By the way. I haven’t caught your name...
漂泊者... Got it. I’ll keep that in mind.
Also, once my shifts over, remind me to get you a good luck charm to make up for all this jumble.
You still in one piece?
I’m okay. Thank goodness you guys came in time. Almost thought I was a goner!
Phew... Good to hear. Can’t have any more people get hurt. Not on my watch...
Wait a sec... Your uniform. You're a Midnight Ranger? And who may this be...?
Yes, the name’s Hé Chou. Rearguard, Midnight Rangers. And this is 漂泊者, a friend who’s got quite a few fighting skills under hs sleeves it seems like.
Yes, the name’s Hé Chou. Rearguard, Midnight Rangers. And this is 漂泊者, a friend who’s got quite a few fighting skills under her sleeves it seems like.

Ahh. Greetings. I’m Qiuwang. Engineer. I received orders from the Defense Division to report my new assignment. I have been briefed on the recent incidents regarding this area. Thank you for your hard work thus far.
Yet, regardless of how difficult the situation may be, we cannot put aside our tasks. Without further delay, let’s head to the surveillance station.
You... You do realize you were just attacked by TDs, right? Aren't you afraid? You sure you don’t want to rest up a bit?
I’m a bit frightened, yes. But rest won’t be necessary.
The risk of danger increases each minute the radar isn’t operational. As I was entrusted with this task, I am obligated to fulfill these duties.
Besides, there is something I wish to pursue...
The way you put it reminds of the old me who volunteered to come to the Desorock Highland.
I used to be full of ambition and eagerness to try out something new...
But after you get beaten down over and over again, those close to you disappear one after another...
And all you can do is just watch... standing there helplessly...
I’ll see if you can still keep that enthusiasm and high spirit of yours when the time comes.
When the time... Well, only time will tell!
All I know is that there is a task at hand, and repairs must be done at the surveillance station.
Hmm... The door seems a little strange...
The rocks must’ve smashed the supporting beam, so the wall tilted inside and jammed the door.
Indeed. The roof has been punctured cleanly through by a large rock.
I wonder if we can repair it... *sigh*... Everything's breaking down all over the place lately...
It would seem repairs are unnecessary. Better to tear everything down and rebuild.
Well, things breaking down isn’t necessarily a bad thing. No construction without destruction. Don’t you agree?
This is the place, let's go in.
Astonishing, 漂泊者! Aren’t you just full of surprises?
Well... Let's see here. This Induction Cell seems to be intact. Once we install this back to where it belongs, all it takes for me is to adjust some settings to restore the station’s data.
You work fast, 漂泊者. You’ll make for a great engineer. Have you considered becoming one?
Ahh. That’s a shame. But I agree that one should decide their own path and walk it on their own free will.
Haha. You were quick to answer. Why don’t you give it some more experience before you come to a final decision?
Qiuwang uttered as he continued to adjust the Induction Cell.
It is done! Data link complete... We now have access to the Tacet Discord incursion on record.
Incursion records? I thought restoring the data was all we needed to do?
Restoring the data is only a temporary solution. With this record, we can study the TDs’ behaviors, in order to better formulate measures to strengthen our defenses and eliminate future problems.
Which is also the ultimate goal of my assignment... Performing constant repairs is simply unfeasible long-term.
As you can see, all three surveillance stations are currently damaged. It will take a significant amount of time for even the most skilled engineers to repair and have them fully back and running.
Not to mention the numerous dangers they may encounter along the way...
Ahem. In short, our work at this station has concluded. We should move on to the next one.
I shall entrust you for protection if we come across anything unexpected.
The door on this one broken, but the Cell is missing.
*sigh* It's either one problem or the other. I can't even hand over my shift properly. How useless I am...
Err... This isn’t really your fault, is it?
Constant moaning about these matters won't do you any good... You are familiar with this place more than any of us. Why don't you try recalling where the Cell may be?
Come to think of it... Nearby Exiles sometimes come here to steal things.
But they usually go for food or scrap metals, stuff like that. They don’t have the guts to try and take something like this... What happened this time?
Hmm... It's a clue at least. Lead the way. We should talk with the Exiles nearby.
Hello there. Are you the ones who’s taken the cell?
Caramel? What caramel? We be eaten all the caramel if we had them!
Err... Not caramel. Cell.
Caramel, cellamel. They be the same.
It’s just an act. I’ve seen it all before.
You try talk sense to these airheads and all you’re going to get is a dead end.
Some good-old beating is the only way to deal with these clowns.
Ow, ow, ow! Alright, Alright! I get it, Boss. I give up, okay!?
Out with it. Where are you keeping the Induction Cell?
I-Induction Cell? We've never even heard of it before.
It's a rectangular piece with smooth edges. It has a metallic frame, cold on the hands, and is rather heavy to carry...
Oh! That! Yes, yes. We’ve seen it before.
The TDs’ been coming over here a lot these days. And we saw them getting into a huge fight with those uniform guys the other day.
They were fighting over that big tin box like crazy. We thought it must be some kind of treasure, and brought it back after everything went all quite.
Couldn’t figure out for the life of us what it was or used for, so we just tossed it aside.
Enough yammering. Just tell us where it is!
Hey! Easy, easy buddy! I-I don’t remember where it is. It’s been a while since we tossed it. Okay...?
How about a physical reminder on the head. Eh?
Eek! I swear, I can’t remember!
Why... why don’t you go look for it yourself? It’s probably in that pile over there.
I appears we are short on screening options for the time being. We’ll just have resort to the old-fashioned way.
Fine. We’ll find it ourselves.
One moment. There’s one more thing I’d like to ask.
Do you recall seeing anyone else besides the Rangers recently?
Oh, yeah. There was someone who wore same uniform as you and was always repairing stuff near the surveillance station. Haven't seen them lately, though.
I see...
Well, it’s more than that...
It’s a long story. Let’s focus on the task at hand first.
It seems luck is on our side. We have the Cell!
Didn’t expect my luck to make a turn from digginig through a garbage dump...
You may be surprised at what you can find even in garbage. Perhaps there are items in those other piles that would prove useful to us as well...
Tell me you're not thinking what I think you're thinking...
*chuckle* I'm fine with either. Let’s leave the decision to 漂泊者.
Let’s hope this thing’s still working.
Qiuwang installed the Induction Cell back in its place.
Hmmm... There. It’s connected!
I’ve managed to gain acces of data on the TDs’ behaviors as well... So the reports about how quickly they’re adapting were true...
How is this possible...?
One more surveillance station to go and the radars can be back online.
It seems the only way we can solve this mystery is by getting the last set of data...
Before we do, there’s more work ahead of us.
As I anticipated, there are also signs of structural collapse in this station... Likely caused by battle.
Judging from these markings, the significance of the amount of force exterted that led to this destruction cannot be underestimated.
Fortunately, it seems that the surrounding area is still safe for the time being... We should break the debris and get inside quickly.
Hmm... Now that the last Cell is back in place, the entire line has been connected, so it’ll take some time for the data to transfer.
Wait... I hear movement outside!
What the...
Tsk... These guys look like they mean business...
They’ve got us outnumbered, what are we gonna do...
I admire your confidence, but be cautious not to get too overconfident.
You’ve got some skills I’ll give you that, but don’t get your guard down...
These TDs may look large in size, but as long as we can figure out their frequencies and exploit their weaknesses, we may be able to gain the upper hand.
We should take the initiative and attack from our side to widen our chances of winning.
Yeah, these TDs aren’t going anywhere anyway... Here goes nothing. I’m not letting anything get in my way of turning in this shift!
Data link complete... TD behavior record download complete...
Qiuwang gave a strange face after he carefully compared the data sets—his eyes sparkled with surprise, but the corners of his mouth curled down slightly in a bitter smile.
Qiuwang gave a strange face after he carefully compared the data sets—his eyes sparkled with surprise, but the corners of his mouth curled down slightly in a bitter smile.
Just as my mentor had told me... The TDs in this areas have managed to evolve and garner the consciousness of coordinating their attacks and finishing off their targets...
Yes. My mentor. The engineer that was last assigned to this station.
A while ago, I received a message from him mentioning the TDs in this area were evolving in abnormal speed. His speculations are now proven true after witnessing what had happened today for myself.
I've collected most of the data mentioned in the message, however...
The reason for this evolution remains a mystery. The same can be said about the whereabouts of my mentor...
Yes... I haven't heard from him since he sent me the message...
Considering the speed at which the TDs are evolving, I'm afraid he...
...Don't give up. There's still a place we haven't been to yet.
The radar station. We should give the place a look.
Another empty building...
The place’s been like this ever since that battle...
There’s one approach left for us to do. Which is to activate the radar.
Once done, we may find new information from the station’s data.
I can’t say for certain there will be any. But at this point, there’s only one way to find out...
The last data... Our last hope.
Warm reminder: There is damage on the roof, non-professionals please stay away, professionals please pay attention to safety when working.
Warm reminder: There is damage on the roof, non-professionals please stay away, professionals please pay attention to safety when working.
Yes... Some TDs found their way inside, and we're now surrounded by a bunch of cops. Hard to make it out of here with the specimens.
Fortunately you caught that Rover. Whether he's useful for research or not, holding he hostage will buy us some time.
Fortunately you caught that Rover. Whether she's useful for research or not, holding she hostage will buy us some time.
What should I do next, Master?
Here's the coordinates. Bring him to me, I'm in the inner chamber.
Here's the coordinates. Bring her to me, I'm in the inner chamber.
He's a sly one. Ready to bolt any moment.
She's a sly one. Ready to bolt any moment.
I have trackers planted on him. him's not going anywhere in our territory.
I have trackers planted on her. her's not going anywhere in our territory.
We'll talk once you get here.
You heard him. You're in our turf. Better not get any bright ideas.
Well that's not your problem. Also, no one's coming to your rescue anytime soon.
I guess you managed to send out a distress call? Somehow it slipped past us. Ah… You had an encrypted transmitter tablet.
Hand it over. Don't try to deceive me.
Good boy.
Good girl.
Funny you'd think you have a choice.
You are a valuable test subject. I don't want to make things difficult for you, unless you force my hands... Got it?
Here's the thing. Dollmaker's listening to our every word. All my efforts will be wasted if he suspects anything.
ll be typing on this tablet for you to see. I want you to follow my instructions.
Very well, if you can refrain from unnecessary struggle, we won't have to do things the hard way.
You don't need to know. Now get moving.
We're in the factory where Dollmaker makes his puppets. The place is full of traps and his minions. Very dangerous.
Hehe. Patience. You'll know once you see him.
Dollmaker's in bed with the Fractsidus, trading Overclock-inducing puppets for resources and funds.
I need your help to collect proof of his crimes.
No more wasting time... Let's go.
I'll take off your restraints on the way. I need you to pretend you're still bound, remember?
Strange. The path is blocked. That thing should open it back up. I'll handle it.
That's the total number of prototype puppets... Imagine what would happen if they're all activated at once.
Military-grade mechs... How did they get their hands on these?
All puppets are powered by these metal canisters... That's why non-Resonators can activate the puppets.
Yinlin, you made it. Have those cops entered the factory?
Not yet. But those Exiles were Overclocking and I had to take them down.
It's fine, they're disposable.
They're a bunch of outcasts, willing to do whatever it takes to survive. No one would mourn them if they died.
Oh...? Me?
I could save them, sure, but who's gonna save me?
Stop it, Dollmaker... My parents would not consent to being brought back as puppets.
Yinlin... I thought at least you would understand me.
I don't blame you. You were too young when they passed away, after all. You hardly remember them.
And that's why I couldn't revive them from your memories. Not from my own, either.
This is where you come in, Rover. You're a godsend, a gift from above.
Precisely. With help from the Fractsidus, plus your body's data… I will finally create their puppets.
Dollmaker, you…
I was an outcast, alone and shunned... Until my mentor and his wife took me in. They were my true family.
I'll do anything to bring them back, no matter the price...
So what? Why should I care?
It's almost time. We'll have to leave the factory behind, but there's a couple prototypes I need to bring.
My identity must stay hidden. Use explosives to stop them if necessary, Yinlin.
But our people are still inside the factory.
Our people? There's only the two of us. The rest of them are not worth my concern.
What about Rover?
Same as before, Yinlin. Just knock him out.
Same as before, Yinlin. Just knock her out.
No need to keep him intact this time, some level of basic consciousness is enough. The Fractsidus taught me methods to operate on a body like that.
No need to keep her intact this time, some level of basic consciousness is enough. The Fractsidus taught me methods to operate on a body like that.
I'll leave two puppets here. To pretend we're still holding him hostage behind the closed door.
I'll leave two puppets here. To pretend we're still holding her hostage behind the closed door.
We'll need the data repository too.
Yes... My research data. That's more valuable than my life.
I'll take care of the data transfer. Yinlin, you deal with this person. Be quick!
See? How lively! You really need to come and see it in person for the full effect.
And that's thanks to your efforts, Wenshu.
Well, I'm just doing my job. I should be the one thanking you. After all, without the Midnight Rangers tirelessly guarding the front lines, the Riverside Games wouldn't be possible.
Don't always be so tense. Sometimes, you have to give yourself a breather. It's not good to push yourself too hard. So, how about picking up an event to participate in?
Wenshu... Thank you, but you don't have to pitch me.
Why not? Go enjoy your youth! I would've rushed to sign up if I was still young.
漂泊者, it's good to see you here.
Oh! I guess you must be the Rover?
Nice to meet you! I'm the director of the Riverside Games. You can call me Wenshu.
Ah, I almost dropped the ball on this one. I would've forgotten to send out those invitations without Jiyan's reminder.
It's not worth mentioning, Wenshu. This is the first Riverside Games in many years, and you must have been busy with various matters. I only offered a little help when I could.
漂泊者, it's a slow day today. Please, take a break and have some fun.
That's right. Go participate in the event, you two! That's how you enjoy your day off!
Of course! The Jinzhou Riverside Games is an event for all people to enjoy. We always welcome guests to participate.
Indeed. I'm looking forward to your performance, 漂泊者.
Only a few events specifically require participants to be Resonators. Other than that, there are no special restrictions for any event.
We haven't held the Riverside Games in years. Look at him, Jiyan still remembers the rules better than I do. Who would've thought?
During the preparation, I came across some pictures from past Games and instantly felt a rush of adrenaline. Ah, the memories of my youth...
It's a pity that the Midnight Rangers are always on the front lines, getting ready for emergencies. The Riverside Games is their only chance to relax and have some fun.
漂泊者, I suggest looking around for events to join if you're interested. Many of them are open to on-site registration.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to confirm the safety of the surroundings before the race begins... You can consult Wenshu should you need any assistance.
Have a great time, 漂泊者.
Oh well, I didn't invite him over for that. I hoped he'd come and relax, not to find a new place to work.
On the other hand, we couldn't have brought the situation at the borders under control without Jiyan's prudence...
Sorry, I'm getting off track. The Gulpuff Relay is about to start, and I have to go to the scene in case anything happens.
Especially those still warming up in the backup lane. Gotta bring them over.
漂泊者, are you coming with me?
Hey, you're our top runner. You should go first and motivate us. Make the other teams sweat. Throw them off their game!
Hmm... I don't think that's the best tactic. Remember that team from ten years ago?
Oh, the record-breaking team?
Yep, it's them. Apparently their plan was to act weak in the beginning and then have their final runner blow past everyone else.
That's nonsense! What if we lag far behind and can't catch up again? All our efforts will be in vain!
Are you 漂泊者? You gonna participate in the Gulpuff Relay too?
Oh, you haven't heard?
It's the best part of the Riverside Games. Four people on each team race Gulpuff Echoes in the water lanes. It's pretty intense!
And we're just figuring out our relay order. Open to suggestions!
I've trained for the longest time. Changfeng and the others are all pretty evenly matched. What do you think—should I lead off or bring it home as anchor?
See! 漂泊者's on my side! So it's been decided!
Okay, okay! If you say so, I believe I can do it!
漂泊者, don't be silly! It's a relay! Anyway, thanks for the joke. It definitely helped calm my nerves a bit.
We'll win and we'll break the record! You hear me?
Yeah!
I can't hear you! LOUDER! DO YOU HEAR ME!
YEAH!!
Wow, if this isn't the very important guest of Jinzhou! Thanks for rooting for us!
Sorry for being loud. But you gotta admit, sometimes a strong voice is needed to show our determination. Right?
I saw another team preparing for the race just now, but they seem to have run into some problem.
Wenshu just rushed over there. I hope they're okay!
Now, the race is about to start. We need to do a final warm-up. Remember to cheer for us, okay?
Ugh... All those hours of training for nothing. We're doomed.
Don't give up yet. We've still got some time before the relay starts!
Lingyan, Ganquan, what's wrong?
Hi, Wenshu! And this is...?
This is 漂泊者.
Perfect timing! We're have a bit of a situation right now.
Two of our teammates accidentally injured themselves during warm-up... Luckily, the wounds weren't too bad, but the doctor said that they wouldn't be able to participate in the relay anytime soon.
We've asked the organizing committee. Said we can still participate with temporary teammates.
But the relay is starting soon. It's impossible to find another person to join us, not to mention two...
Sigh... First our captain had to quit because of some family emergency, and now this...
Ugh. Are we supposed to just wait for the next Riverside Games? Who knows when that will be...
Speaking of which... Do you have a team, 漂泊者?
漂泊者 is also a Resonator. He's fully qualified for the Gulpuff Relay.
漂泊者 is also a Resonator. She's fully qualified for the Gulpuff Relay.
Still... it depends on whether he would like to join you.
Still... it depends on whether she would like to join you.
It's simple! Four people take turns controlling a Gulpuff in a relay race. The first team to reach the finish line wins.
Thank you so much! If we can get the prize money, we'll definitely split it with you!
Even if we don't rank, we'll treat you to a big feast in Jinzhou to thank you for doing us such a big favor.
That's right! We'll buy you the best barbecue in Jinzhou. That place is everyone's favorite!
Then you're only one person short for the relay. I know a good candidate for that...
Wh-who?
Bingo.
Oh! Why didn't I think of him!
Huh? Are you serious? The general doesn't look like he'd be interested in events like this.
Well, there's more to your general than you know. That's all I can say.
What do you mean?
Instead of asking questions here, why don't you just go and invite him?
I don't have the guts...
Go invite him now, and you may still have a chance to get him onboard. Don't let others take your chance!
We're counting on you, 漂泊者!
漂泊者, what are you doing here? Have you found any event that you're interested in?
Trouble? If you're comfortable sharing, tell me about it. Maybe I can help.
So... you want me to join the relay as your temporary teammate?
No worries.
No.
The key to winning a relay race lies in mutual understanding, cooperation, and trust among team members.
Most of the teams are formed according to the Midnight Rangers units they belong to. Therefore, they're familiar with their teammates and have good teamwork.
I believe you can find a better candidate for your team. That candidate doesn't have to be me.
Disqualification for teams without enough participants... Yes, I remember that rule. I imagine your teammates would be greatly disappointed if that happened.
Joining you... I see. It might be fun.
But given we never trained together before, it may prove challenging to win.
A temporary team...
I'm fine, thank you for asking... It's been a long time since I last heard that phrase.
Indeed. No need to worry about the end result before the competition begins.
Yes... I'll join you.
Spectators are gathering along the lanes. The race should start soon.
Let's go join our new teammates.
Nothing... Perhaps it's just my imagination.
You... You managed to rope the general in?
Greetings, General Jiyan, 漂泊者.
漂泊者 has told me what happened. I will join you.
Hooray! Now we can join the race! With General Jiyan and 漂泊者 on our side, maybe we can even aim for a new record!
Not to be the party pooper here, but as a last-minute team, we probably won't hit the record. Unless...
Unless what?
Uh, sorry, forget about it.
Ten years ago, a team set the record in the Gulpuff Relay race. That record remains unbeaten to this day.
Since then, every time the Games are held, a major highlight is whether the record will be broken.
Yeah! I really wanted to learn from their strategy, but the video of that race got borrowed and never returned. Bummer.
They set the record. They must have trained together for a long time.
Well we're a temporary team. Wouldn't have been able to learn much from it anyway.
Keep your chin up. Your hard work will pay off.
Not to mention the team you were talking about was a temporary team, too.
Wow, so even General Jiyan has heard of that race!
Yes. That was a... good race.
Well, it's been ten years... I wonder how that team's doing now.
We should worry about ourselves first... There's not much time left, and we haven't even decided the relay order.
Ah, the relay order... It used to be decided by the captain...
Then... General, can you decide it for us?
As you have trained together extensively, I trust you can decide the order better than me. I will gladly cooperate to the best of my abilities.
Alright... in that case, I think Ganquan would be perfect as the first runner!
Me... the first? Seriously?
You've always been the first runner during our training. Surely you'll make a good start!
The first runner doesn't need to coordinate with the two of us; he only needs to exchange the controller with Lingyan. It's a safe arrangement indeed.
Whew—I'll do my best.
Hmm... As for General Jiyan and 漂泊者, I think...
General, can you be the connecting third runner? Since you're familiar with both 漂泊者 and us Midnight Rangers.
A reasonable strategy. I agree.
Then the relay order would be me first, followed by Lingyan, then General Jiyan, and 漂泊者 last.
漂泊者, this is your first race, and you may receive plenty of attention as the last runner. Please stay calm and relax.
I'm glad to hear that.
Once I arrive at the exchange zone, go for the goal and don't look back. I'll take care of the rest.
I've always trusted your capabilities.
Any other questions?
Yes!
Our team doesn't have a name yet!
Since 漂泊者 brought this team together, maybe we should let him decide the name.
Since 漂泊者 brought this team together, maybe we should let her decide the name.
Good, it sounds easy to remember.
I'm starting to crave some buffalo wings too...
Not bad. It helps to release the tension.
We can have this as the team name, though I wouldn't call myself a genius.
Considering your character, I was expecting something... different.
Nevertheless, it is a good name. I have no objection.
The name is settled, then. Everyone, please get ready in your designated exchange zones.
We can stay in touch with our Terminals once the race begins.
The relay race started. Lingyan and Ganquan successfully exchanged the controller. However, your team lagged far behind the other teams.
漂泊者, here's the controller. We're counting on you.
Be careful of the driftwood. Jump over it.
The lane is narrowing ahead. Watch out.
Good!
Come on! Come on!
Shhh! Don't disturb him.
Shhh! Don't disturb her.
We are in the lead now. Don't worry, keep going.
Takeover...
Eh? Who was that?
Wait, the Gulpuffs don't seem right. Watch out.
漂泊者, are you all right?
I'm sorry for what just happened. You almost reached the finish line, and then...
漂泊者, did you notice anything unusual before?
An unfamiliar voice briefly interrupted our team's channel...
Wenshu, let's evacuate the spectators now. Send them back to the city in batches.
I understand, but most of the teams are waiting to start their race, and it's our first Riverside Games in years... Ending it early may spoil their fun.
The voice you mentioned... Could it be our spectators cheering?
When 漂泊者 asked me to team up with him, I heard something similar by the racing lane.
When 漂泊者 asked me to team up with her, I heard something similar by the racing lane.
I have requested the monitoring data records of all nearby waterways from the Academy for safety measures.
I see. I thought the Gulpuffs were just frightened...
There might be an underlying cause of this unusual behavior.
The records will take some more time to download. Evacuate the people first.
I trust your decision, but...
A man somehow ended up riding a Gulpuff when it all happened, and he seemed to really enjoy it. Now, other people are eager to give it a try too...
They all seem super excited... I guess it will take some time to evacuate them.
Get that person to leave first, and the others should follow.
Wenshu, I'm going with you.
Of course! Rover, you are respected by many. If you're willing to help us calm people down, it will making things easier for sure.
Thank you.
I heard we must all go back to the city now. For real?
Yes, because there is a security risk. We are here to escort you.
Say sike! I was hoping to snap a few more pics of that guy on the Gulpuff...
Ohh! You must be the runner in the lead just now!
What a pity they just suspended the race... I was really excited to see your performance!
You looked so cool! See, I've even got a video clip of you!
Sure I will! My camera only captures the best moments!
Hmm? Do you not like it? Looks pretty good to me.
Anyway, let's hurry up and leave here, shall we?
Please excuse us. My sister's never been to the Riverside Games before. She's super into photography, so she may have gotten a little carried away talking about her work.
So we're really not doing it anymore? Can't we try to find another way?
I still have more than half of my camera's memory left...
I'm sure the board of coordinators will find a way to hold it again on a later date. Now, please return to the city for your safety.
Alright. Let's go.
Ugh, fine. At least I've got two wonderful photos now! One of the famous Rover taking over the lead, and another with a guy on a Gulpuff.
By the way! Can I enter your photo in a contest? Like, is it okay for you?
That's great! I'm pretty sure it's gonna be an award-winning entry! I'll give you a half of my prize money!
Okay then... I'll just submit the other photo.
Let's go.
Can I stay a little longer please? I want to watch the full race.
The race is over now.
Hi, 漂泊者. Here's the thing. This kid won't let me take her home.
I came here by myself!
Well, you see, that's the problem. She managed to sneak in here. We are trying to get in touch with her parents.
Please don't call mommy. She'll be upset at me.
Hmm... I...
I came here to see daddy. He won the silver medal in the last race!
I haven't seen him for a long long time, so I thought maybe I can find him here.
The last relay? That was three years ago. What's your father's name?
Kongqing!
Oh... It's him.
Do you know my daddy?
Yes. We were stationed in the same camp.
Great! Can you take me to daddy's place?
Uh, well, he's... busy! Like, super super busy! So he's not here today...
I know! Mommy said he's fighting monsters.
Yes, he's out there fighting now. I'll ask your dad to give you a call.
Really!
You can't lie to me!
I never lie!
Rover is the witness. Pinkies!
Pinkies!
Let's go!
Alright, let's go.
I'll take her home first. Rover, we're counting on you to handle the rest.
Sir, please calm down and stop talking about riding Gulpuffs.
But that was really fun!
May I have your hand?
What... What's wrong?
Nothing major. I just need to confirm something.
As I expected.
Huh? When did I get hurt? I didn't feel it at all.
The adrenaline from excitement may have dampened your sensitivity to pain.
However, your nervous response betrays your condition. You right hand has been shaking involuntarily, likely because the wound has been left untreated.
Fortunately, it's not caused by the Gulpuffs. Please take this to relieve the pain for now.
Ouch... It's really starting to hurt now that you've mentioned it.
Alright. Have you calmed down now?
I'm sorry. I got a little carried away... Sorry again for the trouble I've caused.
Let's go have someone see to your wound.
漂泊者, fancy seeing you here.
I don't want to spoil your fun, but I'm afraid we need to suspend the race for now.
Can you fill us in on the data?
I checked the monitoring data as you asked, and I found unusual fluctuations near the upper waters to the north.
Why didn't the nearest Beacon pick up on this anomaly?
The Resonance Beacon is functioning properly, but we still don't know why it didn't issue a warning this time. I will investigate this further at a later time.
Animals are often the first to detect signs of danger.
Tacet Discords are similar to animals in this regard. They're very sensitive to any change in the frequencies in their surroundings. That's why those Gulpuffs went haywire.
I suppose that's why you asked me to check the monitoring data for you, Jiyan?
Yes.
The timing of this change is concerning... Why did it happen precisely during the Riverside Games?
Perhaps the Riverside Games' frequency resonated with something in the upper waters?
Yes. Let's go.
The lack of perceivable warning signs typically suggests unknown risks. Jiyan, 漂泊者, stay safe.
Don't... Come near me...
The Tacet Discords are increasing. Let's take them down first.
It's the Retroact Rain... We need to hurry up.
...Let's participate... Together...
Help... help me...
The voices are coming from here.
...I don't want...
It might be trying to tell us something... We need to decipher the message somehow.
The rain is getting worse. If this persists, we will likely have to face a minor TD Outbreak.
漂泊者, I have your back. Stay focused on analyzing the voices.
You should relax... Weekend... Who knows when is the next... Let's go... Come on... Go... Takeover...
Tacet Discords... They won't... No... I'm gonna... I can't... Help...
It's the cheers during the Riverside Games, mingled together with cries for help.
Perhaps some people have been trapped in this place, or maybe...
Anyway, we have to figure it out.
...We're no longer seeing any unusual fluctuations now.
Good job. You should have successfully prevented a potential TD Outbreak.
As you requested, I compared the fluctuations with those of the previous Outbreaks, and I did spot some similarities.
Thank you, Mortefi.
I'm not done yet. Thank me later if you must.
Though there are some similarities, they aren't identical. I'm no expert in this field, and I can't give you any definitive conclusions yet.
This is the frequency sample I've recorded.
Frequency sample from a Sonoro Sphere... I'll deliver it to a colleague. It's in better hands with her.
It's someone you know. Baizhi. She specializes in Ecoacoustic research, and the Sonoro Sphere is her field of expertise.
Yes... Whatever you do, please keep it safe.
What now, you don't trust me?
I trust you as always, Mortefi. But this sample... It means a lot to me.
Rest assured. You should know how careful we are with our samples... Especially such a valuable one.
This should be our wake-up call. The Waveworn Phenomena is more complicated than we thought.
It's a wake-up call, and it may also hold the answers we've been searching for all these years.
By the way, the Riverside Games people were looking for you, Jiyan. Probably wanted to discuss holding the event again at a later date.
Sure, I'll go talk to them once everything is settled here.
Now, if there's nothing else, I'm going back to my lab.
漂泊者, there is a place I need to visit. Could you come with me?
Thank you. I need to pick up something first. See you at Knell Square.
Sure. I'll be waiting for you at Knell Square.
There is something I wish to do with you today.
A seed.
This is the seed of a resilient type of flower, which I asked the Academy to help me breed years ago.
From here, you can see all of Jinzhou city.
I thought... Those who died for Jinzhou would want to see how it's thriving now.
This flower... We named it the Emortia.
Yes. The word represents both departure and return.
Yes. I know there's nothing we can do to bring them back, but for us still living, we need something like this to hold on to.
Thank you, 漂泊者, for finally bringing them peace. Now, they no longer have to fight.
And this is why I believe you should be the one to plant this seed here.
You accepted the seed. It was small, but it felt heavy in your hand.
You planted the seed with Jiyan. Maybe one day, the two of you can watch the sunset here, with the flower you planted beside you.
We have prevented one Outbreak for the time being.
But a greater danger remains lurking in the darkness... Our knowledge of it is severely lacking.
I must act to prevent more deaths...
Thank you for your concern.
Every Midnight Ranger is prepared to die on the battlefield any day. I know this all too well as their general in command.
Helping the souls of our fallen ones return to their homeland... This is one of the few ways I can honor their sacrifices.
漂泊者, I have one more request.
If one day I perish in battle and cannot return home... Could you please plant one of these flowers for me?
Thank you, 漂泊者.
漂泊者, I heard you've returned to the city with General Jiyan?
Ah, what a relief. I am beyond happy to know you're all safe and sound.
There is something I forgot to give you. Let's meet up somewhere when you have the time.
Greetings, 漂泊者.
You see those fish? They look so happy in the safety of their pond.
Happiness and safety often come at a cost, whether it be for fish or people.
And if we do not feel the weight of that price, someone else is carrying it for us.
Ten years... How time flies. I coordinated the Riverside Games that year, too.
Dozens of teams competed that day, and the race lasted well into the afternoon... The sunset was so beautiful, like what we're seeing now... It was so warm, so tranquil.
That team was thrown together last minute, and nobody thought they could win. They even stumbled during their first exchange.
But then, the team surprised everyone with their final runner's expert Gulpuff handling and victorious finish. It was truly a race to remember.
Yes. I still remember how excited those kids looked...
Just like how you looked in this photo.
We were worried. We weren't going to get a photo of you all together... Luckily, the photographer managed to capture a shot of the whole team.
I should thank you for bringing that team together, 漂泊者.
I'm planning to talk to Jiyan about hosting the Riverside Games another time. If all goes well, please join us!
Greetings, 漂泊者.
You see those fish? They look so happy in the safety of their pond.
Happiness and safety often come at a cost, whether it be for fish or people.
And if we do not feel the weight of that price, someone else is carrying it for us.
