I should thank you for bringing that team together, 漂泊者.
I'm planning to talk to Jiyan about hosting the Riverside Games another time. If all goes well, please join us!
Hi, 漂泊者! Fancy seeing you again!
Thank you so much for your help that day.
I'll forever cherish the memories of that race. I got to have you and our general as my teammates!
I heard you and the general tackled a big problem together.
Man, I hope to be as capable as you someday!
Thank you for saying that! I've always wanted to serve on the front lines, but I was assigned to the Rearguard Base. Guess I'll just have to stay here for now.
I don't want to give up my dream yet, so I'm still trying to apply for a transfer.
I know, but somebody's gotta be out there for our people. I won't regret my choice, no matter what happens.
And before that, I'll be giving my all to protect people as a Rearguard!
Duty calls. I should return to my post now. See ya around!
Hi, 漂泊者!
You know what!
I finally managed to borrow the recording of the Riverside Games from ten years ago!
Yeah, and they just returned it to the archives recently.
Since they're holding the Riverside Games again soon, I wanted to see if the recording was returned.
And surprise! It was!
But man, gotta say the video quality sucks... All backs and no faces at all. Thought I could finally admire how cool they looked.
What? When? How?
Come on, 漂泊者, just tell me!
I could really use some advice from them...
Yes they are! They're all fully recovered. Thank you for asking.
And... There's another thing, 漂泊者...
Erm, you know they're gonna hold another Riverside Games, right? Lingyan and I want to join the race with our original teammates this time.
Thank you, 漂泊者! Promise you'll come cheer for us, alright?
I want to join the race too!
Can I ride that Gulpuff?
Wow, they're really going fast.
This temporary team... They're really something...
The race... It's starting... Shall we go?
The Riverside Games... Fun...
Three... Two... One... Go!
Oops... What a pity...
They're catching up!
That young man... He is...
He's in the lead now!
Did they just break the record...
...Yay!
Champion! Champion! Champion!
Yeah!
Well done!
Yay!! Haha!!
We're not winning at this rate...
Go... Run while you can...
Backup... Call the reinforcement...
Can we trust him?
If only I could... It's all my fault...
*sigh* Ruiyun...
*sigh* Why won't you listen, Ruiyun...
I'm begging you. Miss Koko, you must have some way to save my daughter.
But...
Is it about the payment? I'll give you all my savings if that's what it takes.
It's not about the money!
漂泊者, you're here. But sorry, the shop's closed for now.
Don't worry. I'm okay. This lady here isn't a threat.
Her daughter's dealing with a rare illness—non-life-threatening for now, but it could get worse.
Doctors have tried everything, but regular medicine isn't working. There's one last hope, though.
Yes, my teacher handled a similar case before, and I still have the prescription from back then.
The issue is, the crucial guide drug is tough to get.
The guide drug is the most critical ingredient in the prescription. Currently, only some wealthy folks have the guide drug we need, and they probably won't sell it for money unless...
Unless you can find some rare items to exchange with them. Oh, by the way, Rover, have you ever heard of something called Clock Spiriton?
If we had that Clock Spiriton, we could use it to exchange for the guide drug.
It's not something easy to obtain.
Miss Koko, do you know how to get it? I'll do anything!
You can only find Clock Spiriton from a Calamity-Class Tacet Discord called Bell-Borne Geochelone. Have you heard of it?
Even Rover hasn't heard of it. Not that surprising, though. Only a handful of people have the chance to see it.
It's said to have a body as huge as a mountain, can crush an armored car with only one step, and freeze a river with a single breath!
Many tried to hunt it down in the past, but they all became revenants frozen in the river.
However, it doesn't usually leave its territory, so it's even rarer for people to see it.
People with sanity won't willingly pick fights with it, let alone risk their lives for an herb.
Yeah, you get how formidable it is. Nobody dares to challenge it, not to mention putting their lives on the line for an herb.
Seriously? You took it down? You're not pulling my leg, right?
Even so, you didn't get the Clock Spiriton. That's a pity.
How can this be? Is there really no way?
Hmm…
Well, there's someone I know who might still have some Clock Spiriton, but the problem is, he's a bit unreliable.
Not sure, but he did sell me plenty of rare TD materials before. It seems like he's got a few tricks up his sleeve.
Please tell me how I can find him. No matter how slim the hope is, I'll give it a try.
Thanks, Rover! So, let this lady stick around to help me prepare other herbs, and I'll leave the task of obtaining Clock Spiriton to 漂泊者? Sound good?
His name's Lianfeng, and he hangs around the theater all the time. You should spot him there.
He goes by TD Hunter and talks a big game about hunting formidable TDs, although no one has actually seen him fight.
If you see someone being loud and boastful over tea at the theater, that's Lianfeng.
If you see someone being loud and boastful over tea at the theater, that's Lianfeng.
Rover, please help me. I've got no other options.
Hey, Lianfeng, you have a guest here.
Who are you? I don't know you.
Are you looking for me? Who told you I'm here?
Darn. Did she send you to collect debts?
Nothing, forget it. Anyway, why are you looking for me? Spill it. I don't have time to waste.
Come on! You're just having tea here with us. Oh! Nice tea.
Just so you know, if you're here to borrow money, then you can turn around and leave. I'm broke. Flat broke.
You can sell those PRECIOUS materials you've obtained from TDs, huh? They should earn you a great sum.
I sold them all a long time ago.
I don't have any. Speaking of which, I once obtained some from a TD called Bell-Borne Geochelone. Well, forget about it. After all, you won't have a chance to see it.
Why am I telling you all this? You're just wasting my time. Get outta here; don't spoil my moment drinking this delicious tea.
I'm not lying, but I'm the only one that can obtain Clock Spiriton.
Then why not go take down that Bell-Borne thing again?
Seriously? I'm not going! I'm tired of dealing with minions like Bell-Borne Geochelone. Whoever wants to go can go by themselves.
If you're that strong, why did you quit the Pioneer Association? Or, were you kicked out?
I heard from Miss Maqi that you quit. So it's true, huh?
Nonsense. I quit because I don't need any companions or assistance to take down TDs.
I'm a lone wolf. I don't waste time getting along with people.
Hey, friend, I remember you're Rover who just came to Jinzhou, right? Why do you want this thing?
That's unfortunate, but so what? Why should I help someone I barely know? Go find someone else.
Hey, how can you be so cruel? Have some compassion!
Oh my, too poor. I can't stand stories like this.
What's the matter with you two?
Ugh, but…
Hahaha! Please explain this matter in detail to us Pioneer Association!
Sorry for the abrupt intrusion! We didn't intend to eavesdrop your conversation. It's just your voices were a bit loud.
Tsk, are all members of the Pioneer Association this rude?
In fact, we're the Explorers of the Pioneer Association, and I'm the captain of this squad. Are you Rover? Nice to meet you!
Haha, Lianfeng, you're ignored!
Shut up. Hey, what do you want?
Well, we're heading to the Gorges of Spirits to investigate a giant Tacet Discord found there.
Yes. Our goal is to take Bell-Borne Geochelone down for further research.
Then we happened to hear your conversation and thought if we could help the unfortunate mother and daughter at the same time, it'd be great.
That's great! Please help them!
You're such good guys, unlike Lianfeng.
Are you insane?
Don't worry. We've thoroughly investigated Bell-Borne Geochelone, and our squad is composed of experienced Resonators.
But we've never heard of this Clock Spiriton before. It seems like an interesting research subject. I'm sure the Editorial Department will be thrilled.
Well, Rover, just wait for our good news! Bye!
Wait, that's too dangerous! You're all going to die! Hey, stop!
Just let them do their work, Lianfeng. You're being ridiculous.
Me? Ridiculous? I just don't want to see them throw away their lives so rashly!
I'm not a member of the Pioneer Association anymore. They can do whatever they want. I don't care.
But they're underestimating that TD. Members of the Pioneer Association are too focused on research and investigation. Sometimes, they forget they're dealing with extremely formidable creatures.
Since you're a man of strength, why not join in and help out? We'll respect you as a true man.
Tsk, easy for you to say.
Look, he's backing down.
Are you underestimating me? Fine, I'll go! But I won't help them fight Bell-Borne Geochelone. I already said I'm done with the Pioneer Association!
I'll tell him how to take down Bell-Borne Geochelone as him Master!
I'll tell her how to take down Bell-Borne Geochelone as her Master!
Looks like you're skilled enough. With my guidance, you'll be more capable than those guys in the future.
Well, as long as you're happy.
Good. Hope you'll be as composed facing that formidable TD.
Tsk. Anyway, with an experienced TD hunter by your side, nothing could go wrong.
One more time!
In that case, you'll know I wasn't bragging. Wait and see.
Rover, come! Let's have a private talk over there. Don't let these fools hear.
As if we'd love to hear. We've had our fill of tea. Bye.
Boss, put it on Lianfeng's tab!
Out, out, out! Get out! Don't waste our time.
Aren't you afraid to fight against TDs?
I mean, Bell-Borne Geochelone is a very dangerous opponent. You might get hurt or even lose your life fighting it.
Though that mother and daughter are quite pitiful, you don't have an obligation to help them.
Even if you back out now, no one can blame you, including that mother and daughter.
Keep this conversation between us. I'll try to figure out a way to get the Clock Spiriton for you, so you don't have to risk your life.
Though we've only known each other for a short time, I don't want to see you die on my watch.
You've got some guts. Well, not bad.
Hmph. Are you doubting that I've never hunted that TD?
That's straightforward.
Fine, even though you said that, I can tell from your expression that you're not fully convinced.
Can't blame you. Honestly, I sometimes doubt if I'm a true TD Hunter myself.
Have you heard of the Overclocking of a Resonator?
You're quite knowledgeable. Have you ever encountered a Resonator after Overclocking?

Seriously? You've never heard of it? Given the fact you're a Resonator, that's a surprise. Overclocking is a negative phenomenon that occurs in Resonators. Different Resonators have different symptoms.
If left unchecked, it can lead to severe aftereffects, even completely altering a Resonator's personality.
For example, I'm one of the unlucky Resonators who went through it.
You've experienced Overclocking before?
You've experienced Overclocking before?
Perhaps, I don't really remember because the researchers at the Academy confirmed that I lost most of my memories after Overclocking.
Some memories, like how to fight those TDs, stay with me—no matter how hard I've tried to forget them.
Though in those memories, I always hunted them alone. There's always this strange feeling of unnaturalness... Forget it. You won't understand.
Anyway, not the right time to talk about this now.
Let's go. I'll head to the meeting point outside Jinzhou and wait for you there. I already sent the coordinates to your Terminal.
If you're ready, meet me there. Don't dawdle. We need to catch up with them!
Cough…
I'm fine. Just a bit careless to be attacked by those minions. Not a big deal. I scared them off effortlessly.
What's with that look! Seems like it's time for your first lesson as my apprentice.
Rule Number One for TD Hunter—Never look down upon minions!
Even weaker enemies can cause unexpected trouble. Got it?
Ahem, I intentionally put myself in danger to teach you a lesson.
Alright, it's your loss not listening to me. I'm speaking from experience.
Good, remember my words. They'll be useful to you one day.
Bell-Borne Geochelone lives in the Gorges of Spirits, which is the source of the Qing River flowing through here. I can sense the state of a TD through the remaining frequency in the medium.

I told you that only I can find the Clock Spiriton, right? It's because Bell-Borne Geochelone emits a special frequency during specific periods, and only when defeating it during these periods can one get the Clock Spiriton.
No matter how many times you defeat Bell-Borne Geochelones, as long as it's not the right timing, you can't get the Clock Spiriton, and only my Resonance Ability can tell if it's the right timing.
We're pretty lucky. There's a high chance we'll get the Clock Spiriton if we hunt Bell-Borne Geochelone now.
Plus, it seems that those from the Pioneer Association are planning to go to the Gorges of Spirits along the river.
Seems like they're well-prepared. The Pioneer Association is really interested in Bell-Borne Geochelone.
You wanna know? Curiosity is a good trait! The more you know about your enemy before a battle, the more confident you'll be.

Let's start from the question how Tacet Discords are formed. Most people believe that they are born out of chaos, but there are some exceptions—some TDs seem to come from legends or even real history.
Legend has it that the ancient army in Huanglong used to sound a bronze bell in battle, inspiring soldiers to fight bravely and symbolizing the good wish of a triumphant return.
One day, the bell ringer saved a turtle along the Qing River by accident. From then on, that turtle became an indispensable part of the soldiers, sharing their happiness and sorrow.
Before the fierce battle ended, the bell ringer died. However, the sound of the bell still echoed on the battlefield. It's said that the turtle was the one who sounded the bell.
Yes, that's the story. Later, someone found a rusted ancient bell in the Gorges of Spirits, similar in style to the bronze bell the ancient army used.

Underneath that ancient bell was a giant turtle-shaped Tacet Discord. It witnessed the fierce war and bid farewell to the bell ringer and soldiers. These memories tied the heavy ancient bell to its back.
But it's just a story. After all, no one knows if TDs have memories and emotions.
No matter what happened in the past, this TD is now a hideous creature bringing nothing other than pain and torture to Huanglong.
You don't need to show any mercy. If it really had emotions, it wouldn't want to be a creature destroying happiness and peace of people in Huanglong.
Rule Number Two for TD Hunter—Never show mercy to Tacet Discords!
The Pioneer Association should have left not long ago. Let's follow their traces and catch up quickly!
Have you used the Scan function on the Terminal?
Wonderful. Let's follow the path displayed on the Terminal and track them down.
This is where having me as your master comes in handy. I can teach you everything you wanna know.
Turn on your Terminal and select the Scan function. You'll see a path displayed on the screen, and all you need to do is to follow it!
Understand? Great, let's follow the path displayed on the Terminal and track them down.
These are the TDs that just attacked me.
Be careful. They seem to get extremely aggressive due to the awakening of Bell-Borne Geochelone.
Even someone as experienced as me got caught up in a tough battle.
That sound…
It's a signal that Bell-Borne Geochelone is waking up.
Ugh… My head…
Nothing, just a bit of a headache.
Darn, it's happening again. It feels like something in my memories is about to be awakened.
The problem is, the traces left by the Pioneer Association members seem to disappear here…
Right, they must be where the bell sound is. Let's go.
Hey! Wake up! Can you hear me!
Ugh, you are… those people at the teahouse?
Enough talking. I'll check your injuries with my Forte.
No major organ damage, but there are multiple fractures. Did you fight against Bell-Borne Geochelone?
Ha, it can't be called a fight. We're completely crushed.
You should leave. Though it's calm now, no one knows when it'll wake up again.
It's not an opponent you ordinary people can deal with.
Ordinary people? You've got us wrong. I'm Lianfeng, a professional TD Hunter, and this is my top apprentice.
You guys stay here and rest. Leave the rest to us.
漂泊者, listen carefully to what I'm about to say.
Do you see the large bell in the center of the Bell-Borne Ravine? Ringing it will awaken Bell-Borne Geochelone.
Since it's giant, it moves and turns slowly, so we'd better…
Staying away from it will only force us into corners with its massive body. It can also use icy breath and condense water into ice crystals for indiscriminate attacks.
Though it may seem crazy, it's actually safer to get as close to it as possible.
Yeah, getting close allows us to take advantage of its blind spots during its turns and attacks. Smart move.
Its four legs, head, and tail are all highly offensive weapons. Don't underestimate them.
Also, its weakness is the big bell on its back, but it's relatively high and not easy to attack under normal circumstances.
You have a clear head, huh?
Bell-Borne Geochelone's feet are covered in hard ice, protecting them from hard.
However, it's also its weakness. Once the ice is shattered, Bell-Borne Geochelone will lose balance and fall down, which gives us a good chance to attack its most vulnerable point.
I'll draw its attention, and you seize the chance to attack.
Tsk, are you underestimating a TD Hunter? Once you figure out its attack pattern, dodging is easy. That's how we took it down before.
We... I... Ugh, my head...
In my memory, there's a group of people fighting alongside me.
Who were they?
Ugh… my head hurts!
It's dangerous to confront Bell-Borne Geochelone on your own.
Wait, 漂泊者!!
You really took down that monster all by yourself! That's astonishing!
That's my apprentice! It should be a piece of cake for him to deal with such a small fish.
That's my apprentice! It should be a piece of cake for her to deal with such a small fish.
Don't know about them, but I'm perfectly fine.
What are you worried about? It's just a small hiccup. Anyway, let me see the material you got from Bell-Borne Geochelone.
Yeah, that's it—the Clock Spiriton. It's actually the seed produced by the plant on Bell-Borne Geochelone.
Haha? Really? Good to know! I need to note it down.
Oh my, can't you forget about your stupid research for one second?
Never mind. Forget about them. You need to hurry back to Jinzhou and give this to Koko. I'll contact the Pioneer Association to get them medical treatment.
Rover, you're back!
Is everything okay? Did you find Lianfeng?
Did he still have Clock Spiriton?
Clock Spiriton? Oh, yes, this is it!
So my daughter can be saved?
Yes, with this, your daughter can be cured.
But it looks so fresh. I thought Lianfeng got it a long time ago.
Because it's freshly picked.
Uncle Lianfeng?
Hey, show me some respect. It's Brother Lianfeng.
Just a little aftereffect of Overclocking. See, I'm totally fine.
Overclocking? But your symptoms don't seem like it. The aftereffect of Overclocking is supposed to be associated with a Resonator's Forte.
So what? My Forte is frequency perception.
Hmm…
Is there a possibility that you didn't really go through Overclocking, and some other incident caused your memory loss?
No way. I've never had any companions or teammates. My dear apprentice, you worry too much. I handle my affairs, and you handle yours.
How did you get injured?
I'll share with you the exciting battle between Rover and Bell-Borne Geochelone later. For now, let's make the medicine this lady's daughter needs.
Thank you, Mr. Lianfeng.
No big deal. Taking down enemies of this level is just a walk in the park for a TD Hunter.
Uncle Lianfeng, what do you think about continuing hunting those giant TDs? If you happen to get any rare materials, I'm still willing to buy them at a good price!
Call me Brother! Anyway, I've already retired. I'll leave the title of TD Hunter to my chief apprentice.
Really? That's good news. Rover's much more reliable than Uncle Lianfeng.
Don't worry! I'll keep teaching you, hahaha!
Okay, fine, but not being a TD Hunter is surely a waste of your skills.
Great. Now you're the new TD Hunter, and I'm sure you can do it well.
Right, and of course, you'll earn a fair wage for your work.
Perhaps, I can find out the true reason for my memory loss in battles against TDs.
Well then, my dear apprentice, if there's information about new large TDs, I'll contact you!
Any business?
Ugh, do you know him?
Nope. Hey, don't talk to me! I haven't forgiven you yet!
Tsk, so irritating.
You've been standing there for a while. How can we help you?
Lianfeng… Sorry, never heard of him.
Your friend, huh? Maybe he joined the Midnight Rangers?
I see. Good luck finding him.
How long do we have to wait here? Darn, I want to go investigate Bell-Borne Geochelone instead of staying in this boring place.
The captain thinks it's too dangerous if there are too many people going there, so we're left here to act as support and ensure a safe retreat. I don't think we'll be needed though.
What bad luck.
Go. I've got this.
I need to organize a research report as soon as possible. Ouch! That hurts.
C'mon dude, just rest.
Miss Koko, please!
I'm desperate here. You've got to help me save my daughter. You're my last hope.
It's not that I don't want to help…
Bro, not that I don't trust you, but you gotta show us how you take down those TDs at least once!
Hey, I would, but here's the problem.
Guys like you might get smashed into meat pulp standing by my side.
Haha, brag. Do you really think he can take down TDs, or am I the Magistrate of Jinzhou?
Sir Magistrate, may I express my deepest respect.
How unlucky I am to run into a bunch of short-sighted fools like you. Can't believe you haven't even heard of the title TD Hunter!
No wonder you can only afford this cheap tea. Hey, waiter, bring me the finest Jade Tea.
What do you have to explain, you liar!
Hold on, at least let's listen to his excuses.
Forget it, let him be! No matter what I say, he won't listen...
Have some tea, guys. As friends, everything can be talked over, huh?
My friend joined the Midnight Rangers. I'm worried she might be in danger now.
New recruits generally aren't assigned to dangerous missions, right? I remember your brother joined last year.
I don't quite follow.
But, in any case, they have to fight against those Tacet Discords. Just thinking about it gives me the shivers.
Yeah, thanks to their efforts, us ordinary folks can live in peace.
So boring...
Bear with it.
Fine, staying here is also a job.
*A happy hoohoo*!
Hoohoo looks very happy!
Yeah, finally, it's all over.
Yeah... Lush vegetation, fresh air—I guess this must be what my mentor always dreamed of witnessing.
This is also something we've been working towards.
Thank you, Rover. You helped us save this forest.
Thank you, Rover! Thank you, Senmin! And Hoohoo too!
Also, thank you for your effort, Qiaomu. You're right. We made this happen together!
Always see past the superficial details. I think this goes beyond the realm of scientific research.
True. Anyway, we finally made it through this! What do you say? Shall we go catch a movie together during our break?
Hoohoo?
Don’t worry, Hoohoo. I'll be staying with you in the forest before that!
Oops, almost forgot. Your payment!
Here you go. It may not be a hefty sum, but this is all we can put together for now. We are super thankful for your help.
And these. Hoohoo prepared these bananas for you!
Hoohoo!
I have to get back to the Academy and put together a report on this case. Our mission has finally come to an end. Phew...
Thank you, Rover.
Hoohoo and I will still be around. There are so many places in the Dim Forest that are worth exploring!
Especially the Violet Banyan! Hoohoo seems eager to visit it again!
Rover, if you come to the Violet Banyan later, maybe we'll meet again!
Well then, farewell!
Why are there so many Hoochiefs in the cave? Ah!
Phew... Almost scared me to death. The Hoochiefs could be coming my way.
I wonder why there are so many Hoochiefs here. If someone could get rid of them, I'll reward him generously!
I wonder why there are so many Hoochiefs here. If someone could get rid of them, I'll reward her generously!
Mrs. Jué, I have news about the front.
Oh, thank you so much, my dear.
Mrs. Jué, everything's going well on the front and our troops are steadily pressing forward.
Yuzan's doing perfectly fine. He's in good hands.
Good, good... That is certainly reassuring to hear.
You're a grown-up now, Yukun. Haven't you ever dreamt about going to other places far away and achieving great things?
Grandma... Sis has already signed up, if I leave Jinzhou too, who's going to be here with you? You'll be all alone by yourself.
Grandma's always trying to have me to sign up for the Rangers. Telling me how I should look up to my older sister more.
But I want to stay home. Where I can be there for her if something happens.
I know. Grandma always talks about how, only when a nation is at peace, can families be at peace. But I can't just leave her by herself.
That's right. I've been learning boxing from Mister Yuanwu lately. I've got enough skills to protect Grandma against anything!
Noctemints?
It’s strange. Lately, about ten gentlemen have brought me Noctemints.
It’s twelve.
And now I'm the thirteenth one... Hold on, those before were all me too…
Remember what you told me last time? One can’t judge an Echo solely from its appearance.
That actually makes perfect sense! So I’ve honed these scythes even sharper!
You can interpret it that way.
What a relief to hear that! Alright, let me present to you what we’ve managed to achieve this time!
What do you think, Linghan?
Sorry, what was the reason for your visit again? Ah, to show me the Echo?
NO! Grandma, he’s here to give you Noctemints!
Yingying seems to be quite lively today, and that helped me a lot.
Yingying is certainly brimming with energy today, isn’t she? That helped me a lot.
I suppose I should seize this opportunity. Yes, that’s right. I did come to bring you Noctemints. Would you like to spend the rest of your life with me?
Oh dear, this is quite the headache. Thank you, but I'm not presently interested in seeking a partner. Even if I were, I'd prefer someone akin to my former lover...
He was a wise and valiant soldier, and even his Echoes were impressive. Compared to him, everyone else falls short.
So, feel free to ask me anything Echo-related, but let’s keep everything else off the table.
Alright, then... Sorry to bother you. I shall take my leave.
Help! Somebody help...!
Are you the only one they sent to come rescue me? Do you know how to fight? Can you take on three or four camps worth of Exiles on your own?
Great. I'll be counting on you!
Then you just need to cover me while I sneak into the camp for some materials, make some explosives!
Well done, well done indeed. This Echo team is much more impressive than mine back in the day, haha!
Alright, I can feel the confidence swelling within me! Let’s return to Jinzhou and dazzle her!
Hehe, I can already picture the look on her face!
No rush. I also need to make some preparations. What should I say to her…
We managed to hold the line thanks to everyone's efforts.
Yuzan even earned himself a promotion, it's stirring up all that energy inside of him now.
And it all owes to young people like yourself. By the way, how are your wounds healing?
It's been healing pretty well. Thank you for asking, ma'am.
You should take care of yourself and get more rest. There's no need for you to visit every day.
With you fighting on the frontlines protecting us, we old people are doing just fine.
We managed to hold the line thanks to everyone's efforts.
Yuzan even earned himself a promotion, it's stirring up all that energy inside of him now.
And it all owes to young people like yourself. By the way, how is your leg healing?
It's been healing pretty well. Thank you for asking, ma'am.
You should take care of yourself and get more rest. There's no need for you to visit every day.
With you fighting on the frontlines protecting us, we old people are doing just fine.
With most of the younger people gone off to war, the older people living in this area aren't very familiar with a Terminal.
So I come to visit whenever I've got the time to see if they're doing well and give them news from the frontlines. A way to help them put their minds at ease.
Speaking of which, can I ask you a favor? Can you help these elderly make contact with me in case of an emergency?
Much obliged. Here's my contact information. You can also find me if you meet any trouble yourself.
Oh... I wonder how everything is going on the frontlines...
Guhong hasn't visited in a while... I hope the child's doing okay...
*sigh*... If it weren't for my age, I'd want to go up there and have a look for myself...
Young man. Can you help an old lady find Guhong?
Young lady. Can you help an old lady find Guhong?
Thank you. Do be careful on your way.
You checked your Terminal and found Guhong's contact information.
You checked your Terminal and found Guhong's contact information.
You can't help but feel a sense of unease. You make yourself stay focused and dialed the number.
You can't help but feel a sense of unease. You make yourself stay focused and dialed the number.
Guhong is a Midnight Ranger, which is under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of War.
Guhong is a Midnight Ranger, which is under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of War.
Let's pay the Ministry of War and ask about Guhong there.
Let's pay the Ministry of War and ask about Guhong there.
Hello. Can I help you?
Guhong? Last I heard he returned to the frontlines... You're saying even Mrs. Jué hasn't seen him since?
This is not good. Maybe something's happened to him...
Rover, do you think you can help find Guhong for me? Here's his contact information.
I can't thank you enough. As you can see, I'm still on my sentry duty and cannot leave the post unattended, so I have no choice but to leave the task to you.
... Desorock...
... Cave...
... Requesting... Backup...
*gasp*... Not yet...
Thank you, Rover.
I was careless and got ambushed. Got held back... I regret having Mrs. Jué feel worried.
Can you help me back to the city, Rover?
I wish to tell Mrs. Jué what happened on the frontlines in person.
Oh, Guhong. What happened to you?!
I'm okay, Mrs. Jué. Rover pulled me out of danger just in the nick of time.
Nonsense! Just look at those wounds! Whatever it is that you want to say, it'll have to wait. For now, you are in great need of rest.
The Fractsidus? What are they doing in a place like this?
The Fractsidus? What are they doing in a place like this?
Damn that woman! Always getting in our way... And what are you doing here? Get lost!
...I'll have to take them down first.
...I'll have to take them down first.
Better hide here for now.
Better hide here for now.
...Ha, now you're here.
Well, we weren't really running from you! We just wanted to make sure you were alone.
Be good, please!
Encore and Uncle Aalto won't do anything bad to you...
That's enough Encore, you're freaking our precious client out.
Encore just did as Aalto said! Encore is usually a good girl.
Don't be scared, Rover. We just have a few questions for you.
Was it your idea to have those two ladies wear those counterfeit Blake Blooms and attract our attention?
I must admit, they looked quite convincing. If I was an outsider, I might mistake them for the real deal.
So you worked with a plant-type Resonator... Interesting.
A plant-type Resonator? We happen to know someone like that too, don't we?
Yeah. There are more than one of them out there. Not a big deal.
So please, tell us... What do you want from the Black Shores?
Why? Hmm, what if I told you... We have the information you want the most?
Oh? Really? So that lead about you was right indeed...
Haha, not bad, you've managed to catch on real quick.
Like what they say here in Huanglong: the straight hook is for willing fish to bite. Ta-daa da daah! Your efforts finally caught our attention.
Surprise! The people you've been looking for are right in front of you!
Now, how's that for a piece of intel? I'll let you have it free of charge!
Aww, not that disappointed look! Are we not what you had in mind?
Aww, not that disappointed look! Gotta learn how to enjoy a surprise while you can, or life gets real boring, you know?
I know you must have a ton of questions for me, but one moment, please.
As you already know, I'm an information broker.
That means I make deals instead of passing out freebies. You want information from me, you gotta give me something in return.
Relax, Rover. We just want to make a deal with you.
We want you to come with us to an abandoned Court of Savantae facility, to help us recover a Resonance Beacon.
In turn, I'll tell you everything we know so far.
Our business is centered around customer satisfaction and built on integrity! Otherwise, we wouldn't qualify as Consultants of the Black Shores.
Well, if you don't take this opportunity, you'll probably never get to learn more about the Black Shores again.
And since you're a first-time customer... I'm pleased to offer you an additional gift.
Here, have this. This should prove we're serious, since you already know what it represents.
And if you still have doubts about us... Just show it to that plant-savvy young miss. She'll be able to tell.
Finally, as a last resort...
Encore, do your cute face, quick!
Aww... Pwease help us... Pretty Pweeaaase...?
Look at this poor child, pleading to you like that! How could anyone have the heart to decline?! The deal's settled then!
We'll be waiting for you near this Beacon in Whining Aix's Mire! And don't forget to come alone, okay?
Grandpa Jingzhu, you’re already done with treatment? That was quick!
Don’t let this old man’s age fool you. I’m still strong and these injuries hardly slow me down!
Really? Um... though it does seem like you’re totally fine now.
Of course! I’m used to injuries. Anyway, I’m feeling perfectly fine now. Shall we go?
Are you coming with us, Grandpa Jingzhu?
Of course, how could I let you youngsters handle my affairs while I sit around? It’s dangerous outside Jinzhou and I’m familiar with the situation there. I’m sure I can be of some help.
But...
Haha, don’t worry! This old man used to be quite something in his day! Even though I’m old now, I can still hold my own against any danger.
Okay, Grandpa Jingzhu, promise me you’ll take care of yourself. If anything dangerous pops up, don’t try to tough it out. Just give me a holler right away!
After all, it’s part of my Patroller duties.
Her house is over there. I've walked that path many times and I won't make a mistake.
Before I go knocking on her door, there's a favor I must ask of you.
Ahem, I’ve prepared some opening lines and I need your assistance in delivering them.
Well, just some nice words, carefully chosen, and I believe they’ll definitely do the trick.
Do you know what’s sweeter than any bloom? Not the Waterlamp’s glow, nor the Iris’s perfume, but the blossom of our love’s perfect tune!
Do you know what lasts forever in Wuthering Waves? Not fleeting civilizations, nor Tacet Discords’ lore, but my unwavering love for you, forevermore!
Well... Grandpa Jingzhu, what are these?
Popular Love Messages in Huanglong! Ahem, I know it might seem a bit strange for someone of my age to say such things...
But as long as I can win her heart, I can put aside my pride.
I’m counting on you. After I say my line, you’ll follow up to set the perfect mood.
漂泊者, I had no idea you’re even more helpful than me! Way to go!
Of course, I won’t stint on compensation. Your efforts will be duly rewarded.
That’s settled then. Thank you, kids.
Grandma Linghan turned him down, right?
She didn’t accept my Noctemint...
Yeah, that's a bit of a bummer. I'm feeling a little down about it too...
Hey, Grandpa Jingzhu, how about we shake off the blues with a stroll? Or maybe grab a bite to eat? I know a place that serves great Maocai, spicy but delicious!
I’m not disheartened, not in the slightest!
I’ve been reflecting on Linghan’s words, and it’s become clear to me.
She wasn’t rejecting me. She was urging me to nurture the Echoes with care.
It’s her way of guiding me forward. Hahaha, she truly does care about me!
...Starting to wonder if Grandpa Jingzhu bumped his head.
Come along, my young friends! There's no time to waste. We're leaving the city to gather the materials needed...
Wait, Grandpa Jingzhu! Take it easy! It's getting late, and you're still recovering from your injury. Plus, 漂泊者 must be beat after capturing all those Echoes...
Oh, my apologies. I got carried away and lost track of time. You must be exhausted. Let’s do it another day.
Ah, almost forgot. Here’s your compensation. Please, accept it.
Good! Next time I ask for your help, I’ll also pay you a decent sum. It’s how connections are forged, isn’t it?
Take it, kid. You’ve earned it. Next time I ask for your help, I’ll also pay you a decent sum. It’s how connections are forged, isn’t it?
You’ve both worked hard today. Hurry home and rest up! Thank you!
Now that we’re all here, Grandpa Jingzhu, what’s the plan?
Since our last parting, I’ve been pondering over Linghan’s words, and they’ve offered me a new perspective!
“If you’re aiming to become an Echo Master, you can’t judge an Echo solely from its appearance. Take this Carapace, for instance. Despite its imposing scythes, it may not what it seems.”
She believed that the Scythes are only imposing on the surface, yet lacking in practicality and sharpness as weapons.
I’m sure if I can hone these scythes to blade-like sharpness, Linghan will gladly accept my Noctemint.
One improves with practice. We’ll know the answer once I try.
Ahem, life is full of uncertainties. If I fail this time, there’s always another chance!
Alright then, let’s set to sharpening these giant scythes!
Um... Speaking of the Echo training grounds...
Ah, that’d be Instructor Yhan’s training grounds! I’ve been there before for the Patroller Graduation Assessment. Honestly, if I can help it, I’d rather not go for round two.
Ahem, but with 漂泊者 by our side today, it won’t be so nerve-wracking, right?
Being timid doesn’t fit being a Patroller! Follow my lead. Let’s roll!
I’ve heard rumors that Yhan has turned into quite the strict instructor. You’d better take care.
There are quite a few juniors in there who were once beaten hard by me, haha! So, I’ll refrain from joining you and spoiling their spirits.
Here we are. Go on in. Wish you good luck!
Not bad. Far beyond my expectations.
漂泊者, you never fail to impress me.
Don’t hesitate to come to me if you need help. I’d be happy to provide training at different levels for enthusiastic people like you.
Haha, that sounds a tad... intimidating, doesn’t it?
I never imagined we’d breeze through all that training so quickly! You’re truly living up to your name, 漂泊者!
Let’s go break the good news to Grandpa Jingzhu!
Back so soon?
Yhan is quite a formidable figure. Breezing through his training is truly commendable.
I have no doubt that the world will soon be at your feet, youngsters!
Haha, enough banter. Let’s get down to the business first. The scythes of the Havoc Warrior await our sharpening!
It seems Grandpa Jingzhu was rejected again.
Grandpa Jingzhu, are you okay? Please don’t be sad... I-I’ll do everything I can to cheer you up.
Hmm? Sad? Not in the slightest! Even if I were, it’d be but a mere act.
Thirteen failures down, but I’m not about to throw in the towel! I’ll persist, be it the fourteenth, fifteenth, or beyond...
For I’ve resolved to become the wise and valiant soldier that matches Linghan’s ideals!
I feel bad for rendering your efforts futile.
Thank you. You two are really kind-hearted!
Don’t worry. I’ll ensure you receive adequate compensation.
Well, this is a little embarrassing... Still, being happy is good for your health, right? At least I made someone happy. It’s not too terrible.
Well, this is a little embarrassing... Still, being happy is good for your health, right? At least I made someone happy. It’s not too terrible.
Thirteen consecutive rejections... Perhaps it’s time for some introspection on my approach...
Perhaps, Linghan isn’t used to such direct and impassioned displays of affection?
That makes sense... Grandma Linghan does seem rather serious, so perhaps it’s time to switch tactics?
Hmm... What alternative approach should I try?

That’s a great idea! Start by engaging her in a topic that grabs her attention, and you might find yourself getting closer to her. Then, asking her to be your partner might just fall into place naturally!
Indeed, it seems Echoes are the only thing that captures her interest.
I’ll have to think carefully about how to improve the Echo. Actually, my captain taught me a lot back in the day, but age has dulled my memory.
Alright, let’s call it a day. I need to go home and think it over. Here, this is your payment for today’s efforts.
Why are there so many Hoochiefs in the cave?
You, you did? That was awe-inspiring! Here, take this. It's your reward for dealing with the Hoochiefs!
Sigh, I wonder why there are so many Hoochiefs...
Strange, why can't I find it?
Pudding, did you find it?
Woof! Woof!
I'm looking for the gift my sister left for me.
She promised me that if I could get into the Ministry of Development, I could follow the clues to find her gift for me here.
Oops, I'm sorry. Forgot to introduce myself. I'm Shixia.
I've been searching here for a long time, but I hadn't found anything.
Pudding has an incredible nose. In most cases, he can sniff out anything buried underground, but this time he's found nothing so far.
I'm wondering if it could be that I've missed out on some clues, because my sister's a Resonator and I'm not.
Are you a Resonator? Can you help me look for it?
That's great! Thank you!
Hey Dad, got all the goods in. Care to take a look?
Hmm... This batch looks good.
You know it, Dad. Jinzhou boasts top-notch minerals. Quality is never an issue here!
And the prices?
Already sorted it with the Mineral Corporation. Stick to the old rules. No need to factor in the recent price changes.
We didn't take advantage of them, right?
Dad, trust me. We didn't take any advantage. We've been loyal customers, and with my staff discount, this is the right price.
Good, good. Remember, son, fair play keeps the business rolling.
Hmm... Why's there petrolatum mixed in with these minerals...
Can't store different mineral colors together...
Mineral colors here, mineral salts here, and petrolatum over there...
Sorry for the mess, just sorting out the minerals. Feel free to take a look around.
Hey there, it’s Jingzhu! I’m reaching out once again to ask for the help of you young folks.
As usual, I’m doing just fine!
A valiant Midnight Ranger like myself won’t be deterred by a few setbacks!
Since we last met, I’ve been pondering a more practical approach...
And I’ve finally devised one! Eager to put it into action!
Hehe, yes. I’ve thought it over and I do need the help of you young folks.
You don’t sound very enthusiastic, but it dosn’t matter. Once you arrive, you’ll be immediately convinced that my plan will work this time!
I’ll be waiting for you at the Jinzhou Theater, and that red-haired Patroller will be joining us as well.
And don’t you worry, I’ve already prepared your payment. I won’t let you work for free.
Alright then, see you later!
Alright then, see you later!
Hey! You’re all here!
When I heard Grandpa Jingzhu needed a hand, I zipped over here using my amazing overdashing skill!
No need to hurry. Take a moment to catch your breath, young one.
No worries, I’m bursting with energy! So, Grandpa Jingzhu, what’s the plan?
Alright. I must say, 漂泊者’s suggestion seems quite practical. Find a subject that piques her interest and proceed gradually...
So, I’ve devised a plan to enhance the Echo. Once we make the Scythes stronger, I’ll be ready to present it to her.
Yeah, what else can we do? The Scythes is already pretty impressive. Can we kick it up a notch?
Let me share a little secret with you. There’s another valuable asset in Tacet Fields... known as Tuners!
Tuners?
Yes, Tuners have the ability to fine-tune the frequencies of Echoes, eliminating any unwanted noise and bolstering their strength!
Oh, right! It’s that round or square thing, isn’t it? How could I forget?
Our goal for today is to acquire some Tuners from Tacet Fields.
Great! For stronger Echoes! Let’s get moving!
Ah, finally arrived. It’s just around the corner.
Sorry, but I must take a brief rest. I’m relying on you, young ones!
Nailed it! 漂泊者, you’re really mastering this!
We did find some Tuners! I gotta admit, I was kinda wondering why you seemed so at ease out in the wild.
But now that I know you used to be a Midnight Ranger, it totally clicks!
My captain taught me a lot... from uncovering Tacet Fields to identifying various Tacet Discords, even the places to find Tuners...
However, memories tend to play tricks as you age, so I must see it with my own eyes to be certain.
Even in the wild, I find myself relying on you young ones to help me reach my objectives.
But enough dwelling on the melancholy. As long as the Echo gets stronger, I’m content.
Strange. It’s unusual for Linghan to not be outside soaking up the sun at this hour. Could she be indoors?
No response...
Something's not right. Linghan typically avoids venturing out too far as her memory isn't as sharp as it once was...
Yeah, I’ve got a weird vibe too. Let’s ask around the neighborhood.
Count on me! I practically know this area like the back of my hand. I’ll go ask everyone I can find to see if they’ve spotted Grandma Linghan.
Shaohua, have you seen Grandma Linghan today?
You mean the old lady next door?
It seems she went out early this morning.
Isn’t it strange? I heard she’s been quite unwell lately, hardly ever venturing outside. Instead, she spends hours basking in the sun right by her doorstep.
But she went straight out today, and I have no idea where she went.
Got it, thanks for letting me know. I’ll check with someone else and see if I can dig up more info.
Hello, may I ask your name?
Hello, I’m Lanqing. I just moved in. Are you a Patroller? Anything happened around here?
Hey, mind if I ask you something? Have you seen Grandma Linghan around today?
You're talking about the lady who's into Echoes, right? I haven't spotted her around today, unfortunately.
I’ve crossed paths with her a couple of times. She seems nice.
But she always looks a bit under the weather, and her memory seems a bit shaky.
I heard she’s dealing with some serious health issues. It must be tough for her.
No, no, no, don’t cry. Tell Grandpa what happened.
Grandma left early this morning, and when Dad noticed and went to find her, she was gone! *Sobbing*
What if Grandma gets lost again...?
Don’t worry, Yingying. Grandma will be alright. She’ll be back home soon.
I must carefully consider why Linghan went out today. There must be a purpose behind it.
At that moment, there comes the ringing of the bell.
At that moment, there comes the ringing of the bell.
Ah, I see... Today is... I know where she is. No need to worry. I’ll bring her back home safely.
It’s reassuring to have your support. When it comes to Linghan’s safety, the more helpers, the better.
Thank you, young ones... Words are inadequate to express my gratitude.
Yep! The more eyes we have, the faster we can track down Grandma Linghan.
But where on earth could Grandma Linghan have gone...?
I think she might have gone to that cave near the edge of Jinzhou.
A cave, you say? Tacet Discords love hanging out in places like that. Let’s hurry and check it out!
This place is huge! How on earth are we going to find her? Ugh, it's so frustrating!
Easy there, young one. There’s a clue that could help us locate Linghan swiftly.
Now that you mention it, something just jogged my memory. It might help us locate Linghan swiftly.
If my memory serves me right, she should be gathering the Echo of Flautist. Given her health, she wouldn’t venture to Tacet Fields, so she must be exploring the wild for scattered Tacet Discords.
In our day, we relied on experience to locate Tacet Discords, but I’ve heard there are more advanced technologies available now.
Yep! The gourd just got upgraded with a search function. Let’s see if we can use it to spot any nearby Tacet Discords.
Don’t worry, 漂泊者, it’s pretty straightforward. Normally, I’d give you time to figure it out yourself, but with Grandma Linghan missing, we can’t afford to waste any. Let me walk you through it.
You got it! I’ll be your guide through this.
Whoa, this new tech is amazing! We found her in no time flat.
Let’s not dawdle. Hang tight, Linghan! We’re on our way!
This place is seriously dangerous. Grandma Linghan isn’t in a good health condition. Why would she come here...
She must be here to collect the Echo of Flautist. After all, today is... a special day.
Many years ago on this very day, Jinzhou was besieged by a fierce Tacet Discord outbreak. Tens of Midnight Rangers stood firm on the front lines, confronting thousands of Tacet Discords.
It was Linghan who proposed a brilliant strategy. With her deep understanding of Echoes, she suggested utilizing them to repel the enemies’ assault.
To minimize casualties, she led the entire squad here to gather hundreds of Flautist’s Echoes.
Yes...
Hey, isn't that person with the silver hair over there...? Grandma Linghan! GRANDMA LINGHAN! Over here!
Darn! She’s too far away to hear us!
No! The Tacet Discords are closing in on her!
Oh, man! We can’t even use overdashing to catch up from this distance!
Leave it to me!
Frostbite Tortoise, I choose you! Protect Linghan!
Phew! That was a close call!
Your observation is sharp, young one. You have the makings of a soldier. Now is the moment to strike! Seize the opportunity given by the lull in Flautist’s attacks!
Let’s go!
Phew... Finally safe.
Young ones, are you alright?
W-We’re fine! Just needed to catch our breath after that crazy moment...
Instead of worrying us, go make sure Grandma Linghan’s okay!
Linghan, how are you feeling? Any injuries? Does it hurt?
Your Echo is Frostbite Tortoise, isn’t it?
You’ve raised it well, and the timing couldn’t be more perfect.
Linghan...
Seeing your Echo reminds me of my dear...
He shielded our entire squad with a humble Frostbite Tortoise, time and time again.
At first, everyone mocked him for choosing such a seemingly feeble Echo. Yet, they were all silenced by its might in the end.
After all, the strength of an Echo lies in the hands of its user.
I see. My judgment was clouded by strength before, capturing Echoes purely based on their appearances. You're right. You're always right.
Grandpa Jingzhu, why are you crying?
These tears... They’re tears of joy.
By the way, there’s a striking resemblance between you and my dear...
Both with a nose and two eyes, quite similar indeed, hehe.
But you’re nowhere near as handsome as him. In my eyes, he was incomparable—wise and brave beyond measure.
Y-Your cataracts seem to be worsening...
You’re right! Captain Linghan, it’s a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Allow me to introduce myself. I’m a member of the Vanguard of Midnight Rangers. You can call me Jingzhu.
Jingzhu... Did you just have flowers with you?
Oh yeah! I was too busy dealing with the Tacet Discords, and I dropped them somewhere.
They’re right here. Let’s take them back to Grandpa Jingzhu!
Here, this Noctemint is for you. Please accept it, Linghan. Will you once again be my lifelong companion?
Linghan stretches out her hand tremblingly and accepts the Noctemint.
Linghan stretches out her hand tremblingly and accepts the Noctemint.
Ah, the scent of Noctemint... it’s so familiar. My dear used to bring me Noctemints. Just a whiff would lift my spirits.
Flowers, Echoes... they’re all the same. Practicality is key.
Y-Yes! From this moment onward, I’ll be by your side, soaking in the sunshine, engaging in conversation... Whatever you desire, I’ll be there with you!
As long as I can be by your side!
Because I made a promise to you, Linghan. I vowed to never let you be alone, and I intend to uphold that promise for eternity.
But alas, we can’t soak up the sun here.
Escort me back. Basking in the sun on my doorstep is where I feel most at ease.
Alright, alright, let’s go home!
Grandpa Jingzhu, where is Grandma Linghan?
Linghan isn’t in a good health condition, so I’ve let her return to rest for now.
Such a relief to hear that! I’m so glad she got home safe.
Oh, and by the way, I’ve got a ton of questions. 漂泊者, you too, right?
You might have noticed already: Linghan was once an exceptional Midnight Ranger, serving as the captain of the Vanguard.
She wasn’t just my captain; she's also my beloved wife, with whom I’ve shared many years...
Being captain, she had a lot on her plate, always leading the charge, protecting our squad, and teaching us survival skills.
As the battles escalated, she pushed herself beyond limits and suffered grave injuries.
After a major victory, she eventually fell ill. She started to feel mentally foggy, causing her memories to slowly fade away.
She forgot how to navigate the streets of Jinzhou, forgot to eat her favorite Helmet Flatbread while they were still warm, and then...
She even forgot about me...
So, that’s why you’ve been chasing after Grandma Linghan, huh?
You’re hoping to stick by her side as her special someone.
Yes, you’re correct. Our comrades, once vibrant youths, perished in battle, while others succumbed to illness.
I can’t help but fear that someday if she were to regain her memories, she’d feel a profound loneliness... I cannot bear the thought.
Sorry for bringing up sad things. Thank you for helping me find Linghan.
Linghan has accepted me. It’s a great joy! I should feel happy!
The past is the past. From now on, I’ll treasure every moment shared with Linghan!
Exactly! Let’s treasure every moment and live life to the max!
Hehe, if you have time, feel free to visit us, and we can chat about Echoes to our heart’s content.
I can’t express my gratitude enough for your assistance in resolving this matter.
Plus, seeing you must have made Linghan so relieved to know that the people we risked our lives for have turned into amazing adults.
Thank you for your efforts. Here are what you deserve.
Besides the compensation, this old man has a word of advice for you.
Take good care of your Echoes. The world beyond can be perilous, and they may come in handy in times of need.
To safeguard yourselves and those dear to you.
Please stop!
The penjing here is meticulously crafted to blend in with the Institute's surroundings. Plucking any of these flowers would throw off the entire aesthetic.
If you love these flowers, feel free to come and enjoy their beauty, but please don't destroy my design.
Beneath the night sky, the flowers exude an enchanting allure. Unconsciously, you reach your hand out...
Beneath the night sky, the flowers exude an enchanting allure. Unconsciously, you reach your hand out...
As you snap out of your daze, a soft touch envelops your fingers. Nestled in your palm lies a little flower, adorned with dewdrops, its presence serene yet captivating.
As you snap out of your daze, a soft touch envelops your fingers. Nestled in your palm lies a little flower, adorned with dewdrops, its presence serene yet captivating.
Hmm... That's strange...
It feels like something's missing here. So strange. I've incorporated all the decorations I could think of...
Miniature models, amber pebbles, moss... I've used them all, so what could be lacking?
Looks like I'll have to ask Ms. Verina to come and take a look. Her designs always emit a vibrant energy that's simply unmatched.
Hey, aren't you that Rover? You awake?
This is the weather observatory in the Port Town of Guixu. You passed out during a battle with the Inferno Rider. Some guys from Lollo Logistics brought you here.
Oh, that's the Tacet Discord you just met. It looks like a rider on a motorbike, so I named it the Inferno Rider. A good name, isn't it?
Hahaha! That’s right. There’s a reason why we must put it down.
Our detection shows that the anomalous gravity field here is giving birth to a giant storm, which will sweep the pollen of Incinero Petal to the upper air.
So you know about it. That'll save me the explanation.
Incinero Petal is not a kind of plant, but an animal Tacet Discord. The flower-like structure is actually the end of its limbs.
To eliminate the Incinero Petals themselves is pointless. To stop the pollen from spreading, we must destroy the Tacet Mark at its core.
Initially, we were thinking about blowing that thing up...
Technically, it didn't come to us; it was discovered. That Inferno Rider seems to have been in the depths of Sea of Flames since that crisis many years ago.
A direct strike at Core Tacet Mark deep into the Sea of Flames was already a difficult mission, and the presence of this TD is making it even more impossible.
The special properties of the Sea of Flames make it safer for solo missions, so I've posted the wanted posters, hoping to recruit some skilled Resonators to defeat that TD.
We don't know either. You should ask the guys from Lollo Logistics who brought you back. They're right outside the observatory.
Hey, who are these people? How did they break in?
I knew it. They're those damn newcomers! Get rid of them!
Wait, we are...
Stop, please! They saved my life!
Miss Yunni? So you've been living here.
Yunni, you said someone saved you from the Sea of Flames. Are these the people you were talking about?
Yes. Now put away your weapons. Nobody attacks them!
Right, we won't fight you today. We are on an important mission.
Mimika told Yunni why you need the Spear parts.
Woah. A short time in that place already left me paralized, I couldn't even move a finger. But a powerful TD in that place? That's...
And you are planning to go and defeat that thing. You're so cool...
We do want to give you this spear thing... But the warehouse is locked, and we can't open it.
We only know the lock on the warehouse is connected to a mechanism. You have to pass a... umm... a little test to unlock that thing.
Simple. You shoot all the yellow targets that appear with that shooting machine. That's it.
The rule is simple, yet passing the test is another matter. We tried so many times, but none of us could pass. What do you say, care to give it a try?
Did you really just pass the test so easily? I'm speechless.
Oh... The bullets you shoot look like the tips of those Explosive Spears, don't they?
Let's go ask Mr. Mortefi about this.
These are indeed the tips of Explosive Spears...
And this test... Maybe it’s just another passion project from the Savants?
Though they are undeniably geniuses, they just have a thing for beating around the bush.
Hah... I really can't bring myself to understand the geniuses...
Then you can have these spear tips, as we agreed.
We don't need them anyway!
Yeah! Kick that TD's ass for us!
Lollo Logistics will take care of the transportation of the spear tips. Let's move on to the next research center.
All the research centers here are ours. Say my name, and they'll comply.
Watch out for those newcomers, though. They've been eyeing our territories.
You might be seen as one of us and get attacked if you leave here.
Are they Exiles too?
Yeah, these punks tried to take our spot and ambush us. They do raids, robberies, and all kinds of crap. No respect for anyone but themselves.
Take care, will ya?
D-did you drive all those people away?
Yes. They've been dealt with. You're safe now.
I'll open the gate now!
Phew... Finally, we are safe. Thank you so much! We thought we were doomed...
Oh, I heard about your purpose from Yunni, though there's still a little obstacle...
Yes. There's the fuel can—the tall thing over there.
The fuel will be pumped here for the flamethrower. It will spray an upright blaze when ignited.
To start the fire thrower and open the warehouse gate, we must connect three fuel cans. This will provide enough fuel for a strong blaze that will activate the sensing device on the gate.
...So says the manual we found in this research center.
Why don't we simply turn the flamethrower on?
Unfortunately, the pipeline connecting the fuel cans and the flamethrower has been deliberately disassembled. We need a way to fix them.
It, it is solved? So it didn't bother you much, did it?
Oh, by the way, one of my people wanted to ask you for a favor. If you could lend us a hand... We would really appreciate it.
Then the breech parts are Lollo Logistics' to deliver. We will make sure they safely arrives on time.
Now, we just need the barrels. Then we will have all three parts for the Explosive Spear.
One moment, please... I just received an emergency contact from my friend...
The newcomers just ambushed our base in the Third Research Center and took the pollen filter...
The concentration of toxic pollen is more higher over there. Without the filter, our guys will be in grave danger.
Could you please take back the snatched filter for us?
They may want to take the filter back to their lair.
Yes, we think so too. I'll send you the coordinates of their lair, 漂泊者.
I'm counting on you!
Hello! We're back with the filter!
Almost thought we wouldn't make it... I'll get the filter installed right away!
I can't thank you enough... We would have all died without you.
I know why you're here. Yunni told me all about it, but the Spear parts...
I can guess it. We'll need to solve another puzzle made by those weird geniuses.
Um, actually... When those thugs attacked us, they messed around with the device in the lab, and some... accidents happened at the warehouse, where the Spear parts are kept...
Yes. The spear barrels have been catapuled as a result. They landed inthe Sea of Flames. Some actually quite far into it.
Sigh... I feel ashamed to admit this, but we can't get them out from there...
I guess... You'll have to go get those barrels yourselves.
Yeah, I'll share them with you.
Cough, cough... It's killing me to stay here. I'm getting outta here one day.
Are you all right, 漂泊者? You stayed in the Sea of Flames for so long.
They are fine. The good barrels have been shipped to the assembly site by Lollo Logistics.
We don't have much time left. Prof. Woodrow is here too. Let's go meet up with them!
漂泊者! Mimika! Are you all right?
We're fine, but why are you here, manager?
We were trying to take all the parts out of Port Town of Guixu and find some other safe place to do the assembly...
...But we were running out of time, so we’re reduced to assembling on site right now. Besides, without the help of dedicated equipment, we couldn’t guarantee the reliability of the Spears. Haha.
Honestly, I'm not sure. The assembly worked, but it's a replica of an old CSC design with outdated information.
So there could be issues. It's best to try the Spears out before relying on them for your main objective.
Good thing is we happen to have installed Sound Emulators here. We can use them to attract the TDs from Sea of Flames.
That’s the spirit! I've set up some Spear generators near the Sea of Flames. Follow me.
Acknowledged… Is that our only option…?
Yinlin seems to be on a call with someone.
Yinlin seems to be on a call with someone.
But... I believe it's unnecessary...
Yes… Understood… I'll have it taken care of.
Yes… It's my contact from the PSB.
They'll be sending people over soon. We can leave Lirong and Yuanyuan in their care.
Are you done with the puppets?
That's fine. We'll dig further once we're in a safer location.
My contact informed me of a safe house not far from here… The Patrollers will meet us there.
We have a designated meet-up spot. There will be wolf-shaped markings nearby to show us the way.
Let's move. Can't let the Fractsidus find us.
That's some spectacular explosions. Don't you think, Mortefi?
The power is no problem. It should be able to penetrate Inferno Rider's barrier, which is effectively condensed Incinero Petal pollen.
Assuming it functions properly and has not been physically damaged, that is...
The last operation didn't work out due to Lollo Logistics' failure to protect Explosive Spears during transportation.
Manager...
The Spears are too big to deliver safely past the TDs to the heart of Sea of Flames. This delivery might end up like last time.
Actually, I got one!
What? Another pie-in-the-sky solution?
Of course not, I reckon. We are left with no other choice, aren't we? Please, let me try!
Umm...
If that's our customer's wish, Mimika, you should try it.
Okay, thank you everyone!
So, what's your plan?
We don't have time for briefings. Ready yourselves first.
Yes. I shall need some time with my co-workers to get ready, and I might need the help of Mr. Mortefi and Mr. Woodrow.
Then we'll meet at the overhead bridge in the central Sea of Flames. Then we'll talk about the plan.
漂泊者, please get to the destination. Lollo Logistics and we will handle the preparations.
Mimika, as you requested, I ordered a fully equipped team to get ready at our branch.
Thank you, manager.
Though I still don't understand why you had all the Explosive Spears moved to the branch...
What's on your mind exactly, Mimika? It should be time you tell us.
Right. Now, I felt like it would be only too arduous for us to carry the heavy Spears through the Sea of Incinero Petal.
That's when I came up with the alternative to ground transport: the air!
My manager had invested a fortune in a freight catapult at our branch. And I thought, if the goods can be catapulted, the Spears can too.
I, I didn't expect that!
If we can catapult the Spears at the maximum power, and correct their trajectory while they fly over the Sea of Flames, they should land right at their destination.
Won't this trigger immediate explosions upon landing?
Rest assured. Mr. Mortefi said an initiation is needed for them to explode.
To be foolproof, the trajectory is calculated by Mr. Mortefi, and Mr. Woodrow's observation returns no possibility of the Spears being affected by the Gravity Storm.
Hey, Mimika. The catapult is all set.
All right. The rest is yours, sir. This time, we will put an end to it all!
All right. The rest is yours, miss. This time, we will put an end to it all!
That spot is like the epicenter of the Gravity Storm. If we just launch the spears right through it... They would likely get thrown off course by the storm.
Hey, Rover, you notice that big building? The core Tacet Mark of all these Incinerating Petals is right there…
I think the only option is to escape from Gravity Storm and give it a try up close.
Hey Rover, remember when you met the Inferno Rider and it whispered “Rush… Till the end...”?

Know what? He will only know that we have won a great victory and will commend us greatly.
Wow! The exiles are here, don't catch me...
What exiles... take a closer look at his attire, does it look like those thieves?
What exiles... take a closer look at her attire, does it look like those thieves?

Just passing by? It's quite rare to come to this wilderness... but it's a good timing, I'm in need of some help.
Good observation, I'm a person who does great things! Since you said that, let me introduce myself to you.
We are a temporary team called Outrider Squad. I'm Storing the Blade, and she's Lingdi. We came to investigate the situation of this camp today.
But I have already figured out the situation inside. It's just a group of exiles, so I'm ready to launch the attack first!
So, what do you think? Do you want to join us and contribute to Midnight Rangers together?
I don't want to be scolded by the captain, don't involve me...

Forget it, you two are so hesitant, you can't rely on it at all.
I will lead the team to attack the camp at the planned time, you just wait for my triumphant return.
Don't be impulsive...
Alright, alright, look at you, so cowardly. You will regret not joining me today when you see me become an official member of the Midnight Rangers!
Ah, you're here! Storing the blade has already led people to attack the camp, but...
They seem to be caught up in the internal conflict of the Exiles, and there has been no news from them for a while.
The captain hasn't come back yet, I really don't know what to do...
Do you want to go up and help them? But those Exiles...
Hmm... you do seem more reliable than Storing Blade, I believe in you.
Go up the path and you will see the camp. There should be other team members outside the camp gate, they will tell you more information.
When the captain comes back, I will come to support you with him! Please, I'm counting on you!
It's really exciting!
I want to try too...
It still feels a bit dangerous...
Gulpuff shouldn't actively harm people, right?
Little sister, listen to your brother and go home quickly.
I don't want to go back...
Could you two please follow me to the safe zone?

What happened?

Do you want to try too?

If you can reach the finish line with all your limbs intact before me, then I...

I'm familiar with the route, so I'll let you go ahead.

Have you thought it through?

Hahaha, not bad, not bad.
I didn't expect this day to come.
As an old man, I can challenge the next place again!

If fate allows, perhaps we'll meet again in the next cave, and I won't let you win next time, hahaha.
Haha, not too bad.
I didn't have to wait too long.
I must say, you do have some talent.
Although you lost to me this time, it's hard to say who will win in the next few tries.

You have great enthusiasm, but lack resilience.

Cough, winning against me on this path shows that your proficiency in body movement has reached a higher level.
Isn't the ability that falls on oneself the greatest benefit?
Haha, not bad, you have a lot of resilience.
Let's begin then.
Don't make me wait too long at the finish line.
Rover? What a pleasant surprise. I've heard a lot about you!
I'm Beigu, the captain of the camp. Currently caught up in an investigation regarding a theft case.
Lollo Logistics regularly delivers supplies to the camp, covering all our needs. When they unloaded the supplies, the quantities matched our order perfectly.
However, during the nightly inventory check, a team member responsible for counting noticed one box missing, though it was not something important.
You're right. It's packed with everyone's favorite hometown dishes.
To treat the soldiers here,  I secretly asked Panhua to prepare a batch of pre-made dishes—
My apologies. It's been a while since I last visited Jinzhou. I miss the hometown dishes so much.
Anyway, I hope you can keep our conversation between us. Unfortunately, I can't conduct the investigation myself.

For the soldiers here, trust is often more valuable than their lives. It's built through shared experiences and overcoming challenges together. I don't want this incident to sow even the smallest seed of doubt.
As a token of gratitude, I'll treat you to a feast at Panhua's Restaurant.
Without further ado, you can start by checking the guard post. Investigate the entry and exit records from yesterday afternoon until now.
No one entered or left the camp.
Maybe I should brace myself for the worst. If that's the case, the thief could only be someone from within the camp.
While you were looking into the entry and exit records, I took the chance to review the surveillance footage from when the supplies were loaded and unloaded.
Mingyi, Tianlang, and Wuheng were present throughout the entire process of loading, unloading, and stocking supplies. You might want to start with them to see if you can uncover any useful clues.
Oh, by the way, the unloading area is a blind spot in the surveillance. Rover, you might discover some hidden clues there. I'm counting on you!

Hello dear, come choose a penjing for yourself. Not only do they add a touch of green to your space, but they also freshen up the air!
Don't worry, even if you're not buying anything, I'm always happy to have company.
Rongqing? Oh, he's been a regular at my shop since before he started helping out here.
He's studying penjing design and thought interning here would be a good fit.
I agreed because I could tell by the way he looked at the penjings.... Such passion and sincerity in his eyes.
It's great to see that kind of dedication. Though, he does tend to go a bit overboard with decorations sometimes. Miniature models, amber pebbles... you name it.
But aiming for perfection isn't a bad thing. Hopefully, he'll refine his style as he learns more about penjing design.
This penjing shop? It's been around for ages. I'm actually the fourth owner.
My daughter Linling, well, she's got her own dreams and doesn't seem to be interested in taking over the shop.
Let her be. I'm still feeling fine. I'm still going strong. As long as I can keep moving around, this shop won't close.
Little Verina? She is such a sweet child. Her smiles always make me happy. She reminds me of the lovely Starflowers.
She has been a great help. She knows a lot about everything plant-related.
All her penjings are something else! So vibrant and enchanting.
If only she were my granddaughter...
Welcome to Bogu's Arbor. Take your time to look around.
Welcome to Jewel Boba!
Hello there, feel free to give our Jewel Boba a try.
Our Jewel Boba boasts the same delightful taste over the past three decades. If you ask around, you'll find it accompanying the growth of people here.
Welcome, dear. Fancy trying our latest dessert soup? We call it Chewy-... Gummy-Yummy SweeTEA?
Quite the mouthful, isn't it? My granddaughter tells me it's all the rage with the youngsters these days. I tried it myself, and goodness, it's tasty!
Speaking of my granddaughter, Pinwen, she works in the Academy. Quite the achiever, you know? She's been a diligent student since her school days.
She's thinking of leaving her job to lend a hand here at the shop. She's like, With all this new technology, I could whip up a flavor that'll really catch on and take our business up to a new level!
But you know, she's put in years of hard work, studying and landing a job at the prestigious Academy. It's no small feat. I'm not sure whether to support her in this...
Perhaps I ought to let her make her own decisions, though. She's not a child anymore.
Pinwen... She's really my granddaughter.
Thirty years ago, when I first opened this shop, I was just like her, nose buried in recipes, trying to perfect my dessert soups.
My heart was warmed seeing my customers' smiles back then.
Perhaps she feels the same way now, right?
Jewel Boba is my pride and joy.
I've been running this shop for over thirty years. Many of my regulars have become dear friends.
They never seem to get tired of my dessert soups.

Eventually, those unfamiliar faces became the warm, familiar smiles of regulars. It's funny, you know. Back then they called me Auntie Pinrong, but as the years passed, I earned the title of Grandma Pinrong, haha!
However, I've noticed fewer young faces lately. Perhaps my granddaughter is onto something with her theory about fancy drinks.
Jewel Boba is now the pride and joy of both me and my granddaughter.
With her new recipes, we've been welcoming new faces every day.
The first time I tasted the dessert soup my granddaughter made... It flooded me with the same joy I felt when I first made a dessert soup of my own.

After all these years, those newly introduced dessert soups back then have become classics, and now we've added another batch of new ones. You know, I believe all these new creations will eventually stand the test of time and become classics themselves, don't you think?
Whether it's an old classic or a new creation, as long as it brings a smile to my customers' faces, it's a success in my book.
Hmm, the centrifugal force of the separator is a bit too strong. Let me tweak it a bit...
Sorry, fully focused on my molecular cuisine right now. Please don't talk to me.
Hey there! How about a cup of Chewy-Gummy-Yummy SweeTEA?
This tea's a special brew. I ground the tea leaves before steaming and brewing, giving it a smoother, delicate taste. And the boba? Made them with fresh fruits!
By extracting them, the fruit's sweetness is kept intact. Take a bite of the boba, and you'll feel the burst of fresh juice in your mouth!
I always knew using molecular gastronomy for dessert soups would be a hit! Haha, glad my efforts paid off.
Getting the right balance of each ingredient is like doing research. It takes dedication and time. Every little step makes a difference.
You know what? Seeing my customers' smiles is as rewarding as getting published in a top-tier journal.
Hmm, this package...
Where on earth is its recipient...
Such a strange name. Nobody around here goes by that...
There's always these weird names on packages, making deliveries a real puzzle...
Can you believe there's someone named Ms. Vera's Dog?
Well, at least it's a living thing. Then there's Liv's Quilted Coat. How's a coat supposed to receive a package?
And this one, Universe's Strongest Chief. We've got Midnight Rangers and Patrollers, but no chiefs. What's that about? There's no such position in the Ministry of War.
Sorry, no time for jokes now. Got a package to deliver, pronto.
Maybe... It's been ages since I watched a Hero Play. Work's been non-stop.
Anyway, enough chatter. Time to hustle and get these packages where they need to be.
Can't afford to mess up our reputation as We Promise, We Deliver.
Intruder!! Kill her!

I understand what my sister wanted to tell me. I won't let her down.
漂泊者, thank you for accompanying me on this short treasure hunting trip, and sharing in the beauty of this sunrise.
I won't forget about this journey.
The road ahead looks even more rugged, but I won't be stopped.
What kind of person is Shiyu?
What kind of person is Shiyu?
She's a bold and curious explorer, always uncovering fascinating finds. She shares her discoveries with the world through submissions to Wutherium Geographic magazine.
While she's daring, she's also very considerate.
If it weren't for her, I might not have as much experience, and I would be even more introverted than I am now.
She brought about a lot of positive changes in me.

We won! We won!

No, no, no, don't get me wrong. I'm not showing off!

Huh? Are you maybe a foreigner? People in Jinzhou are quite touchy about grades.

Follow me. I know this place like the back of my hand.
My sister and I used to climb higher up the mountain from here.

Pudding! C'mon, let's try again!

I made this model as a child, a witness to my goals.

My sister didn't know this, so she thought I was smart enough to be admitted...
Let's keep moving. I'm eager to see what else she has in store.

This… isn't what I'm looking for.
Pudding! C'mon, let's try again!

Direction of the hand, protection of the heart.
