Haha, did you reply to me that way on purpose? As if you were acting as a stooge.
Don't you think our conversation is like an improvised Xiangsheng? I must say, we did it quite well.
Please, have a seat here. It seems we've formed a connection, so I'll treat you to some sunflower seeds. It's on me.
No problem. When you have time, please come again.
Hahaha, that was some good crosstalk! I've got a bunch of jokes ready to go. When you have time, I'd love to share them with you.
Hi there, what a coincidence! Nice to see you again.
Are you busy today?
In that case, how about I tell you something fresh?
Have you heard about rats stealing oil?
Well, for someone as knowledgeable as you, it may not be something fresh. But a mouse stealing oil to share with a cat, that's not something you see every day, right?
Indeed.
After we were closed yesterday, I cleaned up until late. When I was locking the door, I caught a glimpse of a gray rat dashing into the shades in the corner.
I immediately followed it and saw the mouse hopping onto the shoulders of a little cat, sneaking into the shop through the window.
Then, the rat dipped the tip of its tail in the oil and fed it to the cat. No wonder the cat was willing to help.
After the mouse left, I went to the cat and asked, Why didn't you just catch the mouse and eat it?
The cat glanced at me and said, Fool. If there is no mouse stealing oil, why would they keep me? It's better to have a bit of oil every day for the long run.
Isn't it amusing? A cat working for a mouse.
If you don't believe it, why don't you take a look at the windowsill? There might be traces of oil left.
Hi, you're here. Are you here to see me?
Oh, you reminded me.
There's a follow-up to that joke!
Sorry, I can't right now. I have customers waiting for their tea.
Thank you, but that's not good...
Well, I appreciate it. Let's serve the tea to the table over there.
No, there's much more to tell.
It's getting more and more intriguing.
Yeah. I pulled an all-nighter to write this bit. Hear it out.
So, after that day, the oil thefts at the boss's house just stopped.
Now the rats weren't stealing oil no more. The young cat could catch a mouse every day. The boss was overjoyed, treating it to meat and fish.
But then the meat started disappearing from the kitchen, and the boss was all confused.
He thought to himself, if he's treating this cat like royalty, there's no need for him to steal the meat.
Little did he know, the young cat was secretly feeding the old one with the meat.
As time went by, those two cats got brazen. Not satisfied with just filling their bellies, they even started selling the stolen meat to stray cats.
Yeah. What do you know? The world's full of peculiar things.
I ran into them the other day.
I overheard some strange muttering like, Clouds cover the moon, people hide in shadows, and cats meow three times?
Didn't catch him all though. The young cat, unlike his father, was on high alert. When I approached, he hissed at me, so I didn't dare to get any closer.
And that's why I couldn't find an end to the story.
Well, you certainly don't sugarcoat your words, huh? If you've got the time, maybe share this story with others. Who knows, someone might find it amusing.
Unfortunately, I don't have any new bits for you today.
Well, then you'd waste a trip. I can't allow that.
How about this? You've seen my routine a few times now. Why don't you try to be the comic and I'll be the stooge?
Why not? It's harder to set up a joke than to tell the punch line.
What do you think? Have you learned the punchlines?
Exactly! The key is how you deliver it. You need to add a touch of absurdity in the way you pronounce work for.
Not bad, but a bit more practice could make it even better.
There's another bit.
Clouds cover the moon, people hide in shadows…
You're such a natural.
Haha, it's okay. We can try it again next time.
So, you're the famous Rover, huh?
I'm contacting you on behalf of the Patrol Station. Sorry for the abrupt request.
Have you crossed paths with someone named Yihu lately?
He's the guy standing outside the teahouse, trying to reel in customers. Tall, thin, loves doing Guankou.
Well...
No, not like that.
Don't be fooled by his modest disposition. He's actually my informant from the streets.
I've been working with him for years. Smart, gutsy, sharp-eyed, good with words, and reads situations well. I always thought he'd make a good Patroller.
But all he's ever wanted was to make people laugh. He dreams of being a Xiangsheng Master and claims it's a tradition to perform Xiangsheng at teahouses, so he won't leave there.
You know, a teahouse is a place where people of all sorts gather. Lots of chatter and gossip. For I've helped him once a few years back, now he's doing this for me to return the favor.
He's my eyes and ears, telling me all the street rumors, which has been a big help in solving cases.
I'm currently on a case, and I need his info. However, every time I visited the teahouse, he signaled me to leave.
So I think something might have happened or someone's got their eyes on him. For his safety, I can't approach him directly.
I saw you shooting the breeze with him a few times before, so I figured maybe you could get close without blowing his cover?
Thank you. Just be careful, for both Yihu and yourself, not to blow your covers.
Here you are.
Oh? What's it?
And that's what you call fresh?
Haha, you're indeed interesting.
By the way, do you remember all the stories I told you before?
Oh no, not necessary. They aren't worth the effort.
When I come up with a new joke, I'll let you know.
Hmm…
I see.
Thank you. The information you provided is very helpful for solving the case.
Kind of. Yihu used plain language, easy to decipher.
He's not exactly a professional undercover, so I have to be really careful.
Thank you for your help, Rover. I'll pick up the pace of the investigation and keep you updated if there are any new leads.
Sorry, but I have to ask for another favor from you.
If you could conduct a secret investigation, they won't catch wind of it.
Without solid proof, we're hands-tied on direct intervention.
Yihu's stayed undercover, thanks to you.
He's a crucial informant for me, and I want to keep him safe.
Here's the detailed address.
Thank you.
Look! Someone is there!
Cough... water, water... Please...
Aah, right here. Drink, please.
I... I thought it was the end.
Did you place an order with Lollo Logistics?
Yes, I did. I'm Yunni. I didn't expect Lollo Logistics to really make it here. Thank you so much.
You're welcome. Maybe I should apologize... for not delivering your order on time.
I don't know. I woke up here, trapped by toxic pollen and unable to leave. I was starving and dehydrated, barely hanging on.
The Gravity Storm was interfering with my signal... I tried calling every one of my contacts in my Communication Touchpad, but none of the calls got through. Until I called Lollo Logistics...
Hehe, of course it would get through! We invested in strenghening the signal so that anyone can place orders with us at any time, any place.
I was worried about losing the signal, so I used your automatic ordering service to quickly order some stuff. But I didn't expect you to actually deliver it here.
You bet! We Lollo Logistics always deliver, no matter what!
You don't have to bother. I can walk by myself now. Thank you. I will never forget your help!
Please don't forget to spread the word about Lollo Logistics' service! New customers get discounts!
Haha. Sure thing! See you!
Right. This order is finally settled. It feels so good to finish the job.
To be honest, I once thought it was no more than a publicity slogan, too. No one would really take each and every order so seriously, right?
But I changed my mind when I received a package delivered by Lollo Logistics. It was something my late father left.
Yes. He was a Midnight Ranger. I was told at a young age that he passed away at his post, and that his body was not even found.
The delivery guy said my dad got hurt during a battle against the TD Outbreaks. He was trying to protect his friends when he fell into a valley.
A Lollo Logistics employee found him, but they could not save him.
It was said that he was keeping me on his mind until the last breath, saying his daughter was about to turn ten, yet he couldn't even meet her for one last time.
He hoped that Lollo Logistics would deliver the doll he carried with him as a birthday present to his daughter.
Yes, but it was far more complicated. Father passed before he could say the address and identity, and no identifications could be found with him by then.
However, couriers from Lollo Logistics didn't give up. They kept asking and investigating while they delivered other goods.
Finally, after all those difficulties, they found the girl, and that was me.
But by the time I received this present, I was already over the age of playing dolls. That day was my 18th birthday of mine.
Lollo Logistics inspired me. I wanted to join and stick to the motto: We Promise, We Deliver!
Hehe, thank you.
One order done. Next up, we have a bigger order to deliver!
Me and my colleagues will go with you to the research centers mentioned by Mr. Mortefi. We'll try to find those Spear parts and bring them back if we can.
I got the coordinates from him. Let's move.
At first I thought that We Promise, We Deliver was just a slogan and no one would really take each order seriously.
But one day I received a delivery from Lollo Logistics containing my father's belongings.
Father was seriously injured when he fell into a valley in the middle of a battle to cover his teammates, and all of his markings were lost and missing.
A passing Lollo Logistics employee found him, but in the end couldn't save him.
The father finally wanted Lollo Logistics to mail the hairpin he had on him intended as a gift for his daughter's 12th birthday, but died before he could give out the address.
This logistician didn't give up on this, investigating and asking questions all the way through the delivery of other goods, and eventually found out where I lived
I was 18 years old when I received this belated birthday present.
That's why I aspire to be a part of Lollo Logistics, with the promise of We Promise, We Deliver.
Now that the order is complete, let's go find Explosive Spear's parts.
The Woodrow newsletter says it has found the parts for the gun head. Want to come along?
Okay, I'll go over there then, you be safe.
Hmph, this will be one helluva score... Hey, what are you sniffing around at? If you're here for something, go take it up with our boss!
Kindly have a seat.
Lady Sanhua will be with you shortly.
Madam Magistrate advised you to explore what these tokens represent during her absence. This may help you acquire the information you desire sooner.
I apologize for the inconvenience, but please rest assured: she will be here to meet you in three days' time.
Sorry... I cannot disclose her whereabouts at this time. Please trust me that she is eagerly looking forward to meeting you in person.
Pardon my inability to provide a better answer. Madam Magistrate has a task that she must handle alone, but she has never for one moment forgotten about her meeting with you.
Not knowing exactly when you'd arrive, she had to leave without having the chance to welcome you in person.
Because she will require at least three days to complete her current task.
Madam Magistrate wanted to assure you that in three days, by any means, she will return to meet you in person.
You...
I'll be sure to convey your kindness to Madam Magistrate. Please accept my sincerest gratitude.

Yes, Madam Magistrate does hope to have your assistance, but there is no rush for a decision. She does not want to pressure you into anything you may not desire. We invite you to learn about our situation before making a final commitment.
When it comes to these tokens, it is never her intention to confuse you with the puzzles. Instead, they should serve as clues that lead you toward the truth.
Madam Magistrate deeply regrets not having the time to deliver her messages to you in person.
We value your presence far more than you might imagine. The same goes for any and all information about you.
Since Madam Magistrate is currently away, I cannot make the final confirmation on her behalf.
But you. You are truly exceptional.
Regarding that...
My eyes can see the frequencies of all living beings.
Or rather, those frequencies are the only thing I can see.
You... You share the same frequency with Madam Magistrate.
You look undistorted and authentic, in your original form.
Apologies. My description was not accurate.
Both you and Madam Magistrate look undistorted to me.
In my eyes, you appear the way you are.
They all look different.
For some reason, you can tell Sanhua doesn't want to continue this topic.
For some reason, you can tell Sanhua doesn't want to continue this topic.
May I have your Terminal for a moment?
I need your Terminal for Access Pass authorization. In the meantime, I will configure the latest Utility modules for you.
Yes, it's the gourd on your waist. The device every Resonator carries.
Indeed. It was an oversight on my end. I will now import my contact information and that of all public services, like Patrol Stations, into your Terminal.
I will be here on standby, ready to assist whenever you need me.
I need your Terminal for regional access authorization. I will also configure the latest Utility module for you.
Madam Magistrate thought you might need it.
You waited for a moment.
The Utility module on your Terminal has been upgraded to the latest iteration. Now all the Utilities, including Sensor, Levitator, and Grapple, should be fully functional.

You are now granted unlimited access to all regions in Jinzhou. I have sent your Terminal ID to every border pass and Resonance Beacon. You will only need to display your Terminal ID, or activate a Beacon with your Terminal for entry.
You are free to visit any part of Jinzhou.
Yes, including the City Hall. You have full access to its facilities.
Also, may I ask... Have you decided your place of residence in Jinzhou?
If not, Madam Magistrate has arranged accommodation for you in advance, here in the City Hall.
I will lead you to your room if you need.
I will lead you to your room if you need.
Understood. We will be ready to accommodate you anytime.
This is Mortefi, a renowned figure in the Department of Safety. He was born in the New Federation, and he joined the Huaxu Academy a few years ago. I heard his talent is truly impressive.
People say he is a bit scary at first glance, but he's actually quite kindhearted once you get to know him...
Chixia told me he's quite popular with the kids. Children have been pestering him for all kinds of fancy toys, and he's always open to their requests.
Here you are. The data we collected in the Gorges of Spirits has been submitted for analysis, and we'll have the results today. I have the equipment for your physical examinations ready, too.
Any discoveries during your trip to the City Hall?
You showed Baizhi the tokens you received and told her about what happened.
What do you think, Baizhi?
I have a hypothesis about the sugar pearl, but I need to verify it first. If possible, I recommend conducting non-destructive tests of all these tokens you have.
Data is always straightforward.

The first three tokens can be tested at my branch's laboratory. This miniature sundial will require radiographic testing, though. To access the necessary equipment, we'll need to file a request with one of the Tacetite studies related branches.
Yes, Mortefi is the Branch of Tacetite Weaponry's head within the Department of Safety.
Indeed.
One moment, please.
Soon after, Baizhi returned with Mortefi.

Give me the items to be tested. Anything else you need me to know, you can let me know now. You may retrieve your items in twenty minutes, and the analysis report will be ready five minutes after that. Take a right, and you'll find me in the testing room.
Mortefi took the sundial and gently weighed it in his hand.
Mortefi took the sundial and gently weighed it in his hand.
This one looks like the early handiwork of someone I know.
It's lightweight, and its design differs from that of the typical sundial. And it appears to be missing a part. See, there's a groove here.

I don't see anything special with these items. Speaking of this sugar pearl... So you all remember eating sugar pearls like this when you were kids? I don't think I've ever had anything like this in my childhood.
No. I'm from the New Federation. You mean this sugar pearl might be unique to Huanglong?
I remember a nurse lady giving me a candy like that.
So, sugar pearls like this were distributed at hospitals? Perhaps...
The sugar pearl might be a type of medicine. Its sweet taste would've made it more palatable to children.
Ms. Baizhi. As a Huanglong local working at the Academy, I suppose you already had an idea about what it is?
I do have my theory as to what it is, but it still needs verification. I wouldn't proclaim any solid answers before confirming the chemical composition of this item with reliable data.
Seconded. Let's find out through actual testing, then.
It will take some time before the results are ready. If you have other matters to take care of, you should go ahead. I'll let you know once we have the results.
Shall we wait here at the Academy, Rover?
Sure you can, but don't forget your physical examination—I'll see you in a while for that.
I smelled tea on him…
Perhaps we can use this to figure out his identity and assist him in finding his family.
I know we’ve been over this a million times. You've always wanted to join the army since you were little, but... I'm not saying you can't.
If that's your concern, I'll quit bugging you. Come home more often, we all really miss you.
Our boss was all, Ski, the future of the Department of Laboratory Evaluation is in your hands, and then...
And then he bounced, haha.
I'm exhausted, like super tired...
Finally, we’re here!
Siqi can now submit the materials on our behalf.
Siqi has been struggling too. He's now the main guy at the Department of Lab Evaluation and must be itching to get those files into the database ASAP.
Would you mind coming with me to look for him?
Siqi, we have fixed the gate, and we can now safely archive your files!
Here, I’ll help you archive the materials for this quarter.
What? It's been repaired again already? Didn't I just...
What do you mean again already? What did you do last night?
Uhhh, no, I didn’t do anything, really... I’m just glad it’s finally fixed!
What about the materials you were supposed to hand in?
Ah, about that… Please just give me another two days...
I didn't think you'd be the one to break that gate.
In just a week, with over thirty experiments, there's no way I can finish them all!
I see. Well, I gotta stick the gate repair costs on the Department of Laboratory Evaluation.
Oh, come on, please! We've been in the red for way too many quarters!
I don't wanna work overtime anymore.
Ugh, I'm seriously beat...
These records involve a plague and a researcher who experimented with the new vaccine on her own son... Hold on. Is this researcher the mother of Mr. Xiangli, our Principal Investigator?
Making her own son the first test subject must have required a terrifying amount of determination and confidence…
Tacet Discords... In this place?
Tacet Discords... In this place?
No, these are simulated projections... Must be some kind of digital guards.
No, these are simulated projections... Must be some kind of digital guards.
They don't seem on full alert, only following a timed patrol schedule.
They don't seem on full alert, only following a timed patrol schedule.
Watch out!
Chirp... Chirp...
Something's not right. Why wouldn't it attack us?
Chirp... brother...
Help... Help...
Brother... help...
Chirp...
Help...
It seems to only repeat these lines... This is not a common Tacet Discord.
Tacet Discords attack other living beings, because they need to feed on those frequencies to make themselves whole again. When frequencies are scattered and recombined, a new Tacet Discord is born.
This one probably devoured the frequencies of... humans.
Turning the last bits of a human's consciousness into such monotonous mumbles... Are these words the last cries of someone innocent? Who is behind this twisted plot?
W-wait! It doesn't look like it's trying to attack us...
Help...
...Brother...
It seems to only repeat these lines... This is not a common Tacet Discord.
Tacet Discords attack other living beings, because they need to feed on those frequencies to make themselves whole again. When frequencies are scattered and recombined, a new Tacet Discord is born.
This one probably devoured the frequencies of... humans.
Turning the last bits of a human's consciousness into such monotonous mumbles... Are these words the last cries of someone innocent? Who is behind this twisted plot?
Yangyang crouched down, hand on the Tacet Discord's head. As she focused on the Streams, sorrow filled her expression.
I can't believe it... There's such a big opening down here...
How odd... This place should have been soaked in water, but everything is dry here. Even the vegetation is thriving.
Did Scar do this? Given his powers, it doesn't seem too hard for him.
Where did it go...?!
Is that a... diary?
Good. Those Exiles can't reach us now.
Master Dollmaker's chamber is right up ahead... Don't die on me now.
So many prototype puppets... How many secrets does this factory hold?
Here, record the physical status of these puppets. Master needs to know for his research.
These are his prized achievements. We need photos of them to prove what he's been up to.
Hmph. That's more like it. Remember to capture every detail. I'll be watching you.
Bad luck. Just a few days left unattended, and the thorns just grew again and entangled themselves with the chest.
Yes. Though the items within it are not so important, we do want to keep using this chest.
But I don’t think I can cut open the thorns with this blade. What should I do...
Oh, you just reminded me. There’s a flamethrower not far from here, but I just don’t know how to activate it.
Well, if you can get this done for me, you can take the items inside as a thank you from me.
The thorns didn’t last long on fire, did they? Was kind of relaxing to watch them burn...
The items are yours now. Don’t forget to take them. And thank you very much!
Oh? So you're one of the participants, huh?
Though I'm a foreign Exile, these locals know nothing about being polite. I'm here to teach'em a lesson!
No matter who you think you are, don't expect any mercy from me.
Be smart and just quit. In that case, I'll keep you alive!
Hi there? Are you here to participate in the Seaside Arena too?
One more competitor here, and my heart is just breaking with guilt.
I've never, ever lost, you know? Best of luck to you, though. You'll need it, trust me.
Here's your entry pass. Now you can come and leave the camp freely.
Did you find out any useful information?
Well, all the participants are elite members of their factions, and the competition only fuels their aggressiveness with each round.
By the way, before the match kicks off, we need to contribute items to the prize pool.
Rover, do you have anything valuable?
No worries! I'll throw in my stuff. I have faith in you!
I've staked everything I own, even a 20th-anniversary limited-edition comic book with the author's autograph.
It's the prized issue number 0001.
Hey! Are you undervaluing them? They cost me a great sum!
I'll hand them over to the organizer. You go register with the receptionist. I'll be your biggest cheerleader during the match!
Hello, are you here to register for the Seaside Arena?
There's a new rule to follow. If you want to register for the match, you need to collect three badges first.
Participants in the Seaside Arena have always been the cream of the crop.
Due to the enticing rewards, many incompetents try to sneak in, wasting everyone's time. That's why we've set up this rule—to ensure only the truly powerful can participate.
To earn these badges, you'll undergo three basic trials. Are you ready?
The first trial tests your courage. A weapon is placed at the highest point in the camp.
If you can retrieve it safely, you'll earn the first badge.
Excellent. Overcoming inner fears is the first step to climbing to the top.
You've earned the badge of courage.
The next badge represents speed. Wait a moment; someone is challenging it now.
Alright, your turn. See those shooting targets?
Your task is to hit those targets within thirty seconds.
Only those who react fast and make swift decisions can pass.
If you're the one we're expecting, I'm sure you can breeze through it. If you're ready, let's get started.
Greetings. I was told that you were the ones that helped find Mister Zongye. Please accept my deepest gratitude.
I've prepared a fresh pot of tea, how about I pour some for you while you rest up in the teahouse for the time being?
*Chuckle* Where are my manners. I am Yuanwu. It's a pleasure to meet you.
I'm Chixia!
I am Yangyang... Master Yuanwu?
You know of me?
Whoa! Careful Mister Zongye! Really hot pot of tea in my hands!
No! My tea!
Watch out!
Wow that was fast!
Such calm Streams...
Oh dear! Thank the heavens you saved it in time, Jianxin!
Here's your tea. Off to the customers you go!
Mister Zongye, you're back! Are you hurt?
*Chuckle* Oh, it's you Jianxin, you silly girl.
H-how's Mister Zongye able to recognize you? Weird!
Jianxin, disciple in training. We've met before.
Are you the one's that brought back Mister Zongye? Thanks so much!
Rover, about the sugar pearl...
Life has never been easy after the Lament, but I still remember that sweetness from my childhood.

The battle against that epidemic in Jinzhou was grueling. Once infected, children either died or suffered life-long disabilities, Resonators or not. With Tacet Discords ravaging Jinzhou and severing all communication with other cities, desperation ran high.
Words are not enough to convey how desperate people must have felt. They resorted to self-experimentation with a newly developed vaccine, risking everything for a chance. If they failed...
We owe our presence here to those who came before us. It's important to remember their sacrifices.
If the sugar pearl points to the information and reports we have just read, what is Madam Magistrate trying to convey?
Is it related to your past? Or is it...
According to the reports, the vaccine's creator died three years after its development, with the rest of the team now over fifty.
You mean... You could be that infant shown in the footage?
They should be around your age by now.
Hmm... but he doesn't have your golden eyes...
Hmm... but she doesn't have your golden eyes...
But you are not from Jinzhou... Maybe the place you came from had a similar situation?

With this thought, perhaps, the reports about the sugar pearl are just one part of the clues. The other part telling your past and memories is hidden in the documents on the Wei shelf. What do you think?
A hero...
Are you saying that the information contained in the sugar pearl doesn't directly point to your identity?

Jinzhou was the most recent city established in Huanglong. The Mountains of Spirits running from north to south divide Huanglong in two. The capital and the five cities are located in the Inner Huanglong, while Jinzhou is in the Outer Huanglong.

The Battle of Gorge of Spirits was the catalyst to found Jinzhou. Tacet Discords were born in the Norfall Barrens and their invasion route was originally traceable. However, the emergence of the Crownless changed that route.
The Crownless is a Tacet Discord that embodies war itself. The hatred of the fallen warriors and the fear of the survivors are the ingredients for it.
In the limited information available, some researchers have speculated its connection with the Threnodian.

When it comes to the Threnodian, there is a lot to tell. For now, you can think of it this way: the Threnodian is the most powerful Tacet Discord. The Battle of the Threnodian that happened before was to fend it off.
According to the reports, the Crownless is very similar to the formidable Tacet Discord we encountered.
Our Sentinel, Jué, manifested before us in that battle.
We have the symbol Wei now. This should go with the time part.
But we can't yet solve the puzzle with this alone.
Maybe we can figure out the cardinal direction part by looking into the tokens again. It might have something to do with how we got one of the clues.
What do you think, Rover?
I've only seen our Magistrate once at the Appointment Ceremony, so I can't comment on her personality.
But her policies have proven effective and greatly benefited us since she took office.
Some believe that the remarkably far-sighted and profound decisions were actually devised by Counselor Changli, due to the young age of the Magistrate.
Lady Changli is our Magistrate's advisor and former teacher. She once held a high position in the Central Secretariat, but she requested a transfer to Jinzhou.
I've also heard about rumors painting her as a cunning manipulator rather than a loyal servant...
You seem to hold Madam Magistrate in high regard.
But rumors are just that, rumors.
Let's look back on what we've gathered so far: Our clues point to the sugar pearl as a key in solving the sundial's puzzle.
Let's look back on what we've gathered so far: Our clues point to the sugar pearl as a key in solving the sundial's puzzle.
Simply put, one token can lead to multiple targets and one target may hold several pieces of information.
Simply put, one token can lead to multiple targets and one target may hold several pieces of information.
We both had our reason for a meeting: the Magistrate had information to share, while I had questions to ask.
We both had our reason for a meeting: the Magistrate had information to share, while I had questions to ask.
However, her tokens contain both what she wants to tell me and what I want to ask her, making it seem like she is complicating matters.
However, her tokens contain both what she wants to tell me and what I want to ask her, making it seem like she is complicating matters.
...Maybe she was running out of time. That's why she could only offer us scraps of the puzzle, instead of actually putting it together.
...Maybe she was running out of time. That's why she could only offer us scraps of the puzzle, instead of actually putting it together.
Or perhaps she's indeed a master strategist, leaving breadcrumbs for us to follow. The initial clues may simply be a test to...
Or perhaps she's indeed a master strategist, leaving breadcrumbs for us to follow. The initial clues may simply be a test to...
She needed to ensure that those who may come across these tokens without understanding their true meaning would not be able to use them for access.
She needed to ensure that those who may come across these tokens without understanding their true meaning would not be able to use them for access.
In other words, there are people who need to be misled, and they may obtain these tokens.
In other words, there are people who need to be misled, and they may obtain these tokens.
It seems there may be hidden dangers lurking in Jinzhou...
It seems there may be hidden dangers lurking in Jinzhou...
If it were you, Yangyang, what would you do to make sure the recipient gets what you mean?
If it were you, Yangyang, what would you do to make sure the recipient gets what you mean?
...I would emphasize my true message by repeating it, again and again.
If I had known what I had to pay for making wishes... I've been lied to! We've been lied to!
If I had known what I had to pay for making wishes... I've been lied to! We've been lied to!

Aalto, why are you telling bedtime stories now? Is it time to sleep already?
Ahem, my bad. Old habits die hard. But the big part is coming right up!
One day, out of the blue, every single Court of Savantae member VANISHED!
The last words from that mysterious researcher, the Court of Savantae Committee's Chairman, was this—
You want my research? You can have it! I left everything I gathered in the Court of Savantae's labs. Now you'll just have to find it...
What do you think, Rover? Aren't you curious?
Haha! I knew you'd be into this like I am! But stories aside, we do have an important mission on our hands.
Wait, don't go! We really do have an important mission on our hands!
I suppose the Magistrate of Jinzhou has already told you what we do.
We've set up Resonance Beacons worldwide to monitor the Lament, collecting data in real-time. This is how we predict when the next Lament is happening.
As the saying goes, one miss is as good as a mile. Every single one of the Resonance Beacons is crucial.
After the Court of Savantae researchers disappeared, all of our Resonance Beacons near their facilities were damaged to varying degrees.
Recently, something went wrong with our Lament detection system, and we suspected it had something to do with a damaged Beacon around the area.
That's why we've been sent here, to investigate the case.
While our main goal is to retrieve the lost Resonance Beacon, we also might find some treasures.
Aalto, even Encore can tell what you're up to...
It's called seize the opportunity while I can! You're just too young to get it! Come on, let's go!
This is... No wonder...
Those crazy savants... They were trying to recreate the Retroact Rain...
Wow! A big cluncky monster!
Damn... Those savants never run out of new surprises for us...
The signal's coming from it. Did it swallow our Resonance Beacon?
Looks like peace isn't an option. Guys, brace yourself. We'll need to take it down!
Aalto, we doing it like we usually do?
Of course.
Hehe, then this big guy is Encore's to tackle!
Cosmos, Cloudy, ATTACK!
Phew, job done!
Hehe, Encore is strong! Told ya!
What is the impact of the Refining Tower shutdown on the frequency of the Magnetic Cube?
What is the principle behind it...?
He seems to be immersed in thought, so it's better not to disturb him for now.
He seems to be immersed in thought, so it's better not to disturb him for now.
You showed the little girl your sugar pearl, and asked if she had seen it before.
You showed the little girl your sugar pearl, and asked if she had seen it before.
The little girl shook her head timidly.
The little girl shook her head timidly.
After a tense moment of silence, the little girl seems to have finally made up her mind about a great sacrifice. She offers you her hand, revealing a small piece of candy.

No need to thank me! P-please have fun in Jinzhou!

Well, would you look at that? Didn't know you were so good with kids!
Well, would you look at that? Didn't know you were so good with kids!

Oh right, Baizhi's still waiting for us at the Academy!
Cosmos! Cloudy! You saw anything fun?
Reporting in! Cosmos saw nothing!

What?! Go! Go look again!

He seems to be angry, so it's better not to talk to him for now.
He seems to be angry, so it's better not to talk to him for now.
That's incredible! We ended the game with a tie!
A tie!
Hehe. What do you think, Mister? Did you learn a trick or two about hiding?
Hehe. What do you think, Miss? Did you learn a trick or two about hiding?
You've been visiting quite often lately. Bet you cook a lot in your free time!
Me? I happen to know a thing or two about cooking.
Has Panhua been talking your ear off about proper seasoning techniques? Well, let me give you the real secret to delicious food: preserving the ingredients' natural flavors.
Take Milky Fish Soup for example. It only requires simple ingredients, but with care and dedication, you'll get incredible results.
The fish becomes tender and melt-in-your-mouth, while the soup retains its fresh taste. No need to drown it in seasonings!
In fact, I'm going to bring her a bowl right now and show her how it's done. I'll make her see the difference!
Hmm, I've been trying out a new recipe lately. Well, somewhat new-ish.
Life used to be tough for us before coming to Jinzhou. We had to do whatever we could to feed ourselves.
Our Ma Xiaofang was just a child then, but she was always so kind and selfless. She gave as much of her food to the elderly as she could.
It broke my heart to see her go hungry at times. But one day, I managed to catch a wild rabbit and made a stew with some fresh greens for her. I still remember that smile on her face to this day.
And now, our Xiaofang... Should I call her Chixia now? She's all grown up and even works as a Patroller! She dropped by recently and told me how she missed that stew.
So I thought it would be nice to recreate it and relive those flavors together.
How to make food taste better? Well, buckle up, you're in for a treat.
Heat control, choice of spices, when you should turn up the heat for stir-fry, when to slow cook your stew... Every detail matters.
Mahe would say it's important to get fresh ingredients, and he's right on that, but seasoning is even more important.
At my restaurant, nothing less than perfection is acceptable. Seasoning is crucial for a good dish! Mahe... He just won't get it.
Well, he does make some good fish soup, though...
As someone who's dined at many restaurants, I can say Panhua's Restaurant is the best!
Just look at this food, taste it! If I could, I'd eat here every day!
If you're free, come have tea with this old man. I've got plenty of Jinzhou food tales to share.
You want to know about Panhua and Mahe? There's a lot to tell!
Those two used to run a business together. Their food used to be absolutely amazing.
But they split up because of their different views on cuisine. Instead of breaking up, it's more like each one is sticking to their own path!

Seasonal dishes... You came to the right person. There's a whole tradition about eating the right food for each season. Our ancestors taught us to live in harmony with nature, and that includes our food!
In the winter, you should drink this Caltrop Soup. And when summer comes, get yourself a cup of Shuyun Herbal Tea to cool down.
But no matter when you go to Panhua's Restaurant, you can always order their Poached Chicken.
Nobody makes Poached Chicken like they do!
You go ahead and get busy. It's good for young people to stay busy. When you have some free time, come and have tea with Uncle Li.
Sigh I'm going to be late for work again... Being chased by a giant whale in my dream wore me out. The alarm clock went off a hundred times, and I still didn't hear it...
If only the butterfly nymph were here, she'd definitely scare away that whale...
Ouch! Who left this huge rock in the middle of the road? Ouch... my foot...
This isn't working. I wanted to go to the fairy mountain at sea to get some good luck... With my luck, I might not even see the mountain when I get there...
Hmm... What should I eat next?
Wait. Why is my wallet empty? Where's my money...
Why am I always so unlucky...

My luck shouldn't be this bad, I haven't seen the butterfly nymph yet...
Hehe, I'll let you in on a little secret. You can overhear all kinds of things here.
From big news to juicy gossip, just hang around long enough and you'll know everything there is to know about Jinzhou!
Don't believe me? I myself have a whole list of stories I could share with you.
I tell you, nighttime is when it really gets lively. Everyone's out and about, chatting and relaxing.
You might run into folks from all walks of life, even some big shots you wouldn't see during the day.
If you're hoping to bump into someone, don't miss out on the nightlife here!
Hmm... Umm... How do I open this box...
Eh? No, nothing's wrong. Well, okay, something's wrong...
It's this chest next to me. I found it after a lot of searching, but I can't open it.
How about this, if you can open it, whatever is inside is yours!
Do you think you can open it? If you can, whatever is inside should be rightfully yours!
Yes, the chest right next to me.
I've tried everything, but it's still locked tight.
I love treasure hunting. I went through a lot to bring it back, but now I can't get it open...
It's not that I don't want it, but if you can open it, I should give you a reward.
I'm big on puzzles and treasure hunting. I found this chest that just won't open. I've been trying to unlock it for ages.
But after all this time, I still can't get it open. I've lost interest in what's inside. I just want to see it open!
So, if you can open this chest, whatever's inside is yours!
Alright. Time for a new puzzle. Where's the next one?
How did you open that box? Tell me when you have a moment.
Didn't I also find a treasure map last time?
Where did I put that treasure map...
Yes, yes! I love solving puzzles and treasure hunting. Sometimes I find treasure maps just for fun.
When I find the map I was looking for, I'll show it to you. Maybe you can solve what I couldn't!
I'll tell you once I find the treasure map!
This food is amazing! Panhua's Restaurant truly lives up to its reputation. Delicious and affordable, I never get tired of it!
Oh, when can I have a proper food stall like Panhua's...
I still dream of starting a small stall...
Starting a business is tough... I need more experience and have to take it step by step.

There seems to be a person lying on the ground ahead, is it Sensor? Let's rescue her quickly.

I admire your courage!
See those Sound Dampeners? They were damaged by TDs in the last onslaught.
First, we gotta fix up these three Sound Dampeners, then activate them to take down the TDs that are drawn in.

漂泊者, huh? That's a good name. Unique and impressive!

Next time I run into something tricky, I hope you'll lend me a hand again! Thanks in advance!
Hey, no worries. It's pretty challenging. Even divine power can't nail it in one go.
Maybe you're a bit off today. It happens to everyone.
I still have confidence in you. When you're feeling better, you should give it another shot!
I'll be right here waiting for you.
Back again! Ready to fix those Sound Dampeners and tackle the TDs? Awesome!
Are you ready? We can start whenever you're ready.
Alright, let's get started.
Okay, just take your time.
Hey, is it 漂泊者? Mayday! Mayday! Help me!

I can't handle them alone, so I need your help.

Anyway, just come as quickly as possible. I sent the coordinates to your Terminal!
Thank goodness, you've finally arrived!
Let's hurry up. I've brought the car over, and we'll drive it to the destination.

This is where the red-clothed keep their prey. Glad to meet you. I'm your cellmate.

Those red-clothed use the guise of high-paying jobs to lure people here. This is where they keep their victims.
Just like you, poor kid, I was also tricked and brought here.

Oh no, those bastards changed the lock to a laser one. The key doesn't work!

Don't panic. My observation tells me the laser gate can be opened once you solve the cube over there.
Oh! Yeah, there's a mechanism over there. Looks familiar to the one 漂泊者 solved yesterday.

Not a big deal. We can hear each other clearly from this distance. Just let him tell you how to solve it.
Not a big deal. We can hear each other clearly from this distance. Just let her tell you how to solve it.
You're right! Please, I'm counting on you, Teach 漂泊者!
Well, honestly, I'm more comfortable in this outfit.
Fantastic! Now we have time to get to know each other better. Let me reintroduce myself. I'm Xiaojue, an Exile.
I was just out looking for my missing friends, but then I got lured by a high-paying job and ended up here.
Well, thinking back, it was obviously a fraud! How could one earn such a huge sum just by killing some TDs! I was blinded by greed and got carried away...
Then I was caught by the red-clothed, and they confiscated all the money I earned from that TD-killing job... They even took away my savings!
But it's not all that bad. When I got here, I stumbled upon the weapons my friends used to carry around.
You know, us Exiles always keep our weapons handy, unless something unexpected happens. So the moment I spotted my friends' weapons, I knew they must be here. To save them, I had to...
Calm down, calm down. If I hadn't done this, I wouldn't have gained their trust, and I wouldn't be able to save my friends.
So I joined them, attempting to earn their trust. Fortunately, I'm pretty smooth, and with my knowledge of the surrounding areas, they usually sent me on errands.
...It took me a long time before they completely trusted me. So now, they've started assigning me the task of kidnapping people.
As long as I could kidnap someone, I would have an excuse to come to the prison.
Well, not exactly. Minghu told me to kidnap someone who's smart and strong. In that case, I would have a higher chance of escaping.
That's why he lent me this outfit and told me how to activate those devices.
So I found you! Someone who's smart and strong!
Sorry to have involved you in this because of my advice.
Sorry. But I know where they hide my money and they put your weapons there too!
I'll take you there to get your weapons back. Oh! And please take my money as compensation. Sorry to have you involved.

*snort* Compared to these red-clothed folks, Patrollers are nothing to fear!
My bad! My bosses used to say Patrollers are a bunch of fierce and ruthless guys stopping at nothing to achieve their ends.
But after staying with Minghu for a while, I realized they lied to me!
Minghu didn't treat me poorly just because I'm an Exile. He even showed me the ropes on gaining trust and where to investigate.
Now, with 漂泊者 on board, our operation is bound to run smoother! We should be able to save them soon!

That's an unexpected discovery.
So these apes were injected with something?
Yeah, I'm afraid they were injected with the spore extract, which can control their behavior, making them bloodthirsty and aggressive.
And now, those red-clothed people probably want to use the spore extract on humans...
What! That's bad. We have to rescue them as quickly as possible!
Thank you! Thank you so much for saving my life!

Mr. Minghu, I'll take care of things here. Please go up and save Gousi.

NO! Stay away from me!
I don't want to become a zombie or something!!!
Gousi, are you okay?

Let's get out of here first, and we can talk later.
You and your companions gathered and left the cave.
Do you think you can come and go as you please?
You scammers kidnapped my friends, and I won't let you get away with it!
We won't let you!
Maosan and Gousi rushed towards him but were quickly knocked down.
So, who's next?
We're safe for now. Let's hurry up and leave.
I've already taken photos of crucial evidence, and the Patrol Station will send people to handle it.
Thanks to all of you, I'm still alive. From now on, I won't trust those buy one get ten, one lottery ticket for a Terminal, and doing grocery shopping to earn a house schemes...
Besides, I'll tell everyone in the neighborhood not to believe in these frauds!
Thank you, Mr. Patroller and 漂泊者. I'll try to find my Prince Charming in a genuine way.
Now I know there's no handsome and rich boy with washboard abs who will buy me big rings without even meeting me!
Even if you meet each other, you shouldn't trust those sweet words easily! We'll regularly conduct anti-fraud campaigns. Feel free to join!
Okay, okay, I'll definitely go.
After we go back, I'll talk to the boss and make sure other companions are aware of these tricks.
If we hadn't been so desperate for money to repair our camps, we wouldn't have fallen for this silly trick...
Hey, don't you think this place looks good? There's a natural cave here. Plus, the red-clothed have left. We can make use of this cave. What do you think?
You're right. Let's tell the boss when we're back. It might save us some money.
We owe this to 漂泊者. We barely escaped with our lives. We need to let other companions know and show him respect when coming across 漂泊者.
We owe this to 漂泊者. We barely escaped with our lives. We need to let other companions know and show her respect when coming across 漂泊者.
Thank you, 漂泊者. Thank you for taking those bad guys down and saving our lives. I sent the coordinates of the treasures to your Terminal. Feel free to take them!
Maybe when we get rich, we won't be so easily fooled by these tricks...
Be careful! I can feel something dangerous over there...
Yes, of course. I've already noticed all that you mentioned.
Indeed. You just pointed out a blind spot in my thinking.
Your workshop? That hellish place?
Heh... Stop sweet-talking me. I get it.
Sorry for keeping you waiting. Let's get back to the sundial.
It's a mortise-and-tenon based puzzle box. The missing component in the middle needs to fulfill two entirely different structural requirements at the same time.
Considering its entire structure, this component needs an automatic buckle that goes down on top of an embedded pointer.

I'll draw up a design for you. The parts you'll need can be found in Xiangli's workshop. I've already informed him about it; you'll only need to go fetch the parts in his place. He keeps a boxful of them.
Division of labor is more efficient in getting things done. Besides, I would like to avoid stepping foot in Xiangli's workshop ever again. The mere thought of that place brings me migraines.
Mr. Mortefi, is it the person you were talking to earlier? ...Mr. Xiangli Yao, I think?
Yes. It doesn't take me much effort to figure out this little sundial here, but I do admit talking with Xiangli made it easier.
He's the expert in Automata Mechanics I mentioned earlier. The only Principal Investigator we currently have.
It's a minefield of clutter and chaos. A murky swamp within the Academy walls, as vile and perilous as some primeval forest before the Lament. Any civilized human would find it impossible to stand.
Considering its dreadful conditions, I can't agree more.
How could he choose to work in such terrible condition? It's like willingingly playing a score backwards.
I see. Shall we go and retrieve the parts now, Rover?
What now? It’s almost time, but the candidate is still not settled to send to the mine.
Miss Taoqi has already got so much on her plate. I shouldn’t be troubling her with this...
漂泊者, long time no see. Something the matter?
Oh, did I? I was kind of troubled by the work, so maybe I raised the voice unconsciously.
By the way, 漂泊者, you have been in Jinzhou for a while. I think you are aware of the things around.
I have a favor to ask of you, on behalf of the Ministry of Development.
Friendly citizen... Oh, Mr. Friendly, could you be so friendly as to help me on this?
Here, take a look at this.
Xiaoyu takes out a small glass container, in which some rock fragments are stored.
Xiaoyu takes out a small glass container, in which some rock fragments are stored.
These are some samples of a mineral called Lampylumen, which, after smelting, can be used as a semiconductor material in various industrial scenarios.
And that may be only one aspect of its value.
As of now, my co-workers from Ordnance Division and Defense Division in the Ministry are joining efforts in hope of finding more applicational value of this mineral.
However, the complicated structure of Lampylumen renders experiment and processing very troublesome.
This little bottle of samples is a result of multiple fussy processes.
Luckily, our researchers have found a new direction after countless tries, that is liquefaction, which will allow us to look into some unknown natures of the mineral.
The only problem is that the equipment in our labs cannot provide the condition for appropriate liquefaction. Carrying out the processing there will probably destroy the material’s structure.
But then, it came to our notice that the Tiger's Maw Mine, the mineral’s origin, might possess the key methods and equipment.
So we made an appointment with the Mine, that samples will be tried today, however an emergency meeting dragged our feet.
No. We don’t put off what can be done today. Things will only get trickier if we deal with it tomorrow.
Could you send the samples to the Tiger's Maw Mine for me, if possible? Of course, the Ministry of Development will reward you.
Great. I knew you’d help.
So I’ll take that as a yes.
Oh no. The meeting is about to begin. I have to hurry up.
Take this. That's the sample you are delivering. And this is the Ministry's ID. We're counting on you.
Doctor Hua, have you found him?
Nope. Been everywhere he would show up. Didn’t find him. Just like you.
Uncle Hong has aged. Became less predictable. It’s hard to find him even on an average day.
Let’s keep looking. We can’t afford to have the Refinery Tower offline for too long.
A travelling salesman? The mine is closed for business today. Please come back another day.
Jinzhou is not far from here. You can take some rest there.
You should stop rushing before the guest even say anything. Let him finish.
Oh, a guest from the Ministry. Let me introduce myself. I’m the doctor of the Mine, Huayu.
The tall guy beside me is Lei’li, head of miners here. And this is Modee, an expert of minerals from the Academy.
I heard of the sample appointment betweem the Mine and the Ministry a couple of days ago. Now, what should I call you?
漂泊者 you are. Well, I saw the photo attached in the Ministry’s request, and I thought it was a young girl who could easily get nervous. How come...
I got the message and the photo from Uncle Hong, the senior officer-in-chief here. Look, this is the photo.
You took the photo from Huayu. The girl on it looks nothing like you, who are much colder. You showed the ID to explain.
You took the photo from Huayu. The girl on it looks nothing like you, who are much colder. You showed the ID to explain.
Hm. The ID does belong to Ministry of Development. Then other things are irrelevance. I’ll be straight: the Mine is facing some problem too, regarding the Ministry’s request.
Haha, this thing is legitimate. Maybe there was some little accidents back at the Ministry. Now I’ll be straight: the Mine is facing some problem too, regarding the Ministry’s request.
Modee has more details.
The Refinery Tower at the center of the Mine is offline, but some of our minerals have to be processed with it.
So does the samples from the Ministry. Now the Mine is working on a solution to reboot the Refinery Tower.
Similar events happened before, but our on-site engineers were always quick to fix them and put us back on track.
However, he got injured recently when carrying out maintenance works on other equipment, so he was transferred to Jinzhou for recovery.
And Uncle Hong was due to take up the fixing job. He was responsible for the Refinery Tower back when he was young, so he’s totally competent.
When there were offline events, Uncle Hong was always there to troubleshoot and coordinate our forces to fix the problems.
However, Uncle Hong didn’t show up this time, and we couldn’t find him everywhere in the Mine.
With his absence, the Mine is having all kinds of difficulties dealing with the Refinery Tower.
He’s just slacking off, if I may comment. I bet it exhausted him to work so hard every time there was an event.
Maybe now he’s just hiding somewhere and peeking at us, saying, “won’t you let me rest, little brats?”
I propose we all go back to our places and carry on with our jobs. The Mine has to keep functioning even with the Refinery Tower offline.
He’ll show once he gets his rest.
Clues... The miners said they met Uncle Hong around the transport lorries. We are sending more people to look if he’s there.
More people mean greater possibility. Thank you.
A scrunched paper that reads: The Mine is getting so cold even though it's summer... Miss you, mum.
A scrunched paper that reads: The Mine is getting so cold even though it's summer... Miss you, mum.
A pop magazine with five screaming young girls on the cover. Caption goes “Let’s get lost together!”
A pop magazine with five screaming young girls on the cover. Caption goes “Let’s get lost together!”
A journal with no name specified on title page. The cover is made of cut newspaper.
A journal with no name specified on title page. The cover is made of cut newspaper.
Where could Uncle Hong be? 漂泊者, you’re back.
Sigh. Running around without an aim only brings more trouble to the Mine.
Though the Refinery Tower is offline, most of our production is still running as usual.
To keep the production running, Lei’li, Modee, and others have to go back to their places.
However, the Refinery Tower’s issue must be addressed.
Did you find anything around the transport lorries?
Maybe written by the miners. Though the Tiger's Maw Mine is not far from Jinzhou, they are constantly kept from going home due to the work.
People who visit me out of sickness often talk about the pancakes their mothers make.
Seems like a book popular with miners. It is only things like this that give life to the Tiger's Maw Mine, where there is nothing but buzzing machines.
However, I don’t think Uncle Hong can be a fan of rock and roll, given his poor hearing.
A cover made of newspaper. I think I’ve seen this somewhere.
If I’m not wrong, this is Uncle Hong’s journal. He always takes it with him.
This helps me make sense of things.
As he ages, his memory starts to show deviations. He starts to forget things.
It’s like a rubber that keeps erasing his past.
He asked me of methods to slow down the fading of memories. I taught him two day-to-day tricks as supports to the therapy.
One is keywords, and the other is journaling.
Keywords help him to find the general picture, while journals help him to correctly walk every step.

Our core mission at the Pioneer Association is to push the boundaries of humanity's understanding through exploration. We ignite curiosity and embrace a trailblazing mindset, inviting adventurers from all backgrounds to join us.
Our team consists of top journalists, writers, photographers, and expeditioners from around the world.
Pioneers are free to plan their own expeditions with our support, and we offer platforms for publishing high-quality content such as magazines, podcasts, and books.

Pioneers also have the opportunity to receive special outdoor tools essential for their journeys. As they venture further, these tools can become invaluable aids in exploration.
