Children. One by one. Take your time. No need to rush.
Let's start with Xinxin. What does Xinxin want to show the teacher?
Mr. Bosong! I finished my essay! I'm the first again!
Good work, Xinxin. You always finish fast. I'll read them carefully.
What about Ling'er? How's her essay coming along? Xinxin said before that Ling'er liked being alone and didn't seem to talk to everyone.
So, if you encounter any difficulties, or if you have something that you don't understand or don't know who to share with, you can pen a letter to Ms. Yuyi. Sounds good?
Well. When it comes to Ling'er...
She doesn't like to talk and likes to keep things to herself. Her parents passed away while she was young and there's no one to take care of her.
Yuyi's used to worry for Ling'er the most. During the holidays, she always asked me about how's Ling'er doing in school and in life.
She said that she loved these children the most, and always worried about if they were healthy and getting the stuff they needed.
When she left, she entrusted these children to me, but I could never be as thoughtful as she is. I really don't know if I can take care of them well... sigh...
Alright, children, it's time for class. Please be quiet.
You may play all you want after class. But during class, please listen carefully.
If you ever catch yourself snoozing off. It's okay. You can stand up for a while to keep yourself awake. Learning requires patience. We can take it slow, okay?
Oh, these kids... I wonder what Yuyi would do if she were here...
Ah, you're still here. Yuyi... She's my lover...
Both she and I attended this school. After she had graduated, she became a teacher. She had always treated these students as her children.
She's a great teacher, but fate can be cruel... Now, I just want to fulfill her last wish and help these children grow up well.
I wonder if these children will remember Ms. Yuyi when they grow up...
Yay! I'm the first one to turn in my essay again! Now I'm the first place again!
This time I wrote an amazing adventure story. It's so interesting!
Do you want to read it as well? Come on, let's read it!
Hmm... Mr. Bosong always tells me to play with everyone more.
But I really like to play with Ms. Yuyi...
But I haven't seen Ms. Yuyi for a long time. I wonder how she's doing... Ms. Yuyi is a very good teacher.
But- but Mr. Bosong is also very kind! Alright, I guess I can join Xinxin and her friends next time if it can keep Mr. Bosong from worrying.
Mr. Bosong, you look unhappy.
Look, Mr. Bosong is over there. He always alone at night.
Though I'm used to this solitude, it feels different now.
Did we make him angry? But recently, Ling'er has been a good girl. Or is it because Ms. Yuyi hasn't come back yet?
But Mr. Bosong said that Ms. Yuyi had gone on an official trip.
Then Ms. Yuyi will come back in a while, right? Why is Mr. Bosong still sad?
Is the reason why Mr. Bosong is sad because Mr. Bosong is actually afraid of being alone? I see it now!
Ms. Yuyi, Ms. Yuyi, please come back soon, so Mr. Bosong won't be sad when he's alone.
This guy packs a serious punch. It's already so powerful in my hands when I'm just an ordinary person. Now, if I was a Resonator…
Careful. Tacetite weapons are not so safe to operate.
Rest assured. I’ll take out those monsters before it blows up in my face!
The Ministry of Development once designed a weapon for non-Resonator units to combat Tacet Discords…
As non-Resonators lacked the necessary Forte to control the weapon, and prolonged exposure to Tacetite energy posed health risks, designers limited its output for safety reasons.
That's why the weapons couldn't operate at full power.

After taking over as General, I revamped the Midnight Ranger's recruitment tactics. Our primary combat units now consist of Resonators, with a significant decrease in non-Resonator members who have been reassigned to support roles.
I still remember the admirable courage in those ordinary people's eyes, as they volunteered to join the military… but I cannot let more unnecessary casualties happen.
The plan is simple. We will use the cliffs as a boundary to divide the battlefield into two.
Our ranged units will secure the high ground while our ground forces charge through the narrow valley.
Meanwhile, we will deploy Resonators to the Suspended Ruins, where most of the Tacet Discords are located.
Squads two and three will flank while General Geshu leads Squad one to break their front line.
Our goal is to shift from defense to offense and disrupt their strategies. Everything is at stake here.
In a word, it's victory or death.
Our strategic plan was crafted 3 years ago, taking into account the terrain in Norfall Barrens. Its value remains crucial today.
But now, our enemies are even stronger than before.
There could be unknown risk factors… We must devise a new plan for the current situation.
General, where did you go...
Wonder why there's still no reply...
Hello there, stranger. Are you a Midnight Ranger? Could you do this old man a favor and check why General hasn't approved my return application?
General promised to let me come back and visit my comrades.
Look, I brought a bunch of flowers for Qiu.
I've told them General has already given me permission, but they still won't let me through! Why won't they listen?
Young man, could you kindly take these flowers to him for me?
Young lady, could you kindly take these flowers to him for me?
If it weren't for them stopping me, I'd want to visit them in person and tell them I haven't forgotten about them.
That's great. Thank you so much.
You put the flowers in front of the tombstone…
Hello there, stranger. Are you a Midnight Ranger? Could you do this old man a favor and check why General hasn't approved my return application?
Delivered what? Are you here to tell me the approval has gone through?!
When did you come back? How's everything going?
That's wonderful. I hope Qiu can sense how much I miss him.
Hello there, stranger. Nice to make your acquaintance. I can tell you're not from Jinzhou, are you?
I've been stationed in Jinzhou for a good while. Sometimes, I watch the passersby. Eventually, I can naturally tell who's a local and who isn't with just a glance!
Don't tease me. In my entire life, the two things I'm most proud of are landing every shot and never forgetting a face.
By the way, could you lend me a hand and deliver these flowers to someone? I can't leave my post right now. Just take them to The Lion from our regiment.
Oh, indeed. How did you know? I've already gathered the flowers, and all you need to do is take them to her.
Even though we called her The Lion back in the days on the battlefield, and she is still as brave and carefree as a boy, I know she loves these beautiful flowers.
Hm? Where are the flowers? I remember seeing them this morning!
You put the flowers in front of the tombstone…
Hey, you're back so soon! Did you find my flowers? I need to send them to The Lion.
How's it going? Did The Lion like it?
What's the matter? She didn't like them? That shouldn't be the case. All the flowers I picked were her favorites…
Well, I'll try something different next time. Anyway, thanks for your help!
Really? That's fantastic! Thanks for your trouble! Now I can stand guard in peace.
Hello there, stranger. Are you a Midnight Ranger? Can you go up from here?
What? Don't play tricks on me. In my entire life, the two things I'm most proud of are…
How... how do you know so many details?
How do you know them? Did we really meet before?
Hold on... I could’ve sworn I don’t know you, but something about you feels so familiar… I just can't recall.
No wonder Santong kept nagging me to keep a diary and I got so annoyed, saying “What the use of keeping one?”
Whenever I shared a joke I learned with him, he laughed like he had to force it, as if he'd heard it many times before!
My memory has become muddy...
No, I can't go on like this. I need to cure my forgetfulness.
Nonetheless... These flowers for Shiying— I might need to ask you to deliver them for me.
You put the flowers in front of the tombstone…
I can't leave you here alone. It's too dangerous. Please come back with me!
All my comrades are here. I'm not going anywhere!
Nice to meet you. I'm Santong, and this is my grandpa.
I asked my grandpa where he went every day, and he mentioned meeting up with his old friends.
Only now do I realize he's been coming here daily! I just wanted to convince him to return to Jinzhou, but he wouldn't listen. So frustrating!
I hope he hasn't caused you any trouble. I apologize on behalf of my grandpa.

No, I have to stay with them. I promised them, so I have to keep my word.
Stop being stubborn, grandpa! You’re trying to enter a military facility! You're no longer in service and you’re obstructing the military officers!
I did NOT obstruct anyone! I didn't even try breaking into it! I was just standing here! You kids... Can't you kids just let this old man have his peace?
I won't cause any trouble. I just want to spend a little more time with them.
We promised we'd always be friends and stick together, but they weren't as fortunate as me. Let me stay here and have a chat with them. Is that too much to ask?
Alright, as long as you're happy...
But, if you can't find your way home or cause any trouble for the soldiers or Patrollers, no matter what you say, I'll take you home, okay?
Well, if it isn't Rover! Long time no see!
How do I know your name? That's strange. Sorry, young man.
How do I know your name? That's strange. Sorry, young lady.
How did you know I was about to send flowers to my friends?
I wanted to head to the cemetery and give this bouquet to Yuandong. It was only when I got there that I realized civilians couldn't get access to the cemetery anymore.
Can you go there? It might be too much trouble for you.
Alright, thanks for your help. Can you pass a message to Yuandong?
Really? Did I trouble you before? Sorry, I'm getting forgetful...
Thanks for lending a hand. Can you pass a message to Yuandong?
His granddaughter has joined the Branch of Resonmedical Science at the Academy, so his unfulfilled wish is finally realized.
You put the flowers in front of the tombstone and informed Yuandong about his granddaughter...
You're back so soon. It feels like you just left. Was your delivery smooth?
Fantastic. When he smells the fragrance of these flowers, he'll know I miss him.
Yuandong, you used to say our home is right beneath our feet. Now, this place has truly become the home for your family.
You can rest assured, guarding them here…
Ah, there you are. It's been a long time since our paths crossed.
Of course! You're Lee from next to Santong's place, right? How could I forget you? Why are you here? On leave?
Hm? Wait a minute, no... Come closer. Let me take a good look.
Almost mistook you, sorry. Now I see clearly. You're Yao from the Ministry of Development.
Am I right? I didn't get your name wrong, did I?
Oh, so you're really Lee. Sorry, seems like my eyes are getting worse as well.
Since you're still around, can you do me a favor? Can you go to the cemetery and place these flowers for me?
I knew it. I couldn't have mistaken you for someone else.
Why are you here? Are you here to maintain the front-line defenses again? You've been working hard to give us a peaceful life. Thank you.

Great! Thank you! When they smell this flower, they know they are still being missed.

I wanted to say…
Y-yes, thank you for your help.

Great, thank you! When they smell this flower, they know they are still being missed.
Well, well, look who’s here. Chixia, back at it with the deliveries, eh?
Nah, that makes me sound like a delivery person. Besides, I’ve got a whole bunch of other stuff on my plate, you know? But hey, I’m here to ask you to check out this recipe.
Haha, but I truly owe you big time for lending a hand. You’re the reason those elderly folks with mobility issues get their goods on time. Thanks!
You’re always on the go, I see. You’re always there to help, whether it’s on patrols or off duty. I suppose deciphering this recipe is just another one of your good deeds?
Well, yeah... But fun fact, it’s Auntie Panhua who gave me this recipe.
What? Is she in trouble? Hand over the recipe!
After listening to your explanation, Mahe scrutinizes the old recipe.
After listening to your explanation, Mahe scrutinizes the old recipe.
Their dynamic is something else, like straight out of a Hero Play, you know? She’s all caring, and he’s all caring, but she’s playing it cool like she doesn’t care. You catch my drift?
Oh yeah! That’s right! Didn’t realize you had such a knack for summarizing. You must be a big fan of Hero Plays, am I right?
Never mind. Relationships are like tangled webs, even I can’t untangle them!
Of course! I’m like a walking encyclopedia for all things in Jinzhou! Worries and woes, they’re all part of the package when dealing with relationships!
...Ah, I see. This recipe seems to be quite old. It uses old-fashioned aliases instead of the ones we’re familiar with, making it tricky to decipher.
Let me see... The red gems here must be Gemberries. Sweet roots are Caltrops, and there’s also Kudzu, Honeysuckles... Lucky for you, I’ve got all these ingredients. I’ll sort them out for you later.
Absolutely! Uncle Mahe’s the go-to guy for anything and everything in Jinzhou. Not only food ingredients, he can get you many strange things!
If there’s anything you wanna buy, just come take a look.
Chixia, you’re being too kind. It’s entirely all thanks to everyone in the neighborhood supporting my business. If you need anything, just let me know.
But here’s the snag: the recipe calls for water from the Monkvyrid, and there’s this other ingredient called golden handle spoon. Honestly, I’m clueless about these two.
I know every food alias in the book, and these two are clearly not food ingredients.
I’m not good at cooking, but this recipe looks like it could be a medicinal cuisine or a chowder because it has many different ingredients in small amounts. What’s your take?
Maybe...? I got it! If it’s a medicinal recipe, we can go ask Koko at Shifang Pharmacy! She’s all about that medicinal recipe life, so she might just have the hookup.
Thanks for the inspiration! Uncle Mahe, how much are these ingredients? I’ll cover the bill.
Hey, they’re free. You’ve been an enormous help, and I appreciate it. Plus, I have a thing for Panhua... er, for what Panhua wants to make. Count me in for a taste, alright?
You betcha! If Auntie Panhua whips this up, you’re getting a front-row seat to taste it!
Shiyu... Well, she's a nice girl. Hard-working. But you can tell she's keeping a lot to herself.
She's trying to look out for everyone, but it's not that easy.
You say she's into liondances now? Haha, it's good to have a new interest.
Next time when the Liondance Troupe has a performance, I'll give her a day off to watch it.
When Debiao was young, he loved to spar with people. Then, I don't know what had happened, he looked so depressed when I found him after I had returned from the army.
But now he's more active, and he trains hard every day. He'll be able to beat me sooner or later.
He's still obsessed with challenging me to a duel. He's lost thirty times already...
But he almost got me this time. He's improving.
This kid, Debiao, he's lost forty times, but he still wants to fight me!
This unwillingness to admit defeat, it's good, he needs to practice more!
Here's to a world of discoveries and wonders! Hello! Welcome to the Pioneer Association's Jinzhou Branch.
Of course. One moment please, we're connecting to your Terminal.
Me? I'm the receptionist here. My job is to help our members in Jinzhou, and bring in new ones when I can!
Oh, and we're now accepting pre-orders for our new merchandise. What do you say, wanna snag one for yourself?
May the world unfold before your eyes, looking forward to seeing you next time.
The Pioneer Association, formerly known as the Post-Lament Geological Society, is dedicated to expanding humanity's knowledge of the world.
We record and share the progress of human civilization's revival and reconstruction.
Our skilled photographers are always out capturing the world's latest marvels!
Do you know the adventure stories of the Icebreakers? They are legends in the history of the Pioneer Association, my idols!
On the polar regions, up the volcanoes, deep in great rifts, and across the wetlands... their footprints are spread across every corner of the world. This is what adventurers should be like.
As written on the front page of Tidal Geography: Go see the world and witness history in the making.
Go see the masterpieces of humanity, paintings, architecture, and inventions, and find joy in the journey.
The seniors always tell me to wait a little longer. I guess it's because I don't have the resonance ability that they never took me on the expeditions.
But there are also members of the Icebreakers who discovered their Resonance in times of crisis. Perhaps it's the same for me.
You'll never know if you never try.
I've tried every way, but I can't persuade him. What should I do... Rover, you came at the right time. Help me think of a solution.
It's about my junior, Zhuyi. He recently joined the Pioneer Association and is now working as an intern photographer.
According to the regulations, new members are required to participate in the regular Fireside Chats to share and learn the history and culture of the Pioneer Association.

The recent adventure story was about the Icebreakers, who ventured into places far and between, like the distant polar oceans, the revived volcanoes, and the Great Rift Valley after the Lament occurred.
They reported about nature's warning signs that they spot around the world and became the first witnesses of countless powerful Tacet Discord.
After hearing these stories, Zhuyi suddenly became restless and applied to the Association to join the next expedition to the unchartered danger zones.
I'm worried that he's moving too fast and might make the mistakes I made before.
To be honest, when I was young, I was just as hotheaded as him. Always at the forefront of the team.
Later, in one of the missions, I rushed forward without properly surveying the terrain and accidentally fell into a cave.
As a result, I injured my thigh, and since then had to gradually retire from the field. Now I'm starting to think about transferring to support.
What if he makes mymistake again?
Rover, if you have a solution, you must tell me.
Photography is like magic. Click. And you freeze a moment in time.
There has been an arms race of photography gadgets. But, at the end of the day– Isn't it down to who uses it? My only criterion for a gadget is that it does the job.
Hello! Are you also here to submit to Tidal Geography of the Pioneer Association?
Well... If you don't mind, could you take a look at the submission I prepared this time?
I started making submissions not long ago, and I don't know if everyone likes my photos.

Thank you. The publisher started a new column called Return to the Front Tide in collaboration with big-shot photographers of the New Federation and the Pioneer Association. It's open for public submission regularly.
There's no requirement for experience and themes, which means even a nobody photographer like me can take a shot.
I heard that the selected photos will be used for image reconstruction using AI to restore the scenes of the world before the Lament.
We can see the former glory of the skyscrapers from the remnants, and what used to be a lustrous sea of flowers from the withered petals.
Just like magic. Takes everyone back to the past.
*sobbing*...
What's wrong, girl? Tell your sister what's wrong!
The work is not easy recently... Hello, what can I do for you?
Curses...! We took the same old verified path as before, and still we got attacked!
Stop your whining. With no end to this fog, those TDs have only gotten more ruthless.
Should I go gather some more Angelica and send them over? If we already have enough, we can just use it as our daily supply.
Hey, have you heard about the phantoms? All big, dark, and gloomy...
Cut that out, all right? And talk like a normal person... Who are you trying to scare?
Got you scared? I know you more than you think I do.
Tsk. I go out with the scavenging team all the time. I've even seen the Mourning Aix, what's a blob of shadow gonna do?
Okay, then we'll go check it out tomorrow night.
On second thought... Hasn't it been getting more dangerous out there lately?
Ooh, getting scared now are ya?
Laugh it up all you want. Me, scared? Let's go then, I'm not afraid of anything!
Every single day, it's been fog and nothing but fog... When is it ever going to end?
This weather pretty much sums up my life. No end in sight and no clear direction.
I think... this fog's got something to do with that Mourning Aix!
You sure?
Every time the Aix flies into the fog, there's always thunder and lightning. My friends and I have all seen it...
Magnetic Cube frequency... proton radius... spin quantum number... suspension dynamics...
I'm in the pursue of the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics... it's just I'm met with some bottleneck.
The ultimate Mechanics is calling me from inside the pit. It's so close, yet so unreachable...
Ha, can't you see I'm obstructed?
You see the block here? Someone locked the entrace with a puzzle.
Is this how far I, the great Mi'zhi can go?
No, I will not stagnate on the path to the ultimate Magnetic Cube Mechanics! And you, your presence here must be the turning point!
Yes, you! The destined tide-turner!
Why hesitate?
No. Engineers don't trap people! Look, this is my identification.
Wait, please...
If you can help me overcome this, you will be rewarded the access to treasure!
Shiny, sparkly, authentic treasure!
As you know, treasure means nothing to me. What only interests me is Magnetic Cube Mechanics.
Refreshingly answered!
You don't think I'm going to cheat, do you? To assure you even more, I work here. You can always come and find me.
All right that's the deal. Let's go, we'll see the puzzle.
You see, some unstable obstacles can be destroyed.
Identify them to progress even more!
Mi'zhi, it was all thanks to Rover that you wasn't killed this time. Don't do that again.
You made me afraid...
Miss Qingshu, I promise I won't do that again.
Because in my heart, there is something more important that Magnetic Cube Mechanics now...
When did you learn that...
I only knew what was truly meant for me after I nearly lost my life.
The pursue for Magnetic Cube Mechanics is endless, but I shouldn't lose sight of the people beside me for that.
You by my side, Miss Qingshu, and all these seemingly bland days. These are the real precious things. I learned that after I almost lost them.
Mi'zhi, it was all thanks to Rover that you wasn't killed this time. Don't do that again.
You made me afraid...
Miss Qingshu, I promise I won't do that again.
Because in my heart, there is something more important that Mechanics now...
When did you learn that...
I only knew what was truly meant for me after I nearly lost my life.
The pursue for Magnetic Cube Mechanics is endless, but I shouldn't lose sight of the people beside me for that.
You by my side, Miss Qingshu, and all these seemingly bland days. These are the real precious things. I learned that after I almost lost them.
Hey ya! Long time no see, 漂泊者. How’s it going?
Well, just calling to see what you’re up to. Are you free now?
No worries at all! It’s no biggie, really. Well, not as huge as diving into those tokens, that’s for sure.
Remember my promise? About treating you to a nice meal? Well, since I’ve got a few days off and figured you’d be around, now’s the perfect time to cash in on that promise and invite you out.
So, what do you say? How about this Jinzhou Speedster takes you on a culinary adventure at Auntie Panhua’s Restaurant?
The Maocai she cooks is an explosion of spice and flavor! One gulp and you’ll feel the buzz in your bones!

You know, that’s what I like. But hey, no pressure if spicy isn’t your thing. Auntie Panhua’s a culinary genius, whipping up many treats like Poached Chicken, Rising Loong... you name it! It’s all authentic Jinzhou cuisine!
Didn’t expect you to be a foodie too. Next time I’m on patrol and find something tasty, I’ll make sure you get a taste.
So, we’re on for a date, right?
Let’s meet at Panhua’s Restaurant on Gourmet Street. Time-wise, just let me know before you’re ready.
I’ll be eagerly waiting to hear from you!
That was really close...
Yeah, thank goodness we were saved.
It's too dangerous.
Found it. It's not too far away, I should check it out.
Found it. It's not too far away, I should check it out.
Hello there, how can I help...? Oh, Ms. Chixia?
What brought you here? Picking up medicine for someone else, or feeling under the weather? Any injuries? Have you seen a doctor? Need any prescriptions?
Oh no, it’s just a habit I’ve picked up from running this pharmacy. Sometimes people struggle to describe their symptoms, so I ask a lot of questions to get a clearer picture.
Yeah... Hold up! Rover, what’s that supposed to mean? Obviously, I...
Obviously, just like this gentleman said, once you get carried away, you forget your own safety!
Obviously, just like this lady said, once you get carried away, you forget your own safety!
Ms. Chixia, you’re the reigning champ on our pharmacy’s medication leaderboard. While I wholeheartedly appreciate your support, topping the charts won’t result in any discounts here.
Seriously, don’t you have work to do? Who keeps tabs on this stuff anyway!
Alright, let’s cut to the chase. 漂泊者 and I are here to get you to check out this recipe Auntie Panhua handed us.
Essence Medley Soup? I felt like I heard it from my grandmother or someone of her generation.
Really? C’mon, wrack your brain for it! Uncle Mahe thinks it’s more of a medicinal cuisine than a regular dish.

Let's see... Caltrops, Kudzu, Honeysuckles, a handful of Gemberries, and some pulled poultry breast. Simmer with water from the Monkvyrid. Once it's boiled, give it a stir with a golden-handled spoon... Water from the Monkvyrid? Isn't that the medicinal soup made from Coriolus, Perilla, and Lemongrass?

Who knew the medicinal soup could serve as a base... In a way, it leans towards medicinal cuisine. But with so many ingredients, wouldn’t it dilute the medicinal effect? There’s always something new to learn in dietary therapy.
No need to go through all that trouble. Remember where you are? A pharmacy! I’ve got some pre-made medicinal soup right here.
Good medicine often tastes bitter, so I've been thinking of ways to make it more palatable.
By making it into medicinal cuisine, we preserve its healing qualities while getting rid of the bitterness, so it’s enjoyable for everyone.
This recipe seems ancient. The Monkvyrid water is an old term from pharmacies, referring to that medicinal soup. Hold on, I’ve got the pre-made stuff for you.
Oh, and here are some new recovery and synthesis potions. Consider them a bonus.
But even with potions to treat your injuries, stay safe out there, alright? Always keep your guard up when exploring.
Don’t be like Chixia, just barging in and scaring everyone.
Are you for real right now? My reputation as the Jinzhou Speedster is...
I-I had no other choice! How can I remember all those safety rules when there are bad guys coming at me? They’d only slow me down... Okay, okay, next time, I’ll watch out!
So, are you two heading back to help Auntie Panhua with this Essence Medley Soup? If so, count me in on learning that recipe too!
Just let Auntie Panhua know. It should be cool for you to join in!
But there's still one last piece of the puzzle to crack: the golden-handled spoon. If we whip up the soup without figuring out what that is about, the flavor might not hit the mark, right?
Wait, isn’t the golden handle spoon that big pyrite spoon from Uncle Wei’s shop? I thought you both knew.
Seriously? No way! Who’d have guessed that!
Oops, looks like I gotta step down from my role as the Jinzhou encyclopedia. I’ve never even heard of that pyrite spoon!
Haha, no worries. I spotted that spoon the last time I dropped off medicine at Uncle Wei’s and asked out of curiosity.
Why does the best weapon maker in Jinzhou have a big pyrite spoon tucked away? Well, I’m counting on you to solve that mystery, along with the last step of the recipe.
You know- if the Midnight Rangers protect the city from the outside, then we at the Defense Division support the city by maintaining its stability from the inside.
Everything you see, from the shield over our heads to the high-precision instruments deployed on every street, are the work of the people who came before us.
I wonder when I will be able to catch up with them, especially Senior Taoqi!
Although She has a nonchalant air around her like she's trying to slack off, she always notices the things that everyone else overlooks.
I am wondering if Taoqi's slow response is deliberate.
This way, there is more time to see what is happening around you. Should I also try to learn it?
The question that's been troubling me all day is finally answered: the time when our brain is at peak activity is different for each individual.
Maybe there is some truth to it. My brain usually comes alive only after the sun sets.
Sometimes a complete new idea defense setup would just come to me after dark.
It's difficult to set up a defense that's watertight all around. I'm constantly put in a dilemma where I put heavy forces in one place and expose ourselves in another place.
But if I leave a deliberate opening in the setup to guide the enemy's attack in another direction, you'd be more targeted and prepared in your defense.
Hehe, my idea is not bad, right? This theory is not only limited to Jinzhou. It can also be extended to other places.
But I've sensed I didn't come up with the idea myself. I got the inspiration elsewhere. Perhaps, in the textbook, or in one of Taoqi's sharing sessions?
Well, let's try this direction first.
Brother Bai, I'm back again. I have a new idea about the Tacetite weapons. You must hear me out this time.
You mentioned before that the Resonators can activate the energy in the Tacetite and convert it into a new form they can control.
That's why the Tacetite weapons are so compatible with the Resonators, even though all current Tacetite weapons use only a small chunk of Tacetite in the core module.
So, if we could process the Tacetite into raw materials for other components, the Tacetite content of the entire weapon would increase dramatically!
They say that a quantitative change can lead to a qualitative change. Maybe a weapon like this can deliver a fatal blow to the Tacet Discord.
A quantitative change leading to a qualitative change is not just about the quantity. Have you factored in the weight?
The weight distribution of the weapon will affect the accuracy, speed, and even the effective range of the attack.
The current designs have an even weight distribution compatible with most wielder's habits, which was approximated by the Ordnance Division through rounds of trials and modeling.
Instead of strategizing on paper out of pure imagination.
It's normal for ordinary people to be curious about the unknown Tacetite weapon, but if you're serious about studying it–
–you should master the basics of Tacetite before you get ahead of yourself.
Like this, asking me every day, the work in my hands is almost too busy.
Ah, peace at last. Finally, I can have some time for me to think about the iteration of the Tacetite weapons.
The most important in research is to block out frequent external disruptions. As a rookie researcher, I had the opportunity to collaborate with Mortefi before.
He said that the research process is like playing a musical piece, the melody should be coherent and uninterrupted by any distractions from the audience.
Though the grand tower of Tacetite studies is almost established, there are still two clouds obscuring the sky above it.
Not far away, you can vaguely see a few small dark clouds drifting. What we have to do is to clear the clouds and let the sun shines through.
After hearing this, it's like I was awakened from a daze and suddenly I found a path forward.
Isn't it the reason why I set foot on this path to see the views behind those dark clouds? At the very least, I need to try to keep up.
So that I can reach the highest point of the Tacetite building with everyone.
The old neighbors around here consider me a fix-it guy when it comes to daily items. Although, I'm not sophisticated enough to repair high-end items.
As long as it's a day-to-day thing found around the house, I can always fix them when you come to me.
The elders are used to living in frugality and don't have a habit of throwing away things that are old or broken. That's why some out-dated electrical parts can only be found here.
Hey, I gradually grew attached while repairing these old gadgets. After all, we're all a bit nostalgic.
Oh, you're speaking of Wenmo. He's my son. That boy always likes to be alone, tinkering with mechanical things.
He has been watching me repair these things since he was a child, and perhaps he has memorized the steps just by watching.
Sometimes, I have to read an instruction manual for some of the more complex items customers bring in, but he'd be able to understand and start dismantling the structure in a few minutes.
Once I caught him completely disassembling an item to its last gear. I panicked so hard as I thought there had been no way to restore it. But he put it back together in moments like it was brand new.
He also fixed those things. So, I let him do his things from then on. Later, he became increasingly more sophisticated with it.
Maybe one day he can become a great inventor. And I'll be known as the father of a great inventor.
This repair shop has also been on this street for many years. Maybe it's eligible to be a AAAA tourist destination in Jinzhou in another few decades.
Well, I'm not ashamed to crack this to you: I opened this shop because I had no talents. My late grandfather was once a prominent craftsman in the Ministry of Development.
I didn't match his talents and had to live under his halo as the grandson of the celebrity craftsman.
Like If it's him, he can definitely do it..., but I can't be as perfect as my father.
Later, I left the Ministry of Development and opened this shop. Now I'm content with this life of fixing things for the folks of Jinzhou.
But the talent of Wenmo was as high as his grandfather's, and he may be able to accomplish what I have not done in the future.
I really hope to see that day.
Welcome to Wenshu Repair, we fix your broken things and broken backs. How may I be of help, sir?
A top-heavy structure. Will it be more solid?
That thing is too high. I can't see the design of the other side. Oh how I wish to grow taller.
Wow, a device I've never seen before, what would happen if I disassembled it?
Big brother, are you also interested in these tall protective walls and mechanical devices?
Big sister, are you also interested in these tall protective walls and mechanical devices?
I am too, but I am too short. I can't see some things clearly, so I can only come here every day.
I remember their shapes and structures little by little, Big brother, you can also tell me what you know.
I remember their shapes and structures little by little, Big sister, you can also tell me what you know.
Because the Moon-chasing Festival is coming soon, I like the colorful lanterns hanging on the street and the lively lantern riddle activities.
But sometimes the weather would be difficult during Moon-chasing Festivals, and the lanterns hanging on the street would be easily blown away because they were too light.
So I was thinking if I could mimic the devices invented by the Ministry of Development and create a special shield for the lanterns
So that we don't need to worry about the weather during the Moon-chasing Festival. But this is a secret between you and me. Don't tell others.
I want to give everyone a surprise.
Big brother, you are here again, shh... wait a moment.
Big sister, you are here again, shh... wait a moment.
I'm at a crucial step in the disassembly, if I messed up the order, it can never be restored.
Oh no, gotta head back, or my dad's gonna get mad at me, Let's play some other time.
Oh, you're... You're that...
Right, right. I remember now. It was all thanks to you.
Zhiyuan told me about you. I must have influenced that kid to want to join the army.
But in any case, thanks to you and that little girl, he got a good dose of reality.
Now, I won't stop him. I'm actually glad he's found something he wants to do.
Hualin and I will give him lessons every now and then.
Even if he can't join Midnight Rangers, at least he'll be able to protect himself.
Huaijin, please be alright...
Huaijin, Huaijin is my... uh, my childhood friend!
I haven't heard from him since I last saw him.
He said he was going to join the Midnight Rangers, but his name wasn't on the recruit list...
And now I can't reach him at all... Did something happen to him?
Maybe he's fine... Yeah, he's fine, he's fine.
I come every day to check. If Huaijin's name's not here, he must be fine.
Shh, keep it down. Mom won't hear me if it's too loud.
Right! Mom is a very impressive Midnight Ranger. She's taken down tons of Tacet Discords!
I come here every night to talk to her.
Grandpa says this is the only place where Mom can hear me.
So, every night, I come here and tell her what happened during the day.
Hello? Can I help you?
Nothing really. Just keeping my daughter company.
Just like everyone else here, being here makes me feel closer to her.
Whew... Finally done. Oh, hi there.
I was just helping this gentleman write a eulogy.
I'm a bit of a writer, so I sometimes help the elderly or injured soldiers here by writing things for them.
There are letters, there are eulogies... There are wills...
The soldiers never know when their time's up. I can understand that.
Sorry, I was just asking this friend to help me write a eulogy for my fallen comrade...
No worries, it's over now. Are you here to visit an old friend?
Yeah, I come here every day to pay my respects to my comrades who fell to the Tacet Discords and the Exiles.
Though often filled with hatred and anger, I stand here as just a broken shell.
The fingers on my injured hand are useless... Can't even hold a pen to write. How pathetic.
Hey? You must be that Rover. How are you?
No, no, don't worry. I just got off work and decided to pay a visit.
There are names I know here... they're lonely souls, so I visit them from time to time.
And as you can see, there are lots of seniors here. If anything happens, I'll be around to help out.
Even though I'm off duty, as long as I'm wearing this uniform, I'm still a Patroller, and I have a duty to protect people.
Hello, are you that Rover? Pleasure to meet you.
Oh I almost forgot. I'm a researcher from Huaxu Academy.
Mr. Mortefi instructed to me to stay here and test the power of those Explosive Spears. I’m just getting ready to do the previous test another time.
By the way, do you want to join me, Rover? You’re a pro now, aren’t you?
Tell me if you’d like to challenge it again. The goal is to protect the three Sound Emulators against Tacet Discords.
Yes, yes. Let me calculate the explosion range now... Oh, don’t mind me. Carry on.
Hm, perfect. The data should suffice now.
Come on! What are you waiting for?! Punch him again!
Here he comes!
What a swing, that's gotta hurt...
You call that a punch? Just give up already!
You two done yet? Get it over with.
This one's pretty!
And so is this one! It's a limited edition.
See anything else you like?
No, these will do for now. When are doing it?
The night after tomorrow. We jump them before they reach the city!
Sweet! But, Qizi... what's the point of snatching these dresses if we can't wear them?
Are we just going to store them inside a closet and stare at them the whole day?
Don't worry, I've got it all planned out. There's gonna be a banquet in the city next week. We change into those dresses, sneak in, and enjoy ourselves.
I love it! How about we get Sisi and Xihsi to tag along?
Fine by me. The more manpower, the greater of our chances.
No way what you're making is authentic Jinzhou cuisine.
The fragrance of ingredients in their own outweighs any kind of seasoning.
How can you eat anything without seasoning? I know I can't, especially with the amount of seasonings I use. How do you even find fragrance in ingredients when there's practically none?
Oh, I wouldn't jump into assumptions just yet. Wait till you try out this dish.
Ooh, I want some too!
How about this? We take the same fish, each make a dish out of it, and you be our judge.
I'm in!
Gladly. I'll show you what I've got.
How many times do I have to tell you, the Chief is not our boss, it's Fiver.
I remember what you told me, it's just that I didn't get it the first time around...
You idiot! Then why didn't you say anything? Now look how much of a fool you've made yourself for getting the names wrong.
Well, tell me then, what did you mean?
Chief is not the boss. We call him that cuz he's the oldest one here.
Our boss is Fiver. That's what he's called, not because he's the fifth guy. You get it now?
All right, I got it this time! I promise I won't get it wrong again!
When can we go traveling again?
You blind or something?! Can't you see I'm standing here? Go outside if you wanna practice!
What are you quacking about? Gave me quite a fright, too. Don't make me unleash my inner demons.
Besides, I'm training for the good of our camp.
Aww, ain't that a nice way of putting it. You think I don't know about your little plans of trying to get into the other camp?
What are you talking about?
I saw you that other night. You with Hai...
Shhh... Okay, enough. The boss is gonna hear us.
I, it's just that... Water runs down, and people's gotta go up.
The other camp's way stronger than us, they got better stuff. Who does'nt want to go... You know how Fiver does'nt give a darn about anything. All I can count on is myself.
Easy for you to say.
Then what do you want from me?
Nothing. Just stop kicking me!
That's it?
Yeah. I want a backup plan of my own...
All right, all right. Just don't say anything. Let's keep this between the two of us.
So tired...
Didn't you just got out of bed?
Not enough sleep... Not nearly enough...
Wouldn't it be great if there's zero work and all I need to do is sleep all day long...?
Aren't you already doing it?
Hehe... You got a point. Just chill and relax, feels good to be alive...
Hey, something smells really good... What's for lunch...?
Anything from the other camp? Keep your voice down.
They snatched some engineer from the Jinzhou Ministry of Development. Must be for that treasure cave.
And I'm pretty sure they're about to make a move on it soon.
I'll have Sixer sneak in as one of theirs in a bit. Don't let up just yet, keep those intel coming.
We stick to the plan. Catch them off guard.
Don't worry, I'll keep you posted on everything that's going on.
By the way, Boss. I thought you didn't care about this whole thing. Didn't expect you...
Heh, did you really think the Gods gave us this one helluva spot for nothing?
You're right. With you holdin' the place for all these years, you definetly know your stuff!
Keep it down! And get this thing fixed already.
Is the food ready?
Hey, it's done when it's done, okay?
What's with the attitude? I'm just here to tell you the boss said no food for the city guy.
Why? Boss wants to starve him a bit?
Yeah, he's not cooperating, so Boss wants to teach him a lesson.
You two on the left, stop fooling around!
You're the worst bunch of recruits I've had in a while!
Here, Big Brains. Boss' s new plan. She wants you to give some thoughts on it.
That's quite the number of men we're sending.
You know the boss more than I do, she wants this in the bag real bad, otherwise she wouldn't want to have those punks come along.
So we're bringing the recruits...
The boss wants them around the outer perimeter. If they struggle, put them under someone trustworthy. As long as something major doesn't come up, it's fine.
To be honest, I don't think there'd be any issues.
If it weren't for that city person, then yeah...
You still think he's gonna mess up our plans?
Yeah, having an outsider here is a bit of a problem.
But we'll just have to work with it. No one could've thought the treasure cave would collapse at a time like this.
We better get it dug up soon before our stuff gets taken.
I think it was no ordinary accident.
What do you mean?
I've talked with Haixing. It's likely Fiver's doing.
Him? Isn't he just sitting there doing nothing all day?. You sure he'd really do something like that?
Heh, ever heard of playing fool to catch wise?
Here, and here...
Got it.
Plus the two other places I just showed you, get defenses and ambush sites set up by the end of next week. Not worth losing our own camp if we fail to gain any ground.
Want me to get started now?
Do it when it's dark! Or they'll think something's up with all the ruckus.
Latest intel on Fiver. Pass it around.
Boss... Are we really planning on splitting turf with those guys?
Heh, once we're done with Fiver, none of them's gonna stand in our way.
You tell 'em, Boss!
Enough. Back to actual business.
Zhongling and his men will flank around and surround Fiver's camp. Cutting them off from any outside support.
An'an will make a frontal assault. You must break through their defenses, and reach straight into their base of operation.

Tianyuan will be on support role and in charge of our own defenses. Keep an eye on the recruits in case if they decide to switch sides. Now, everyone knows how much men they're given like we planed earlier.
We know their capabilities. If all goes to plan, we'll be enjoying drinks by the end of the day!
Are we really helping Fiver fight Haixing?
I don't see a reason not to.
What if they do end up winning and come for us next? We won't stand a chance against them...
But right now they keep each other at bay...
No one ever said we're helping Fiver till the end.
So you mean...
They can fight all they want, we help whichever side's losing, let them bleed each other out, and then...
And then we jump in and reap all the turf for ourselves when they're at their weakest! What a plan, Boss!
Hmph. It's about time we took over.
Here, check and see if the numbers add up.
They do! Whoa, didn't expect Fiver to give these out for free like this. This is some special delivery you got here.
You haven't seen it all yet. This is just a small present from us. After we pull off this operation together, there'll be plenty more where this came from.
For sure! Looking foward to doing business with you all!
Boss, this new weapon of yours looks really good on you! It gotta be worth a fortune?!
Hehe, I wouldn't go that far. It's just a small toy from Fiver.
That's our boss! Even Fiver's gotta show some respect in front of you!
Darn right. They'd already be at war if it weren't for us being here. We made work of the area's security and put a balance in between them. They can't live without us!
Yeah, Boss! We're sticking with you till the end!
Hey, I saw our boss and Haixing on a secret date the other day.
For real?
You sure it was him? I thought Haixing was dating with that adjutant of hers?
No doubt about it. But I'm sure Boss isn't in it for the real.
There's something else that I found out.
What is it?
The boss and Riloong are planning to take over their camps. I saw it in one of their private messages.
With our numbers...? Is he for real...?
What are you afraid of? We won't be part of the action. Our boss's really in it for Haixing's treasure.
*yawn*... *yawn*...
Patrol, patrol, nothing but patrol all day. This is so boring...
Now, if you have any other questions, please ask away.
Haha, well... I’m afraid you should ask Patroller Chixia herself.
Rover, you... Can we please not talk about this? My old name was cringy, that’s all…
No, I don’t mean to hide anything from you...
You see, “Ma Xiaofang” just sounds so lame. Heroes in the Hero Plays I watch never use any name like that.
Yeah, I’m not quite a hero yet, but I’m giving it my all.
Aww… Please, spare me that, Rover.
Okay... Because we’re besties, I’ll give in a little. You can call me Ma Xiaofang when it’s just us, but please don’t do that when there’s other people.
That’s right! Chixia, Chixia... oh, what a magnificent name! I came up with it all by myself. This is the culmination of all my life experiences and knowledge!
Rover, feel free to call me by any name, but... Ahem, just so you know, that name is for our ears only, okay?
Yeah, I wanna know too. You’re all about exploring the past, but people always say we should be looking ahead, so what’s the deal?
Yeah, I wanna know too. Why are you so keen on collecting Sonance Caskets, Uncle Chenpi? Those… Fragments of past data, are they really that important?
The past has influenced how things are today and will be in the future, as everything we see has changed a lot over many years.
The seeds of yesterday give root to the flowers of tomorrow. In the absence of historical knowledge, how can we engage in discussions about the future?
The past serves as a reminder of our origins, ensuring that we do not lose sight of our original intentions amidst the overwhelming current of history.
Ah… I see. That sounds really cool. Thank you, Uncle Chenpi.
You’re welcome.
Oh right. Uncle Chenpi’s the best treasure appraiser in town.
I appreciate the compliment, Chixia. There are numerous talented individuals in Jinzhou, and I am far from being one of the best.
If the art of appraising treasure piques your interest, it may be worthwhile to seek guidance from a young girl known as “Master Youhu” if you cross paths with her in the future.
I am not nearly as skilled as her. Youngsters these days are seriously talented.
Ugh, speaking of that, I haven’t seen Youhu for a while now. Hopefully she didn’t get into trouble again…
If you ever find other Sonance Caskets, please consider selling them to me.
Don’t worry, the pay will make it worth your while. I’m not stingy when it comes to money.
The weather is so nice. If it can last until the Moon-chasing Festival, I can go out with Qixian!
Yes, the Moon-chasing Festival! There'll be all sorts of delicious foods and fun activities!
As soon as it's time, Qixian and I are going out to enjoy ourselves!
Hmm... the weather isn't great...
But I'm still really happy we can hang out together!
What a lovely day...
Such a beautiful night. It would be a waste not to spend it with you, Lulu.
I'm very happy to be out with Lulu.
It's a brand new day. Time to get to work!
The Moon-chasing Festival is almost here. The city will be bustling with new and exciting activities!
We need to be extra vigilant to ensure everyone's safety, just like Chixia said!
Ah... I'm really feeling a bit tired after a whole day.
After work, let's head to Panhua's Restaurant for dinner, then chat with the teahouse owner, and maybe...
Oh, right! We need to see the Hero Play. How could I forget?
I've heard the special show for the Moon-chasing Festival will begin soon, though its details are still a mystery.
Ah... I have no idea where my grandson's package is. Why is it taking so long to arrive...
How about I send him some Loong Whisker Crisps? The Moon-chasing Festival is almost here, and I still haven't heard from him...
Moon-chasing Festival—It's a time for reunion...
But it's good that the kids want to spread their wings and fly far, isn't it?
I just hope he'll remember these old bones and come back to visit me once in a while...
Where did I agree to meet Hualin? Was it here... or over there?
Why aren't I there yet?
Oh, I wonder if Huaijin is doing okay...
Really?! Is he okay? Where is he now? Why hasn't he come back?
Oh, really? That's a relief! He's okay, thank goodness.
But how could that boy be so busy with work that he didn't even notice when I called... Doesn't seem like him.
Anyway, thanks for telling me!
I need to find Huaijin... I have to see him.
Mom, I've been a good boy today. Didn't make the teacher angry.
The teacher said as long as I work a little harder, I'll get a good grade for the next exam.
Mom, guess what? Grandpa got mixed up again while cooking dinner today.
He used sugar instead of salt! We were eating and it was so sweet we couldn't stop laughing!
The dishes you cooked were better... Sob... Sob...
No, I'm fine. I'm a grown man now. I shouldn't cry.
I'm so sleepy. I should head back. We talked a lot today.
Mom, let's chat again tomorrow night. I'll have more stories to share.
Goodbye... Mom.
Hello... You must be a thoughtful person to come here this late.
It's okay. Having Yangming with me at night makes it a bit easier than the day.
Yes, he comes here almost every day to talk to his mother.
I stay with him too. Sometimes we spend the whole night here...
It'd be a sleepless night at home anyway... might as well stay here a bit longer with them.
Well... This needs a little more polishing. We don't want his family to worry...
Ah, that might be a little too hard to understand...
Did you meet Xieyang?
He... he's my brother.
Is it, like, hard to talk to him?
My brother has his own, uh, way of expressing himself.
But you could say we're similar. We both have our ways of expressing what we want to say.
In some ways, he's set an example for me.
Yes, an example of being true to yourself, expressing yourself bravely, and not backing down even when others don't understand.
Tuanjin is a good kid. She's always here helping out and looking after us.
Everyone likes her, but it's hard for them to express their gratitude.
Of course, just don't let her know. She'd probably get all embarrassed.
Well, well, if it isn’t our Xiaofang. Back so soon? Didn’t I just fix up your pistols last week? You broke them again already?
...Aw, please don’t call me Xiaofang! It’s Chixia!
Oh no, I'm doomed. It seems everyone knows my other name now.
Haha, you’re exaggerating. As far as I know, only we, your old pals, are calling you that.
Coll, cool. Let’s get to business then.
漂泊者, you too?! No, please no... Let’s keep that name between us, alright?
Anyway, we're here to help Auntie Panhua recreate the Essence Medley Soup.
According to the recipe, once it's bubbling away, we gotta stir it with a golden-handled spoon. And according to Koko, you just own a pyrite spoon with that exact name, right?
Ah, I see.
That’s right. The golden handle spoon, indeed the pyrite spoon I have. And let me tell you, I have a bit of history with this Essence Medley Soup. Any guess what this soup is all about?
Just a simple brew of herbs, really. Barely qualifies as medicinal cuisine in my book.
Well, I don’t think it’s a formal dish, seeing as we just throw a bunch of ingredients together.
Haha, you have the point. It’s indeed a chowder, but not an ordinary one.

You youngsters didn’t witness the making of this soup. Back then, Jinzhou was still under construction, right around the year-end. Every household would bring out their cherished foods to share. And if they had nothing, they’d whip up some medicinal soup. If that wasn’t an option, they’d pitch in however they could.

And that’s when I forged this large pyrite spoon. Made stirring that big pot a breeze. What a shame though, those border guards insisted on every bit of metal being used for weapons. Otherwise, you’d still see it around.
No wonder Auntie Panhua said it’s passed down through word of mouth, sparking debates over its flavor.
Seems like this recipe is more of a shopping list than a detailed guide.
Absolutely! Every household pulled out their secret stash of ingredients to brew up this soup. It’s gotta be divine.
Even if it doesn’t require any fancy cooking techniques, those good reviews can’t be bogus, right? Just like Auntie Panhua said, it’s brewed from the finest Jinzhou ingredients...
Now I’m even more eager to get a taste, knowing the backstory! Uncle Wei, mind lending us your big pyrite spoon?
The reason that the spoon affects the soup's flavor is because it releases a few minerals while stirring. You could use a smaller pyrite spoon instead.
That makes sense... By the way, doesn’t Auntie Panhua already have one on standby?
Since we’re here, might as well make the most of it. Can you lend a hand and check out my friend’s weapon?
Ah, I remember you. New to Jinzhou, right? You’re that... that...
That’s right. Madam Magistrate mentioned you’re Jinzhou’s guest.
Let’s have a look at your weapon... Hm, this wear and tear... Can’t let youngsters like you wander around with a weapon in this state.
Here, take these unused casting molds and ores the Ordnance Division gave me. They’re the building blocks of a weapon. With these, you can forge a new one.
Kid, materials are meant to be used. If you want to thank me, put them to good use.
What an impressive lion head!
Do you know what the lion dancer will be like?
I heard that it was a strange man.
Mom, I want it too.
No problem, honey. Is one bowl enough? If not, we can get another bowl.
It's enough. Thank you, mom.
Sir, how much for the snacks?
Sir, I've been waiting for your stall! Finally!
Sheng, thank you for your hard work.
Not a big deal. Finally got a break, so it's only right that I help our mom with some chores.
Have we prepared the wedding candies and everything?
Yes, even though it was a bit rushed, we've got everything ready. We just have to wait for tomorrow.
Sheng, promise me you'll take care of yourself.
I promised you that I would return safely.
IS ANYONE THERE!
HELP!
It's been a long time since we've watched a lion dance show together, hasn't it?
What could be the secret of the Jingle Beast...
Just wait and see!
What a spectacular show!
I remembered everything...
Bravo! Bravo!
That's a feast for my eyes!
What's really going on here...
It's quite perplexing...
This creature must be quite big, huh?
Yeah, Long tusks, sharp claws, and traces of the Resonance Power...
This is a significant discovery, enough for several more reports.
Let's collect samples and conduct a thorough investigation over here.
Be careful! Don't disturb the precious scene.
This place... It's full of different smells. Plants, beasts, Tacet Discords, and... humans.
I'm pretty good at pathfinding. Leave it to me!
Look. I bet Bei Ji dropped this.
From what Bei Shi described, Bei Ji doesn't sound like someone brave enough to come here alone...
But why does he have this bizarre obsession with the Jingle Beast?
I guess this is the only way ahead. Let's keep going.
The path is tricky and narrow here. Tacet Discords could be hiding. Let's be careful as we move on.
Looks like one just appeared—I'll handle it, stay back!
The Tacet Discord we encountered earlier should not have attacked Beiji, so he was able to continue forward.
The rocks just fell and blocked our way. Ugh, Bei Ji must have passed through here already.
Here! I'll break this rock!
The cave is getting bigger as we go deeper inside...
There are fewer signs of beasts around here.
Watch out! There's thorns up ahead. Let's jump over them!
漂泊者, see those glowing plants up in the cave?
They help us find our way in the dark. Pretty handy, right?
But be careful. Our enemies can also use these lights to locate us and set up an ambush.
So we can't stay too long in the light.
Whoops, this guy is completely blocking our way!
It's not too difficult to fight against, but it's a total wrecking ball. If we fight it here, it could bring down the entire cave.
Oh, and it keeps one nostril open for food scents even when it's asleep. We can turn that against it and use a scent it hates to repel it.
Sniff sniff... Yup, that's the Noctemint! Let's put it by the Spearback and see what happens.
The scent is coming from below.
The rocks here look so funny. They kinda resemble the Plum Blossom Poles we use in liondancing... How about this!
Kick kick slide, twirl and glide...
Oops! Sorry, I always recite this as I hop on the poles.
I got carried away and said it out loud...
Hmm, so many thorns here...
One prick from these thorns hurts more than a fall.
Let's glide over them!
Grrr... More thorns? No way!
漂泊者, I'm here with you!
The Noctemint smells near. Let's go and have a look!
That's it! The Noctemint we're looking for! Now we can safely distract that Spearback.
Watch out! More Tacet Discords!
Alright, let's get out of here!
I found a shortcut! Let's go this way.
Feels like an earthquake when it moves...
Whew! Been a while since I last swam. This feels so good!
Wow... I didn't expect the insides of this cave to look like this. This is so beautiful.
This plant only grows in dark places, and I haven't seen it in a long time... I miss it a little.
Let's keep moving.
Where do you think you are runnin' to, brat?
Didn't expect you to make it this far. Shame these monsters didn't get you yet.
Oh well, at least we'll get to claim your sorry corpse later...
I-I'm not afraid of you!
I know all the dirty things you've done!
I-I've already sent out proof against you.
Even if you kill me... It won't change the truth!
There are still brave people out there... They will stand up to you... I know they will...
I knew it's not like what Bei Shi had thought...
Oh? Our prey is finally here...
Who are you? Run! Run while you can! They're targeting me...
Run? Nah, don't even think about it!
You think you were smooth?
We saw you spying and creeping up on us... We just played dumb to lure you in...
...and now we gotcha. Time to pay for your sneaky ways!
Boss, you're the best!
Surrender now and you may die in once piece!
My, my. Why would you choose to live like a beast when you could be a human?
You call yourself beasts, then you should know... every beast has its own hunting game.
Sometimes, a beast may pretend to be weak... to give their preys a false sense of security. Make them assume they're the hunters.
What?!
I haven't been this angry in a while.
漂泊者, we'll show them no mercy.
Since you've chosen to act like beasts... I'll handle you the way beasts do!
Crap...
Oh no, boss... I heard once his tail starts wagging real fast, he's unstoppable in battle...
So what?
B-but his tail's wagging like crazy now!
Humph, I haven't revealed my true strength yet...
Wow... you're so strong!
Hah...
You don't stand a chance against me in the wilderness. Submit while you can.
...Or would you prefer getting torn into shreds?
Haha... You've startled those things awake...
Boss... What do we do now?!
Well...
We're fighting them?
We're running, of course!
What? Wait, wait! Boss!
漂泊者, watch out!
Don't you dare lay a claw on him!
Don't you dare lay a claw on her!
Hiss... Grrr... You hurt my friend... You die!
漂泊者, sorry I let you see this side of me.
Please keep it a secret between the two of us.
Thank you. That would be great.
I'm alive! Thank you for saving me!
Oh and sorry but, who are you?
My sister... Bei Shi? She's been worried about me? Is she doing okay?
That's good to hear... Thank you.
What?! Oh, Bei Shi... I'm so sorry... I'm such an awful brother.
Lingyang share with you every detail
I didn't expect she would... I'm sorry.
Sorry, I made you worry too.
Yeah, I guess you've already heard some of it from her...
Our parents were both members of the Pioneer Association. They were famous explorers, until we lost them to an accident.
We've been struggling to survive since then... I did many part-time jobs to make ends meet, trying to take care of my sister.
But Bei Shi... She said she wanted to join the Pioneer Association, and fulfill our parents' unfinished ambitions...
She's the last family I have. I was really scared I'd lose her, too.
I tried to ban her from joining the Pioneer Association, and we got into a huge fight. We haven't really talked to each other ever since...
But, to be honest... When she was accepted to join the Association, I was really happy for her.
Unlike me, she is brave, positive, and always willing to try new things. As her brother, I'm happy she'll get to see a bigger world.
Looking back on it, I was holding her back from pursuing her dreams...
...Yes. I shouldn't have tried to make the decision for her.
It's too dangerous here. Let's get out first.
Your sister's been worried about you.
Oh, the fish...
No, I can't do this. It's public property!
I... I wasn't trying to catch that fish! Really!
Uh, hi... So you saw it?
Well, the fish here have been really active during these rainy days... I couldn't help it...
They... They say you have claws...
We heard you can tear those monsters into shreds...
Wanna take a look?
Yes! Please!
Okay, then! Here you go...
Eek...
C-Candies!
Try some! I hope these candies can make up for not showing you my impressive claws.
See? He's not scary at all!
Thank you, L-Lingyang!
You're welcome! Do come by to see our liondance show tomorrow!
I will!
See you soon!
Hmm... you smell unfamiliar, yet so powerful, and so pure...
You must be that famous Rover.
Hiya! I've heard a lot about you, and now I finally get to meet you in person.
You can call me Lingyang, glad to make your acquaintance! Fare thee well, blessings swell!
You really are different from everyone else...
So we've shaken hands. Now we're good friends!
Hmm... So even you are scared of me, too...
...Anyway! Welcome to the city of Jinzhou!
Our troupe is doing a big liondancing show tomorrow evening, and I'm now doing some advertising!
Yeah, the Liondance Troupe. We do cool liondancing shows for parades.
Oh, and liondancing is a traditional thing in Jinzhou.
Well, liondancing is a traditional thing in Jinzhou.
We've got whole groups dedicated to liondancing, our troupe for example.
We've got lots of activites in Jinzhou. I can't wait to show you!
his stomach growled...
Oh! Oops, uh.. Sorry, I guess I'm a bit hungry after rehearsing for a whole day.
Speaking of that, I should treat you to dinner! Let's talk over food. That will be fun!
Well actually... Yes it is! Jinzhou people love feeding our guests! It's our way of showing hospitality.
Get ready to be blown away by the amazing flavors here!
Don't get me wrong, but this is just how we treat our guests here in Jinzhou.
You'll love the hospitality here, I promise!
N-Nothing! Please believe me. I'm just trying to treat you to a meal, since you're our super important guest and all.
You'll see how we roll with our guests soon enough!
But right now, I still have some other things to finish...
I've been getting a ton of requests for private liondances lately, and some happen to overlap with our big show tomorrow.
And you know how important liondancing is to the folks here in Jinzhou! Can't just turn 'em down.
So I had an idea: why not combine all these personal requests into the grand performance? That way, everyone's happy.
We can even customize the performances to cater to each client's needs.
But first, gotta figure out exactly what our clients want!
漂泊者, wanna come with me?
We can go visit my clients on our way to grab food. I'll show you around and introduce you to our local customs firsthand.
It'll be way cooler than just hearing about it from others. What do you say?
Great! Let's goooo!!
Okay, let me think.. My first client's nearby. You might've seen them before.
Just cross the bridge, keep going, and we're there!
Oh, you are...
Fivefold blessings grace your door, good luck and fortune evermore!
Aww, the Lucky Greetings... You're from the Liondance Troupe, I bet. Nice to meet you!
Are you here for my grandpa's birthday party?
I thought our reservation was tomorrow. Did you maybe mix up the time?
Ah, here's the thing. People from City Hall already booked a liondance show on the same day for soldiers leaving on an expedition.
I see...
But maybe we can combine your celebrations with this existing show...
My grandpa loves hanging out with people. He'd be so happy if you could do that for him.
Nice! Just double-checking again: It will be your grandfather's sixtieth birthday, right?
Correct.
Alright, I'll keep that in mind.
Then, I'll do six spins in a row as part of the celebration, which symbolize the six decades your grandpa has lived through!
Means I'll dance around our birthday star on the poles! It's a special birthday celebration dance.
One spin for a decade past, health and vigor forever last!
Thank you so much. I'm sure grandpa will be happy to hear that!
Ah, so you want to learn more about liondancing?
Well, I don't know much about it, but my grandpa has always been an invested fan.
He's even friends with Mr. Wufang and Mr. Qixing, who are sorta like advisors to the troupe. They often hang out at Liuxian Teahouse and chat over tea.
Fun fact: those aren't their real names, just special titles that have been passed down over the generations.
But everyone knows them by these names now.
Nowadays, they prefer to stay behind the scenes and provide instructions, rather than be in the spotlight themselves.
If you wanna get to know them better, you might just need some good luck.
Done! Now, onto the next client... Hmm, I remember it's a young couple.
Blissful union, endless delight, love eternal in thee alight!
Oh my, look who's here! Come here, Lingyang!
We're getting the wedding candies ready. Here's one for you, and this one here...
Thank you for the candies! Actually, I'm here for that liondance request you made...
City Hall already booked a show for soldiers on the same day, so...
Really? So you won't be able to perform for us?
We are both born and raised in Huanglong, so we've been super looking forward to the Liondance Officiant ceremony during our wedding...
It's an interactive wedding ceremony.
The bride and groom stand on either side of the liondance performer. When the lion head opens its mouth, they put their hands inside and it bites down.
It's called Settlement. It symbolizes an unbreakable bond!
I know this wedding means everything to you, and I don't want you to have any regrets.
Your love is rock solid, and I can see that. The Liondance Officiant ceremony would just be the cherry on top of your unbreakable bond.
How about you two exchanging tokens when the lion head reaches the top during tomorrow's performance? It'll be a lively atmosphere with drums, gongs, and firecrackers bursting in celebration...
Even though it's not exactly the thing you wanted, isn't it still a unique way to exchange vows in front of your loved ones?
And it symbolizes... To the world's end your hearts aligned, to the sky's edge your fates entwined!
Aw, that's so sweet.
My partner's a soldier in training, headed to defend our borders soon. The liondance show for departing soldiers must mean a lot to him.
Sheng, what do you say?
Sure, I'm happy to go along with whatever you want.
Okay. Hmm, we'll need some more time to think it through.
No problem, I'll be waiting to hear from you!
Hello, 漂泊者, what can I do for you?
Oh! I know!
The soldiers of Jinzhou have a special affection for liondance. It originated from the ancient celebration of Taiping Musical, symbolizing success and a positive beginning.
The Liondance Troupe often travels to boost soldier morale, performing at frontlines and military camps.
Liondance mixes boxing with dance, drawing from Huanglong's traditional martial arts for its moves.
There's a folk belief that the liondance's footwork, known as the Bugang Steps, originated from an ancient ritual that could exorcise evil spirits...
Tread on the Dipper's stars, and no evil shall escape... This is one of the reasons why people believe liondance can ward off evil and bring good luck.
When we see the Liondance Troupe, we all hurry to watch. Not just for good luck, but to pick up some combat moves too.
Alright! Just one more client to go! He's at the place where we'll be eating our dinner!
Uhh... My stomach's rumbling again. Can't wait for a big feast!
Here we are. This is the place!
Heya, mister! Lionpeppers on the beam, may your profits always stream!
Oh hi! Isn't that the Lingyang boy?
What brought you here? My liondance request? I heard you're getting a ton of requests. I hope you can still fit mine in.
Look, I got the Lionpepper and everything. Just waiting for you to put on the lion head and chow down at my store opening!
Sir, there's something I need to tell you...
Yeah, I heard. My thing conflicts with the performance you're doing for the soldiers, right? Will you have to cancel?
Exactly. So I was thinking we could incorporate some Lionpepper elements into the show to make up for it...
Nah, no need to worry about my little shop, boyo. Just focus on your big performance!
Oh, and you must be...
Haha, looks like Lingyang has made a new friend.
Here, try this while you're here! A new snack I just came up with!
Go on, 漂泊者. Dinner's on me. Mr. Shuncai is a great chef!
To really get to know a city, start with the food!
Yum-yum! Hey sir, can we share this snack with the audience during our evening show? No snacks, no show!
Let me do something for you. Anything! To help you attract more customers.
Oh my, that'll be my great honor!
But...
What's the matter?
Have you heard? There's a monster in the wild recently, one they call the Jingle Beast...
The Jingle Beast...
Yeah. Somehow the nickname sounds cute even!
But you know what? It does all the terrible stuff you can think of!
When hunting, it makes these jingling sounds... They say its tusks are over half a meter long and its claws shred prey with ease.
No, that's not true. The Jingle Beast doesn't look like that...
It... It's a... A friend of mine.
Well, actually... I need this one ingredient for my new snack, but the Jingle Beast has been messing things up. Can't find good meat anywhere right now.
Do you have other ways to replenish your stock?
There's only one place left to get it, and it's run by this Exile group called The Savages.
Apparently, they're in cahoots with the Jingle Beast, and that's how they still have meat for sale.
But it's crazy expensive—five times the usual price! It's insane!
I'm just a small shop, how am I supposed to afford that?
So... I can't make a lot of these snacks for you to hand out yet.
Me? Oh... I'm fine...
It suddenly struck me that there was another request to deal with... It should be right next to the tea house not far away. Now, if you'll excuse me, I must go!
Sorry, 漂泊者. I'll be back soon!
Oh, that's typical Lingyang.
You'll get used to him soon.
He's spontaneous, always doing whatever pops into his head at the moment.
He just loves helping people.
You'll often see him sprinting around the alleys, lending a hand wherever needed.
He's quick and strong, nothing seems to faze him. He's been such a blessing to us.
We do feel bad when he injures himself accidentally, though... He brushes it off and tells us not to fret, but even though he says not to worry, we still do.
漂泊者, can you go check on him? Whatever you order at my place will be on the house!
Thank you!
Of course, take your time.
The teahouse Lingyang mentioned is in the residential area, just past the square. Keep walking and you'll find it...
The teahouse? It's in the residential area. Just keep going straight and you'll see it on your left once you're in the neighborhood.
Ah, you must be curious about the opening ceremony with Lionpeppers, right?
At the ceremony, the Usher playfully throws the Lionpepper on the shop's beam, and then the Liondancer jumps up to bite it off.
It's a traditional ceremony in Jinzhou, but to be honest, I'm not entirely sure how it started...
But who cares? As long as we get the Liondance Troupe, people will flock to our shop!
That's how the Lionpepper works its magic on business, I guess.
Sorry, but I'm not the one you're looking for. I never made any liondancing requests...
漂泊者, what brought you here?
It's not a big deal, really! Thanks for coming to check on me.
What? Oh no! How much money did it cost you? I'll pay you back!
I was really freaked out for a moment. If anyone finds out I let the guest pay, I'll be shamed in Jinzhou!
I received a strange request from the Bei Family. It didn't mention any specific requirements.
Could it be your parents?
...No, it can't be. Now, if there's nothing else, please excuse me.
Please, one moment! Bei Shi... do you have an older brother?
How did you know...
The client who called me had a mature male voice.
And since he said he's from the Bei Family, there is only one other possibility...
Bei Shi, has something happened to you?
I'm Lingyang from the Liondance Troupe. This is 漂泊者.
You can trust us.
...It's about my brother, Bei Ji. It's been a week now, and he still hasn't come back home.
A week ago... That's when I received this request.
Was he acting strange the last time you saw him?
My brother and I stopped talking to each other a while back, after a big fight. I don't even know when he last left our house...
But... he still sends me packages from time to time. It's been a bunch of strange stuff...
This package has old Angelica flowers, they don't smell good anymore.
And these meats... They are almost bad, even though they're refrigerated... Anything else he told you?
He mentioned hanging out with people from The Savages in one of his letters...
I didn't tell anyone, because I was worried my brother would get in trouble if I reported it to the police.
Yeah, The Savages seem shady. And there's talk of the Jingle Beast being connected to them.
But the return addresses on these packages are all different. How are we supposed to find him?
I see... 漂泊者, you're so clever!
Bei Shi, leave it to me! I'll help you find your brother.
Can I go with you?
I get it, Bei Shi. You really want to find your brother.
But it's dangerous out there with the TD Outbreaks happening more frequently. I can't guarantee your safety if we run into a spreading Tacet Field.
I... I can handle it. I used to be a member of the Pioneer Association, too.
Us Pioneers never... never back down from a challenge...
But... I...
If you insist... Okay, but we'll need to ask 漂泊者 about it.
He is a strong Resonator. With He, we'll be safer on our journey.
She is a strong Resonator. With She, we'll be safer on our journey.
To be honest, I don't want to drag my friend into this... But this is an emergency, and Bei Shi want to tag along, so I'm asking a favor of you.
漂泊者, I know it's a big ask...
But please... Please help me!
Amazing! Thank you, 漂泊者!
The guy who brings my packages is always the same dude, and I know where he works.
Okay, let's get this dealt with. 漂泊者, are you ready?
漂泊者, you ready?
Great, let's go!
We'll wait for you here.
It should be around here...
Wait... There's someone calling for help...
Over there! The Hoochiefs are attacking someone!
Day 1: I had one lazy day and now there's a whole convoy of missing packages! They shipped me off to a remote station for punishment. Time to redeem myself as the ultimate delivery hero!
Day 2: Played Echo Simulation all day.
Day 3: Played Echo Simulation all day.
Day 4: Come on! I can't keep playin games!
Day 5: Played Echo Simulation all day.
Day 6: They're freaking out about a Tingle Beast out there in the wild... Scared, wanna bail...
Day 7: It IS called the Tingle Beast right... Right?
No beasts, just Exiles ruining my day. Even more packages gone. Broke my terminal. No Echo Simulation now : UGH!!
Day 8: They tried to force me into delivering stuff for them... Over my dead body! They can feed me to the Tingle Beast for all I care!!
Day 9: We Promise, We Deliver!
Oh, h-hello! Anything else I can do for you?
But I've already told you everything I know...
This is a small logistics station we set up. Humble but well-equipped, so we can provide basic logistics services to our clients.
Please help yourself if you need to check anything here... Oh, maybe I should tidy up a bit first...
I've got nothing to hide, really. Please feel free to look around.
Phew... Thank you! You saved my life!
Are you alright?
Thanks for asking. I'm fine. I could have run away, but then the packages wouldn't reach their recipients...
