Of course! We Promise, We Deliver! That's our slogan at the Lollo Logistics!
All packages must be transferred at this station, but we rarely see anyone dropping off their packages here. If someone did, I will surely remember them.
We're searching for a missing person who used your service. Can you help us?
Sure! You just saved my life. I'll tell you everything I can remember!
Hmm, I'm sorry, but this doesn't ring any bell...
But we just checked the package tracker, and it said you were the deliveryman...
...M-Maybe it was a mistake?
I see... Well, we still have another question.
The Twinkle Beast? You mean that monster everyone's been talking about recently?
You mean the Jingle Beast, right?
Yeah, whatever. That dangerous, man-eating thing.
It's said to have long tusks and sharp claws that can tear anything to shreds...
And there's this Exile group, called The Savages, and they claim to be able to talk to that beast.
So people have been paying them to talk the Jingle Beast out of attacking humans...
The Savages... Yeah, sounds familiar...
Do you know the Tingle Beast? That monster everyone's been talking about recently.
You mean the Jingle Beast, right?
Yeah, whatever. That dangerous, man-eating thing.
It's said that they know how to communicate with that ferocious beast.
So people have been paying them to talk the Jingle Beast out of attacking humans...
That's all I know, sir.
Thank you, but I've got one last question.
Do you know where we can find The Savages, or the Jingle Beast?
...Sorry, but we have our rules to f-follow... I cannot divulge details of our clients.
But I heard the Jingle Beast is often found roaming in a campsite. It's somewhere near a broken tree, on that mountainside...
Those working on the guard tower can often spot it, too.
I see. Thank you for answering my questions.
Sir, may I remind you...
That thing is very dangerous... It's ferocious beyond your wildest imagination. Please be careful...
And there may be more than one of them...
Don't worry! If there really was a second Jingle Beast... Well, I'll have to see it for myself!
The deliveryman thanked you and left...
Oh well... We didn't get anything useful from him...
Yeah. At least now we know The Savages and the Jingle Beast are definitely connected.
Besides, did you see his expression?
He seemed frightened. I bet he was hiding something from us out of fear.
Well, but at least we still got some clues from him. Like where we can find the Jingle Beast.
B-but there are so many campsites in the wild, how can we pinpoint its exact location with a couple words from him?
Follow me. Let's keep our eyes open for anything unusual.
Campsite near a broken tree, and visible from the guard tower... I think I know where it is.
That's the place. Let's look around and stay alert.
From the size of this campsite, it doesn't look like they can hold a big gathering here.
The broken tree... It should be somewhere up ahead. Let's keep walking!
Hmm? I just heard people talking. It's coming from above that slope...
Shh... Let's stay low...
Let's not step on those bushes. Try not to make any noise!
How did it go?
Hehe, you're so smart, boss! That Jingle Beast rumor really did the trick!
So they're really here...
Shh... Keep quiet. Do you see these bushes?
These bushes are not supposed to grow so well on exposed ground.
Must be planted on purpose. There might be traps hiding underneath.
Let's stay put and listen to what they're saying.
Oh, about that new guy. He's been getting things down quickly, I'll give him that.
He's too nosy. Can't shut up about the Jingle Beast.
Let him go find the beast if he's so eager.
And then we'll handle him ourselves.
Boss, I heard this guy we're dealing with is tough.
He probably won't believe in the Jingle Beast rumor.
Let's see how he feels after we rough him up in the dark.
You get it now?
Brilliant plan, boss. You're relentless.
Heh, watch and learn, kid.
You're just a pup. You don't know what really scares people...
But I'll come with you this time.
Alright everyone, let's go! Grab your stuff!
Phew... Are they gone?
No... Wait, they're still nearby.
I can still hear them breathing. They're on high alert.
But they're still inexperienced by beast standards.
Okay, now they've gone farther away.
Let's go check it out.
They don't seem to have a solid plan or established routes yet.
They seem disorganized, probably a new gang.
漂泊者, you found anything over there?
Yep, don't worry. I'm keeping watch.
If something happens, you'll know first.
You can focus on finding clues. Let us know if you find anything.
What on earth are they doing...
My brother... Is he really working for these people?
The tusk of an unknown creature, huge in size.
The tusk of an unknown creature, huge in size.
A spoiled, smelly frozen meat that has turned brown.
A spoiled, smelly frozen meat that has turned brown.
A messy bill with barely visible entries. The expenditure is almost zero.
A messy bill with barely visible entries. The expenditure is almost zero.
This is... This is my brother's device.
How could this be... Is my brother really working for those bad guys?
Bei Shi, what kind of person is he?
He's shy and careful, but not sneaky. He may be timid, but he really loves me...
Bei Shi... Sometimes, we can't trust what we hear or see.
We have to use our hearts and logic to uncover the real truth, it's not always obvious.
...Thank you. I see.
漂泊者, you found anything else?
It's just the tusk of an adult Sabyr Boar. It's indeed larger than usual, but...
They must be using this to make people believe the Jingle Beast is real.
It's been refrigerated for a while, but the inside has spoiled... Exactly like the thing we found in one of those packages...
I can even smell the chemical preservatives in there...
They're not just spreading rumors, they are also selling spoiled meat.
Ugh... It pisses me off, too.
The top priority now is to find clues about Bei Ji's whereabouts.
Now we have another problem. We have to keep tabs on The Savages to see what they're planning.
According to what we just heard, their next victim is about to show up.
Sounds good. The Savages are super alert, but I know the wilderness better than them. I can track them down.
漂泊者, I understand your anger.
But they are super alert. It'll be too risky for you to go alone. Besides, I know the wilderness better than them. Maybe I should go.
I want to ask you to take Bei Shi and go look for her brother.
She'll be safer with you by her side.
If anything happens, I'll call you.
Thank you, 漂泊者. You take care of yourself too.
This thing may still be working.  My brother could have left me a message...
Hmm... Ah! There is a message!
Sorry Bei Shi... I stood between you and your dreams.
Perhaps you were right... Your brother is just a selfish coward.
I don't dream of your forgiveness... But still...  I want to do something for you.
Farewell, Bei Shi. I'll kill the Jingle Beast... for you...
The video ends here...
I-It's my brother...
It's probably because I joined the Pioneer Association.
My brother was really against my decision...
But that was my childhood dream, so we had a big fight...
I... I don't know. He never told me anything about it...
Ring... Ring...
Ring... Ring...
Eek!
No... It must be the Jingle Beast!
I know... I know that sound too well.
A while ago, when I was on a mission in the wilderness, I got ambushed by Tacet Discords...
As I struggled to escape, I heard the sound of a bell ringing in the distance...
I-I can't remember... I was so scared, my mind went completely blank.
After hearing the bell, I...
I just kept running without looking back. That bell kept chasing me and only disappeared when I reached a safer place.
If I hadn't made it, perhaps I would have been eaten by the Jingle Beast...
So... Yes, this must be the Jingle Beast again!
Alright... L-Let's go...
漂泊者! Wow, it's only been minutes since I sent you the signal. Didn't expect you to arrive so soon!
While I was tailing The Savages, I overheard them talking about where Bei Ji went.
A loud bell ringing? I think I heard something like that, but...
But I didn't... I didn't see anything like the Jingle Beast.
Let's stick with the Bei Ji thing.
Do you remember what we overheard at the campsite? They mentioned a newbie who was obsessed with the Jingle Beast.
And just now, they sent him to some deep cave.
I'm sure I did hear the bell ringing... So the Jingle Beast is probably hiding in here, too!
Well... Given how big it is, I don't think it could fit inside a cave like this. What do you say?
I do smell danger from this cave though...
Based on what we've gathered so far, the newbie, probably Bei Ji, is in danger. We need to act fast.
...漂泊者, I've always known how strong you are.
I probably shouldn't be asking you for more help, but Bei Ji is in danger, the situation's looking dire, and we need your aid.
Could you please help us rescue him? Your help would mean everything to me!
Once we find him, we must make him explain. Everything!
Yeah. His sister is super worried too!
Of course! You have my word!
I-I'm going with you!
My brother's in there. I want to find him as soon as possible...
Bei Shi, I understand how much you want to find your brother.
But it's really dark inside, and we've got no idea what could be hiding in there. We'll be stretched thin just watching each other's backs...
Besides, I have a more important thing for you to do.
I need you to go back to the city as fast as you can, let Patrollers know what happened today, and request their help.
But... I don't want to run away from danger anymore...
Bei Shi... As an explorer of the Pioneer Association, I trust you understand.
A seasoned explorer knows how to make sound decisions in the moment.
And sometimes, choosing to retreat doesn't mean we are weak.
Please trust 漂泊者 and I. We promise to bring your brother back safely.
...Yes, I will. Please help him!
And please stay safe, you two!
No worries. We'll bring him back!
Why... Why did this happen?
When it rains, it pours...
This is not what I had planned!
Behave!
Lingyang! Rover!
Thanks for the tip, young lady. We made it in time to catch them because of you.
Lingyang! 漂泊者! Are you alright?
Bei Shi...
Bei Ji!
Bei Shi, I'm so sorry I made you worry...
Though seeing your reunion is truly touching...
I still gotta say, this isn't the right place for conversation. Let's head back to the city first.
So, when you found out that Bei Shi lost her courage because of the Jingle Beast, you came up with a plan to get rid of it?
Yeah... I thought I could kill the Jingle Beast, and make my sister happy again...
And I heard rumors about an Exile group called The Savages. Said they knew how to talk to that beast...
So I thought...
Yes... I wanted to prove my courage. Wanted to make her proud of me.
I just wanted to show her... If her timid brother could do it, so can she!
But in the end, I couldn't achieve anything...
Yes, you're right...
I failed. Couldn't find the Jingle Beast, couldn't beat the bad guys... I only knew how to cower in fear... That's all I could do...
I'm just an incompetent coward. I've always been!
No... That's not true...
At least, you didn't choose to work with those bad guys.
Succumbing to desire and killing their own kind, these are the deeds of beasts.
It's a uniquely human trait to go against their natural instincts, even sacrificing themselves for someone else, or for a greater cause.
It only takes a moment for a human to descend into beastliness.
But holding on to one's humanity requires unwavering commitment and courage.
Bei Ji, you've already proved your bravery.
I'm sure your sister is proud of you, too.
R-really...?
Yes! I love you, brother. But promise me you won't do anything stupid again.
Okay, yes, I promise you... But, um, at least I did find something this time!
We now know the so-called Jingle Beast is just a bluff!
So, Bei Shi, you don't need to fear it anymore!
But I did hear the bell...
Perhaps it was just your imagination? Or maybe it was some Tacet Discords?
No way! I heard it loud and clear. I couldn't have mistaken it.
Hmm... I guess we still need to help Bei Shi get over the Jingle Beast...
漂泊者, Lingyang, we'll be going home now. Sorry for the trouble I caused...
Sure, go get some good rest. Don't forget to come see the liondancing show tomorrow!
Eh? Tomorrow?
Don't tell me you've forgotten your liondance request?
No, no, I didn't...
Sorry... Actually, I made that request to further investigate the Jingle Beast...
But now, I guess that's no longer necessary...
I see...
I know you've still got questions about the Jingle Beast. Who knows? You may find the answers in tomorrow's liondancing show...
I see. We'll come watch the show!
Nice! Please do come, yeah?
Bei Shi and Bei Ji waved you goodbye and left...
漂泊者, I know you still have a lot of questions to ask...
And there are things I'd like to discuss with you.
Please, follow me.
Keep going down this road and we'll reach the theater. But I guess you've been here many times already...
Well, let's just hang out a bit while we're here!
Sir! May your business boom!
Thank you, Lingyang!
After our adventure in the wilderness, the hustle and bustle brings a comforting sense of prosperity.
I must... do what I can to keep it thriving.
Have a happy wedding, Ms. Linling!
Thank you, Lingyang!
Haha, Ms. Ganxue's shop is always so popular. Let's not bother her for now!
Her souvenirs are all made with care. I'm sure people will love them!
Hey, you two! Just came back from outside the city? Or are you going somewhere?
Remember to eat on time no matter how busy you are!
Oh, and when my store opens, you must visit! I'd love to see you there!
Lingyang! 漂泊者! Nice to see you!
And oh, about the wedding suggestion... We may still need some time to think over it. It's our once-in-a-lifetime thing, after all!
But we'll surely go watch your liondancing show! This I am sure of!
Phew, and now we're back.
Lingyang! You're finally here! Master's been looking for you!
Oh no! I completely forgot!
漂泊者, could you look around the backstage for a bit? See if you can find anything that might help Bei Shi overcome her fear...
I'll be right back!
Hurry up! Master's getting angry!
I'm coming! I'm coming!

Hey, 漂泊者, I'm back!
My Master is super strict before our performances. He wants us to give our all for the people of Jinzhou. Can't disappoint them!
Hmm... Let's begin with the history of this tradition.
Liondance shows started as a way to cheer up returning soldiers and boost their morale before battles.
It evolved over time into a way to boost soldiers' spirits before battle, symbolizing courage and the hope for victory.
Later on, it transformed into the festive performance we see today, but it's still about keeping bad luck away, dispelling fear, and passing prosperity and protection to future generations.
Bei Shi got hit pretty hard during the attack, and she probably blanked out for a bit.
Then, perhaps her brain made up some fake memories about that creepy Jingle Beast in the rumors to fill in the gaps.
Bei Ji wanted to kill the Jingle Beast to help his sister. Indeed, getting rid of the thing she fears could work.
But that won't solve the actual issue.
Like we heard on our way here...
The scary beast comes with many different names. We can defeat the Jingle Beast now, but another Twinkle Beast could appear later.
It's not enough to just defeat that one Jingle Beast. One must have the courage to take on any other beasts, too.
That's why I want help Bei Shi overcome her fear with our liondance performance.
As the liondance evolved, it picked up various new styles and elements, which hold unique significance to each person.
Our goal is to create a customized performance that truly benefits Bei Shi.
Okay, gonna go prep now! See you at tomorrow's liondance show!

Text: They're quite busy right now, but I'll let them know. Sir, would you mind coming back after the performance?
Thank you, miss, thank you!
Oh my, how did you get here? Come on, we're going home!
I-I wanna be a Liondancer when I grow up!
Really? Why you want to be a Liondancer? Can you tell mommy?
Because the big lion's so cool! I can scare away bad people and keep mommy safe!
Aww. But it takes a lot to be a Liondancer, you know?
I can do it!
Well, then it depends on whether Mr. Wufang and Mr. Qixing are willing to accept you as their student?
Hmm... I have candies! I hope they'll like my candies...
Gosh, I'm so nervous...

Yeah, the show hasn't started yet, but just seeing such a grand stage already makes my heart race!
Which side do you think the lion's gonna show up from? Left or right?
Hello there, Rover. I think we've met once.
I'm the Drummer of the Liondance Troupe. You can call me Chie.
Yes and no.
Just as people say, Feel the drum and dance along. When it comes to lion dance, there's no set tune. That's why the cooperation between the dancers and drummers is key.
Drummers have to match the Liondancers' moves, while the dancers must follow the drumbeats.
It's like a dance between the two, with the drums guiding the lion's movements and the lion depicting it through their posture and expressions.
That's why we all need to study both liondancing and drumming to better understand each other.
In short, every member of the Liondance Troupe can be a Drummer.
Haha, yeah! Every impressive performance requires years of hard work behind the scenes.
Oh, the show's starting now. Remember to cheer for us!
Enjoy the show!
Oh! You must be that famous Clo... Clover?
Hahahaha... Sorry, my memory's not what it used to be!
My granddaughter said you and Lingyang did a lot for me. Thank you so much.
As I get older, my memory's not as sharp...
But I'll never forget that one liondance show I watched when I was in the military.
The booming Qixing Drum sounded like roars of ferocious lions.
Everyone in the troop felt unstoppable back then!
I never thought that I'd have the chance to watch something like that again... It's bringing up a lot of feelings.
Hi, 漂泊者, fancy seeing you here!
Sheng and I have been discussing our choices, and we still want to give the Settlement ceremony a try.
Besides, things were a little rushed this time, and we aren't really ready yet.
So we've decided to postpone our wedding. We'll choose a good date later!
Aww, that's so sweet. Did you learn that from Lingyang?
But I didn't expect this liondance show to be so big.
This is probably the first time I've watched such a big show ever since I met Sheng.
Yeah, I can't wait for it to start...
What a great stomp on the Dipper poles! What an impressive jump! Haha!
Yeah, I'm still thinking about the show we just watched!
What an amazing show. I'd say it rivals the shows in my time!
The new Liondancer they picked really did a great job!
Our future is in good hands with these youngsters!
漂泊者? Weren't you planning to catch the liondance show? It's about to start, no?’
Sure, here you go! I just heard the supply issue has been resolved. I should get you some extra for free!
Oh well. I really wanted to catch the show, but, you see, I've got so many clients here! Can't step away for a moment!
I really wanted to go, but, you see, I've got so many clients here! Can't step away for a moment!
But I just heard the supply issue has been resolved! Thank you so much for your help. Help yourself to some food while you're here. It's on the house!
Have fun watching the show! Tell Lingyang I said hi!
Hi, 漂泊者, there you are!
It's been quite a while since I last saw a grand liondance show like this. I'm so excited about it.
漂泊者, do you know what is the secret about the Jingle Beast Lingyang was talking about?
Oh, the show's beginning!
Hi Rover, you're back? How was the show?
Hehe, of course! The liondances in Jinzhou are truly spectacular! I'll definitely go watch it myself next time!
Now, I'll be getting ready to go home. You're welcome to visit my place again anytime, 漂泊者!
I was once chased by a big creature in the wilderness. All I could hear was a bell ringing and my only thought was to run away.
Then I heard about the Jingle Beast, so I figured it must have been what attacked me.
But when I saw you perform today, it all came back to me! That's the same bell ringing sound I had heard back then!
So... I must have been saved by that bell.
The bell that sounded like it was chasing after me... It was actually guiding me away from danger.
The liondance inspires and empowers each person in a unique way. I'm glad my performance could give you courage and inspiration.
Yeah! I loved your performance! I think I can keep working as Explorer for the Pioneer Association now!
Bei Shi, that's amazing!
When you joined the Association, I was actually so proud... I'm happy you get to keep chasing your dreams...
And, erm, please forgive me...
I am upset, because you never told me anything... You always carried the burden alone.
Didn't even tell me you were gonna go kill the Jingle Beast... Don't you ever do something like that again!
I promise, I promise. Let me treat you to something as my sincere apology.
I know a nice food stall, it's right up ahead in the square. You should check it out.
Awesome! Bei Shi, let's go!
漂泊者, how was my performance? Did you like it?
Hehe, getting your compliment is all that matters to me!
Hmm... Guess I still need to hone my skills a bit more...
You're making me blush, 漂泊者...
Anyway, I'm super glad to hear that from you.
漂泊者, thank you so much for your help.
I couldn't have accomplished any of this without you.
Yeah, sure... Let's talk somewhere more private.
漂泊者, let's talk here.
Where should I begin...
漂泊者, have you ever thought about this...
Since there are humans with Resonance Abilities...
...Then, could there ever be beasts with the same kind of power?
Uncontrolled emotions in human Resonators lead to disasters. It's even more dangerous in beasts, as they follow instincts.
Over time, most of them died out, driven extinct by their unrestrained desires.
Beasts that can bring their power under control are extremely rare, but... They do exist.
And the Jingle Beast... It happens to be one of them.
A long, long time ago, the Jingle Beast wasn't called the Jingle Beast. It used to have a name—
It was called Suan'ni.
Back then, the Suan'nis lived a tranquil life in deep forests, far away from humans.
However, when the Tacet Fields expanded rapidly, their territories were not spared.
Some of them had to encroach upon certain human territories for a chance to survive.
Humans suffered greatly against the Suan'nis, with their terrifying appearance, powerful Resonance Abilities, and wild animal instincts...
...And that's why the Suan'nis were deemed evil.
Uh... I read it in an old book in Huanglong. Said they lived under that giant Violet Banyan tree in the Dim Forest.
The Suan'nis have nearly gone extinct over the years. And now, there might be only one of them remaining.
And... I've heard of an interesting theory from the archaeologists...
That last Suan'ni may have yearned to become a human.
To make itself more approachable, it first came up with a less intimidating name... Something like, the Jingle Beast.
And then, it yanked off all its fur, filed down its claws, twisted its bones, and learned to stand upright...
Maybe... It was drawn by the bustle and merriment of human cities. It must have been lonely as the last of its kind.
Maybe it was moved by human bravery against the Lament, and wanted to offer help. Maybe it wanted to fight the catastrophe that ruined its once homeland.
Or maybe, it simply couldn't resist human foods?
Anyway... It never really became a human in the end.
If it truly wanted to become human, it had to first understand the essence of what makes a human.
If you ask me, the essence would be the 'heart' of a human.
Therefore, the Jingle Beast no longer rejected its appearance and began to, in its animal form, connect with humans, to assist them...
Perhaps, in this process, it happened to save a girl in the wilderness.
漂泊者, what do you think the ending for the Jingle Beast was? Did it finally become a human?
Well... is that what you think?
I think the Jingle Beast no longer cares whether it's a human or a beast. It lives in its own way.

In this world, there are beings with the appearance of a beast and the soul of a human, just as there are beings with the appearance of a human and the soul of a beast. All it needs to do is be true to itself.
It will remain resolute and convey the beautiful and inspiring qualities it once saw in humans in its own way.
Oops, I got carried away and almost forgot—here, keep this bell as a memento!
Thank you, 漂泊者!
Lingyang! Come here!
Coming!
漂泊者, I must go get the props ready for the next show.
Come watch my performance again next time! Food's on me!
Please keep this bell! It should bring you good luck! Fare thee well, blessings swell!
Hi, 漂泊者, long time no see! Do you still remember me?
My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!
It's me, Bei Shi! My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!
Who's that... It's me, Bei Shi! My brother and I are super grateful for the help we got from you and Lingyang. Please let me thank you again!
We at the Pioneer Association are planning an in-depth investigation into the Jingle Beast's mysteries.
I've read lots of ancient books on this topic during this time.
The books said the Jingle Beast used to live near the Violet Banyan, so I proposed coming here for an investigation.
But our plan had to be put on hold because of the dangerous spores here.
Until not long ago, the Academy sent us a message that the spores had been cleared. We hurried over here as soon as we got the all-clear from them!
And you know what? We really found some traces of a large creature having lived here!
The researcher on our team did a quick analysis, and they've came to the preliminary conclusion that it must be the Jingle Beast.
And the Moon Lanterns on the tree... The Jingle Beast, or maybe its family too, they must have put them up there... Why did they do that?
And this... Lucky Greetings Collection?!
How weird!
Has the Jingle Beast learned how to talk already?
But why would it choose to learn the Lucky Greetings, of all things...
Oh my, how did I leave such an important thing behind...
Whoa, 漂泊者?! Why-why are you here?
R-really? Me too! What a coincidence, ahahaha...
Have you heard? Bei Shi's team just found some traces left by the Jingle Beast. What a surprise!
By the way, where did you learn that from?
Really? How strange! Someone must have forgotten it there!
I mean... The Jingle Beast, learning how to do Lucky Greetings? Who could have thought...
Me? Uh, I have no idea...
Maybe it just wanted to make people happy. Wanted to blend in...
After all, everyone likes the Lucky Greetings, right? Ahahaha...
One day, these weird spores suddenly showed up in the Dim Forest, after the Lament hit.
They turned the once peaceful forest into a deadly wasteland, and many of the forest's inhabitants had to flee their home.
I've been trying to clean up the forest, but I couldn't do it on my own...
Really?! 漂泊者, how did you do that? I can't believe it... You just did something I've been dreaming of doing every day... You're so cool!
Thank you, 漂泊者! The forest and I will never forget your help!
Yeah! I wonder who cleaned up the forest... They must be a very amazing person...
If I ever get the chance, I must thank them properly in person. The forest and I will never forget their help.
If this is really the place where the Jingle Beast used to live... Maybe it put up the first Moon Lantern here?
Perhaps, after being stuck in the dark for so long, even the Jingle Beast would want some light...
Even if it's just a little bit of artificial moonlight... It would have made it feel less lonely.
Yeah, indeed.
I'm sure it's no longer feeling lonely... Not anymore.
Watch out for its ranged attacks!
Rover, have you noticed?
It avoids attacking the moon behind. That moon must be the core of our enemy.
...Copied my weapon already, huh?
RETURN... THE WEAPONS... TO MOTHER...
YOU... MUST PAY...
Careful!
WARNING - ACCESS DENIED
WARNING - ACCESS DENIED
Ah... Why hasn't my grandson's package arrived yet...
Twenty... Thirty... Fourty...
Nice to see you again! Got any fun stories to share this time?
Two thousand and ninety-eight, two thousand and ninety-nine... Hey, it's you, number three thousand! Congrats on being our three thousandth visitor to Jinzhou today!
Everyone's been saying, Make the most of the land, and the people's wisdom will follow. Jinzhou's feats of construction have been the talk of the town!
As the Moon-chasing Festival gets closer, the excitement is definitely in the air. The gate's getting pretty lively too!
You probably haven't noticed because you're not here all day, but trust me, more and more folks are passing through Jinzhou's gate every day.
We've got busy couriers, regular folks, and sometimes workers coming back from the Tiger's Maw all bustling around inside.
I bet it's linked to the Moon-chasing Festival. Oh, and since this is your first Jinzhou festival, I hope you have a great time!
I should use my day off to get ready for the festival. What should I do first?
Great idea. Back in the day, my family would go all out buying decorations and festival toys.
But in the end, we realized we often overdid it. As for meals... we typically eat out now.
If we start with food... cooking a nice, homemade meal surrounding by family and friends... sounds amazing just thinking about it!
Speaking of which, I've seen Mr. Ma from the grocery store quite often lately. He must be prepping for the Moon-chasing Festival too.
He's famous as the 'ingredient expert' around here, very knowledgeable about wild ingredients.
Like guarding Jinzhou's gate, prepping food needs strategy. I'll head over to him after work.
When they say, Make the most of the land, and the people's wisdom will follow, they've gotta be talking about this impressive high wall in Jinzhou.
I heard the creation of this wall was a lucky accident. The byproducts from processing Tacetite weapons turned out to be ideal for defense.
It's ideal for building strong and stable defense structures.
The land was used to its fullest, and everyone did their part. Together, we built Jinzhou brick by brick with our skills.
I think it's not only the high wall that keeps Jinzhou safe, but all of us who stand behind it.
Thinking about this makes the dullness and weariness of guarding the gate fade away.
I'll warn everyone once I see danger! Grandma said I've got super sharp eyes and ears!
Hehe, you can count on me!
You listen to this old lady and her words carefully. Don't go runnin' off to those dangerous places on your own, okay?
Dangers at every corner outside camp grounds. Horrifying monsters... and those Patrollers. You watch yourself.
Want one?
Don't worry. I don't drink when I'm on duty.
No need to tip-toe around me, I know I'm a puppet. I'm just happy to see Jinlu again.
Well, as a dead guy, I try not to overthink things anymore.
I will not let them separate us again.
I know... I know full well. No need for you to remind me. Please. Leave us.
Sorry, my mom can get a bit impatient sometimes, she doesn't mean it.
I don't know how much longer I can stay with mom, but still... I want to make her happy.
Daddy's still inside... Mr. Wu is looking after him.
Daddy… *weeps*…
Lirong... Look what you've gotten yourself into.
Yes, I know... He'd do anything for her. Hopefully he'll wake up soon.
I know staying with us puppets will make my hubby sick eventually... I just want to stay with him while I can.
Yes, maybe we are causing harm by simply existing... But I wouldn't trade what I have now for anything else.
Hey Rover! Ring me up when you find something unusual again, will ya?
Yeah, I heard they'd hide their true identity and inflirtrate criminal groups.
Doesn't sound like something I could pull off... I'd probably have my cover blown in less than three minutes.
Daddy, are we waiting for someone?
Yes, honey. We're expecting a new member...
There, Yuanyuan... Are you hurt?
No, Miss Yinlin. My body is fully functional.
I will not let those puppets fall into Fractsidus hands!
I think I've lost them...
I should be safe at this point.
Linsi... Where are you?
Don't be scared, Xiaofu. We are right here with you...
Fujie. You have no idea how much I miss you...
It's me, Yinlin…
Greetings, Miss Yinlin. Back already?
Yeah, just bringing this boy in.
Yeah, just bringing this girl in.
Want Grandma to get you some snacks after this round of patrol?
I'll pass, Grandma. I don't need to eat, remember?
Hey, bud... Wanna grab a drink tonight?
Haha, nah, I know you can't handle much.
Don't wander off on your own, okay?
I know, Mom. I'm not going anywhere.
Daddy…
Lirong... *sigh*... This is a tough one...
Well, dear. Can you save him?
Ugh... Yuanyuan...
Ow, ow, ow... That's gonna leave a mark.
Xiaosheng!! Stay where you are!
Mom! The monsters are coming!
Another attack? We must keep them away!
I've never seen this many of them before...
Defend the south gate! Enemy attack weakening. This wave is almost over!
You are truly impressive, you will become the one who dominates among us!

In the book, the hero with the sharp blade always ventures into the most dangerous places in the world. The basic tracks are not exciting enough for you. You have the ability to face danger and challenges just like the hero with the sharp blade!
No one has successfully completed the enhanced version of the track I designed. If you want to give it a try, let me know!
Do you want to challenge Overdashing again?!
Alright, after the conversation ends, the challenge will begin. Please reach the distant finish line as soon as possible within the rules.
First, the hero, with a mortal body, rarely knows defeat. We, the followers, must rely solely on ourselves, without borrowing any external abilities, to complete the challenge.
Second, the hero, with a sharp blade in hand, has a weapon by their side. Challengers can use external objects such as a grappling hook during the dash to complete the challenge.
Third, the hero, hiding in high places, their presence unknown. The dash must be done only on the rooftops, and challengers must not touch the ground or seek another path along the way.
The above three are the requirements for Overdashing.
How about it, do you want to start the challenge?
I see, then I look forward to your next challenge!
Alright, looking forward to your next challenge!
Brother, I noticed your successful challenge record!
Keep it up! I hope you can conquer another track!
Oh, you have succeeded in the challenge again!
Your demeanor is just like the hero with the sharp blade himself! This is incredible!
You have surpassed my level, you will definitely be the master of overdashing this year!
I will stay in Jinzhou until this year's competition begins. If you want to continue the challenge, come find me, I will be waiting for you in the usual place!
If you can become the new Overdashing Master, please be sure to share with me the story that the withered sea told you! I can't thank you enough for your great kindness!
Brother, we'll meet again in the martial world!
Dashbon jumped onto the roof and quickly ran away...
Our doc seems busy... I'll go get it myself.
And here we are. This is the Synthesizer Uncle Wei mentioned.

Aside from crafting materials and beefing up their quality, you can also whip up some basic potions here. It’s like a one-stop shop for all your needs, whether you’re kicking it in the city or out on an adventure.
I’ve got some synthesis materials right here. Go ahead, give it a try.
It might seem a bit tricky just hearing about it, but once you try it hands-on, you’ll get the hang of it real quick.
How do you feel? Quite handy, huh?
With technology getting fancier by the day, life’s becoming a breeze around here.
I’m kinda curious, though. If we rallied everyone up again and asked them to bust out their most prized grub, what do you think they’d bring this time?
Oops, got a bit carried away there. Let’s hustle back to Auntie Panhua’s restaurant! Who knew making a dish would be such a mission...
Here you are.
I've been waiting for you.
Call me the Gatekeeper for now. My name doesn't matter. What really matters is the Gate here.
The Gate has been waiting for you, to be more exact.
Behind this gate lies the Somnoire, a space where all the dreams, memories, and emotions of Solaris-3 converge.
It remembers the sweetness of a child's coveted candy and the madness entwined in a dictator's schemes. It delves into the depths of life's subconscious, acquainted with both its beauty and baseness.
In other words, it holds the dreams of all living beings, eternally recorded.
It's made up of the experiences of every individual on Solaris-3 throughout history.
The Somnoire records everything on our planet, with your existence being a crucial component for its normal functioning.
Before your reawakening, something that shouldn't have been there had infiltrated the Somnoire.
Now, the Somnoire is in a state of chaos, and your assistance is much needed to restore its stability—Wait, something's not right...
Tacet Discords are coming out of the Gate...
The situation inside Somnoire must be worse than I thought.
Impressive.
Now I am more confident you'd be able to help us restore the Somnoire to its normal state.
I can't explain it further to you just yet. Not before you regain your memories.
Authentic memories and experiences are imperative for the Somnoire, and I can't casually tamper with them.
At least you now know Tacet Discords are coming out of it. It's kind of like the Tacet Fields.
If you can help us fix the Somnoire, we may be able to prevent more Tacet Discords from showing up. It's like clearing the Tacet Fields.
Of course, you will be adequately compensated. What do you say?
Yes, you've always been like this... Perhaps this is why the Gate has chosen you.
Yes, you've always been like this... Rest assured. I guarantee you'll receive generous rewards.
Once you enter the Gate and see those anomalies with your own eyes, you'll naturally learn more about the Somnoire.
Time is ticking. Let's get inside, then.
Well, this weapon looks decent enough. Take care of it, alright?
If you don’t like what you’re currently using or want another one made, come find me anytime. As long as you've got the casting molds and ores, I'll make it for you.
No need to be so formal, kid. I’m not really useful for much else besides tinkering with weapons.
Just so you know, the ores and materials I just gave you aren’t top-notch. For higher-quality stuff, you’ll want to check out the Synthesizer.
Oh, I heard about it! It's a new type of device the Academy introduced a couple of years back, right over there!
Well, since you know the place, how about having Chixia show you the way there? If you’re short on materials, I can...
Hey, no worries, Uncle Wei. I just snagged some synthesis materials recently. Rover can borrow mine!
Once we check out the Synthesizer, we’ll head straight back to Auntie Panhua’s restaurant. Just sit tight for the good news about whipping up that Essence Medley Soup.
FIGHT… ABSORB… EVOLVE…
It's been immobilized. Time to strike!
Those frequencies we just crashed... The moon is drawing them in?
That moon has cannibalized the Crownless's remaining frequencies to created another monster.
I remember... I saw it during the Battle Beneath the Crescent...
DON'T YOU DARE... COME CLOSE...
MOTHER... NEEDS WEAPONS...
MORE WEAPONS... STRONGER... WEAPONS...
This is the swordsmanship we teach our new recruits... How dare you!
The quantity and models checks out. Gotta say, I'm impressed. You brough in the perfect amount of weapons and gear. They all look brand new, better yet, you stayed in budget!
Hehe... That's why I'm here...
I'll have the guys try them out later. After they give me the okay, I'll speak to the boss about leaving you in charge of getting hardware in the future!
That's great! Thank you, brother! Here's the rest of the budget from earlier. You keep it. If it weren't for you, I wouldn't have the opportunity to shine.
Hehe, sure, you can leave them to me. I'll put them back into the camp's expenses.
I... Works for me. Your call.
You're a clever kid, so word of advise. Use those smarts of yours outside of the camp, not the other way around. The boss doesn't like it that way.
Got it. It won't happen again!
Oh, right, the boss requested for another batch of weapons yesterday. Want them delivered in two days. Can you make it happen?
Not a problem. Consider it done!
Those morning guys should've reported back hours ago. Where the hell are they?
Do you think they might of ran into some trouble?
For getting food and hunting? I'd say they're probably just taking their sweet time and slacking off.
Why should we even care...?
Let's wait another half hour. If they're still not back then we'll take a few guys to go look for 'em.
That'll do.
Right. Mastered all of them?
If you have, I’ll ask you a few questions. And we’ll start the mission if you answer them right.
Okay, I’ll wait.
Great. Question number 1. What did the mother of Qiao Sheng and Qiao Yang do for a living?
Correct. Well done. You remember things fast.
Incorrect. Their mother was a teacher! You have to remember it!
Incorrect. Their mother was a teacher! You have to remember it!
Question number 2. What was the reason for the injury on Qiao Sheng’s right leg?
Correct. You sure are reliable, aren’t you?
Incorrect. The injury was due to an attempted shoplifting at the age of 9.
Incorrect. The injury was due to an attempted shoplifting at the age of 9.
Question number 3. What does Kuixiao, a friend of Qiao Sheng’s at the camp like doing?
Correct. You were very careful when you read the material, weren’t you?
Incorrect. The meat lover is Zaijia. Kuixiao likes studying technologies. Don’t mistake them for one another!
Incorrect. The combat lover is Daji. Kuixiao likes studying technologies. Don’t mistake them for one another!
We still got some time. According to the info we got earlier, they will be checking the stocks today. It might not be the best timing we go in.
Let’s start the mission tomorrow evening. You can keep mastering the material with this time.
Care to have a drink after the shipment?
Why not? I was just planning to get some new novels to read.
Why don't we grab all the supplies we need to get into town on the way after we drink then!
Hey, I’ma go on a private mission. You stay here and cover for me.
What private mission?
Taking out a delivery courier who not only was unfriendly but tricked my money.
These are... enraged Hoochiefs! They've all been contaminated!
*A worried hoohoo*!
Step back. I'll deal with them!
Step back. I'll deal with them!
Alrighty. What should we do next?
Shall we go grab a bite?
I am to return to the Academy.
The anomalies at the Gorges of Spirits, the resurgence of that Tacet Field, and the many Waveworn Phenomena occurrences... I should report them in time.
Then I'll go submit our report, and prepare the documentation needed for Rover's audience with the Magistrate while I'm there.
It's the political hub of Jinzhou, and where the Grand Library is located.
The City Hall is an important place. Seeking an audience with the Magistrate isn't too difficult, but there are still rules to follow.
It may take some time, but there won't be too much paperwork.
Then I guess I'll take Rover over to the Nexus Tower for registration first, and we'll just hang out for a while.
Being new to Jinzhou and all, he can't be left standing outside the City Hall with nothing to do.
Being new to Jinzhou and all, she can't be left standing outside the City Hall with nothing to do.
Hospitality is our local speciality, you know!
Then I'll leave you in Chixia's care, Rover. Is that alright with you? I'll give you a call once the paperwork is done.
Leave it to me!
I'll send the Branch of Resonmedical Science a notice. We need to conduct a throughout physical examination on you to make sure you are fine.
Come visit the Academy after your audience if you have no other plans.

Yes. A physical examination would be required to determine if any disease is present. If no medical issues are found, we'll conduct further monitoring and analysis to understand what happened to your body.
Of course, we won't do anything without your consent.
The unique nature of your condition requires specialized treatment only available in the Huaxu Academy.
And your body is bound to arouse the interest of many researchers.
Myself included.
Baizhi, I think your last sentence could be worded better...
I see. I agree that my phrasing lacked the attention to detail. Please allow me to reorganize my words.
You guys done yet?
What's the hold up. Let's move, then I'll have more time to show Rover around!

We've got loads of fun in Jinzhou! We can go watch Liondances, Hero Plays, Stand-up Shows, and then maybe the Martial Championships... Plus tons of different treats to try out. You think it, we have it.
General!
We've got all equipment repaired, Tacetite weapons adjusted and given to Resonators. Non-Resonators are also equipped and prepared for action.
But... the rain's getting heavier. Should we take shelter for the time being?
One of our combat medics claims it's no ordinary downpour, and he strongly advises holding off any moves until it clears.
Though young, his sharp intuition has been proven in previous battles. You've seen it firsthand.
However... I do agree this will be our last chance at organizing another attack.
Sir, his name is...
Ji...yan...
General, help... Please... help me...
What do you make of this, Jiyan?
Maybe you are right.
The rain just happened out of nowhere. It's indeed unusual. But...
This is our only chance.
The enemy we've been yearning to destroy is finally right before us.
And now you're asking me to sit back and do nothing because of some Phantoms?
Silence... Is this your response? Or is it fear holding your tongue?
Ah... I see. You’re no different. We fear, we bleed, we suffer, and in the end, we'll all die on the battlefield.
But what about your brethren, friends and comrades? As you witness them viciously slain before your eyes, one by one...
Will you still remain silent when their souls demand an answer?
There is no other choice. We must trample the pile of corpses at our feet and push on. Keep barking orders, keep fighting until every last one of those monsters is gone.
The Retroact Rain merely creates illusions of past events. My soldiers will not succumb to those hallucinations. I will not allow it.
We'll crush anything in our path, no questions asked.
And I will pave the way for us all with my Forte.
If tens, hundreds, thousands more of my men will die… So be it. We will win this battle, by any means necessary.
Jiyan, I have a question for you... What would you have done on that day, if you were in my position?
Whatever you say... I'll never answer those brave souls with such silence and cowardice.
General Geshu Lin... We fight to protect what we cherish.
And we cherish our comrades, not out of cowardice or fear, but out of trust. The trust in their lives' worth.
I cannot assure you I am always making the right choice, General.
But we should never build our victory on top of endless sacrifices.
Hah, is that so?
As I see it, we are cut from the same cloth, you and I.
Perhaps we are indeed, General. I share at least one thing with you. I, too, will draw my blade to fight for what I believe in... and I'll stop at nothing to see it through.
General!
General... You look pale.
I am fine. Please go on.
We just detected an intense frequency reaction from that Tacet Field ahead.
That moon... It's gradually turning full now, as you predicted.
The sky... It looks just like how it was during the Battle Beneath the Crescent...
It's time.
Sir, the Midnight Rangers are ready. We await your orders.
Attention all troops! Take position and get ready to engage!
Yes, sir!
When the moon turns full, a roving traveler shall return... The prophecy is being fulfilled.
Here they are.
They're not coming at us... Are they trying to protect something... Or are they waiting for commands?
With an TD Outbreak of this magnitude and organization, someone must be orchestrating it. Could it be...
It looks almost full now.
And the Retroact Rain falling... Rover, maybe this is the right time Madam Magistrate was talking about?
...Citizens of Jinzhou, please remain calm and evacuate in an orderly manner as we practiced during previous drills...
It's a pre-recorded broadcast message. Our Magistrate saw this coming, and she had General Jiyan devise an emergency plan a long time ago.
This wave of TD attacks should be over now.
We knew this was coming and we were ready, but oh boy, the amount of TDs is insane.
Thanks for coming in time, Rover. It would've taken us much longer to handle this.
Oh, Director Taoqi is here too. For a better run down of the situation, you can find her near the city gate!
Ugh... Please tell me this is the last one!
Rover, your moves are sharp as always. Dealing with so many TDs seems like a walk in the park for you.
Rover, did you see that?
Now it's almost identical to what we saw three years ago, during the Battle Beneath the Crescent.
I'm afraid... We're already running out of time.
Report the situation, please.
Madam Magistrate, the barrier has been fully repaired and we have evacuated all residents. We've successfully minimized the damage.
Well done, Director Taoqi.
Indeed, it's been a while, Rover.
It’s been going according to plan, if I may say so. I was made aware of this in advance, and planned out our defense beforehand.
Now that we are facing such an emergency, I cannot sit back and wait for Jué to save us. I will act and see my duty through. This is my decision.
I have secured some much-needed aid for our city during my visit to the capital. Also, our experts should be ready by now.
Rover, do you still remember Jué's message for you?
Now we have raindrops that fall upstream, and the Midnight Rangers' General in the Norfall Barrens, ready to take on the Ovathrax.
This must be the right time Jué was talking about.
Rover, it's going to be dangerous. You might... directly confront a Threnodian.
You eyes look as determined as ever.
I understand how you must feel, Rover.
I have been in a similar situation before. When my life suddenly took a big turn, and I had no choice but to face it head on.
On the entire Jinzhou’s behalf, I am immensely grateful for your assistance, Rover.
You will be remembered as a heroic ally in our defense against external threats, regardless of the outcome of this battle.
May victory prevail the lasting night. I will pray for your safe return.
Rover, I have informed border checkpoints across Jinzhou about your trip to the front line. You have been granted unlimited access to all places.
Yangyang, you're one of our Outriders. I hope you can go with Rover and provide assistance.
You'll need to pass through a Tacet Field to reach our base in the Desorock Highland. Please be careful.
Rover, Yangyang, I'll be keepin' the city safe as a Patroller. Do come back in one piece, okay?
Thanks! I'll give it my all!
Rover! I said don't call me that... Nevermind, we don't have time for this.
Wow, thanks, Rover! Can't believe you still remember that title! I'll live up to it for sure!
It seems the rain is not stopping anytime soon...
The city... What if...
Rest assured. You can count on me!
I will keep everyone safe.
Me... Me too!
Don't forget us Liondance Troupe!
We've got this!
Hehe, as you can see. Everyone's ready to defend our city.
Rover, Yangyang, safe travels!
I've informed General Jiyan that you're heading to his place. He will be meeting up with you soon.
May victory prevail the lasting night!
Customer! Just a moment. The catapult will lock on the target in just a moment.
Good. Target locked. Ready to fire. Counting down...
Three! Two! One!
Fire!
It's about time. Zeyuan should have the entry pass ready. I'll go catch up with him.
It's about time. Zeyuan should have the entry pass ready. I'll go catch up with him.
Yes, the neo-classical theory influenced this painting.
Is this artwork a source of empowerment for its audience?
What? Oh... Hahaha, indeed.
Will you attend the opening ceremony of the art festival next week?
Of course, I will go. After all, they have invited me three times.
Why do you insist on street portraits?
Well, it's my way to pay back to the loyal support of my fans...
You're really skilled! Neither track has defeated you!
I have prepared a prize for you. Please come to me!
The third rule of Overdashing is, you lose as soon as you touch the ground!
Do you want to challenge again?
Alright! Please return to the starting point.
Alright, take your time. This sport often requires long-term training to make progress. Looking forward to your next challenge!
The third rule of Overdashing is, you lose as soon as you touch the ground!
Do you want to challenge again?
Alright! Please return to the starting point.
Take your time, don't rush. This sport often requires long-term training to make progress. Looking forward to your next challenge!
Where on earth is it…
If you find anything, please let me know. Thank you so much!
The gift should be nearby. Judging by Pudding's behavior, it should be leading us there!
Let's follow its lead. We will find the gift soon!
There should be plenty of ingredients around here.
If needed, we can also collect some.
Oh my, I only remember there's a rabbit hole here, but forgot its exact spot.
Hopefully, Pudding will guide us right.
Ugh… again, painted for nothing. Oh, hey! Would you like a portrait, Sir?
Ugh… again, painted for nothing. Oh, hey! Would you like a portrait, Miss?
I'm a professionally trained painter. If the portrait turns out not to bear your resemblance, I won't charge you a thing.
Awesome! You seem to know the drill, right? Please take a seat here.

Shuyun Herbal Tea, refreshing and heat-clearing!

To describe the dense fog... packages would be soaked by the fog in the past.
Thankfully, Mumian, my colleague, invented a type of dehumidifier. When paired with our special delivery boxes, we can ensure the package stays dry for three days.
But even with this extra insurance, one can never be too careful when you're traveling through Whining Aix's Mire.
Oh, these dehumidifiers are quite effective!
Yeah. It's a must-have when delivering packages in Whining Aix's Mire.
Without it, even the delivery box can't shelter packages from the penetrating fog.
I have a stellar reputation for making dehumidifiers. I can assure that!
Look! I made these dehumidifier from Violet Coral ground into powder, mixed with Angelica!
Angelica repels insects, and Violet Coral powder absorbs water... With these, we don't have to fear the heavy fog anymore.
If only Port Gunchao could always stay peaceful like this...
It's been many years since this port completed when I joined the Patrollers.
After that, I stayed here every day, handling immigration issues while guarding the port.
No. I've got Port Gunchao with me. It's always there, quiet and peaceful.
No. Seeing the calm and peaceful Port Gunchao, it just puts my mind at ease.
Even if my legs grow old and weak, I'll still hold it dear in my heart.
I see no point standing guard here all day... We should strike first.
It just gives me a feeling that we'll lose the initiative if we remain here.
You get the same feeling, right? How can we just stay here without taking any further moves?
I heard that the TD over at Desorock Highland has been causing quite a stir recently...
And here I am, stuck at this port, unable to do anything. I feel useless.
Oh, it's just that I got hurt during the war last time... Uncle Gaoshan just transferred me here for recovery.
Uncle Gaoshan said I can't return to the front lines until I fully recover... But it's just some minor injury.
...Darn it. I got too excited. I think my wound has reopened...
Check the order and the goods, and be careful with the quantity. Make sure you transfer the goods correctly, as sending the wrong goods can damage our reputation.
This is a catchy rhyme I wrote myself. What do you think?
Hehe, thank you. I didn't get much of an education, but I enjoy reading and poetry in my spare time.
Lately, I've been brainstorming some more serious pieces.
What do you think about using the Whining Aix as inspiration?
Perhaps their mournful song isn't meant to intimidate humans, but merely a call between mates.
The Whining Aix leaves the branch to soar. Unable to fly, they perish together...
Hey, you're the Rover, right? I'm the boss of Maosan and Gousi. They told me you've saved them from some kind of mess.
I know you're some expert!
Betcha! We've gone through a lot together. Names are the representations!
Thank you for saving them. They were crying lightning just like some naughty kids. Can't deal with them, right?
I should be nice to them. We live our lives, no more dirty jobs!
This is mind-blowing. I wonder how did you make it.
Trust me, I'll give you some results!
Scar, you are now under arrest for committing multiple felonies in Huanglong. Do you have anything to say?
What do I want to say, huh? While I'd love to tell you another story... I guess that's not what you want to hear.
Let's cut to the chase, “Madam Magistrate”. I'm getting bored already.
Very well. You will answer only our questions from now on.
Sure, why not. What do you want to know?
A Sentinel such as Jué can predict and correct future events. It gets in our way of achieving our sublime vision.
We merely wanted to topple the set future built on lies, and take control of our own destiny.
The Threnodians... They hold the key to our ideal.
Together they will bring us the promised true Lament, and we will embrace the new world that is bound to come.
What is the Lament? Disaster? Curse? Some kind of punishment? Ha! People only see the surface...
The Lament brings death, destruction, and countless Reverberations.
Reverberations that will be reflected, overlapped, and interwoven during the Lament... They will be our salvation, the only path to a new lifeform and a new civilization.
Our goal has always been the same... We want you. Need you to join us.
Forces battle over you, causing all this strife, and yet you remain unaware of your own worth... Are you really that naive, or are you just dense?
But whatever. Our interest in you isn't affected by such trivial matters.
Too bad. We will then be forced to kill you, by any means necessary...
But I'm sure you'll willingly come to us... When the time arrives.
You kidnapped Jué and revived the Threnodian, accelerating the next Lament... This is proof enough that you are the enemy of Jinzhou, and all humanity.
Stop dreaming you can force Rover to join you. He is our honored guest, and I will not allow any harm to come He way.
Stop dreaming you can force Rover to join you. She is our honored guest, and I will not allow any harm to come She way.
Ha! How confident you sound. As the Threnodian's resurrection approaches, Jinzhou is barely holding on. How much longer do you think you can keep up this facade?
Thank you for your concern. We have crushed your schemes once, and we can do it again.
I have one last question for you. Abducting Jué, stalking Rover, and setting up an ambush in Qichi Village... You couldn't have accomplished that all on your own.
Unless...
Unless I'm not the only Overseer in Jinzhou, right? Hahaha...
I have answered all your questions with full honesty. I don't mind you knowing, because it won't make any difference.
You can try to stop us with all you have... But it's too late to change the course of history.
Now, I have one question for you...
You seem convinced we caused the disappearance of Jué... What if I told you there was more to it? Would you be curious?
About Jué... What else do you know?
Come closer and I'll tell you, Madam Magistrate... It's a secret for your ears only...
How dare you! Madam Magistrate, I...
No, it can't be...
Shocked, aren't you? But there's more...
What if I told you... Your Sentinel had made this prophecy a long, long time ago?
Your all-seeing Sentinel abandons you now of all times. Need I say more?
We're merely adding a touch of extra fuel to the fire that will soon consume all.
Rover, care for a wager? I know you've been searching for answers about your past, and I've got news for you—
Watch out!
You are one of us, the black lambs, and you have been chosen to join us ushering in the new world...
Once you discover what you really are, you will come to us with no hesitation.
The Fractsidus awaits your arrival with open arms.
And I look forward to that day in sincere anticipation...
Hehehehehe.... AHAHAHAHAHA!
Scar is put in jail...
...Sorry, Rover. What he mentioned about our Sentinel is... highly sensitive. I cannot disclose it yet, not before verifying it myself.
Is it a ploy to create distrust among us, or... I must first find our Sentinel to uncover the truth.
Jué is the Guardian Sentinel of Jinzhou. It is responsible of assisting Jinzhou's Magistrate in administrative affairs.
While I am the final decision maker... Without the assistance of Jué, I cannot guarantee I'm always making the best choices for my people.
T-Thank you. I am glad you think so.
Jué can predict the future, and up to this point, every one of its prophecies have been proven true.
Jué can predict the future, and up to this point, every one of its prophecies have been proven true.
While justice may not be universally agreed upon, its decisions have consistently served the best interests of Huanglong.
For that... I suppose we will have to talk to it in person to find out.
In addition, Rover, Jué once told me to deliver a message to you.
To the Awakened One: When raindrops fall upstream, please head to the Norfall Barrens, and seek General Jiyan of the Midnight Rangers.
I suppose so. General Jiyan is currently battling another TD Outbreak in the Norfall Barrens, which will also serve as our frontline against the Threnodian.
But the ongoing war has made it a very dangerous place to go.
Since you won't need to go there right now, not until when the raindrops fall upstream...
I know you're here for clues about your true identity, and I don't want you to leave the city empty-handed.
Have you heard about the Black Shores, Rover?
It's an organization shrouded in mystery, with a secretive membership process and members who usually keep their identities hidden.
Upon your awakening, one of their members discreetly contacted me to gather information about you.
But please don't worry. The Black Shores developed a special Lament prediction system, and has established partnerships with countries worldwide.
While operating in secrecy, they are not an extremist group like the Fractsidus.
They have been monitoring the situation in Jinzhou to provide assistance when needed.
Thanks to their extra help, my meeting with you went smoothly.
This Blake Bloom is their symbol. The Black Shores members usually wear it on their person.
The Black Shores once provided us significant insights into the relationship between the moon and Threnodians.
This time, they've come to inform us a Threnodian is about to resurrect near Jinzhou.
Apart from that, I am not sure what else they may be hoping to achieve.
Rover, after the recent series of events, I trust you have gained a general idea of who you might have been.
Before you fell into that deep slumber, you likely played a significant role in important historical events, shaping the course of history in some way.
Ultimately... I suppose it is up to you to discover the final definitive answer for yourself.
Yes, I suppose it does make them stand out. On the other hand, they presumably possess extraordinary abilities to stay anonymous.
This photo is yours to keep. I will return with Jué shortly, and the Black Shores may be worth your try during this time.
Rover! Are you all right?
I see... The Black Shores must have a deep connection to your past.
Since you are likely being closely monitored by the Fractsidus now...
I suggest keeping an eye out for the Black Shore members. They could prove to be your valuable allies.
I'll do my best to find Jué, and tell you everything I learned from it once I return.
This is my promise.
Yes. Please leave it to me.
Sanhua.
Yes, Madam Magistrate.
I will be going on a temporary leave. During my absence, please help me handle my responsibilities in Jinzhou.
Understood. Should I continue protecting that Rover?
No need. Both Changli and I will be away, and there'll be more paperwork for you to handle.
Is Lady Changli leaving for the capital?
Please pardon my intrusion, but he just faced an ambush in the Central Plains. What if...
Please pardon my intrusion, but she just faced an ambush in the Central Plains. What if...
Regarding that incident... We tried to warn him about the Fractsidus, but they were more cunning than we thought.
Regarding that incident... We tried to warn her about the Fractsidus, but they were more cunning than we thought.
If he runs into another powerful enemy like Scar, he'll eventually have to confront them on he own.
If she runs into another powerful enemy like Scar, she'll eventually have to confront them on she own.
Sanhua, you can place more trust in Rover and me.
Understood. I will.
My lady... No matter what happens, my sword is always yours.
Both the interrogation and my appointed meeting with Rover have already finished.
Scar only needed the two of you as his audience. We already knew what he wanted, and we let him have as much.
He decrypted every message we intended to convey. It's only proper you meet He in person, as the one who crafted those puzzles.
She decrypted every message we intended to convey. It's only proper you meet She in person, as the one who crafted those puzzles.
Such intricate puzzles... I guess only Rover has the patience to solve them all.
No detail is too small. I'm sure he understands. Besides... Not seeing the opponent heightens the thrill of the game.
No detail is too small. I'm sure she understands. Besides... Not seeing the opponent heightens the thrill of the game.
If everything goes according to the prophecies of Jué, I will meet him in person eventually.
If everything goes according to the prophecies of Jué, I will meet her in person eventually.
So... What did our captive from the Fractsidus tell you about Jué?
...That Jué had predicted I will have to fight it one day. A fight that will shape Jinzhou's future.
Well, that is... unexpected. But you don't seem all that surprised, do you?
Can't say I am. I had suspected as much from our previous conversations, and the message it left me... His words only confirmed it.
Where was it when you last sensed its presence?
It was... In Mt. Firmament. Unlike Jinzhou city, that mountain is still resting in stillness.
The place where the first people of Jinzhou lived, and where Jué first manifested before us humans... I see.
I'll find Jué and bring it back as soon as possible.
Our enemies could have planned it as a trap. We have a bigger goal to focus on, remember?
I understand. I will not let anything or anyone disrupt the peace in Jinzhou.
Would you let what you heard from Scar sway your determination?
No, he cannot ever turn me against Jué. If anything, his words only confirmed my theory.
I am the Magistrate of Jinzhou, appointed by the Sentinel itself.
The prophecy speaks of a decisive incident for Jinzhou's future, where I will be a key player. The fight between me and Jué is only a precursor.
My job remains unchanged. I will fulfill my duty as Jinzhou's Magistrate with my own judgment.
And that's your final answer?
A single strand's neglect births mountainous upheaval. You taught me that, remember?
The safest option is for me to go in person.
...Very well.
Since we are already mid-game, I will let you decide our next move.
This time, I shall be a pawn in your hand.
Remember I will always stand by your side, in this crisis or any other.
...Am I a player or a mere pawn? I suppose there is no difference at this point.
No matter what, I will do what I must.
I found it... It's located on the Wei shelf.
Bye! See you again.
Let's call it a day. The happy hours begin! Hmm? It's you, is there something you need?
Hehe. Because I practice the conservationism of energy. I avoid unnecessary endeavors and seek to finish what needs to be done with least efforts.
Although I'm often misunderstood, isn't it perfectly normal to get off work as soon as you're done with what you need to do?
The first principle of energy conservation is to learn to adapt. But I'm not talking about adapting to the pace of work, but about making work adapt to your own pace.
Alright, do you want to say goodbye to the energy-consuming work life with me?
For example, you can go to the living area. Although you can't bring the entire Jinzhou to the mining area, at least you can recreate parts of it.
Like the local dishes at the food stalls. Sharing conversations with your friends around a table over some tea. Or perhaps playing some chess with the retired miners.
Over time, this small area became the miniature of Jinzhou to the miners.
You need to feel the vibe yourself. Drop by the area if you have time.
Oh, the Moon-chasing Festival is coming up, and last year was too swamped to get the chance to see the lanterns with my Xiaobao.
This year is my chance to make up for it. I wonder what kind of gift would be good for the child?
Toys? I don't really understand the likes of children. I have to ask that kid, Chixia, for help.
She often helps me babysit my Xiaobao, who treats her like a real sister and tells her everything.
Food? I work down in the mine all year round. To be honest, my knowledge of food in Jinzhou is as good as yours. So I should ask you for recommendations.
Quality time with Xiaobao... Yes, I haven't been able to spend time with the child because of work.
Last year the child had a huge tantrum because he didn't see the lanterns with me, and it took a long time to calm him down.
Moon-chasing Festival, the festival that children are always talking about... I'm actually quite looking forward to it. To be honest, I was once one of the Exiles.
In the past, even on the day of the Moon-chasing Festival, we had to worry about the supplies needed for survival.
It was only after we were accepted by Jinzhou that we started to enjoy the Moon-chasing Festival like everyone else.
Thank you for your suggestion. I will think about it after work...
You... don't seem to work here. Is there anything I can help you with?
You want to know about the past and present of the mine, right? I've only been stationed here not for long.
But occasionally I can hear the miners talking about it. It is said that the Tiger's Maw Mine was built on the ruins of a city.
Affected by the Lament, Jinzhou underwent some drastic tectonic changes, in which the ore mines buried deep were turned out and exposed to the surface.
So the Tiger's Maw Mine became an indispensable source of energy supply in the founding of Jinzhou.
After the mineshafts were built, the mine gradually started to form its own ecosystem as the production and research facilities, and living quarters, as well as other amenities, were set up.
As for the ore... Although I'm not an expert, I picked up a few things over time as I spent enough time around here.
Apart from the Tacetite, which is the largest in demand, the Tiger's Maw Mine also produces Lampylumen.
I heard from the researchers that it's a special kind of ore where the veins of minerals distribute evenly along the same direction.
And the veins are composed of a variety of minerals, which can be processed into raw materials that can be used in advance technologies like terminals and cores of intelligent devices.
However, the Academy and the Ministry of Development didn't stop their research from there. So, maybe one day they'd discover a field of application.
How to resolve the disputes?
Yes, the dispute about the deployment of the new technology has been escalating recently, and I'm worried that the workplace party next week will turn into a chaos.
New technologies always meet resistance at the start. Because it's not only about technology, but also about people behind it.
The old miners represent experience and skills from the old times, and the young miners are the promoters of new technology.
As more and more young miners join in, these dynamics are thrown off balance. So the conflict was set off.
As for me... I'm not one of the miners, but a Patroller who carries out the duties as required.
The concerns or reasons for disagreements aren't as many as they appear to be. I think it's natural for things to iterate and evolve, isn't it?
Just like the law of physics we all learn in textbooks: the entropy of a system is bound to increase over time. And the systems of the world aren't isolated.
So as they recombined, they'd return to a low entropy state before the entropy rises again.
Isn't this the law of the world?
Geez, I can finally take a breather now. Lately, I've been bombarded with people trying to sell me rocks...
Hi, there. Let me know if you're ever in need of ore! We've got all types.
Hope this helps! Thanks and come back soon!
Sorry, but you need more credits. Come back when you have enough, yeah?
With just a few simple ingredients, I can whip up endless delicious dishes. Don't underestimate the power of flavor combinations!
Hey there, what can I get you? The place is small, but there's plenty to choose from!
Did you like it? Of course, you did! My cooking never disappoint. Come back anytime!
Looks like you're in a bit of a pickle. You're welcome to come back anytime.
It's been a while, Rover! We solved the mine's crisis all thanks to your help.
Found anything you want? Feel free to look around.
Nice pick, I hope they come in handy in your journey. Stay careful out there.
I'll be right here when you need anything again.
It's dangerous beyond this point. No trespassers!
Even Resonators need to be careful. The front line is intense...
Don't go up the slope near the Lookout Camp. It's strictly off-limits.
It's close to Norfall Barrens, an unpredictable territory of threats... Even powerful Resonators shouldn't underestimate it.
I find the wind extremely unsettling tonight... I sense a desperate voice from it.
An old friend, who has been here for decades.
I can't leave him here for the lonely night. So I come here every night to keep his company.
If you happen to run into Zongye back in Jinzhou City, remember to say hi for me.
And remember to keep my secret.
One, two, three... These Green Rabbits should be enough to last a week.
As you can see, I'm processing the ingredients. First, wash them, then peel them, and finally chop them into small pieces. Add scallions, ginger, and garlic, and stir-fry them...
Freshly cooked rabbit meat has a soft texture and delicious taste... Just thinking about it makes my mouth water!
Desorock Highland is far from Jinzhou. Even fresh meat will become dry and tough after being transported here.
It's better to have some fresh meat here and satisfy our cravings.
Because rabbit meat is delicious! Freshly cooked rabbit meat has a soft texture and delicious taste... Just thinking about it makes my mouth water!
Desorock Highland is far from Jinzhou. Even fresh meat will become dry and tough after being transported here.
It's better to have some fresh meat here and satisfy our cravings.
Norfall Barrens is now under threats...
Tacet Discords kept attacking, and it was only through the desperate resistance of the Midnight Rangers that the Lookout Camp was defended...
Although I've often read about the horrors of war in books. Seeing it with my own eyes is a whole different experience...
Even my heart feels like it's been drenched by the Retroact Rain, losing its color just like the view of Withering Frontline...
*Sigh* Thank you. I should gather myself up.
Even though I can't join the Midnight Rangers on the front lines, there's still something I can do.
I want to capture the moment of where the desperate resistance shines upon those nameless graves.
Excarats traces. I should follow it.
Excarats traces. I should follow it.
A communications device... Exiles seem to have intercepted its signal. I may be able to find a similar device in the Exile camp nearby.

I think I managed to find all of the stolen components, so it wouldn't matter that much.

The power's reconnected. The powerline seems to be leading up to that abandoned lighthouse.
The power's reconnected. The powerline seems to be leading up to that abandoned lighthouse.
Let's see if there's anything I can find in that lighthouse.
