The lighthouse looks like it was built ages ago. Should be operational with some patching up here and there.
We're still missing a few parts for the repairs. I already had my assistant go fetch some at the edge of the hill.
She's been gone for quite a while now. I'm guessing she's probably caught in some trouble. What will I do with her...
There is a riddle at the end of the recording...
There is a riddle at the end of the recording...
Look afar at break of dawn, by the end of light's shadow, surprising discoveries await!
Look afar at break of dawn, by the end of light's shadow, surprising discoveries await!
How did it go? Did you find anything?
Do come back to me after you have found all five lighthouses. I await your successful return!
Hello, hello! You must be the one who solved the mysteries of the lighthouses.
Please, describe to me your findings within the consoles. I am truly intrigued.
You told the historian what you found inside the consoles.
How could this be?! You managed to find information from all five lighthouse consoles you say...!
Your passion for history is much greater than that of my own pupils. This brings tears to my eyes.
Of course, this information is more than adequate for me to calculate the Stingray's whereabouts. But there is something strange about this...
No. It's just that it is not worth searching for it anymore.
According to those coordinates, I can say with confidence that this Stingray is the same ship that we salvaged near the harbor of the Whining Aix's Mire a few years prior.
Inside the wreckage, we found some of the crew's logs, although broken into pieces, we still managed to link them with the stories found in the consoles.
Unfortunately, we also discovered six bodies inside... Based on the information we have, they belong to Moak and his crew members.
Further investigations found that the deaths of the other five members date back even further than the time when Moak made his first recording in the lighthouse.
In other words, Moak had been sailing on the sea alone all this time, and his crew members had long since fallen victim to the TDs...

Experiencing such losses, Moak refused to accept such an ending. So he fell into a fantasy, that he and his crew members all found the lighthouses one by one, found their own homes, and left the Stingray safely.
In the end, only he himself completed the voyage and forever laid in that seabed with the Stingray.
I cannot make any guarantees, as these are just my own speculations. Yet, unfolding forgotten stories, is what makes history fascinating.
No matter the case, I'm very grateful to you for letting me witness the entire story in its entirety. You deserve these rewards for your passion for history.
Little lambs cowered and huddled in their village, terrified of the relentless wolf packs.
Until a shepherd arrived, bearing the gift of wishes and providing shelter and sustenance.
Slowly, the shepherd gained control over the flock, and the lambs lived contented lives... but this is not the end of our story.
The shepherd found the solitary black lamb in his flock, and offered to grant any wish it desired. In exchange, he wanted one of its companions as a sacrifice.
The black lamb refused, and it was shunned by its flock, left without shelter or sustenance.
After the black lamb's exile, more lambs continued to vanish...
The shepherd then blamed that black lamb for breaking the rule, and withheld his wish-granting power as punishment.
From the very beginning, the lambs knew the risk of making wishes—they could become sacrifices for those of others.
But they always believed it wouldn't be them.
Meanwhile, some lambs reasoned that since they had already risked being sacrificed for someone else's wish...
It was then only fair to pass on that risk for a chance at fulfilling their own desires. And so, they continued to play the game.
They all knew the consequences, but chose to remain silent.
Fearful yet greedy, they followed the shepherd's orders and made wishes again and again...
Until one day a black lamb spoke up, shattering their façade of a peaceful and happy life.
The black lamb got in the way of the flock and the shepherd's greedy pursuit, sparking hatred in their hearts.
Suddenly, they could no longer ignore the blood and ashes of past sacrifices littering the ground.

Do we really need Dark Knights in the wilderness of Jinzhou...
It's a trending topic among the Patrollers. Recently there have been fewer cases involving the Exiles.
Because in addition to the efforts of the Public Security Bureau to contain the Exiles, there is an upsurge of these so-called Dark Knights in the wild.
These are a group of armed civilians who serve punishments to the criminal Exiles in vigilante style outside of the judicial system.
A righteous course by the look of it, if it's bound to cause chaos if everyone does this.
Jinzhou has always had different punishments for the Exiles committing different degrees of crimes.
They are more lenient towards misdemeanors. Only those considered a threat to public safety may be taken restrictive measures against.
But, if everyone serves their own version of justice, chances are ill-intent individuals may administer unjust penalties for crimes, which could be ten times worse than the initial offense.
I think everyone should calm down and reconsider their actions.
Hmm, the air outside is so much better. I feel alive again.
Unlike the damp and musty smell in the confession room, which I seemed to have gotten used to. I've become a regular in the confession room.
Hey, it's just some minor procedural noncompliances. After becoming a patroller, I realized that I could quite agree with some of these regulations. I have my own ways of justice.
I value justice as shown in the substantive results, not the tedious proceedings. In extraordinary times, you need to use extraordinary means.
In this case, had we gone through all the required procedures when we tried to retrieve the stolen mineral resources from the Exiles, they would have sold it off by now.
So, I had to use some *unconventional* methods to trick them out. Yet, I got scolded for it. But... at least I got the results I wanted.
Well. It's not my first time. I guess my partner, Baichuan, has reported it to the supervisors again.
He always talks about laws being like a compass, the circles drawn with a compass is bound to be better than drawn with hands.
Yeah, because aside from selling ores, we're now buying them too.
People have been eager to sell the ore they found to us. Sadly, most of it was just worthless rocks.
That's why I thought, maybe we should team up with the Pioneer Association to create a special magazine issue about identifying ores.
We could give readers tips on how to distinguish them by color, shine, and other traits.
Mind giving me a few pointers after I finish my first draft?
If only every day could be so peaceful and calm...
Hello, I'm the patroller here. Is there anything I can help you with?
The distribution center is an important part of the Tiger's Maw Mine and a crucial node in the mine's logistics system.
At the distribution center, the ores excavated are unloaded, sorted, and then sent to various destinations.
Our job as patrollers here is to maintain the order of operations and the temporary storage of mineral resources.
So, are you interested in joining us?

A little girl carried her doll to the garden. The doll suddenly let out a loud cry and called for her mother. The mother came and spooned up the doll instead of her daughter... How about it? Scared yet?
Oh, this is your first time listening to a horror story, isn't it? The fact that it still gets the ones who haven't heard of it proves it's a classic macabre rhyme.
The essence of horror stories is about eerie things taking place in day-to-day scenes. Like the tune I just hummed.
If you pay attention, you see it's not the girl who's crying but the doll. That's why the second half is added.
Dad and Mom are arguing, and the little girl is crying. The little girl calls for Mom. M-mom is gone.
Dad just fertilized the garden trees, the cherry tree turned new leaves. Curiously I dug underneath, and found my doll buried deep...
I don't know when I became obsessed with them. Maybe it's because horror stories have a clear representation of karma.
Behind the twists and turns of the gloomy plots is a pursuit of romantic ideals.
I have always suspected that there are real horror stories around me, just between you and me.
To think of something ominous might lurk in the darkness under the cold industrial surface of this jungle of steel and bolts... Phew... I've got goose bumps.
Stop right there. I can sense the pulsating restless energy emanating from you.
That is something more dazzling than the morning sun, more profound than the sea- You must my alley in justice!
Of course... I heard it from Chixia. She said she recently became friends with someone with a stern cold face and dresses all in black.
Haha, actually it's Xiaofang... Ahem, Chixia is my senior from the previous year.
At that time, I was quite a lone kid. She would often come to the backyard of my home to play games with me.
Later, under her influence, I gradually opened up and we began to talk about fantasies of us saving the world.
However, after becoming a Patroller, I realized that everything was not quite as I imagined. Not all Patrollers has the cool and commanding air.
Personal disputes, Exiles's scams, petty thefts... every day is just the same... These are the norm of the work.
Sometimes, you forget the birthdays of the important ones in your life while you still remember container sorting numbers at the logistics center.
I'd get tired of these trivial matters, but...
On weekends, when I take off the Patroller's uniform and see the ordinary people passing by while wandering around.
I see busy couriers rushing on the road, Pioneer Association members going on expeditions, and workers returning to Jinzhou to visit their families...
At moments like this, I'd see how our efforts have maintained the peace and order of this city.
It makes me feel cool.
Before placing an order... Ask yourself, why would anyone sell you such flawless ores at such a low price?
The- the streets aren't p- paved with gold... They're lined with traps laid up by ill-intent people. D- Don't fall for the tricks. Let's stay alert to frauds.
Hello, can I bother you for a moment?
Ah, I'm sorry. I'm just a little scared to talk to strangers. Actually... I'm doing anti-fraud publicity.
Recently, near the Tiger's Maw. There have been Exiles posing as ore merchants, selling fake ores. It's just one of their many cunning scams.
Some male exiles even dress up as females with fake sweet voices to swoon the customers into buying goods. But you can easily see pass it as long as you don't believe in becoming rich overnight.
And their scam will fail... Phew... Thank you for listening to me. Don't forget to share this with your family and friends.
Right you are. With the miners' health in mind, I've jazzed up traditional Jinzhou recipes to keep them both satisfied and nourished.
My version of the Jinzhou Stew packs in fresh vegetables and a flavorful broth while cutting back on greasy and salty ingredients, all without sacrificing taste.

I added fresh diced vegetables to the stew, simmered in flavorful broth. This way, they can satisfy their appetite without compromising their health. And don't worry, the original flavors are still intact!
Things have slowly returned to how they were before, but with a few changes here and there.
Remember those two who always argued? Now they're practically inseparable, working together on updating the refinery's parts and system.
Uncle Hong doesn't spend his whole day revisiting places with a diary in hand now.
He's not just writing about the past anymore. He's focusing on the present and making plans for tomorrow.
He's happy enough to let the younger generation take over the mine now. And it's all thanks to you, Rover. Come visit more often when you have a chance!
Man, this place is really big...
Back in Tiger's Maw Mine, a few rounds were all it took to explore the whole place.
Yeah... I grew up in the mine. I almost succeeded our family business as a miner.
But I wanted to see the world myself, so I joined Lollo Logistics and became a courier.
Turns out I got assigned to a place of vast expansion. And I'm able to witness those novel sights by myself!
The peach trees of Taoyuan Vale, the fireflies of Lake Deerslumber, the lighthouse of the Tiderise Cliff... I never get tired of seeing these places!
If you get the chance, you really should go see it.
All the deliveries for the Tiderise Cliff have been finished. Are we done today? Well, that's unusual...
Whoa! I've got another 50 orders from Peipei just now!
These ones surely have an overwhelming kick...
Wait. All of these are sent to Taoyuan Vale, which means we have to pass through the Gubei Pass again.
I taught a lesson to that annoying Shengying a few times. Hope he can just stop bothering me.
Ugh... I can't stand it... But as a navigator, I have to keep my spirits up and work hard, to set a good example for the younger ones!
I lost again, ugh... I just can't beat her!
Shh... Can't afford to let her hear my words... I'm talking about that courier, Pijing.
The boss asked me to rob Lollo Logistics' supplies, but I always run into her.
She could knock me out in just a couple of moves, easier than beating a Gulpuff! She's just too strong...
What are you talking about? Of course not! No one enjoy getting hit!
Shengying's not here again... Well, he's getting the hang of this!
I mean he's grown up like a real fighter.
I asked him to compete with the folks from Lollo Logistics before but I don't feel his determination in doing this.
But he's into this now, always running around outside the camp.
Well, he must have mastered his way. Got those couriers all tamed.
But he didn't bring any supplies back with him...
Maybe I'm not cut out for this...
I thought that Central Plains would be perfect for a newbie investigator like me, with all its open terrain, villages and flowers.
Turns out I keep running into either Exiles or TD...
Can't beat 'em. So I gotta run... Ugh, I feel so embarrassing...
*sob* Thank you for letting me confide in.
Here's hoping that maybe one day, I'll become stronger, braver.
They say Central Plains is safe, but plenty of weirdos are hiding behind the bush.
At first, those shady Exiles ripped my supply chests.
I was going to teach them a lesson, but then I ran into another suspicious folks.
Those guys in red robes, all mysterious, you can tell they're up to no good.
Who are these people, and what are they doing here?
Forget it... What lies in front of us is more important. If you see any Exiles, remember to let me know.
I'm gonna beat them until they're picking up their teeth off the ground, then take back our supplies.
Otherwise, Yujin and I will be starving.
Farming and watering the crops... The life here is the best.
It's peaceful and comfortable when you have everything worked out by yourself.
Better than the past when you had to trade something just to get a bite to eat...
Hmm... When I was younger, in another village, they had the habit of exchange.
Exchange... What exactly are we exchanging...?
I can't remember... Every time I think of the word exchange, I get the heebie-jeebies...
Forget it... I'm too old to remember anything...
Hey, see that big peach tree over there? That's the symbol of Taoyuan Vale.
Flowers can be brewed into flower wine, and fruits can be picked and made into fruit preserves...
...Ahem, there's more to it!
The famous Liondancer Lingyang from the city comes to Taoyuan Vale every year for secluded training!
Peach blossoms fluttering down, lions dancing with the wind... Nothing is more beautiful than this.
The Liondance is dancing...
One step, two steps, three steps... Step by step on the plum piles!
Yes! It's my favorite performance!
See? The mane on that lion's head swaying in the wind. And the eyes shine like two diamonds!
When I grow up, I want to learn the liondance from Lingyang!
Hmm?
Um... Does he mean What's your business at the Vanguard Base?
Hmph.
He means If you have nothing to do, don't loiter around here.
I'm sorry! My brother can be a bit rude... Let me explain for him!
The Midnight Rangers have three divisions: Outrider, Vanguard, and Rearguard, all under the command of General Jiyan.
The Vanguard is the vanguard force of the Midnight Rangers, mainly responsible for frontline combat. This is the Vanguard Base.
We are very close to the frontline here, and there are often Tacet Discord sightings around. If you have nothing important, please do not linger around, especially do not proceed further to the east.
Although he doesn't talk much, he is very dedicated to his work and skilled, which is why General Jiyan specifically appointed him to guard this place.
Hmph, with the two of us, the Vanguard Base is impregnable!
That's right, even some of the soldiers who were originally stationed at the base have recently been deployed to the battlefield...
In order to defend this place, we can't leave our posts to ensure your safety, so please stay away from the front lines as much as possible.
Ah... Well, we grew up together, so even without words, I can understand what he means just from his expression.
Huh?
Danger.
Don't go.
It seems like my leg really doesn't hurt anymore...
Huh? I'm sorry, is there anything I can help you with?
Uh... Yes, the Tacet Discord in Norfall Barrens is active and the attacks are intense. It's inevitable to get injured.
Last week, we, the defenders, successfully repelled ten attacks from the Tacet Discord. It's already good that I only have these minor injuries.
But luckily, General Jiyan is here. That's why I was able to recover from my injuries so quickly.
Yes, that day he noticed that my legs seemed a bit strange after standing for a long time, and he quickly brought me ointment.
I don't know how he could see the symptoms at a glance, and I didn't expect him to pay attention to such small details...
He took the time to personally deliver the medicine and told me how to take care of myself. Look, I'm already jumping around now. It's amazing, isn't it?!
Hehe, I didn't expect him to be such a caring person.
Only two more days...
General Jiyan has been leading the Vanguard in battle for more than ten days and has not returned. This situation is very rare...
Although communication has not been interrupted, but...
According to the General's previous instructions, if the army does not return after two days, the remaining defenders in the camp will have to follow the planned route to support the front line.
The number of Tacet Discord near our base has recently decreased. Could they have concentrated on the frontlines?
No, I have to be fully alert here and share the burden with my comrades on the frontlines.
I'll go to the frontlines tomorrow to capture some footage!
Huh? Ah, that's how it is for ordinary people!
But for me, precisely because it's dangerous, I should personally experience it and truthfully convey this feeling through the lens to inform more people and keep everyone updated on the situation.

Sorry, I forgot to introduce myself. I am Qingling, a war journalist. I was previously working on a special feature on the homeland inside Jinzhou, and now I'm here to assist Senior Huowen with the filming.
Being on the frontlines and reporting the truth is the duty of us journalists. Don't worry, I have experience in war reporting, so I won't encounter any major dangers.
It's not you, you don't seem to be a Midnight Ranger. Be careful here!
You have a strong sensitivity to the angle of shooting, but you are not careful enough in your actions...
Oh, I'm talking about my junior, Qingling. She has been helping me with the shooting recently and has submitted a lot of good materials.
As a war reporter, her daring and adventurous personality has helped her excel in her missions, which is quite impressive. I can even see my younger self in her.

However, the Tacet Discord is rampant here, and the ferocious Tacet Discord can appear from anywhere. The shallow waters beneath your feet are unstable, and the ruins are filled with precarious dangers...
Even walking can easily lead to encounters with long-abandoned dangerous weapons.
In such a dangerous environment, her fearless determination worries me a lot.
I have advised her countless times, but she never listens. If you see her, please help me persuade her.
Based on my past adventure experiences, it's better to be cautious in your actions here.
If nothing unexpected happens, we will definitely win this war.
After fighting for a lifetime, we can always summarize some battle experience and conclusions.
Although everyone is still tense, overall, the Midnight Rangers will no longer be trapped in a bloody battle like the previous war when facing Tacet Discord.
The Battle Beneath the Crescent many years ago... Oh, come to think of it, it's been a long time since I talked to someone about these things.
I was young back then, and I had never seen such a battle before...
The unstoppable tide of Tacet Discord almost engulfed the entire army, and the comrades in chaos suddenly started killing each other...
The endless war slowly dragged each of us into the vortex of weariness, and a moment of relaxation in the mind could take away your life.
Countless people fell in that war, even my dear friend who grew up with me was not spared.
Those nightmarish days, I can't even distinguish now what was real and what was fake...
Those who have experienced that war find it hard to completely move on. I once left the army and lived in the city, but I found that I can only find peace in the barracks.
... I still can't let go of my comrades, whether it's the past or the present, haha.
There are new supplies to be counted today.
Hmm? Do you need any help? Just let me know, I will ensure your well-being!
The more intense the war, the better we should eat and drink, and be in high spirits! Morale is also an important factor in the outcome of the war, right? Hahaha!
As a logistics support personnel, I not only want to take care of my comrades' material needs, but also to uplift their spirits a bit!
Hehe, actually, I once went to chat with Fusheng when I didn't understand. I wanted to make him feel relaxed, but I ended up hitting a wall...
Since then, I have realized that fighting is already tough enough, and everyone has endured a lot...
Self-righteous consolation only brings sadness, so why not let me bring everyone a moment of simple joy!
Hey, did you hear? Because of the Crownless, the Gorges of Spirits is becoming a center of attention.
The Huaxu Hive is exploding with posts. Everyone's panicking about the possibility of even worse Tacet Fields.
Even the Pioneer Association keeps bombarding us for the latest investigation updates.
Looks like I'm pulling overtime again... Ahhh...
So, Rover, did you really cross paths with that Fractsidus Overseer in Qichi Village?
If you're saying it too, then it has to be real.
But I heard he said a bunch of weird stuff to you, didn't he? What did he say?
Bad guys sure love to talk. What'd he say to you?
No wonder there's been a surge of Qichi Village claims on the forums lately...
Everyone claims to know the story of what went down there.
There are tons of variations, each story wilder than the last.
Ah! Darn it... I almost forgot about my project deadline!
The war in the Norfall Barrens has finally ended.
That Retroact Rain was horrible, wasn't it?
The Retroact Rain was already scary as an illusion... but then actual ghosts appeared!
Yeah, we thought so too. The Threnodian seemed on the brink of awakening... and its recent activities have already had such a terrible impact.
Can you believe the Fractsidus wanted to hatch such a terrifying creature...
I heard Fractsidus members were part of this Threnodian revival too. Rover, any insights?
Ah, too bad. I was hoping to get more information from you...
Of course, it's all online!
Hmm... Haha, is that for real?
Oh, nothing, just browsing the Huaxu Hive. These latest posts are hilarious.
It's an internal forum for the Academy. You can find all sorts of gossip and updates there!
Oh no. No, no, no... I really should stop and get back to my assignment! The deadline is today!
Ah! I've got an idea!
You can use my account to browse the forum. Since it only allows one login at a time, I won't be able to get distracted, and you can enjoy the forum! Win-win!
Crownless... No way, the progress on the frequency calculations is only at 7%...
I'm analyzing the Crownless data. I've never seen such a complex Tacet Discord before.
By the way, did you know? Miss Baizhi actually came up with the term Crownless. What a pity.
Don't you think the name is a bit... uninspired? Miss Baizhi is a genius at everything, except naming Tacet Discords.
Everyone on the forums wants a more memorable name. They even held a virtual contest for suggestions.
My favorite is Savage God of Torn Wings. What do you think, Rover?
No way... Did Miss Baizhi blackmail you??
Haha, Rover, you've got great taste!
In the end, Miss Baizhi, as the discoverer, has the final say.
Phew... Everyone else is working, but I'm here slacking off and loving it... Haha!
Hang on, you're not planning to snitch to Mr. Mortefi, right...?
Mr. Mortefi is scarier than my own mentor.
His words can be brutal... If he sees me slacking off, he'll probably say something like...
Taking a little break, I see. You must enlighten me about your vast knowledge of avoiding work.
Just so you know, that's the 17th most brutal line from Mr. Mortefi, as per our rankings on the Huaxu Hive.
Oddly enough, some people don't mind his scolding... In fact, they seem to provoke him on purpose.
I really can't understand what those people are thinking...
Yes, even though my specialty is in pharmaceuticals, we can't develop new medicines without studying the Tacet Discords...
If you have questions about Tacet Discords, feel free to come to me.
Despite resembling organisms, Tacet Discords are essentially an energy construct made up of Reverberations.
Tacet Discords doesn't follow ordinary biological evolution or hereditary rules.
They may take the form of real-world objects, but it's mere camouflage.
Although Tacet Discords lack biological connections between themselves...
For the sake of observation and understanding, we still categorize all the discovered Tacet Discords we come across.
The five defined types include Whisperin, Howler, Tranquilite, Clamorling, and Staticoid.
While Tacet Discords may vary, they all pose a threat to us humans.
Naturally, we devised a threat level classification system.
We determine the threat by assessing the strength of the Tacet Discord's characteristic frequency. Folks tend to think the higher the frequency, the stronger the Tacet Discord.
The ranking goes from lowest to highest: Common, Elite, Overlord, and Calamity.
Because Tacet Discords are essentially aggregates of Reverberation energy, they turn back into disordered frequencies upon elimination.
That being said, there's a small chance these frequencies might recombine into new, specific substances.
These substances exhibit unique appearances and compositions, and have special medicinal properties used in making medicine.
Hmm... the medicine seems to be working better this time.
Yes, this is my patient, Niu. He's got a strange illness, and the usual meds don't work well on him.
So I decided to try a new medicine, hoping it'll do the trick.
Should I join Mr. Mortefi's project? ...Koko, would you support my decision?
Ah, you must be the Rover. What can I do for you?
Koko is my little sister, and she's currently the acting manager of Shifang Pharmacy.
Yesterday, Mr. Mortefi invited me to join one of his projects.
But joining would mean spending even less time with Koko.
I don't want to pass up this chance. It's more than just a project. Being able to working alongside Mr. Mortefi is an honor itself.
He's probably the most respected researcher here, just behind our Principal Investigator, Mr. Xiangli Yao.
He's great at fending off unreasonable client demands. He rejected over 40 of them in his first week alone!
He even treats us to afternoon tea. He really looks out for us.
Mortefi's been trying to outdo him in research, but it's not easy. Xiangli is just... built different.
About Mr. Xiangli... You'll see what I mean when you meet him.
Rover, is that you? You're still up at this hour?
You gotta get more sleep, or you'll end up like us, unable to sleep even when you want to.
We're pretty much always busy.
You know what? Koko might actually be right. I've seriously considered quitting my job to join her, running the pharmacy.
But after mulling it over, I still preferred to stay and do research.
Our current medicines can handle most diseases.
However, with the discovery of more diseases and the spread of new treatments, we're also facing an increasing number of pathogens.
So, meds gotta stay up to date, and my job is to give more powerful tools to those battling diseases.
Huaxu Academy is filled with talented people... I'm so jealous.
Who wouldn't be jealous of working in a nice, bright office, doing research that shapes the future?
And the pay must be great! I want that kind of life too...
I've actually been using my free time to study Imperial Academy courses, and I'm almost done.
As soon as I graduate, I'm leaving that filthy mine and getting a decent job.
Yeah, it's pretty far from the life I dreamed of. Definitely don't want to be a miner though.
So cold... So cold...
Even though it's not cold out, I feel like I'm freezing every night.
I've been to so many doctors, but no one can figure it out, so I had to turn to Liuqing for help.
He thinks my symptoms might be caused by Tacet Discords, which can make you hallucinate... but I haven't been near any recently.
I wonder if it's related to the weird stuff going on in the mine lately...
Not sure, but if you're free, you could check out the Tiger's Maw.
I didn't expect such a terrifying Tacet Discord to be hidden under the mine...
Thanks for getting rid of them all, otherwise I wouldn't know when my hallucinations would go away.
But Liuqing told me to come here for his inspection tonight.
He's worried about any side effects I might have, but also really curious about what happened.
Ah, the spirit of a true researcher, I get it.
That weapon on you seems well maintained. You must be a Resonator.
Yeah, I can tell. You're holding a Tacetite Weapon, after all.
You've probably used it countless times by now, but I'm sure you're not familiar with how it's made.
The more you understand, the handier it will be. If you're curious about Tacetite weapons, feel free to ask me anything.
Tacetite Weapons are designed for Resonators to combat Tacet Discords.
These weapons are adaptable in form and size for different needs. They're all essentially the same thing.
There are five main types of Tacetite Weapons. Pistols, Gauntlets, Rectifiers, Swords, and Broadblades.
Which one piques your interest?
Pistols are compact firearms that use Resonance Energy to create powerful bullet projectiles.
The amount of energy used determines the bullets' effects. You'll understand once you try it yourself.
Compared to traditional guns, these Tacetite pistols have low recoil and do not require frequent reloading. Perfect for ranged combat.
Gauntlets are arm-mounted combat gear, commonly worn as gloves or vambraces.
With a limited range, their design prioritizes both offense and defense capabilities.
This makes them highly selective in terms of material and the physical abilities of their wielders.
Rectifiers capture and amplify specific frequencies. I'd say they work more like musical instruments.
While not as lethal, they have the strongest amplification effect on Resonance Abilities, or Fortes as we call it.
Additionally, Rectifiers can scan and interfere with the unique frequencies of Tacet Discords. As a type of Tacetite Weapon, Rectifiers test the user's skills.
Swords are a staple weapon for Resonators like you, with their balanced and agile design.
They're versatile and efficient in combat, making them a popular choice for dealing with different enemies.
That being said. Swords are also the hardest to master among of all Tacetite Weapons. They may seem simple, but there's more to them than meets the eye.
Need a weapon to take down tough Tacet Discords? Then the Broadblade is your choice. It does a lot of damage.
Wow, a visitor in the archives! This place is usually so boring.
In other words, if the Huaxu Academy is like Jinzhou's main library, then the archives are like the library within that library.
Everything about this academy can be found here. There's nothing about it that I don't know.
Did you come here with any questions?
You're in luck because I'm here every day sorting out info, so I know the Huaxu Academy inside out.
Huaxu Academy is Jinzhou's research center, a branch of Huanglong Huaxu Academy, and a respected academic institution.
Huaxu Academy, the heart of Jinzhou's research, is a branch of the esteemed Huanglong Huaxu Academy, and a respected academic institution.

There are various departments, including the Department of Anomaly Studies, the Department of Laboratory Evaluation, the Department of Safety, and the Department of Resources. Occasionally, a Special Project Team is also established.
Every department at Huaxu Academy is at the forefront of research. Pretty impressive, right?
Zzz... Huh!? What am I doing? No, can't sleep yet!
I'm trying to stay awake, enjoying the evening breeze. Otherwise, I'll... zzz..
Ah! Did I just nod off again!? Oh no...
Could you please, like, hit me when I start dozing off?
Please!
Uh... Umm...
Alright!! Enough! I'm fully awake now!
I've never felt so awake! Thanks a bunch.
Better hurry back to the lab, or I'll be out like a light if I keep this up.
Ugh, I finally convinced them to extend the report deadline to tomorrow after some serious convincing.
Hey, you're the Rover, right? Got important business here?
Wow, that's impressive... You've been given a big responsibility...
That sounds cool... If you're chilling like that, you must have finished everything ages ago.
Ugh, I can barely get a research report done.
Honestly, everyone here at the institute is a genius... The pressure working here is insane.
My stomach... it hurts again, no, I can't afford this now... I still have to finish this report.
Director, I'll for sure have the investigation report ready tomorrow!
You'd better hand it in by then... Otherwise not even I can help you!
Ugh... I really wish I could create a clone of myself when things get this hectic.
I heard Resonators can create clones. I'm so jealous...
If I could figure that out, my stomachache would be cut in half.
People will think I'm useless if I ask for help, won't they?
I'm not as smart as everyone else, so I need to work harder if I want to stand out.
I'm okay, just need a short break... The real work happens at night.
Hey, Siqi! This data's for me, right?
Siqi, bro, how do I use this gadget?
Eh? Okay, okay... one at a time...
So sleepy...
Why is it not morning yet...
No, I'm about to fall asleep...
Uh! It's not enough!
It hurts, but it's effective!
Am I awake? Or is this a dream!?
Man, every time I read Mr. Mortefi's research, I learn something new...
No way, you were there too?
Did you see Mr. Mortefi shut down that guy making all those crazy demands?
Seriously! Who's the genius behind these thoughtless demands on our R&D?
Only Mr. Mortefi has the guts to challenge them openly, it's pretty cool!
I've always looked up to him. His genius and fearless attitude...I hope to emulate that one day.
Some folks might not get Mr. Mortefi, seeing him as only short-tempered, but there are plenty who secretly admire him.
Hmm... Tacetite weapons have their limits, you know...
Oh, hey! I was just discussing a new weapon project with the department head.
Your timing is impeccable. I have a question for you.
You know what? We just had this epiphany! So, regular Tacetite weapons are like, for one person, right? They don't have much impact on a big battle?
But imagine this: a Tacetite weapon that needs a whole team to operate. That would pack a serious punch!
Uh... then just fix it!
Uh, hold on a sec...
Ugh, yeah... Still a bunch of kinks to work out...
The Disruptor's a good weapon, but man, it's a pain to keep it in shape...
You witnessed the Disruptor launch up close, huh? Must've been quite the spectacle.
Once that cannon fires, the Tacet Discord won't stand a chance.
But the Disruptor's charging system got fried after the launch. We're grounded for now.
That's the price of such a powerful weapon... But hey, where else will our motivation to make better weapons come from?
I can see it now, someday we'll going to make something with even more juice than the Disruptor!
Jinzhou won't have to fear the Tacet Discords anymore, and my scientific research will begin in earnest!
New faces... Are you from outside Jinzhou?
I suppose you don't know how bad the war between Jinzhou and the Tacet Discords was in the past.
Things are better now, but on the front lines, soldiers are still risking their lives every day.
Huh... Tell me, young friend, do you think I'll live to see the end of the war as a veteran?
Yes... the war never seems to end.
The soldiers will never disappear.
You think so...?
If I can't make it, young friend, please bear witness to that day for me.
I had a dream last night. It was about a future without war.
When I woke up, I realized I was dreaming about the past.
I'm old now and have spent decades of my youth under fire.
These days, I'm just reminiscing. Please forgive this old man.
I'll stay a little longer... and then I'll be on my way.
Would you stop coming around here all the time? You're making us all nervous.
When is Heming coming back?
Well, you don't miss people by doing this. What kind of man stares at a list of fallen soldiers every day, looking for his sweetheart's name?
And the list hasn't even been updated for so long... If you carry on like this, your life is over!
I'm worried about her! She hasn't responded to my calls for over thirty-six hours!
They're fighting on the front lines. What do you think they're doing, camping?
You're right... I'll go back to Mr. Yhan later and sign up for ten more training sessions!
If I train hard, maybe I'll get a chance to join her on the frontlines.
This is getting to sappy for us. We won't tag along again!
The storm formed by the abnormal gravity field seems to be returning...
So a new story is about to begin?
Oh, actually... It's not that much of a big deal.
I've been conducting uninterrupted observations at this weather Observation Station...
Recent observation data shows that the weather changes in the surroundings share similarities with the storms happening here in the past...
But the similarity are still in the cradle. I can't jump to conclusions now.
Don't worry. I'll keep an eye on this.

The ground is covered with broken rocks and gravel. The traces of digging spread across the broken rock wall, accompanying by trails of aged brown bloodstains. Faint glimmers cast their eyes through the crevices, throwing specks of light onto the saddened ground. Placing your hand on the rock wall, you exert a gentle force. With a thunderous roar, the rock wall gives way, releasing a gust of fresh air that rushes in, breathing new life into the train carriage once more.

They aren't supposed to be here. This Memory Zone must have been corrupted, too.

Meow!
Meow!
I'm not sure what that thing was, but the Metaphor it provided should come in handy.
There is no such thing as an objective reality in this realm of dreams and memories. The more obscure something is, the more possibilities it holds.
Here they come again. Such a relentless mob of monsters.
Finally, you are here.
No, I'm not.
Do not trust anything that man has told you.
We used to work together to guard and maintain the Somnoire.
But now, I would no longer call him a Gatekeeper.
You may have noticed how he is nowhere to be seen since you met me.
Because I've temporarily sealed off this area. He won't know you met me here.
However, you can't stay here for too long. He might become suspicious.
Before I leave, I'll provide you with some assistance.
I hope this will make your exploration easier.
By the way, I am the white cat you just saw. Hopefully, he couldn't tell it was me…
Anyway, this is important: Please remember what I said. Never trust that man under any circumstances.
Hmmm... That's enough talk for now. I trust you'll use your wise judgment to figure out what really lies behind that mask.
What took you so long to leave that Memory Zone?
Well, forget it...
Ugh, enemies are everywhere.
But it seems you've become somewhat accustomed to the battles here. That's good.
I've got something for you... They should come in handy at some point.
Anyway... See the thing over there? It's the culprit behind the chaos and corruption in this area...
It looks tough to deal with. You should make good use of the Illusive Echoes and Metaphors you've gotten so far.
How are you feeling?
You seem calm. Good. That means the Somnoire's effects haven't gotten to you.
Keep up with the good work, will you?
Well, now you've thoroughly cleared this area.
As you've probably already noticed, the Somnoire is really large, and what you've just cleared was just a tiny fraction of it.
To prevent future incidents like Tacet Discords escaping again, there is still much work to be done.
Well, you can just come back here to get your answers, then.
I knew you're not someone to sit back and watch.
Of course, I'll be sure you get the pay you deserve.
Let's wrap up the exploration for now. Time to leave.
Next time, we'll delve into the deeper Memory Zones together.
Any update on the protective barrier?
We've put in all our resources to repair it as soon as possible, but...
Leave the healing to me!
I'm ready to help. Please hold on a little longer!
Our morale is unbeatable. Let's keep it up and crush all our enemies!
They'll get a taste of our conviction!
Hold on! Reinforcement's on their way!
Leave... Leave me alone!
He's been cornered!
Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!
What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!
No... you're not... Aghhhh!
Jingyang... you...
You... You are... Jun! No... No no no, what have I done?!
Sorry... I'm so sorry. I can't tell the differences... I really can't... Ahhh...
The Phantoms contain a lot of Remnant Energy... These Tacet Discords might be coming after it!
The rain is spreading across Desorock Highland... I can feel chaos growing in the Streams. We must hurry.
Ugh... When will we ever see the end of this...
General Geshu has already brought us this far. We'll be over this soon!
That must be the lair of the damned Ova-something. We just need to get rid of it, and that's all.
Yeah. Let's not drag our General's feet at least. Gotta step up our game...
My leg... my leg...
Orders are orders. No one's leaving!
You're just asking us to die...
How's the weapons?
We’re all set!
Good. Can't be careless in this battle.
How's your injury?
Fully healed. I’m ready to go!
Don't push yourself too much. Stay safe in the upcoming fights.
The battle is upon us. Are you ready?
We must defend Jinzhou and all we hold dear. Victory will be ours!
Victory will be ours!
We will prevail the lasting night!
The battle is upon us... This is our last chance.
We must defend Jinzhou and all we hold dear. Victory will be ours!
Greetings, Rover! I've heard about you!
I'm Yuehui, in charge of our infantry. This is Konglin, our ranged units leader. We're making battle plans.
You see, the valley’s got a tricky terrain. We'll need a way to maximize firepower.
Any suggestions? Please do share.
We must consider all options and brace for the worst.
The terrain's narrow, we'll be forced into close combat.
We can cover you from the cliffs, like this...
Something's wrong. This TD Outbreak seems different, unlike the previous ones caused by Retroact Rain.
According to the Academy people, we should see converging energy trails.
But no energy trails this time, the Tacet Discords are appearing out of think air, as if summoned…
You mean… It is the Threnodian’s work?
Likely so. We have to find and stop it before it’s too late.
There's something off about this Outbreak...
And you mean...?
Uh, Rover, it's been a long time.
That old man's flowers? Here they are. He left them here this morning.
Bless him. That old man looks troubled to me. He’s always trying to bring flower bouquets to the graves every other day.
It might have worked in the old days, but now Desorock Highland is so close to the front line that the people are no longer allowed to go up there.
Do you know him? If so, you'd better advise him to go back to the city. It's dangerous to stay here all the time.
I can understand the old man's desire to return to the troop. Sometimes when I’m free, he’d have me listening to stories from his past.
He called us by a different name each time, so I guess he thought of us as his comrades in arms.
Even when he’s lost touch with reality, he still clings on to these memories and the thought of sending them flowers ... They must have shared a special bond.
Truth be told, sometimes when I look at him, I always feel like I see my future self.
Sorry, I was caught in my emotions. You can have the flowers.
Thank you for believing in this tale, and for solving those puzzles…
May your love be eternal, never parting ways.
...And that's all we've gathered so far...
If the wounded can't be transferred to hospitals in time, take them to my teahouse and boxing gym. We can set up temporary medical points there.
Thank you, Mr. Yuanwu!
As a citizen, it is my obligation to aid in the face of this immense danger. I'll do my best to assist.
Are you alright, young mister?
Are you alright, young miss?
This is one of the largest TD Outbreaks I've witnessed. There have already been quite a few casualties. It seems far from over yet.
I still have some supplies with me. Please, take them. Stay safe out there.
*sob* I-I'm scared...
Shhh, everything will be alright. Look, the Patrollers and guards are all here to help. Those bad monsters won't stand a chance!
But it's getting dangerous outside. We'll get you home real quick, okay?
Hi, Rover! I'm Lingyang from the Liondance Troupe. Thank you so much for you help! If you don't mind, here's some food. Please have some!
Ugh, those damn Tacet Discords. They just keep showing up out of nowhere...
But worry not, the Liondance Troupe is here! We'll teach them a lesson!
No one can beat us when it comes to morale!
Shhh... It's okay now... I'm here with you...
This lesion looks bad... Please stay still. I'll heal you with my Forte.
My wounds are closing up... Thank you, Miss Verina!

Rover, are you alright? Let me heal you if you got injured.
Jinzhou is such a beautiful place. The plants here are incredibly resilient. It's heartbreaking to imagine all of them getting wiped out from this war...

Please stay still. I'll help you patch it up...
You still up for another fight or two?
Don't underestimate us, sir! Absolutely!
We'll make sure those monsters leave defeated!
Good. That's the spirit. Remember what I've taught you!
Safety first, then take down as many of them as you can. Understood?

I must send these supplies to our men...

Chixia is right. Please leave it to us. We'll help deliver these supplies.

Rover, Yangyang and I need to get these stuff delivered.

Countless brave souls have been trapped here by the evil powers of Ovathrax. I want to help set them free.

Our next move is to reclaim the Disruptor and break through the Groundwave Barrier.

It's a powerful anti-Threnodian weapon from when Jinzhou was founded. We need it to break through this barrier.

Our loved ones are counting on us! If we fail, Jinzhou falls!
Easy for you to say! We're just ordinary folks with no powers!
We have our will and bodies! Those monsters aren’t going anywhere, not when I'm still alive!
Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!
What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!
No... you're not... Aghhhh!
Jingyang... you...
You... You are... Jun! No... No no no, what have I done?!
Sorry... I'm so sorry. I can't tell the differences... I really can't... Ahhh...
Who... Who are you! Are you human?! Answer me!
What... what are you talking about? I'm Jun!
No... you're not... Aghhhh!
Time flies by, anything can change, yet the Sonance Caskets shall endure...
Hmm, I wonder what’s in that crevice... and why does my alloy glow...
I really can't seem to figure it out.
Huh? Excuse me if I'm disturbing you by talking to myself.
A crevice appeared in the mine underground lately.
From the looks of it, it seemed like an entrance to some unstable Sonoro Sphere.
It isn't, though...
Not really.
However, several miners who work with my ore shop told me that with this crevice, they are afraid and unwilling to go down the mine recently.
They can easily find other jobs, but without their supply, my shop would go bankrupt.
It's a small business. If I want to stay in this game, I have to fight a price war.
And if I lose these old suppliers who offer lower prices, I simply cannot compete with those monopolies like Huaipu Mining Firm...
Let me see... well, I appreciate your kindness, but you don't have enough to keep me stokced. So keep it for yourself.
At this point, we have to figure out what’s inside the crevice...
As long as we confirm that it is not dangerous, I can convince the miners to keep working with me.
I can't believe there is someone as friendly as you...
If you can confirm the situation inside the crevice and help me get my shop back up and running, I'll be sure to thank you with a large sum of money!
You're a good person, but a businessman's reputation is on the line. Since I made a promise, I have to give you the payment.
Of course, my word is my bond.
Before you go, please bring this Sample Alloy with you.
It's an alloy I smelted myself. The formula is still under review...
But my goal is very clear: I will make the best-performing alloy material in the world!
Back to the point... I found that my alloy glows when it gets close to the crevice.
I don't quite understand how it works, but I have a hunch it might help you.
Right. Go on, then. I’ll wait for your good news!
You're back!
How's it going in there?
I didn't know it was so dangerous there... Are you hurt?
That's good, that's good...
Did, did it really?! How did it help you?
My alloy strengthened the bearer in this Sonoro Sphere...
I, I'm really good at smelting!
Tell you what, I'll give you some more alloys, and you help me test them in the Sonoro Sphere!
That's not the point. Two days out of business won't kill me.
Even though I'm a businessman, I have a dream.
If I can make the most powerful alloy in the world, then all the mine companies will remember my name!
Compared to that, a temporary business setback is no big deal.
Please!
Though I've been tweaking the recipe for my alloy, the progress of its improvement has always been limited.
I really can't compare myself with the academics and engineers at the academy who specialize in weapons materials.
But this crevice in the mine seems to have a special connection to my alloy.
Only my alloy glows near this crevice...
I was excited and scared at once.
Excited, because I felt my efforts were recognized, and my alloy was special in this Sonoro Sphere.
But I'm also scared that if the crevice disappears, will my alloy become meaningless?
Every time I think about this, I stop worrying about my business, and I even hope the crevice lasts a little longer...
These rocks are blocking our way. We'll need to get rid of them.
Finally... Rover, you hear me?
Our signals got blocked off by the Threnodian’s power. Took us a lot of effort to make this call get through.
I have to say your Terminal has a very intriguing design. We'd love to thoroughly investigate it once we have the chance...
Now back to business. We are aware of your situation.
Luckily, your current location is still within the Disruptor's range. We can provide fire support.
You've seen what the Disruptor is capable of. We can turn down the output power, but I strongly advise finding cover far away.
The structure of this building is almost entirely destroyed... We'll need to create a safe space where we can take cover.
There is a floating platform over there... Perhaps we can make use of it.
That tree... It's stunning. It's almost eerily enchanting.
Please... Save us...
Are you trying to tell us about... something hidden here?
Wait? The signal's back!
This is... a holographic message to all of Jinzhou from the City Hall.
My fellow soldiers and citizens, I apologize for any inconvenience caused. I am Jinhsi, the Magistrate of Jinzhou.
As the Moon-chasing Festival approaches, our city welcomes visitors from around the world. The festivities are highly anticipated by our people, and I, too, share in this joyful sentiment.
Jinzhou has always been a crucial defense against the Tacet Discord Outbreaks, safeguarding Huanglong. We have a heavy responsibility on our shoulders with no room for retreat or failure.
It is the dedication of our warriors, along with the diligence of our citizens, that has allowed us to thrive in peace and prosperity.
Despite the challenges of Tacet Discords, we remain steadfast and hospitable to visitors, upholding our enduring traditions.
With that in mind, I have a favor to ask.
Among our many visitors, there is one visitor that holds utmost importance to me, the City of Jinzhou, and the entirety of Huanglong.
We have awaited your arrival for a long time.
Given the circumstances, you may be feeling bewildered at this time.
You should have noticed some strange happenings related to you.
If you plan to stay in Jinzhou for some time, I would be more than delighted to personally meet you in the City Hall of Jinzhou.
While I cannot guarantee to provide all the answers you need, I will do my best to assist you and provide necessary permissions, if applicable.
This is only my personal request. You can decide your course of action in any way you see fit.
Therefore, I request the people and soldiers of Jinzhou to assist this esteemed visitor when the opportunity arises.
Why do I get this feeling...
This person our Magistrate was talking about...
...is Rover.
Wow, so this is the true measure of a Chief... I mean, of our Rover!
This is the true measure of a Chief!
It's a famous line from a good old Hero Play. It's been runnin' for almost four years! It's a really heart-warming tale about the Chief and their Squad.
Does that Hero Play story sound familiar to you?
Now you're talking a little like Baizhi, Rover.
The Moon-chasing Festival and the Spring Loong Festival are the liveliest times in Huanglong. They're two of our most famous traditional festivals.
Every region in Huanglong will be celebrating the festivals in their unique ways. Jinzhou is a city built on the boarders, but it's no exception in that regard.
Are you curious about our Magistrate's title, Rover?

Our Magistrate's real name is Hsi. Usually, the Sentinel selects a candidate during the Appointment Ceremony to become our Magistrate. They will then take on the city's name as their surname. This signifies their wholehearted dedication to the city and its people.
Hey, that ain't the point, okay?!
What are your plans now, Rover?
There's still a while before the festival break. The best part of it hasn't even started!
If you're eagerly anticipating the festival atmosphere now, I'm afraid you will end up disappointed.
But if you can stay in Jinzhou for a little while longer until the Moon-chasing Festival activities begin...
I remember you had a flashback of yourself looking into its eyes when you saw the statue of our Sentinel.
We can't confirm its authenticity, but based on the Magistrate's message, it seems Jinzhou has a lot to do with your past.
Whether you're the visitor our Magistrate mentioned or not, you are surely important to Jinzhou, and you will be our important...
Friend!
We've already entrusted our lives to each other. I've never seen so many TDs packed together, and that Elite one was so scary! Well, you did get rid of most of them, hehe.
Anyway, once we're back in Jinzhou, I'll treat you to that famous specialty from Panhua's Restaurant.
I'm sorry...
No, that's beyond my ability. I just sensed some complex feelings from it... A mixture of deep sadness and eager anticipation.
Rover... I think I know what's going on here.
It seems to be begging for help, but it's not asking us to help it. I can sense the pained cries of this Tacet Discord... No, the cries of this whole village.
The village is crying, waiting for rescue.
Something truly awful must have happened here... And the victims' Reverberations still linger.
Based on the evidence we've found and the condition of these ruins, that didn't happen all too long ago. I can still feel it in the Streams.
Perhaps the Tacet Field has kept this village from being discovered, or maybe someone has been intentionally concealing it. Anyway...
There must be something we can do. We may find the victims nearby. I can feel someone connected to what happened here is still close... This place is dangerous.
I'll inform Chixia about what happened here. Can we continue our search before the official investigators arrive?
Sorry, I know it doesn't sound very convincing... It's just a hunch of mine, and I don't have any evidence to back it up.
Thank you, Rover. Please stay vigilant.
As for the little one here... Let's leave it be.
Ovathrax's towering statue, built from repurposed weapons and debris, has long loomed over Jinzhou as a foreboding symbol of our ongoing struggle.
Challenge concluded! Continuous success!
Oh, can't afford to underestimate our Rover!
Please accept your rewards!
Challenge concluded. Flawless performance!
Impressive skills and footwork... I'm overwhelmed by your talent!
Mr. Wufang always says: Observe others and correct yourself. I learned a lot from your footworks.
If you're interested in joining the Liondance Troupe, Lingyang and I would love to give you a referral.
A reward for you to commemorate your success!
Break time is over. All stand up! The training resumes. Attention!
Aye, sir!
Ah... my legs are screaming...
Sir! I have a question about TD—
Sir, I wonder how I handle a weapon malfunction during a fight...
Finally, after all the applications I've filed over the years. Finally, I'm going to the front line!
S-sir! How many soldiers have you trained!
First, about weapon damage—
Get in teams of two and we'll do another simulation battle.
Perseverance is not the same as recklessness. Do you hear me?
Yes, sir!
The moves aren't pretty but they work ...... Well, it's still important that they work.
I've figured out Xiaohua's moves. Hey, I can't lose this time!
You will meet... the same fate...
Pay for your insurrection… in blood…
The war… never cease… We… will return…
Approaching the war zone ahead, Jinzhou residents without passage rights, please do not cross the line.
I've fought hard for this opportunity. I hope I don't let Mr. Yhan down with my performance.
Everything's normal. No anomalies to report.
I think there's room for improvement. Look at these data.
We need more samples. Any changes to weapons already in use need to be handled with the utmost caution.
You're back, big hero! That monster is gone, and Jinzhou will soon retrieve its usual liveness.
It's gonna be a blast! Oh, right, the Moon-chasing Festival is coming up! You've gotta have a good time in our city when it's here!
Ah, it's big brother! Magistrate's guest!
Ah, it's big sister! Magistrate's guest!
Th-thank you... for protecting everyone!
Thank you, Rover. You ended the conflict with the least price to pay and saved the lives of many Midnight Rangers.
Seeing you and general here in safe and sound, I just can't help...
...Sorry, I got a bit too excited. Anyway, nothing matters more than coming back safely.
Oh, it's you. I was just thinking that it's about time I paid you a visit.
I've been here telling stories for many years, recounting countless legends, tales, and anecdotes. Now, for a change, I can be a listener.
You've become part of a new story. If you've got time, come over for a chat with me!
You're back, Rover. Must've been a tiring journey back to the city, right?

Last time we met was at the Rearguard Camp. I was too busy then... I didn't realize you were the guest Magistrate mentioned. I didn't even get a good look at you. Now, you're a hero of the Midnight Rangers.
Things are much better than before. The war is over, no more casualties, and the medical staff can finally catch their breath.
However, as a Rearguard, there are a lot of trivial matters that I've got to attend to. This rain... it's just too heavy.
But everything will be fine. Whether it's about Rearguard or Jinzhou.
Pretty much the same as before, I'll have to get back to work after our chat.
Even though I've been given a vacation... now's not the time. I've got to sort out the aftermath.
Only after the rush do I feel the aches all over my body. Once I've wrapped up my current tasks, I plan to take a break.
And you should also take some time to relax from all the hustle and bustle.
Oh no, I think I forgot my weapon at the station during the unloading.
Hamster? Oh, you mean the hat's design. This is one of Lollo Logistics' must-haves—protects us from wind, sun, rain, and fog!
Shh... Listen. When the wind blows, it makes this cool whistling sound against our uniform!
Hi there. I heard that Pioneer Explorers are informed travelers. Maybe you can answer my friend's little question here?
There's so much talk about the Magistrate's guest. My friend thinks... it's actually him!
My friend's a seasoned traveler. He walks a thousand miles a day and lifts a thousand catties with his bare hands...
Hold on. You're talking about yourself, aren't you?
Did you hear about last night? There was drama on the high street. A girl knelt down and begged in public.
She was bawling, saying she'd do anything. It's gonna be quite the scandal if it's not cleared up...
It's not just here, rumors about the guest are spreading outside Jinzhou, too. It's all anyone's talking about.
But... the guest is just a visitor. Feels like everyone's getting a bit too excited about this.
Hey there! Fate must have brought us together today. Interested in reviving Jinzhou Conversations with us?
Oh, let me introduce myself first. I'm Tracy Jacks, the host of Jinzhou Conversations. And these two here are our fellow members.
Just nicknames! Can't be too careful with online comments, you know.
At Jinzhou Conversations, we keep our eyes and ears open to know everything within arm's reach. Pretty impressive, isn't it?
Grandpa, this snack looks weird... Is it even edible?
Haha, you won't know until you try!
Hmm... Oh, it's tasty! Still could do with a better presentation.
As you grow older, you'll realize that any local food reflects the essence of a place.
Just like Jinzhou—a humble border city with a warm heart, welcoming all. We as its citizens should do the same.
I'm quite the storyteller, huh? Last time, we talked about... um, let me think.
It was about the Teal General and the Battle of Norfall Barrens.
Right! See? Ah, seems our guests have better memories than me.
I see many listeners today. Thank you for joining us! But before we begin, let us begin a new subject.
It's not about the Teal General or the Battle of Norfall Barrens...
Today, let's talk about Jinzhou, the fortress city we call home. Huanglong boasts one capital and six cities, and Jinzhou is the gatekeeper.
The name Jinzhou itself is rather special. Its spoken and written form have layers of meaning.
It sounds like the word for gateway, and when its written, resembles the shape of a dragon's roar. Hence, we call this place Jinzhou.
And as for what Jin really means, it also signifies the beginning, where every journey starts. That's why Jinzhou is always ready to welcome travelers from far and wide.
It's a fitting name, isn't it?
This lake brings back memories of my days by the sea...
Grandpa, you always talk about the sea. What's beyond it?
Haha, beyond the sea lies boundless freedom, my child.
How'd your City Hall Entrance Examination go on?
Ugh, let's not talk about it. Third time's the charm, they say, but not for me.
Ever thought about trying a different path? You might be barking up the wrong tree.
I've thought about it, but my parents... You know how they are. They think those who work outside the City Hall are all nobodies.
Please return. If anything changes, we'll post it on the notice board.
I'm not trying to rush you, but this lockdown's dragging on. Us merchants need to make a living, you know?
Hey, Grandma, check out that massive peach tree! Has it always been here?
Yup, that tree's been around longer than me. It's like the guardian of our generation.
When I was a kid, I used to make wishes on that peach tree during the Moon-chasing Festival.
I wanna make a wish too!
Take it easy. That peach tree's been watching over Jinzhou's kids for generations.
Hello, welcome to Jinzhou. Need help with anything?
Are you here to see the Magistrate? Cross the bridge and take the elevator up. Someone will meet you there.
Have a pleasant time in Jinzhou.
I've never seen so many visitors here at the City Hall. Who's our special guest?
The Magistrate said they're important to Jinzhou, even the whole of Huanglong. Must be someone pretty impressive then!
No, think about it. Whoever they are, they've gotta be old and wise. Like a master strategist.
Zhiyuan, stop sulking! I won't stop you. I'm just worried about you.
You... You're not Zhiyuan?... Oh, right. You're not...
I'm getting old and confused. I'm sorry, I'm sorry...
Why don't you come home, Zhiyuan...
I heard that Withering Frontline is undergoing a harsh and long battle.
The Rearguard camp has been operating at full capacity recently, due to the significant increase in the number of wounded soldiers from the battlefield.
The TD Outbreak is the biggest threat to Jinzhou. Unable to severe it entirely, the Midnight Rangers are feeling exhausted.
I'm really worried about the soldiers on the front line... We must also be ready to provide support.
Is General Jiyan still fighting on the front lines? I heard that he hasn't taken a rest for a long time.
Yeah, no one could talk him out of it. Sigh, General Jiyan used to be a doctor. He should know better than anyone else...
Get some more sleep and you'll feel better soon...
The injury is just too terrible. No one knows how long it'll take to get back. Baishan's still over there...
I know you're worried, but the less you can endure, the longer the recovery time you'll need.
Xiulan once said, it's crucial to inspect and protect your Tacetite weapon.
I'll be heading to the front lines to help my comrades soon. I need to be of help, not a trouble.
Have you memorized the rescue rules? There's no time for you to review them on the battlefield.
Aye, sir.
When do we leave?
Soon. Triage is a priority. Everyone, be careful when you're rescuing.
Did you figure out what the problem was?
Hold on. Let me try to fix it myself.
If it doesn't work out, submit a report and get more people. We're short-staffed right now.
Alright. I'll keep an eye on the other side of the device for you.
Hello, Rover.
The system has recognized that you have embarked on a unique journey, with your own companions and narrative.
As previously instructed, I will set up a test for you in the Jinzhou wilderness.
Once you pass the test, a key to the unknown will reveal itself to you.
I promise to stand by you unwaveringly as you begin your journey, and as you grow stronger, I will grant you access to more keys to unravel the mysteries that lie ahead.
There are countless unexplored parts of the world waiting for you, and I hope you’re prepared to embrace the unknown.
I wish you a pleasant journey.
Hello, Rover.
The system has identified multiple references to you in various folk tales, and your adventure continues.
As previously instructed, I will set up a test for you in the Jinzhou wilderness.
Once you pass the test, a key to the unknown will reveal itself to you.
Wishing you success on your test and may your travel go smoothly.
Hello, Rover.
The system has concluded that you have explored this realm and honed your physical and mental capabilities.
As instructed, I will set up a test for you in the Jinzhou wilderness.
Once you pass the test, a key to the unknown will reveal itself to you.
The responses you provide could potentially shape the future of SOL-3.
I hope you will enjoy your journey.
Looks like a child's diary...
Looks like a child's diary...
There's a crude drawing folded inside, with some scribbled words on the back.
There's a crude drawing folded inside, with some scribbled words on the back.
Is it the handiwork of one of the children back there?
Is it the handiwork of one of the children back there?
Or… a memory of an adult member's youth?
Or… a memory of an adult member's youth?
Let's join the Riverside Games after we beat that monster.
The Riverside Games...?
You won first place in the last armed race, remember? Don't back out now... I already counted you in!
We haven't held the Riverside Games in years. This should be another illusion from the past.
If everything goes well, perhaps we can hold it again this year...
We should be safe here.
Rover, I'll defend our base. General Jiyan has set off with his team to distract those Tacet Discords.
We'll leave the Disruptor to you.
That's amazing. I thought…
I thought this task wouldn't be easy, even for someone like you.
I underestimated you.
The Somnoire has grown increasingly chaotic and dangerous.
Recently, it has been devouring and copying all dreams without discrimination...
You'll encounter more bizarre occurrences in the Somnoire… Creatures, plants, Tacet Discords, and even your cherished friends.
While you are aware it's a dream, these sights may still leave a lasting impact on your psyche. I hope you are prepared.
Anyway… You did well today. I'll meet you outside the Gate.
Aim at that wall. We can pull ourselves over!
Mist, thunderstorms, and the so-called phantoms, all of these anomalies are due to the Mourning Aix's obsessions.
The CSC seniors were right in judging that there may be a similar bond between TDs as there is with humans, and I was right in judging that you are a very dependable partner.
I wish I could have you as my research partner in the future... Unfortunately, we have to transmit back the data we collect from this operation first.
Anyway, leave the wrapping up and documenting to me. If you have a chance, come find me in Huaxu! Next time we meet, I'll be sure to bring Hoshi's share along and become even more awesome!
Jiuyue also made observations and frequency recordings of the Bird Egg left in the field.
Jiuyue also made observations and frequency recordings of the Bird Egg left in the field.
Ugh… Yinlin! What are you doing?!
It all ends here, Dollmaker… You're going nowhere.
You of all people should know why the Fractsidus offered their help!
Yinlin… You... How dare you betray me!
I have never forgotten who I am. My bloodline is one of Jinzhou's Patrollers. I will always uphold my duty, just like my parents before me.
They fought to the last minute of their lives, trying to save the innocent.
Everything I've done... I did it for them!
No... you did it to relive the kindness you once felt.
But my parents are gone. So are everyone else's loved ones... It's time we wake up from this dream you've been spinning.
No! Don't you dare!
Careful... Those people don't look right! They've all Overclocked!
I'm not sure if the administration will approve the funding, but hopefully it won't take forever.
The Institute has sent us a lot more work, so I think we might get another hazelnut on the permit.
How much is missing? Let me do the math…
Everything okay with security?
No worries, we've double-checked everything.
You go about your business. I'll let the neighborhood Patrollers know if anything happens.
Hmmm? A report on the inspection and speculation about the First Resonator...
Isn't this an ancient post? How did it get bumped up again?
Is that an analysis thread on Mr. Xiangli's latest research? That I'll have to check it out.
This complaint really needs to go through, it's my last shot...
Hopefully, they'll just temporarily lock my account this time...
Hey, check it out! It's the first Resonance Nexus in Huanglong, part of our institute's collection. Isn't it gorgeous?
Back when I was a student, I visited the institute once. When my hand touched its surface, the metal felt chilly, almost as if it was saying hello.
That's when I realized I had to work here someday. I wanted to stay with it.
This antique item is more weathered and robust compared to other versions of the Resonance Nexus in Jinzhou. It's now a historical artifact of great significance.
But it's consistently harder to maintain than other models and requires several specific parts for repairs.
How long will you be gone this time? When are you leaving?
I'm not sure. I'm planning a trip to Huaxu Academy HQ.
Hmmm...
The Detection Stage lets us see all of Jinzhou's terrain, helping the Institute spot abnormal energy spikes quickly.
Xiaoshi swings by regularly with updates. The Midnight Rangers are out there holding the line and can sometimes spot signs our devices miss.
Ms. Zhang is super attentive. She's helped us dodge danger more times than I can count, and she's been on the job since I joined the Rangers.

Has the report been brought up yet?
No, I wanted to confirm again.
Why isn't it finished yet? How long has this been dragging on...
Did you find those Ecoacoustics reports? The ones filed recently?

Yeah, they want to review them again.

He's always making breakthroughs so quickly, we struggle to keep up.
But we have to keep up. If you can't even try to keep pace, why bother being an academic?
Do you know why there are names engraved on the abandoned turrets here?
Many years ago, the battlefield was filled with smoke as the Jinzhou Garrison regiment fought bravely and successfully pushed back the TD tide, reclaiming a small portion of the front line.
In those times, the majority of soldiers were ordinary people, and the demands of war were such that not everyone who departed left something behind.
Engraving the names of fallen comrades onto stone monuments might just be a way of commemorating their sacrifice and creating a sense of unity.
The group then devised a method to engrave the names of the deceased soldiers onto the turrets and continue the tradition.
The engravings here are their names.
I didn’t know any of them, but my grandpa said them so many times that I just remembered them all!
When I was a kid, he barely mentioned his war experiences. Lately, he has become increasingly forgetful and tends to reminisce about his younger days.
Grandpa was probably scared of forgetting, so he wanted other people to remember in his place.
Anyway, I’ve heard it a million times and can’t forget it even if I tried, and even if Grandpa forgets, I’ll remember it for a few more decades.
I can recite the names engraved on the monument backwards now.
Look, this is Shenyin, he’s nicknamed the Divine Eagle because of his incredible marksmanship.

He stuck to the front line with his gun for two whole days so that the others could retreat without harm. When he eventually returned to rescue him, he discovered that his leg had been shattered, he had lost a significant amount of blood, and yet he had managed to stay in his firing position until his last breath.
This is... Little Bean, she doesn’t have a name, that’s what everyone calls her.
She died as the first one to rush out and pull the alarm when the TD wave suddenly erupted, getting the TD’s attention and giving the others a chance to react.
Do you still want to hear more?
This one is Yuandong... next to this one is Beimo...
Yuandong was a military doctor, and when the TD wave broke out, he died fighting without any medical support.
Beimo was discovered in a cave-in after a week-long battle, and he rescued around twelve soldiers from starving to death beneath the sealed ground.
Here is Ziyu, and this is Xiaohua...
Do you still want to hear more?
Well, then I’ll stay here a little longer.
Dong's just got a sharp tongue.
He really knows about play. But he has to learn how to deliver it in a less outright way and let the young ones figure it out themselves.
When will he learn to restrain his complaints? We'd have no play to see if he scares those performers away.
I hope Qinghe's new play can satisfy his appetite, so he can stop nagging all day long.
The Threnodian's revival has done significant damage to the environment nearby...
Things have gotten even more dangerous out here. The closer we get to Norfall Barrens, the worse it gets.
I heard the front lines were pretty intense.
Yes, I've heard about it too. Thankfully, it's all over now, and the rain has stopped.
The goods have been piling up for so long. Finally, we can start shipping them out!
Yes. All thanks to that Rover.
Mom, mom! Where is that powerful person?
He will be here in a minute. How about we listen to the storyteller's tale of that person first, okay?
She will be here in a minute. How about we listen to the storyteller's tale of that person first, okay?
What a lucky coincidence, Rover. No way, you're actually here listening.
What do you think? Bet you're pumped to have your exploits told by a storyteller, right?
I dream of being as famous as you, Rover...
Ah, I see. So people are calling you Rover because you’re a roving traveler here.
People will likely associate the word Rover with their idea of “Hero” for a while!
漂泊者... This name will soon spread like wildfire in Huanglong, I reckon!
Make sure to relax and enjoy the hospitality of the people in Jinzhou, okay?
General Jiyan kicked me back here to heal after the Norfall Barrens battle.
Don’t worry though! My injuries aren't too bad.
Our extensive pre-war plans paid off. All units did great and we had way fewer casualties than usual.
I'm pretty good at fighting Tacet Discords, and I usually end up with a few scrapes and bruises. No biggie.
Speaking of that... General Jiyan got messed up pretty bad in the last battle. But he's already back at work, leading the recovery efforts on the front lines...
Ugh, I wish I could go and help him!
...My bad, I got sidetracked. Anyway, thank you so much for helping us!
Just a shiny box, but filled with random engineering parts...
Just a shiny box, but filled with random engineering parts...
It’s difficult to understand why the designer made it so noticeable... Maybe they simply forgot to include a button for turning off the lights?
It’s difficult to understand why the designer made it so noticeable... Maybe they simply forgot to include a button for turning off the lights?
Gather 'round, I have a tale to spin! Our feather-haired maiden faces a horde of beasts…
And just in time, a ray of light!
Sunbeams burst through the clouds, banishing darkness out of sight.
From the statue emerged two… Guess who we have?
None other than General Jiyan and the legendary Rover!
And lo! Ruins fell, a colossus shattered. The Overthrax meets its defeat.
Mountains and rivers exulted in glee, as the war's finale came to be.
As they say, why fear when fate is ours to take?
Amidst setbacks, heroes will rise to conquer. Their determination fuels the fire of hope in the darkest hour.
Under starlit skies we battled, divine Loong roaring above.
Now victorious, our songs of triumph shall shake the clouds!
And our story goes on...
